048@SuppressWarnings({"unchecked","rawtypes"})
049public class DefaultScriptingEngine implements ScriptingEngine
050{
051        @Override
052        public String ID()
053        {
054                return "DefaultScriptingEngine";
055        }
056
057        @Override
058        public String name()
059        {
060                return "Default Scripting Engine";
061        }
062
063        protected static final Map<String,Integer>      funcH   = new Hashtable<String,Integer>();
064        protected static final Map<String,Integer>      methH   = new Hashtable<String,Integer>();
065        protected static final Map<String,Integer>      progH   = new Hashtable<String,Integer>();
066        protected static final Map<String,Integer>      connH   = new Hashtable<String,Integer>();
067        protected static final Map<String,Integer>      gstatH  = new Hashtable<String,Integer>();
068        protected static final Map<String,Integer>      signH   = new Hashtable<String,Integer>();
069
070        protected static final Map<String,Pattern>      patterns= new Hashtable<String,Pattern>();
071
072        protected boolean                               noDelay                  = CMSecurity.isDisabled(CMSecurity.DisFlag.SCRIPTABLEDELAY);
073
074        protected String                                scope                    = "";
075        protected int                                   tickStatus               = Tickable.STATUS_NOT;
076        protected boolean                               isSavable                = true;
077        protected boolean                               alwaysTriggers   = false;
078
079        protected MOB                                   lastToHurtMe     = null;
080        protected Room                                  lastKnownLocation= null;
081        protected Tickable                              altStatusTickable= null;
082        protected List<DVector>                 oncesDone                = new Vector<DVector>();
083        protected Map<Integer,Integer>  delayTargetTimes = new Hashtable<Integer,Integer>();
084        protected Map<Integer,int[]>    delayProgCounters= new Hashtable<Integer,int[]>();
085        protected Map<Integer,Integer>  lastTimeProgsDone= new Hashtable<Integer,Integer>();
086        protected Map<Integer,Integer>  lastDayProgsDone = new Hashtable<Integer,Integer>();
087        protected Set<Integer>                  registeredEvents = new HashSet<Integer>();
088        protected Map<Integer,Long>             noTrigger                = new Hashtable<Integer,Long>();
089        protected MOB                                   backupMOB                = null;
090        protected CMMsg                                 lastMsg                  = null;
091        protected Resources                             resources                = null;
092        protected Environmental                 lastLoaded               = null;
093        protected String                                myScript                 = "";
094        protected String                                defaultQuestName = "";
095        protected String                                scriptKey                = null;
096        protected boolean                               runInPassiveAreas= true;
097        protected boolean                               debugBadScripts  = false;
098        protected List<ScriptableResponse>que                    = new Vector<ScriptableResponse>();
099        protected final AtomicInteger   recurseCounter   = new AtomicInteger();
100
101        public DefaultScriptingEngine()
102        {
103                super();
104                //CMClass.bumpCounter(this,CMClass.CMObjectType.COMMON);//removed for mem & perf
105                debugBadScripts=CMSecurity.isDebugging(CMSecurity.DbgFlag.BADSCRIPTS);
106                resources = Resources.instance();
107        }
108
109        @Override
110        public boolean isSavable()
111        {
112                return isSavable;
113        }
114
115        @Override
116        public void setSavable(final boolean truefalse)
117        {
118                isSavable = truefalse;
119        }
120
121        @Override
122        public String defaultQuestName()
123        {
124                return defaultQuestName;
125        }
126
127        protected Quest defaultQuest()
128        {
129                if(defaultQuestName.length()==0)
130                        return null;
131                return CMLib.quests().fetchQuest(defaultQuestName);
132        }
133
134        @Override
135        public void setVarScope(final String newScope)
136        {
137                if((newScope==null)||(newScope.trim().length()==0)||newScope.equalsIgnoreCase("GLOBAL"))
138                {
139                        scope="";
140                        resources=Resources.instance();
141                }
142                else
143                        scope=newScope.toUpperCase().trim();
144                if(scope.equalsIgnoreCase("*")||scope.equals("INDIVIDUAL"))
145                        resources = Resources.newResources();
146                else
147                {
148                        resources=(Resources)Resources.getResource("VARSCOPE-"+scope);
149                        if(resources==null)
150                        {
151                                resources = Resources.newResources();
152                                Resources.submitResource("VARSCOPE-"+scope,resources);
153                        }
154                }
155        }
156
157        @Override
158        public String getVarScope()
159        {
160                return scope;
161        }
162
163        protected Object[] newObjs()
164        {
165                return new Object[ScriptingEngine.SPECIAL_NUM_OBJECTS];
166        }
167
168        @Override
169        public String getLocalVarXML()
170        {
171                if((scope==null)||(scope.length()==0))
172                        return "";
173                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer("");
174                for(final Iterator<String> k = resources._findResourceKeys("SCRIPTVAR-");k.hasNext();)
175                {
176                        final String key=k.next();
177                        if(key.startsWith("SCRIPTVAR-"))
178                        {
179                                str.append("<"+key.substring(10)+">");
180                                final Hashtable<String,String> H=(Hashtable)resources._getResource(key);
181                                for(final Enumeration<String> e=H.keys();e.hasMoreElements();)
182                                {
183                                        final String vn=e.nextElement();
184                                        final String val=H.get(vn);
185                                        str.append("<"+vn+">"+CMLib.xml().parseOutAngleBrackets(val)+"</"+vn+">");
186                                }
187                                str.append("</"+key.substring(10)+">");
188                        }
189                }
190                return str.toString();
191        }
192
193        @Override
194        public void setLocalVarXML(final String xml)
195        {
196                for(final Iterator<String> k = Resources.findResourceKeys("SCRIPTVAR-");k.hasNext();)
197                {
198                        final String key=k.next();
199                        if(key.startsWith("SCRIPTVAR-"))
200                                resources._removeResource(key);
201                }
202                final List<XMLLibrary.XMLTag> V=CMLib.xml().parseAllXML(xml);
203                for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
204                {
205                        final XMLTag piece=V.get(v);
206                        if((piece.contents()!=null)&&(piece.contents().size()>0))
207                        {
208                                final String kkey="SCRIPTVAR-"+piece.tag();
209                                final Hashtable<String,String> H=new Hashtable<String,String>();
210                                for(int c=0;c<piece.contents().size();c++)
211                                {
212                                        final XMLTag piece2=piece.contents().get(c);
213                                        H.put(piece2.tag(),piece2.value());
214                                }
215                                resources._submitResource(kkey,H);
216                        }
217                }
218        }
219
220        private Quest getQuest(final String named)
221        {
222                if((defaultQuestName.length()>0)&&(named.equals("*")||named.equalsIgnoreCase(defaultQuestName)))
223                        return defaultQuest();
224
225                Quest Q=null;
226                for(int i=0;i<CMLib.quests().numQuests();i++)
227                {
228                        try
229                        {
230                                Q = CMLib.quests().fetchQuest(i);
231                        }
232                        catch (final Exception e)
233                        {
234                        }
235                        if(Q!=null)
236                        {
237                                if(Q.name().equalsIgnoreCase(named))
238                                {
239                                        if(Q.running())
240                                                return Q;
241                                }
242                        }
243                }
244                return CMLib.quests().fetchQuest(named);
245        }
246
247        @Override
248        public int getTickStatus()
249        {
250                final Tickable T=altStatusTickable;
251                if(T!=null)
252                        return T.getTickStatus();
253                return tickStatus;
254        }
255
256        @Override
257        public void registerDefaultQuest(final String qName)
258        {
259                if((qName==null)||(qName.trim().length()==0))
260                        defaultQuestName="";
261                else
262                        defaultQuestName=qName.trim();
263        }
264
265        @Override
266        public CMObject newInstance()
267        {
268                try
269                {
270                        return this.getClass().newInstance();
271                }
272                catch(final Exception e)
273                {
274                        Log.errOut(ID(),e);
275                }
276                return new DefaultScriptingEngine();
277        }
278
279        @Override
280        public CMObject copyOf()
281        {
282                try
283                {
284                        final DefaultScriptingEngine S=(DefaultScriptingEngine)this.clone();
285                        //CMClass.bumpCounter(S,CMClass.CMObjectType.COMMON);//removed for mem & perf
286                        S.reset();
287                        return S;
288                }
289                catch(final CloneNotSupportedException e)
290                {
291                        return new DefaultScriptingEngine();
292                }
293        }
294
295        /*
296        protected void finalize()
297        {
298                CMClass.unbumpCounter(this, CMClass.CMObjectType.COMMON);
299        }// removed for mem & perf
300        */
301
302        /*
303         * c=clean bit, r=pastbitclean, p=pastbit, s=remaining clean bits, t=trigger
304         */
305        protected String[] parseBits(final DVector script, final int row, final String instructions)
306        {
307                final String line=(String)script.elementAt(row,1);
308                final String[] newLine=parseBits(line,instructions);
309                script.setElementAt(row,2,newLine);
310                return newLine;
311        }
312
313        protected String[] parseSpecial3PartEval(final String[][] eval, final int t)
314        {
315                String[] tt=eval[0];
316                final String funcParms=tt[t];
317                final String[] tryTT=parseBits(funcParms,"ccr");
318                if(signH.containsKey(tryTT[1]))
319                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
320                else
321                {
322                        String[] parsed=null;
323                        if(CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms).equals(funcParms))
324                                parsed=parseBits("'"+funcParms+"' . .","cr");
325                        else
326                                parsed=parseBits(funcParms+" . .","cr");
327                        tt=insertStringArray(tt,parsed,t);
328                        eval[0]=tt;
329                }
330                return tt;
331        }
332
333        /*
334         * c=clean bit, r=pastbitclean, p=pastbit, s=remaining clean bits, t=trigger
335         */
336        protected String[] parseBits(String line, final String instructions)
337        {
338                String[] newLine=new String[instructions.length()];
339                for(int i=0;i<instructions.length();i++)
340                {
341                        switch(instructions.charAt(i))
342                        {
343                        case 'c':
344                                newLine[i] = CMParms.getCleanBit(line, i);
345                                break;
346                        case 'C':
347                                newLine[i] = CMParms.getCleanBit(line, i).toUpperCase().trim();
348                                break;
349                        case 'r':
350                                newLine[i] = CMParms.getPastBitClean(line, i - 1);
351                                break;
352                        case 'R':
353                                newLine[i] = CMParms.getPastBitClean(line, i - 1).toUpperCase().trim();
354                                break;
355                        case 'p':
356                                newLine[i] = CMParms.getPastBit(line, i - 1);
357                                break;
358                        case 'P':
359                                newLine[i] = CMParms.getPastBit(line, i - 1).toUpperCase().trim();
360                                break;
361                        case 'S':
362                                line = line.toUpperCase();
363                                //$FALL-THROUGH$
364                        case 's':
365                        {
366                                final String s = CMParms.getPastBit(line, i - 1);
367                                final int numBits = CMParms.numBits(s);
368                                final String[] newNewLine = new String[newLine.length - 1 + numBits];
369                                for (int x = 0; x < i; x++)
370                                        newNewLine[x] = newLine[x];
371                                for (int x = 0; x < numBits; x++)
372                                        newNewLine[i + x] = CMParms.getCleanBit(s, i - 1);
373                                newLine = newNewLine;
374                                i = instructions.length();
375                                break;
376                        }
377                        case 'T':
378                                line = line.toUpperCase();
379                                //$FALL-THROUGH$
380                        case 't':
381                        {
382                                final String s = CMParms.getPastBit(line, i - 1);
383                                String[] newNewLine = null;
384                                if (CMParms.getCleanBit(s, 0).equalsIgnoreCase("P"))
385                                {
386                                        newNewLine = new String[newLine.length + 1];
387                                        for (int x = 0; x < i; x++)
388                                                newNewLine[x] = newLine[x];
389                                        newNewLine[i] = "P";
390                                        newNewLine[i + 1] = CMParms.getPastBitClean(s, 0);
391                                }
392                                else
393                                {
394
395                                        final int numNewBits = (s.trim().length() == 0) ? 1 : CMParms.numBits(s);
396                                        newNewLine = new String[newLine.length - 1 + numNewBits];
397                                        for (int x = 0; x < i; x++)
398                                                newNewLine[x] = newLine[x];
399                                        for (int x = 0; x < numNewBits; x++)
400                                                newNewLine[i + x] = CMParms.getCleanBit(s, x);
401                                }
402                                newLine = newNewLine;
403                                i = instructions.length();
404                                break;
405                        }
406                        }
407                }
408                return newLine;
409        }
410
411        protected String[] insertStringArray(final String[] oldS, final String[] inS, final int where)
412        {
413                final String[] newLine=new String[oldS.length+inS.length-1];
414                for(int i=0;i<where;i++)
415                        newLine[i]=oldS[i];
416                for(int i=0;i<inS.length;i++)
417                        newLine[where+i]=inS[i];
418                for(int i=where+1;i<oldS.length;i++)
419                        newLine[inS.length+i-1]=oldS[i];
420                return newLine;
421        }
422
423        /*
424         * c=clean bit, r=pastbitclean, p=pastbit, s=remaining clean bits, t=trigger
425         */
426        protected String[] parseBits(final String[][] oldBits, final int start, final String instructions)
427        {
428                final String[] tt=oldBits[0];
429                final String parseMe=tt[start];
430                final String[] parsed=parseBits(parseMe,instructions);
431                if(parsed.length==1)
432                {
433                        tt[start]=parsed[0];
434                        return tt;
435                }
436                final String[] newLine=insertStringArray(tt,parsed,start);
437                oldBits[0]=newLine;
438                return newLine;
439        }
440
441        @Override
442        public boolean endQuest(final PhysicalAgent hostObj, final MOB mob, final String quest)
443        {
444                if(mob!=null)
445                {
446                        final List<DVector> scripts=getScripts();
447                        if(!mob.amDead())
448                                lastKnownLocation=mob.location();
449                        String trigger="";
450                        String[] tt=null;
451                        for(int v=0;v<scripts.size();v++)
452                        {
453                                final DVector script=scripts.get(v);
454                                if(script.size()>0)
455                                {
456                                        trigger=((String)script.elementAt(0,1)).toUpperCase().trim();
457                                        tt=(String[])script.elementAt(0,2);
458                                        if((getTriggerCode(trigger,tt)==13) //questtimeprog
459                                        &&(!oncesDone.contains(script)))
460                                        {
461                                                if(tt==null)
462                                                        tt=parseBits(script,0,"CCC");
463                                                if((tt!=null)
464                                                &&((tt[1].equals(quest)||(tt[1].equals("*"))))
465                                                &&(CMath.s_int(tt[2])<0))
466                                                {
467                                                        oncesDone.add(script);
468                                                        execute(hostObj,mob,mob,mob,null,null,script,null,newObjs());
469                                                        return true;
470                                                }
471                                        }
472                                }
473                        }
474                }
475                return false;
476        }
477
478        @Override
479        public List<String> externalFiles()
480        {
481                final Vector<String> xmlfiles=new Vector<String>();
482                parseLoads(getScript(), 0, xmlfiles, null);
483                return xmlfiles;
484        }
485
486        protected String getVarHost(final Environmental E,
487                                                                String rawHost,
488                                                                final MOB source,
489                                                                final Environmental target,
490                                                                final PhysicalAgent scripted,
491                                                                final MOB monster,
492                                                                final Item primaryItem,
493                                                                final Item secondaryItem,
494                                                                final String msg,
495                                                                final Object[] tmp)
496        {
497                if(!rawHost.equals("*"))
498                {
499                        if(E==null)
500                                rawHost=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,rawHost);
501                        else
502                        if(E instanceof Room)
503                                rawHost=CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID((Room)E);
504                        else
505                                rawHost=E.Name();
506                }
507                return rawHost;
508        }
509
510        @Override
511        public boolean isVar(final String host, String var)
512        {
513                if(host.equalsIgnoreCase("*"))
514                {
515                        String val=null;
516                        Hashtable H=null;
517                        String key=null;
518                        var=var.toUpperCase();
519                        for(final Iterator<String> k = resources._findResourceKeys("SCRIPTVAR-");k.hasNext();)
520                        {
521                                key=k.next();
522                                if(key.startsWith("SCRIPTVAR-"))
523                                {
524                                        H=(Hashtable)resources._getResource(key);
525                                        val=(String)H.get(var);
526                                        if(val!=null)
527                                                return true;
528                                }
529                        }
530                        return false;
531                }
532                final Hashtable H=(Hashtable)resources._getResource("SCRIPTVAR-"+host);
533                String val=null;
534                if(H!=null)
535                        val=(String)H.get(var.toUpperCase());
536                return (val!=null);
537        }
538
539        public String getVar(final Environmental E, final String rawHost, final String var, final MOB source, final Environmental target,
540                                                 final PhysicalAgent scripted, final MOB monster, final Item primaryItem, final Item secondaryItem, final String msg,
541                                                 final Object[] tmp)
542        {
543                return getVar(getVarHost(E,rawHost,source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp),var);
544        }
545
546        @Override
547        public String getVar(final String host, final String var)
548        {
549                String varVal = getVar(resources,host,var,null);
550                if(varVal != null)
551                        return varVal;
552                if((this.defaultQuestName!=null)&&(this.defaultQuestName.length()>0))
553                {
554                        final Resources questResources=(Resources)Resources.getResource("VARSCOPE-"+this.defaultQuestName);
555                        if((questResources != null)&&(resources!=questResources))
556                        {
557                                varVal = getVar(questResources,host,var,null);
558                                if(varVal != null)
559                                        return varVal;
560                        }
561                }
562                if(resources == Resources.instance())
563                        return "";
564                return getVar(Resources.instance(),host,var,"");
565        }
566
567        public String getVar(final Resources resources, final String host, String var, final String defaultVal)
568        {
569                if(host.equalsIgnoreCase("*"))
570                {
571                        if(var.equals("COFFEEMUD_SYSTEM_INTERNAL_NONFILENAME_SCRIPT"))
572                        {
573                                final StringBuffer str=new StringBuffer("");
574                                parseLoads(getScript(),0,null,str);
575                                return str.toString();
576                        }
577                        String val=null;
578                        Hashtable H=null;
579                        String key=null;
580                        var=var.toUpperCase();
581                        for(final Iterator<String> k = resources._findResourceKeys("SCRIPTVAR-");k.hasNext();)
582                        {
583                                key=k.next();
584                                if(key.startsWith("SCRIPTVAR-"))
585                                {
586                                        H=(Hashtable)resources._getResource(key);
587                                        val=(String)H.get(var);
588                                        if(val!=null)
589                                                return val;
590                                }
591                        }
592                        return defaultVal;
593                }
594                Resources.instance();
595                final Hashtable H=(Hashtable)resources._getResource("SCRIPTVAR-"+host);
596                String val=null;
597                if(H!=null)
598                        val=(String)H.get(var.toUpperCase());
599                else
600                if((defaultQuestName!=null)&&(defaultQuestName.length()>0))
601                {
602                        final MOB M=CMLib.players().getPlayerAllHosts(host);
603                        if(M!=null)
604                        {
605                                for(final Enumeration<ScriptingEngine> e=M.scripts();e.hasMoreElements();)
606                                {
607                                        final ScriptingEngine SE=e.nextElement();
608                                        if((SE!=null)
609                                        &&(SE!=this)
610                                        &&(defaultQuestName.equalsIgnoreCase(SE.defaultQuestName()))
611                                        &&(SE.isVar(host,var)))
612                                                return SE.getVar(host,var);
613                                }
614                        }
615                }
616                if(val==null)
617                        return defaultVal;
618                return val;
619        }
620
621        private StringBuffer getResourceFileData(final String named, final boolean showErrors)
622        {
623                if(getQuest("*")!=null)
624                        return getQuest("*").getResourceFileData(named, showErrors);
625                return new CMFile(Resources.makeFileResourceName(named),null,CMFile.FLAG_LOGERRORS).text();
626        }
627
628        @Override
629        public String getScript()
630        {
631                return myScript;
632        }
633
634        public void reset()
635        {
636                que = new Vector<ScriptableResponse>();
637                lastToHurtMe = null;
638                lastKnownLocation= null;
639                altStatusTickable= null;
640                oncesDone = new Vector<DVector>();
641                delayTargetTimes = new Hashtable<Integer,Integer>();
642                delayProgCounters= new Hashtable<Integer,int[]>();
643                lastTimeProgsDone= new Hashtable<Integer,Integer>();
644                lastDayProgsDone = new Hashtable<Integer,Integer>();
645                registeredEvents = new HashSet<Integer>();
646                noTrigger = new Hashtable<Integer,Long>();
647                backupMOB = null;
648                lastMsg = null;
649        }
650
651        @Override
652        public void setScript(String newParms)
653        {
654                newParms=CMStrings.replaceAll(newParms,"'","`");
655                if(newParms.startsWith("+"))
656                {
657                        final String superParms=getScript();
658                        Resources.removeResource(getScriptResourceKey());
659                        newParms=superParms+";"+newParms.substring(1);
660                }
661                myScript=newParms;
662                reset();
663                if(myScript.length()>100)
664                        scriptKey="PARSEDPRG: "+myScript.substring(0,100)+myScript.length()+myScript.hashCode();
665                else
666                        scriptKey="PARSEDPRG: "+myScript;
667        }
668
669        public boolean isFreeToBeTriggered(final Tickable affecting)
670        {
671                if(alwaysTriggers)
672                        return CMLib.flags().canActAtAll(affecting);
673                else
674                        return CMLib.flags().canFreelyBehaveNormal(affecting);
675        }
676
677        protected String parseLoads(final String text, final int depth, final Vector<String> filenames, final StringBuffer nonFilenameScript)
678        {
679                final StringBuffer results=new StringBuffer("");
680                String parse=text;
681                if(depth>10) return "";  // no including off to infinity
682                String p=null;
683                while(parse.length()>0)
684                {
685                        final int y=parse.toUpperCase().indexOf("LOAD=");
686                        if(y>=0)
687                        {
688                                p=parse.substring(0,y).trim();
689                                if((!p.endsWith(";"))
690                                &&(!p.endsWith("\n"))
691                                &&(!p.endsWith("~"))
692                                &&(!p.endsWith("\r"))
693                                &&(p.length()>0))
694                                {
695                                        if(nonFilenameScript!=null)
696                                                nonFilenameScript.append(parse.substring(0,y+1));
697                                        results.append(parse.substring(0,y+1));
698                                        parse=parse.substring(y+1);
699                                        continue;
700                                }
701                                results.append(p+"\n");
702                                int z=parse.indexOf('~',y);
703                                while((z>0)&&(parse.charAt(z-1)=='\\'))
704                                        z=parse.indexOf('~',z+1);
705                                if(z>0)
706                                {
707                                        final String filename=parse.substring(y+5,z).trim();
708                                        parse=parse.substring(z+1);
709                                        if((filenames!=null)&&(!filenames.contains(filename)))
710                                                filenames.addElement(filename);
711                                        results.append(parseLoads(getResourceFileData(filename, true).toString(),depth+1,filenames,null));
712                                }
713                                else
714                                {
715                                        final String filename=parse.substring(y+5).trim();
716                                        if((filenames!=null)&&(!filenames.contains(filename)))
717                                                filenames.addElement(filename);
718                                        results.append(parseLoads(getResourceFileData(filename, true).toString(),depth+1,filenames,null));
719                                        break;
720                                }
721                        }
722                        else
723                        {
724                                if(nonFilenameScript!=null)
725                                        nonFilenameScript.append(parse);
726                                results.append(parse);
727                                break;
728                        }
729                }
730                return results.toString();
731        }
732
733        protected void buildHashes()
734        {
735                synchronized(funcH)
736                {
737                        if(funcH.size()==0)
738                        {
739                                for(int i=0;i<funcs.length;i++)
740                                        funcH.put(funcs[i],Integer.valueOf(i+1));
741                                for(int i=0;i<methods.length;i++)
742                                        methH.put(methods[i],Integer.valueOf(i+1));
743                                for(int i=0;i<progs.length;i++)
744                                        progH.put(progs[i],Integer.valueOf(i+1));
745                                for(int i=0;i<CONNECTORS.length;i++)
746                                        connH.put(CONNECTORS[i],Integer.valueOf(i));
747                                for(int i=0;i<GSTATCODES_ADDITIONAL.length;i++)
748                                        gstatH.put(GSTATCODES_ADDITIONAL[i],Integer.valueOf(i));
749                                for(int i=0;i<SIGNS.length;i++)
750                                        signH.put(SIGNS[i],Integer.valueOf(i));
751                        }
752                }
753        }
754
755        protected Vector<DVector> parseScripts(String text)
756        {
757                buildHashes();
758                text=parseLoads(text,0,null,null);
759                final List<List<String>> V = CMParms.parseDoubleDelimited(text,'~',';');
760                final Vector<DVector> V2=new Vector<DVector>(2);
761                for(final List<String> ls : V)
762                {
763                        final DVector DV=new DVector(2);
764                        for(final String s : ls)
765                                DV.addElement(s,null);
766                        V2.add(DV);
767                }
768                return V2;
769        }
770
771        protected Room getRoom(final String thisName, final Room imHere)
772        {
773                if(thisName.length()==0)
774                        return null;
775                if((imHere!=null)&&(imHere.roomID().equalsIgnoreCase(thisName)))
776                        return imHere;
777                if((imHere!=null)&&(thisName.startsWith("#"))&&(CMath.isLong(thisName.substring(1))))
778                        return CMLib.map().getRoom(imHere.getArea().Name()+thisName);
779                final Room room=CMLib.map().getRoom(thisName);
780                if((room!=null)&&(room.roomID().equalsIgnoreCase(thisName)))
781                {
782                        if(CMath.bset(room.getArea().flags(),Area.FLAG_INSTANCE_PARENT)
783                        &&(imHere!=null)
784                        &&(CMath.bset(imHere.getArea().flags(),Area.FLAG_INSTANCE_CHILD))
785                        &&(imHere.getArea().Name().endsWith("_"+room.getArea().Name()))
786                        &&(thisName.indexOf('#')>=0))
787                        {
788                                final Room otherRoom=CMLib.map().getRoom(imHere.getArea().Name()+thisName.substring(thisName.indexOf('#')));
789                                if((otherRoom!=null)&&(otherRoom.roomID().endsWith(thisName)))
790                                        return otherRoom;
791                        }
792                        return room;
793                }
794
795                List<Room> rooms=new Vector<Room>(1);
796                if((imHere!=null)&&(imHere.getArea()!=null))
797                        rooms=CMLib.map().findAreaRoomsLiberally(null, imHere.getArea(), thisName, "RIEPM",100);
798                if(rooms.size()==0)
799                {
800                        if(debugBadScripts)
801                                Log.debugOut("ScriptingEngine","World room search called for: "+thisName);
802                        rooms=CMLib.map().findWorldRoomsLiberally(null,thisName, "RIEPM",100,2000);
803                }
804                if(rooms.size()>0)
805                        return rooms.get(CMLib.dice().roll(1,rooms.size(),-1));
806                if(room == null)
807                {
808                        final int x=thisName.indexOf('@');
809                        if(x>0)
810                        {
811                                Room R=CMLib.map().getRoom(thisName.substring(x+1));
812                                if((R==null)||(R==imHere))
813                                {
814                                        final Area A=CMLib.map().getArea(thisName.substring(x+1));
815                                        R=(A!=null)?A.getRandomMetroRoom():null;
816                                }
817                                if((R!=null)&&(R!=imHere))
818                                        return getRoom(thisName.substring(0,x),R);
819                        }
820                }
821                return room;
822        }
823
824        protected void logError(final Environmental scripted, final String cmdName, final String errType, final String errMsg)
825        {
826                if(scripted!=null)
827                {
828                        final Room R=CMLib.map().roomLocation(scripted);
829                        Log.errOut("Scripting",scripted.name()+"/"+CMLib.map().getDescriptiveExtendedRoomID(R)+"/"+ cmdName+"/"+errType+"/"+errMsg);
830                        if(R!=null)
831                                R.showHappens(CMMsg.MSG_OK_VISUAL,L("Scripting Error: @x1/@x2/@x3/@x4/@x5/@x6",scripted.name(),CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(R),CMParms.toListString(externalFiles()),cmdName,errType,errMsg));
832                }
833                else
834                        Log.errOut("Scripting","*/*/"+CMParms.toListString(externalFiles())+"/"+cmdName+"/"+errType+"/"+errMsg);
835
836        }
837
838        protected boolean simpleEvalStr(final Environmental scripted, final String arg1, final String arg2, final String cmp, final String cmdName)
839        {
840                final int x=arg1.compareToIgnoreCase(arg2);
841                final Integer SIGN=signH.get(cmp);
842                if(SIGN==null)
843                {
844                        logError(scripted,cmdName,"Syntax",arg1+" "+cmp+" "+arg2);
845                        return false;
846                }
847                switch(SIGN.intValue())
848                {
849                case SIGN_EQUL:
850                        return (x == 0);
851                case SIGN_EQGT:
852                case SIGN_GTEQ:
853                        return (x == 0) || (x > 0);
854                case SIGN_EQLT:
855                case SIGN_LTEQ:
856                        return (x == 0) || (x < 0);
857                case SIGN_GRAT:
858                        return (x > 0);
859                case SIGN_LEST:
860                        return (x < 0);
861                case SIGN_NTEQ:
862                        return (x != 0);
863                default:
864                        return (x == 0);
865                }
866        }
867
868        protected boolean simpleEval(final Environmental scripted, final String arg1, final String arg2, final String cmp, final String cmdName)
869        {
870                final long val1=CMath.s_long(arg1.trim());
871                final long val2=CMath.s_long(arg2.trim());
872                final Integer SIGN=signH.get(cmp);
873                if(SIGN==null)
874                {
875                        logError(scripted,cmdName,"Syntax",val1+" "+cmp+" "+val2);
876                        return false;
877                }
878                switch(SIGN.intValue())
879                {
880                case SIGN_EQUL:
881                        return (val1 == val2);
882                case SIGN_EQGT:
883                case SIGN_GTEQ:
884                        return val1 >= val2;
885                case SIGN_EQLT:
886                case SIGN_LTEQ:
887                        return val1 <= val2;
888                case SIGN_GRAT:
889                        return (val1 > val2);
890                case SIGN_LEST:
891                        return (val1 < val2);
892                case SIGN_NTEQ:
893                        return (val1 != val2);
894                default:
895                        return (val1 == val2);
896                }
897        }
898
899        protected boolean simpleExpressionEval(final Environmental scripted, final String arg1, final String arg2, final String cmp, final String cmdName)
900        {
901                final double val1=CMath.s_parseMathExpression(arg1.trim());
902                final double val2=CMath.s_parseMathExpression(arg2.trim());
903                final Integer SIGN=signH.get(cmp);
904                if(SIGN==null)
905                {
906                        logError(scripted,cmdName,"Syntax",val1+" "+cmp+" "+val2);
907                        return false;
908                }
909                switch(SIGN.intValue())
910                {
911                case SIGN_EQUL:
912                        return (val1 == val2);
913                case SIGN_EQGT:
914                case SIGN_GTEQ:
915                        return val1 >= val2;
916                case SIGN_EQLT:
917                case SIGN_LTEQ:
918                        return val1 <= val2;
919                case SIGN_GRAT:
920                        return (val1 > val2);
921                case SIGN_LEST:
922                        return (val1 < val2);
923                case SIGN_NTEQ:
924                        return (val1 != val2);
925                default:
926                        return (val1 == val2);
927                }
928        }
929
930        protected List<PhysicalAgent> loadMobsFromFile(final Environmental scripted, String filename)
931        {
932                filename=filename.trim();
933                List monsters=(List)Resources.getResource("RANDOMMONSTERS-"+filename);
934                if(monsters!=null)
935                        return monsters;
936                final StringBuffer buf=getResourceFileData(filename, true);
937                String thangName="null";
938                final Room R=CMLib.map().roomLocation(scripted);
939                if(R!=null)
940                        thangName=scripted.name()+" at "+CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID((Room)scripted);
941                else
942                if(scripted!=null)
943                        thangName=scripted.name();
944                if((buf==null)||(buf.length()<20))
945                {
946                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Unknown XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
947                        return null;
948                }
949                final List<XMLLibrary.XMLTag> xml=CMLib.xml().parseAllXML(buf.toString());
950                monsters=new Vector<PhysicalAgent>();
951                if(xml!=null)
952                {
953                        if(CMLib.xml().getContentsFromPieces(xml,"MOBS")!=null)
954                        {
955                                final String error=CMLib.coffeeMaker().addMOBsFromXML(xml,monsters,null);
956                                if(error.length()>0)
957                                {
958                                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Error in XML file: '"+filename+"'");
959                                        return null;
960                                }
961                                if(monsters.size()<=0)
962                                {
963                                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Empty XML file: '"+filename+"'");
964                                        return null;
965                                }
966                                Resources.submitResource("RANDOMMONSTERS-"+filename,monsters);
967                                for(final Object O : monsters)
968                                {
969                                        if(O instanceof MOB)
970                                                CMLib.threads().deleteAllTicks((MOB)O);
971                                }
972                        }
973                        else
974                        {
975                                logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","No MOBs in XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
976                                return null;
977                        }
978                }
979                else
980                {
981                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Invalid XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
982                        return null;
983                }
984                return monsters;
985        }
986
987        protected List<PhysicalAgent> generateMobsFromFile(final Environmental scripted, String filename, final String tagName, final String rest)
988        {
989                filename=filename.trim();
990                List monsters=(List)Resources.getResource("RANDOMGENMONSTERS-"+filename+"."+tagName+"-"+rest);
991                if(monsters!=null)
992                        return monsters;
993                final StringBuffer buf=getResourceFileData(filename, true);
994                String thangName="null";
995                final Room R=CMLib.map().roomLocation(scripted);
996                if(R!=null)
997                        thangName=scripted.name()+" at "+CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID((Room)scripted);
998                else
999                if(scripted!=null)
1000                        thangName=scripted.name();
1001                if((buf==null)||(buf.length()<20))
1002                {
1003                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Unknown XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1004                        return null;
1005                }
1006                final List<XMLLibrary.XMLTag> xml=CMLib.xml().parseAllXML(buf.toString());
1007                monsters=new Vector<PhysicalAgent>();
1008                if(xml!=null)
1009                {
1010                        if(CMLib.xml().getContentsFromPieces(xml,"AREADATA")!=null)
1011                        {
1012                                final Hashtable<String,Object> definedIDs = new Hashtable<String,Object>();
1013                                final Map<String,String> eqParms=new HashMap<String,String>();
1014                                eqParms.putAll(CMParms.parseEQParms(rest.trim()));
1015                                final String idName=tagName.toUpperCase();
1016                                try
1017                                {
1018                                        CMLib.percolator().buildDefinedIDSet(xml,definedIDs);
1019                                        if((!(definedIDs.get(idName) instanceof XMLTag))
1020                                        ||(!((XMLTag)definedIDs.get(idName)).tag().equalsIgnoreCase("MOB")))
1021                                        {
1022                                                logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Non-MOB tag '"+idName+"' for XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1023                                                return null;
1024                                        }
1025                                        final XMLTag piece=(XMLTag)definedIDs.get(idName);
1026                                        definedIDs.putAll(eqParms);
1027                                        try
1028                                        {
1029                                                CMLib.percolator().checkRequirements(piece, definedIDs);
1030                                        }
1031                                        catch(final CMException cme)
1032                                        {
1033                                                logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Required ids for "+idName+" were missing for XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName+": "+cme.getMessage());
1034                                                return null;
1035                                        }
1036                                        CMLib.percolator().preDefineReward(piece, definedIDs);
1037                                        CMLib.percolator().defineReward(piece,definedIDs);
1038                                        monsters.addAll(CMLib.percolator().findMobs(piece, definedIDs));
1039                                        CMLib.percolator().postProcess(definedIDs);
1040                                        if(monsters.size()<=0)
1041                                        {
1042                                                logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Empty XML file: '"+filename+"'");
1043                                                return null;
1044                                        }
1045                                        Resources.submitResource("RANDOMGENMONSTERS-"+filename+"."+tagName+"-"+rest,monsters);
1046                                }
1047                                catch(final CMException cex)
1048                                {
1049                                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Unable to generate "+idName+" from XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName+": "+cex.getMessage());
1050                                        return null;
1051                                }
1052                        }
1053                        else
1054                        {
1055                                logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Invalid GEN XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1056                                return null;
1057                        }
1058                }
1059                else
1060                {
1061                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Empty or Invalid XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1062                        return null;
1063                }
1064                return monsters;
1065        }
1066
1067        protected List<PhysicalAgent> loadItemsFromFile(final Environmental scripted, String filename)
1068        {
1069                filename=filename.trim();
1070                List items=(List)Resources.getResource("RANDOMITEMS-"+filename);
1071                if(items!=null)
1072                        return items;
1073                final StringBuffer buf=getResourceFileData(filename, true);
1074                String thangName="null";
1075                final Room R=CMLib.map().roomLocation(scripted);
1076                if(R!=null)
1077                        thangName=scripted.name()+" at "+CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID((Room)scripted);
1078                else
1079                if(scripted!=null)
1080                        thangName=scripted.name();
1081                if((buf==null)||(buf.length()<20))
1082                {
1083                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Unknown XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1084                        return null;
1085                }
1086                items=new Vector<PhysicalAgent>();
1087                final List<XMLLibrary.XMLTag> xml=CMLib.xml().parseAllXML(buf.toString());
1088                if(xml!=null)
1089                {
1090                        if(CMLib.xml().getContentsFromPieces(xml,"ITEMS")!=null)
1091                        {
1092                                final String error=CMLib.coffeeMaker().addItemsFromXML(buf.toString(),items,null);
1093                                if(error.length()>0)
1094                                {
1095                                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Error in XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1096                                        return null;
1097                                }
1098                                if(items.size()<=0)
1099                                {
1100                                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Empty XML file: '"+filename+"'");
1101                                        return null;
1102                                }
1103                                for(final Object O : items)
1104                                {
1105                                        if(O instanceof Item)
1106                                                CMLib.threads().deleteTick((Item)O, -1);
1107                                }
1108                                Resources.submitResource("RANDOMITEMS-"+filename,items);
1109                        }
1110                        else
1111                        {
1112                                logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","No ITEMS in XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1113                                return null;
1114                        }
1115                }
1116                else
1117                {
1118                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Empty or invalid XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1119                        return null;
1120                }
1121                return items;
1122        }
1123
1124        protected List<PhysicalAgent> generateItemsFromFile(final Environmental scripted, String filename, final String tagName, final String rest)
1125        {
1126                filename=filename.trim();
1127                List items=(List)Resources.getResource("RANDOMGENITEMS-"+filename+"."+tagName+"-"+rest);
1128                if(items!=null)
1129                        return items;
1130                final StringBuffer buf=getResourceFileData(filename, true);
1131                String thangName="null";
1132                final Room R=CMLib.map().roomLocation(scripted);
1133                if(R!=null)
1134                        thangName=scripted.name()+" at "+CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID((Room)scripted);
1135                else
1136                if(scripted!=null)
1137                        thangName=scripted.name();
1138                if((buf==null)||(buf.length()<20))
1139                {
1140                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Unknown XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1141                        return null;
1142                }
1143                items=new Vector<PhysicalAgent>();
1144                final List<XMLLibrary.XMLTag> xml=CMLib.xml().parseAllXML(buf.toString());
1145                if(xml!=null)
1146                {
1147                        if(CMLib.xml().getContentsFromPieces(xml,"AREADATA")!=null)
1148                        {
1149                                final Hashtable<String,Object> definedIDs = new Hashtable<String,Object>();
1150                                final Map<String,String> eqParms=new HashMap<String,String>();
1151                                eqParms.putAll(CMParms.parseEQParms(rest.trim()));
1152                                final String idName=tagName.toUpperCase();
1153                                try
1154                                {
1155                                        CMLib.percolator().buildDefinedIDSet(xml,definedIDs);
1156                                        if((!(definedIDs.get(idName) instanceof XMLTag))
1157                                        ||(!((XMLTag)definedIDs.get(idName)).tag().equalsIgnoreCase("ITEM")))
1158                                        {
1159                                                logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Non-ITEM tag '"+idName+"' for XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1160                                                return null;
1161                                        }
1162                                        final XMLTag piece=(XMLTag)definedIDs.get(idName);
1163                                        definedIDs.putAll(eqParms);
1164                                        try
1165                                        {
1166                                                CMLib.percolator().checkRequirements(piece, definedIDs);
1167                                        }
1168                                        catch(final CMException cme)
1169                                        {
1170                                                logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Required ids for "+idName+" were missing for XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName+": "+cme.getMessage());
1171                                                return null;
1172                                        }
1173                                        CMLib.percolator().preDefineReward(piece, definedIDs);
1174                                        CMLib.percolator().defineReward(piece,definedIDs);
1175                                        items.addAll(CMLib.percolator().findItems(piece, definedIDs));
1176                                        CMLib.percolator().postProcess(definedIDs);
1177                                        if(items.size()<=0)
1178                                        {
1179                                                logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Empty XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1180                                                return null;
1181                                        }
1182                                        Resources.submitResource("RANDOMGENITEMS-"+filename+"."+tagName+"-"+rest,items);
1183                                }
1184                                catch(final CMException cex)
1185                                {
1186                                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Unable to generate "+idName+" from XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName+": "+cex.getMessage());
1187                                        return null;
1188                                }
1189                        }
1190                        else
1191                        {
1192                                logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Not a GEN XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1193                                return null;
1194                        }
1195                }
1196                else
1197                {
1198                        logError(scripted,"XMLLOAD","?","Empty or Invalid XML file: '"+filename+"' in "+thangName);
1199                        return null;
1200                }
1201                return items;
1202        }
1203
1204        protected Environmental findSomethingCalledThis(final String thisName, final MOB meMOB, final Room imHere, List<Environmental> OBJS, final boolean mob)
1205        {
1206                if(thisName.length()==0)
1207                        return null;
1208                Environmental thing=null;
1209                Environmental areaThing=null;
1210                if(thisName.toUpperCase().trim().startsWith("FROMFILE "))
1211                {
1212                        try
1213                        {
1214                                List V=null;
1215                                if(mob)
1216                                        V=loadMobsFromFile(null,CMParms.getCleanBit(thisName,1));
1217                                else
1218                                        V=loadItemsFromFile(null,CMParms.getCleanBit(thisName,1));
1219                                if(V!=null)
1220                                {
1221                                        final String name=CMParms.getPastBitClean(thisName,1);
1222                                        if(name.equalsIgnoreCase("ALL"))
1223                                                OBJS=V;
1224                                        else
1225                                        if(name.equalsIgnoreCase("ANY"))
1226                                        {
1227                                                if(V.size()>0)
1228                                                        areaThing=(Environmental)V.get(CMLib.dice().roll(1,V.size(),-1));
1229                                        }
1230                                        else
1231                                        {
1232                                                areaThing=CMLib.english().fetchEnvironmental(V,name,true);
1233                                                if(areaThing==null)
1234                                                        areaThing=CMLib.english().fetchEnvironmental(V,name,false);
1235                                        }
1236                                }
1237                        }
1238                        catch(final Exception e)
1239                        {
1240                        }
1241                }
1242                else
1243                if(thisName.toUpperCase().trim().startsWith("FROMGENFILE "))
1244                {
1245                        try
1246                        {
1247                                List V=null;
1248                                final String filename=CMParms.getCleanBit(thisName, 1);
1249                                final String name=CMParms.getCleanBit(thisName, 2);
1250                                final String tagName=CMParms.getCleanBit(thisName, 3);
1251                                final String theRest=CMParms.getPastBitClean(thisName,3);
1252                                if(mob)
1253                                        V=generateMobsFromFile(null,filename, tagName, theRest);
1254                                else
1255                                        V=generateItemsFromFile(null,filename, tagName, theRest);
1256                                if(V!=null)
1257                                {
1258                                        if(name.equalsIgnoreCase("ALL"))
1259                                                OBJS=V;
1260                                        else
1261                                        if(name.equalsIgnoreCase("ANY"))
1262                                        {
1263                                                if(V.size()>0)
1264                                                        areaThing=(Environmental)V.get(CMLib.dice().roll(1,V.size(),-1));
1265                                        }
1266                                        else
1267                                        {
1268                                                areaThing=CMLib.english().fetchEnvironmental(V,name,true);
1269                                                if(areaThing==null)
1270                                                        areaThing=CMLib.english().fetchEnvironmental(V,name,false);
1271                                        }
1272                                }
1273                        }
1274                        catch(final Exception e)
1275                        {
1276                        }
1277                }
1278                else
1279                {
1280                        if(!mob)
1281                                areaThing=(meMOB!=null)?meMOB.findItem(thisName):null;
1282                        try
1283                        {
1284                                if(areaThing==null)
1285                                {
1286                                        final Area A=imHere.getArea();
1287                                        final Vector<Environmental> all=new Vector<Environmental>();
1288                                        if(mob)
1289                                        {
1290                                                all.addAll(CMLib.map().findInhabitants(A.getProperMap(),null,thisName,100));
1291                                                if(all.size()==0)
1292                                                        all.addAll(CMLib.map().findShopStock(A.getProperMap(), null, thisName,100));
1293                                                for(int a=all.size()-1;a>=0;a--)
1294                                                {
1295                                                        if(!(all.elementAt(a) instanceof MOB))
1296                                                                all.removeElementAt(a);
1297                                                }
1298                                                if(all.size()>0)
1299                                                        areaThing=all.elementAt(CMLib.dice().roll(1,all.size(),-1));
1300                                                else
1301                                                {
1302                                                        all.addAll(CMLib.map().findInhabitantsFavorExact(CMLib.map().rooms(),null,thisName,false,100));
1303                                                        if(all.size()==0)
1304                                                                all.addAll(CMLib.map().findShopStock(CMLib.map().rooms(), null, thisName,100));
1305                                                        for(int a=all.size()-1;a>=0;a--)
1306                                                        {
1307                                                                if(!(all.elementAt(a) instanceof MOB))
1308                                                                        all.removeElementAt(a);
1309                                                        }
1310                                                        if(all.size()>0)
1311                                                                thing=all.elementAt(CMLib.dice().roll(1,all.size(),-1));
1312                                                }
1313                                        }
1314                                        if(all.size()==0)
1315                                        {
1316                                                all.addAll(CMLib.map().findRoomItems(A.getProperMap(), null,thisName,true,100));
1317                                                if(all.size()==0)
1318                                                        all.addAll(CMLib.map().findInventory(A.getProperMap(), null,thisName,100));
1319                                                if(all.size()==0)
1320                                                        all.addAll(CMLib.map().findShopStock(A.getProperMap(), null,thisName,100));
1321                                                if(all.size()>0)
1322                                                        areaThing=all.elementAt(CMLib.dice().roll(1,all.size(),-1));
1323                                                else
1324                                                {
1325                                                        all.addAll(CMLib.map().findRoomItems(CMLib.map().rooms(), null,thisName,true,100));
1326                                                        if(all.size()==0)
1327                                                                all.addAll(CMLib.map().findInventory(CMLib.map().rooms(), null,thisName,100));
1328                                                        if(all.size()==0)
1329                                                                all.addAll(CMLib.map().findShopStock(CMLib.map().rooms(), null,thisName,100));
1330                                                        if(all.size()>0)
1331                                                                thing=all.elementAt(CMLib.dice().roll(1,all.size(),-1));
1332                                                }
1333                                        }
1334                                }
1335                        }
1336                        catch(final NoSuchElementException nse)
1337                        {
1338                        }
1339                }
1340                if(areaThing!=null)
1341                        OBJS.add(areaThing);
1342                else
1343                if(thing!=null)
1344                        OBJS.add(thing);
1345                if(OBJS.size()>0)
1346                        return OBJS.get(0);
1347                return null;
1348        }
1349
1350        protected PhysicalAgent getArgumentMOB(final String str,
1351                                                                                   final MOB source,
1352                                                                                   final MOB monster,
1353                                                                                   final Environmental target,
1354                                                                                   final Item primaryItem,
1355                                                                                   final Item secondaryItem,
1356                                                                                   final String msg,
1357                                                                                   final Object[] tmp)
1358        {
1359                return getArgumentItem(str,source,monster,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
1360        }
1361
1362        protected PhysicalAgent getArgumentItem(String str,
1363                                                                                        final MOB source,
1364                                                                                        final MOB monster,
1365                                                                                        final PhysicalAgent scripted,
1366                                                                                        final Environmental target,
1367                                                                                        final Item primaryItem,
1368                                                                                        final Item secondaryItem,
1369                                                                                        final String msg,
1370                                                                                        final Object[] tmp)
1371        {
1372                if(str.length()<2)
1373                        return null;
1374                if(str.charAt(0)=='$')
1375                {
1376                        if(Character.isDigit(str.charAt(1)))
1377                        {
1378                                Object O=tmp[CMath.s_int(Character.toString(str.charAt(1)))];
1379                                if(O instanceof PhysicalAgent)
1380                                        return (PhysicalAgent)O;
1381                                else
1382                                if((O instanceof List)&&(str.length()>3)&&(str.charAt(2)=='.'))
1383                                {
1384                                        final List V=(List)O;
1385                                        String back=str.substring(2);
1386                                        if(back.charAt(1)=='$')
1387                                                back=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,back);
1388                                        if((back.length()>1)&&Character.isDigit(back.charAt(1)))
1389                                        {
1390                                                int x=1;
1391                                                while((x<back.length())&&(Character.isDigit(back.charAt(x))))
1392                                                        x++;
1393                                                final int y=CMath.s_int(back.substring(1,x).trim());
1394                                                if((V.size()>0)&&(y>=0))
1395                                                {
1396                                                        if(y>=V.size())
1397                                                                return null;
1398                                                        O=V.get(y);
1399                                                        if(O instanceof PhysicalAgent)
1400                                                                return (PhysicalAgent)O;
1401                                                }
1402                                                str=O.toString(); // will fall through
1403                                        }
1404                                }
1405                                else
1406                                if(O!=null)
1407                                        str=O.toString(); // will fall through
1408                                else
1409                                        return null;
1410                        }
1411                        else
1412                        switch(str.charAt(1))
1413                        {
1414                                case 'a':
1415                                        return (lastKnownLocation != null) ? lastKnownLocation.getArea() : null;
1416                                case 'B':
1417                                case 'b':
1418                                        return (lastLoaded instanceof PhysicalAgent) ? (PhysicalAgent) lastLoaded : null;
1419                                case 'N':
1420                                case 'n':
1421                                        return ((source == backupMOB) && (backupMOB != null) && (monster != scripted)) ? scripted : source;
1422                                case 'I':
1423                                case 'i':
1424                                        return scripted;
1425                                case 'T':
1426                                case 't':
1427                                        return ((target == backupMOB) && (backupMOB != null) && (monster != scripted))
1428                                                        ? scripted : (target instanceof PhysicalAgent) ? (PhysicalAgent) target : null;
1429                                case 'O':
1430                                case 'o':
1431                                        return primaryItem;
1432                                case 'P':
1433                                case 'p':
1434                                        return secondaryItem;
1435                                case 'd':
1436                                case 'D':
1437                                        return lastKnownLocation;
1438                                case 'F':
1439                                case 'f':
1440                                        if ((monster != null) && (monster.amFollowing() != null))
1441                                                return monster.amFollowing();
1442                                        return null;
1443                                case 'r':
1444                                case 'R':
1445                                        return getRandPC(monster, tmp, lastKnownLocation);
1446                                case 'c':
1447                                case 'C':
1448                                        return getRandAnyone(monster, tmp, lastKnownLocation);
1449                                case 'w':
1450                                        return primaryItem != null ? primaryItem.owner() : null;
1451                                case 'W':
1452                                        return secondaryItem != null ? secondaryItem.owner() : null;
1453                                case 'x':
1454                                case 'X':
1455                                        if (lastKnownLocation != null)
1456                                        {
1457                                                if ((str.length() > 2) && (CMLib.directions().getGoodDirectionCode("" + str.charAt(2)) >= 0))
1458                                                        return lastKnownLocation.getExitInDir(CMLib.directions().getGoodDirectionCode("" + str.charAt(2)));
1459                                                int i = 0;
1460                                                Exit E = null;
1461                                                while (((++i) < 100) || (E != null))
1462                                                        E = lastKnownLocation.getExitInDir(CMLib.dice().roll(1, Directions.NUM_DIRECTIONS(), -1));
1463                                                return E;
1464                                        }
1465                                        return null;
1466                                case '[':
1467                                {
1468                                        final int x = str.substring(2).indexOf(']');
1469                                        if (x >= 0)
1470                                        {
1471                                                String mid = str.substring(2).substring(0, x);
1472                                                final int y = mid.indexOf(' ');
1473                                                if (y > 0)
1474                                                {
1475                                                        final int num = CMath.s_int(mid.substring(0, y).trim());
1476                                                        mid = mid.substring(y + 1).trim();
1477                                                        final Quest Q = getQuest(mid);
1478                                                        if (Q != null)
1479                                                                return Q.getQuestItem(num);
1480                                                }
1481                                        }
1482                                        break;
1483                                }
1484                                case '{':
1485                                {
1486                                        final int x = str.substring(2).indexOf('}');
1487                                        if (x >= 0)
1488                                        {
1489                                                String mid = str.substring(2).substring(0, x).trim();
1490                                                final int y = mid.indexOf(' ');
1491                                                if (y > 0)
1492                                                {
1493                                                        final int num = CMath.s_int(mid.substring(0, y).trim());
1494                                                        mid = mid.substring(y + 1).trim();
1495                                                        final Quest Q = getQuest(mid);
1496                                                        if (Q != null)
1497                                                                return Q.getQuestMob(num);
1498                                                }
1499                                        }
1500                                        break;
