1501                                }
1502                        }
1503                }
1504                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
1505                {
1506                        str=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,str);
1507                        Environmental E=lastKnownLocation.fetchFromRoomFavorMOBs(null,str);
1508                        if(E==null)
1509                                E=lastKnownLocation.fetchFromMOBRoomFavorsItems(monster,null,str,Wearable.FILTER_ANY);
1510                        if(E==null)
1511                                E=lastKnownLocation.findItem(str);
1512                        if((E==null)&&(monster!=null))
1513                                E=monster.findItem(str);
1514                        if(E==null)
1515                                E=CMLib.players().getPlayerAllHosts(str);
1516                        if((E==null)&&(source!=null))
1517                                E=source.findItem(str);
1518                        if(E instanceof PhysicalAgent)
1519                                return (PhysicalAgent)E;
1520                }
1521                return null;
1522        }
1523
1524        private String makeNamedString(final Object O)
1525        {
1526                if(O instanceof List)
1527                        return makeParsableString((List)O);
1528                else
1529                if(O instanceof Room)
1530                        return ((Room)O).displayText(null);
1531                else
1532                if(O instanceof Environmental)
1533                        return ((Environmental)O).Name();
1534                else
1535                if(O!=null)
1536                        return O.toString();
1537                return "";
1538        }
1539
1540        private String makeParsableString(final List V)
1541        {
1542                if((V==null)||(V.size()==0))
1543                        return "";
1544                if(V.get(0) instanceof String)
1545                        return CMParms.combineQuoted(V,0);
1546                final StringBuffer ret=new StringBuffer("");
1547                String S=null;
1548                for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
1549                {
1550                        S=makeNamedString(V.get(v)).trim();
1551                        if(S.length()==0)
1552                                ret.append("? ");
1553                        else
1554                        if(S.indexOf(' ')>=0)
1555                                ret.append("\""+S+"\" ");
1556                        else
1557                                ret.append(S+" ");
1558                }
1559                return ret.toString();
1560        }
1561
1562        @Override
1563        public String varify(final MOB source,
1564                                                 final Environmental target,
1565                                                 final PhysicalAgent scripted,
1566                                                 final MOB monster,
1567                                                 final Item primaryItem,
1568                                                 final Item secondaryItem,
1569                                                 final String msg,
1570                                                 final Object[] tmp,
1571                                                 String varifyable)
1572        {
1573                int t=varifyable.indexOf('$');
1574                if((monster!=null)&&(monster.location()!=null))
1575                        lastKnownLocation=monster.location();
1576                if(lastKnownLocation==null)
1577                        lastKnownLocation=source.location();
1578                MOB randMOB=null;
1579                while((t>=0)&&(t<varifyable.length()-1))
1580                {
1581                        final char c=varifyable.charAt(t+1);
1582                        String middle="";
1583                        final String front=varifyable.substring(0,t);
1584                        String back=varifyable.substring(t+2);
1585                        if(Character.isDigit(c))
1586                                middle=makeNamedString(tmp[CMath.s_int(Character.toString(c))]);
1587                        else
1588                        switch(c)
1589                        {
1590                                case '@':
1591                                        if ((t < varifyable.length() - 2) && Character.isLetter(varifyable.charAt(t + 2)))
1592                                        {
1593                                                final Environmental E = getArgumentItem("$" + varifyable.charAt(t + 2),
1594                                                                source, monster, scripted, target, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp);
1595                                                middle = (E == null) ? "null" : "" + E;
1596                                        }
1597                                        break;
1598                                case 'a':
1599                                        if (lastKnownLocation != null)
1600                                                middle = lastKnownLocation.getArea().name();
1601                                        break;
1602                                // case 'a':
1603                                case 'A':
1604                                        // unnecessary, since, in coffeemud, this is part of the
1605                                        // name
1606                                        break;
1607                                case 'b':
1608                                        middle = lastLoaded != null ? lastLoaded.name() : "";
1609                                        break;
1610                                case 'B':
1611                                        middle = lastLoaded != null ? lastLoaded.displayText() : "";
1612                                        break;
1613                                case 'c':
1614                                case 'C':
1615                                        randMOB = getRandAnyone(monster, tmp, lastKnownLocation);
1616                                        if (randMOB != null)
1617                                                middle = randMOB.name();
1618                                        break;
1619                                case 'd':
1620                                        middle = (lastKnownLocation != null) ? lastKnownLocation.displayText(monster) : "";
1621                                        break;
1622                                case 'D':
1623                                        middle = (lastKnownLocation != null) ? lastKnownLocation.description(monster) : "";
1624                                        break;
1625                                case 'e':
1626                                        if (source != null)
1627                                                middle = source.charStats().heshe();
1628                                        break;
1629                                case 'E':
1630                                        if ((target != null) && (target instanceof MOB))
1631                                                middle = ((MOB) target).charStats().heshe();
1632                                        break;
1633                                case 'f':
1634                                        if ((monster != null) && (monster.amFollowing() != null))
1635                                                middle = monster.amFollowing().name();
1636                                        break;
1637                                case 'F':
1638                                        if ((monster != null) && (monster.amFollowing() != null))
1639                                                middle = monster.amFollowing().charStats().heshe();
1640                                        break;
1641                                case 'g':
1642                                        middle = ((msg == null) ? "" : msg.toLowerCase());
1643                                        break;
1644                                case 'G':
1645                                        middle = ((msg == null) ? "" : msg);
1646                                        break;
1647                                case 'h':
1648                                        if (monster != null)
1649                                                middle = monster.charStats().himher();
1650                                        break;
1651                                case 'H':
1652                                        randMOB = getRandPC(monster, tmp, lastKnownLocation);
1653                                        if (randMOB != null)
1654                                                middle = randMOB.charStats().himher();
1655                                        break;
1656                                case 'i':
1657                                        if (monster != null)
1658                                                middle = monster.name();
1659                                        break;
1660                                case 'I':
1661                                        if (monster != null)
1662                                                middle = monster.displayText();
1663                                        break;
1664                                case 'j':
1665                                        if (monster != null)
1666                                                middle = monster.charStats().heshe();
1667                                        break;
1668                                case 'J':
1669                                        randMOB = getRandPC(monster, tmp, lastKnownLocation);
1670                                        if (randMOB != null)
1671                                                middle = randMOB.charStats().heshe();
1672                                        break;
1673                                case 'k':
1674                                        if (monster != null)
1675                                                middle = monster.charStats().hisher();
1676                                        break;
1677                                case 'K':
1678                                        randMOB = getRandPC(monster, tmp, lastKnownLocation);
1679                                        if (randMOB != null)
1680                                                middle = randMOB.charStats().hisher();
1681                                        break;
1682                                case 'l':
1683                                        if (lastKnownLocation != null)
1684                                        {
1685                                                final StringBuffer str = new StringBuffer("");
1686                                                for (int i = 0; i < lastKnownLocation.numInhabitants(); i++)
1687                                                {
1688                                                        final MOB M = lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(i);
1689                                                        if ((M != null) && (M != monster) && (CMLib.flags().canBeSeenBy(M, monster)))
1690                                                                str.append("\"" + M.name() + "\" ");
1691                                                }
1692                                                middle = str.toString();
1693                                        }
1694                                        break;
1695                                case 'L':
1696                                        if (lastKnownLocation != null)
1697                                        {
1698                                                final StringBuffer str = new StringBuffer("");
1699                                                for (int i = 0; i < lastKnownLocation.numItems(); i++)
1700                                                {
1701                                                        final Item I = lastKnownLocation.getItem(i);
1702                                                        if ((I != null) && (I.container() == null) && (CMLib.flags().canBeSeenBy(I, monster)))
1703                                                                str.append("\"" + I.name() + "\" ");
1704                                                }
1705                                                middle = str.toString();
1706                                        }
1707                                        break;
1708                                case 'm':
1709                                        if (source != null)
1710                                                middle = source.charStats().hisher();
1711                                        break;
1712                                case 'M':
1713                                        if ((target != null) && (target instanceof MOB))
1714                                                middle = ((MOB) target).charStats().hisher();
1715                                        break;
1716                                case 'n':
1717                                case 'N':
1718                                        if (source != null)
1719                                                middle = source.name();
1720                                        break;
1721                                case 'o':
1722                                case 'O':
1723                                        if (primaryItem != null)
1724                                                middle = primaryItem.name();
1725                                        break;
1726                                case 'p':
1727                                case 'P':
1728                                        if (secondaryItem != null)
1729                                                middle = secondaryItem.name();
1730                                        break;
1731                                case 'r':
1732                                case 'R':
1733                                        randMOB = getRandPC(monster, tmp, lastKnownLocation);
1734                                        if (randMOB != null)
1735                                                middle = randMOB.name();
1736                                        break;
1737                                case 's':
1738                                        if (source != null)
1739                                                middle = source.charStats().himher();
1740                                        break;
1741                                case 'S':
1742                                        if ((target != null) && (target instanceof MOB))
1743                                                middle = ((MOB) target).charStats().himher();
1744                                        break;
1745                                case 't':
1746                                case 'T':
1747                                        if (target != null)
1748                                                middle = target.name();
1749                                        break;
1750                                case 'w':
1751                                        middle = primaryItem != null ? primaryItem.owner().Name() : middle;
1752                                        break;
1753                                case 'W':
1754                                        middle = secondaryItem != null ? secondaryItem.owner().Name() : middle;
1755                                        break;
1756                                case 'x':
1757                                case 'X':
1758                                        if (lastKnownLocation != null)
1759                                        {
1760                                                middle = "";
1761                                                Exit E = null;
1762                                                int dir = -1;
1763                                                if ((t < varifyable.length() - 2) && (CMLib.directions().getGoodDirectionCode("" + varifyable.charAt(t + 2)) >= 0))
1764                                                {
1765                                                        dir = CMLib.directions().getGoodDirectionCode("" + varifyable.charAt(t + 2));
1766                                                        E = lastKnownLocation.getExitInDir(dir);
1767                                                }
1768                                                else
1769                                                {
1770                                                        int i = 0;
1771                                                        while (((++i) < 100) || (E != null))
1772                                                        {
1773                                                                dir = CMLib.dice().roll(1, Directions.NUM_DIRECTIONS(), -1);
1774                                                                E = lastKnownLocation.getExitInDir(dir);
1775                                                        }
1776                                                }
1777                                                if ((dir >= 0) && (E != null))
1778                                                {
1779                                                        if (c == 'x')
1780                                                                middle = CMLib.directions().getDirectionName(dir);
1781                                                        else
1782                                                                middle = E.name();
1783                                                }
1784                                        }
1785                                        break;
1786                                case 'y':
1787                                        if (source != null)
1788                                                middle = source.charStats().sirmadam();
1789                                        break;
1790                                case 'Y':
1791                                        if ((target != null) && (target instanceof MOB))
1792                                                middle = ((MOB) target).charStats().sirmadam();
1793                                        break;
1794                                case '<':
1795                                {
1796                                        final int x = back.indexOf('>');
1797                                        if (x >= 0)
1798                                        {
1799                                                String mid = back.substring(0, x);
1800                                                final int y = mid.indexOf(' ');
1801                                                Environmental E = null;
1802                                                String arg1 = "";
1803                                                if (y >= 0)
1804                                                {
1805                                                        arg1 = mid.substring(0, y).trim();
1806                                                        E = getArgumentItem(arg1, source, monster, monster, target, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp);
1807                                                        mid = mid.substring(y + 1).trim();
1808                                                }
1809                                                if (arg1.length() > 0)
1810                                                        middle = getVar(E, arg1, mid, source, target, scripted, monster, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp);
1811                                                back = back.substring(x + 1);
1812                                        }
1813                                        break;
1814                                }
1815                                case '[':
1816                                {
1817                                        middle = "";
1818                                        final int x = back.indexOf(']');
1819                                        if (x >= 0)
1820                                        {
1821                                                String mid = back.substring(0, x);
1822                                                final int y = mid.indexOf(' ');
1823                                                if (y > 0)
1824                                                {
1825                                                        final int num = CMath.s_int(mid.substring(0, y).trim());
1826                                                        mid = mid.substring(y + 1).trim();
1827                                                        final Quest Q = getQuest(mid);
1828                                                        if (Q != null)
1829                                                                middle = Q.getQuestItemName(num);
1830                                                }
1831                                                back = back.substring(x + 1);
1832                                        }
1833                                        break;
1834                                }
1835                                case '{':
1836                                {
1837                                        middle = "";
1838                                        final int x = back.indexOf('}');
1839                                        if (x >= 0)
1840                                        {
1841                                                String mid = back.substring(0, x).trim();
1842                                                final int y = mid.indexOf(' ');
1843                                                if (y > 0)
1844                                                {
1845                                                        final int num = CMath.s_int(mid.substring(0, y).trim());
1846                                                        mid = mid.substring(y + 1).trim();
1847                                                        final Quest Q = getQuest(mid);
1848                                                        if (Q != null)
1849                                                                middle = Q.getQuestMobName(num);
1850                                                }
1851                                                back = back.substring(x + 1);
1852                                        }
1853                                        break;
1854                                }
1855                                case '%':
1856                                {
1857                                        middle = "";
1858                                        final int x = back.indexOf('%');
1859                                        if (x >= 0)
1860                                        {
1861                                                middle = functify(monster, source, target, monster, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp, back.substring(0, x).trim());
1862                                                back = back.substring(x + 1);
1863                                        }
1864                                        break;
1865                                }
1866                        }
1867                        if((back.startsWith("."))
1868                        &&(back.length()>1))
1869                        {
1870                                if(back.charAt(1)=='$')
1871                                        back=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,back);
1872                                if(back.equalsIgnoreCase(".LENGTH#"))
1873                                {
1874                                        middle=""+CMParms.parse(middle).size();
1875                                        back="";
1876                                }
1877                                else
1878                                if((back.length()>1)&&Character.isDigit(back.charAt(1)))
1879                                {
1880                                        int x=1;
1881                                        while((x<back.length())
1882                                        &&(Character.isDigit(back.charAt(x))))
1883                                                x++;
1884                                        final int y=CMath.s_int(back.substring(1,x).trim());
1885                                        back=back.substring(x);
1886                                        final boolean rest=back.startsWith("..");
1887                                        if(rest)
1888                                                back=back.substring(2);
1889                                        final Vector<String> V=CMParms.parse(middle);
1890                                        if((V.size()>0)&&(y>=0))
1891                                        {
1892                                                if(y>=V.size())
1893                                                        middle="";
1894                                                else
1895                                                if(rest)
1896                                                        middle=CMParms.combine(V,y);
1897                                                else
1898                                                        middle=V.elementAt(y);
1899                                        }
1900                                }
1901                        }
1902                        varifyable=front+middle+back;
1903                        t=varifyable.indexOf('$');
1904                }
1905                return varifyable;
1906        }
1907
1908        protected DVector getScriptVarSet(final String mobname, final String varname)
1909        {
1910                final DVector set=new DVector(2);
1911                if(mobname.equals("*"))
1912                {
1913                        for(final Iterator<String> k = resources._findResourceKeys("SCRIPTVAR-");k.hasNext();)
1914                        {
1915                                final String key=k.next();
1916                                if(key.startsWith("SCRIPTVAR-"))
1917                                {
1918                                        final Hashtable H=(Hashtable)resources._getResource(key);
1919                                        if(varname.equals("*"))
1920                                        {
1921                                                for(final Enumeration e=H.keys();e.hasMoreElements();)
1922                                                {
1923                                                        final String vn=(String)e.nextElement();
1924                                                        set.addElement(key.substring(10),vn);
1925                                                }
1926                                        }
1927                                        else
1928                                                set.addElement(key.substring(10),varname);
1929                                }
1930                        }
1931                }
1932                else
1933                {
1934                        final Hashtable H=(Hashtable)resources._getResource("SCRIPTVAR-"+mobname);
1935                        if(varname.equals("*"))
1936                        {
1937                                for(final Enumeration e=H.keys();e.hasMoreElements();)
1938                                {
1939                                        final String vn=(String)e.nextElement();
1940                                        set.addElement(mobname,vn);
1941                                }
1942                        }
1943                        else
1944                                set.addElement(mobname,varname);
1945                }
1946                return set;
1947        }
1948
1949        protected String getStatValue(final Environmental E, final String arg2)
1950        {
1951                boolean found=false;
1952                String val="";
1953                for(int i=0;i<E.getStatCodes().length;i++)
1954                {
1955                        if(E.getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
1956                        {
1957                                val=E.getStat(arg2);
1958                                found=true;
1959                                break;
1960                        }
1961                }
1962                if((!found)&&(E instanceof MOB))
1963                {
1964                        final MOB M=(MOB)E;
1965                        for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
1966                        {
1967                                if(CharStats.CODES.NAME(i).equalsIgnoreCase(arg2)||CharStats.CODES.DESC(i).equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
1968                                {
1969                                        val=""+M.charStats().getStat(CharStats.CODES.NAME(i)); //yes, this is right
1970                                        found=true;
1971                                        break;
1972                                }
1973                        }
1974                        if(!found)
1975                        {
1976                                for(int i=0;i<M.curState().getStatCodes().length;i++)
1977                                {
1978                                        if(M.curState().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
1979                                        {
1980                                                val=M.curState().getStat(M.curState().getStatCodes()[i]);
1981                                                found=true;
1982                                                break;
1983                                        }
1984                                }
1985                        }
1986                        if(!found)
1987                        {
1988                                for(int i=0;i<M.phyStats().getStatCodes().length;i++)
1989                                {
1990                                        if(M.phyStats().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
1991                                        {
1992                                                val=M.phyStats().getStat(M.phyStats().getStatCodes()[i]);
1993                                                found=true;
1994                                                break;
1995                                        }
1996                                }
1997                        }
1998                        if((!found)&&(M.playerStats()!=null))
1999                        {
2000                                for(int i=0;i<M.playerStats().getStatCodes().length;i++)
2001                                {
2002                                        if(M.playerStats().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
2003                                        {
2004                                                val=M.playerStats().getStat(M.playerStats().getStatCodes()[i]);
2005                                                found=true;
2006                                                break;
2007                                        }
2008                                }
2009                        }
2010                        if((!found)&&(arg2.toUpperCase().startsWith("BASE")))
2011                        {
2012                                for(int i=0;i<M.baseState().getStatCodes().length;i++)
2013                                {
2014                                        if(M.baseState().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2.substring(4)))
2015                                        {
2016                                                val=M.baseState().getStat(M.baseState().getStatCodes()[i]);
2017                                                found=true;
2018                                                break;
2019                                        }
2020                                }
2021                        }
2022                        if((!found)&&(gstatH.containsKey(arg2.toUpperCase())))
2023                        {
2024                                found=true;
2025                                switch(gstatH.get(arg2.toUpperCase()).intValue())
2026                                {
2027                                case GSTATADD_STINK:
2028                                        if(M.playerStats()!=null)
2029                                                val=CMath.toPct(M.playerStats().getHygiene()/PlayerStats.HYGIENE_DELIMIT);
2030                                        break;
2031                                case GSTATADD_DEITY:
2032                                        val = M.getWorshipCharID();
2033                                        break;
2034                                case GSTATADD_CLAN:
2035                                {
2036                                        Clan C = CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan(M);
2037                                        if (C == null)
2038                                                C = M.clans().iterator().hasNext() ? M.clans().iterator().next().first : null;
2039                                        val = (C != null) ? C.clanID() : "";
2040                                        break;
2041                                }
2042                                case GSTATADD_CLANROLE:
2043                                {
2044                                        Clan C = CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan(M);
2045                                        if (C == null)
2046                                                C = M.clans().iterator().hasNext() ? M.clans().iterator().next().first : null;
2047                                        if (C != null)
2048                                        {
2049                                                final Pair<Clan, Integer> p = M.getClanRole(C.clanID());
2050                                                val = (p != null) ? p.second.toString() : "";
2051                                        }
2052                                        break;
2053                                }
2054                                }
2055                        }
2056                }
2057                if(!found)
2058                        return null;
2059                return val;
2060        }
2061
2062        protected String getGStatValue(final Environmental E, String arg2)
2063        {
2064                if(E==null)
2065                        return null;
2066                boolean found=false;
2067                String val="";
2068                for(int i=0;i<E.getStatCodes().length;i++)
2069                {
2070                        if(E.getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
2071                        {
2072                                val=E.getStat(arg2);
2073                                found=true; break;
2074                        }
2075                }
2076                if(!found)
2077                if(E instanceof MOB)
2078                {
2079                        arg2=arg2.toUpperCase().trim();
2080                        final GenericBuilder.GenMOBCode element = (GenericBuilder.GenMOBCode)CMath.s_valueOf(GenericBuilder.GenMOBCode.class,arg2);
2081                        if(element != null)
2082                        {
2083                                val=CMLib.coffeeMaker().getGenMobStat((MOB)E,element.name());
2084                                found=true;
2085                        }
2086                        if(!found)
2087                        {
2088                                final MOB M=(MOB)E;
2089                                for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
2090                                {
2091                                        if(CharStats.CODES.NAME(i).equals(arg2)||CharStats.CODES.DESC(i).equals(arg2))
2092                                        {
2093                                                val=""+M.charStats().getStat(CharStats.CODES.NAME(i));
2094                                                found=true;
2095                                                break;
2096                                        }
2097                                }
2098                                if(!found)
2099                                {
2100                                        for(int i=0;i<M.curState().getStatCodes().length;i++)
2101                                        {
2102                                                if(M.curState().getStatCodes()[i].equals(arg2))
2103                                                {
2104                                                        val=M.curState().getStat(M.curState().getStatCodes()[i]);
2105                                                        found=true;
2106                                                        break;
2107                                                }
2108                                        }
2109                                }
2110                                if(!found)
2111                                {
2112                                        for(int i=0;i<M.phyStats().getStatCodes().length;i++)
2113                                        {
2114                                                if(M.phyStats().getStatCodes()[i].equals(arg2))
2115                                                {
2116                                                        val=M.phyStats().getStat(M.phyStats().getStatCodes()[i]);
2117                                                        found=true;
2118                                                        break;
2119                                                }
2120                                        }
2121                                }
2122                                if((!found)&&(M.playerStats()!=null))
2123                                {
2124                                        for(int i=0;i<M.playerStats().getStatCodes().length;i++)
2125                                        {
2126                                                if(M.playerStats().getStatCodes()[i].equals(arg2))
2127                                                {
2128                                                        val=M.playerStats().getStat(M.playerStats().getStatCodes()[i]);
2129                                                        found=true;
2130                                                        break;
2131                                                }
2132                                        }
2133                                }
2134                                if((!found)&&(arg2.toUpperCase().startsWith("BASE")))
2135                                {
2136                                        for(int i=0;i<M.baseState().getStatCodes().length;i++)
2137                                        {
2138                                                if(M.baseState().getStatCodes()[i].equals(arg2.substring(4)))
2139                                                {
2140                                                        val=M.baseState().getStat(M.baseState().getStatCodes()[i]);
2141                                                        found=true;
2142                                                        break;
2143                                                }
2144                                        }
2145                                }
2146                                if((!found)&&(gstatH.containsKey(arg2)))
2147                                {
2148                                        found=true;
2149                                        switch(gstatH.get(arg2).intValue())
2150                                        {
2151                                                case GSTATADD_STINK:
2152                                                        if(M.playerStats()!=null)
2153                                                                val = CMath.toPct(M.playerStats().getHygiene()/PlayerStats.HYGIENE_DELIMIT);
2154                                                        break;
2155                                                case GSTATADD_DEITY:
2156                                                        val = M.getWorshipCharID();
2157                                                        break;
2158                                                case GSTATADD_CLAN:
2159                                                {
2160                                                        Clan C = CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan(M);
2161                                                        if (C == null)
2162                                                                C = M.clans().iterator().hasNext() ? M.clans().iterator().next().first : null;
2163                                                        val = (C != null) ? C.clanID() : "";
2164                                                        break;
2165                                                }
2166                                                case GSTATADD_CLANROLE:
2167                                                {
2168                                                        Clan C = CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan(M);
2169                                                        if (C == null)
2170                                                                C = M.clans().iterator().hasNext() ? M.clans().iterator().next().first : null;
2171                                                        if (C != null)
2172                                                        {
2173                                                                final Pair<Clan, Integer> p = M.getClanRole(C.clanID());
2174                                                                val = (p != null) ? p.second.toString() : "";
2175                                                        }
2176                                                        break;
2177                                                }
2178                                        }
2179                                }
2180                        }
2181                }
2182                else
2183                if(E instanceof Item)
2184                {
2185                        final GenericBuilder.GenItemCode code = (GenericBuilder.GenItemCode)CMath.s_valueOf(GenericBuilder.GenItemCode.class, arg2.toUpperCase().trim());
2186                        if(code != null)
2187                        {
2188                                val=CMLib.coffeeMaker().getGenItemStat((Item)E,code.name());
2189                                found=true;
2190                        }
2191                }
2192                if(found)
2193                        return val;
2194                return null;
2195        }
2196
2197        @Override
2198        public void setVar(final String baseName, String key, String val)
2199        {
2200                final DVector V=getScriptVarSet(baseName,key);
2201                for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
2202                {
2203                        final String name=(String)V.elementAt(v,1);
2204                        key=((String)V.elementAt(v,2)).toUpperCase();
2205                        Hashtable<String,String> H=(Hashtable)resources._getResource("SCRIPTVAR-"+name);
2206                        if((H==null)&&(defaultQuestName!=null)&&(defaultQuestName.length()>0))
2207                        {
2208                                final MOB M=CMLib.players().getPlayerAllHosts(name);
2209                                if(M!=null)
2210                                {
2211                                        for(final Enumeration<ScriptingEngine> e=M.scripts();e.hasMoreElements();)
2212                                        {
2213                                                final ScriptingEngine SE=e.nextElement();
2214                                                if((SE!=null)
2215                                                &&(SE!=this)
2216                                                &&(defaultQuestName.equalsIgnoreCase(SE.defaultQuestName()))
2217                                                &&(SE.isVar(name,key)))
2218                                                {
2219                                                        SE.setVar(name,key,val);
2220                                                        return;
2221                                                }
2222                                        }
2223                                }
2224                        }
2225                        if(H==null)
2226                        {
2227                                if(val.length()==0)
2228                                        continue;
2229
2230                                H=new Hashtable<String,String>();
2231                                resources._submitResource("SCRIPTVAR-"+name,H);
2232                        }
2233                        if(val.equals("++"))
2234                        {
2235                                String num=H.get(key);
2236                                if(num==null)
2237                                        num="0";
2238                                val=Integer.toString(CMath.s_int(num.trim())+1);
2239                        }
2240                        else
2241                        if(val.equals("--"))
2242                        {
2243                                String num=H.get(key);
2244                                if(num==null)
2245                                        num="0";
2246                                val=Integer.toString(CMath.s_int(num.trim())-1);
2247                        }
2248                        else
2249                        if(val.startsWith("+"))
2250                        {
2251                                // add via +number form
2252                                if(CMath.isNumber(val.substring(1).trim()))
2253                                {
2254                                        val=val.substring(1);
2255                                        final int amount=CMath.s_int(val.trim());
2256                                        String num=H.get(key);
2257                                        if(num==null)
2258                                                num="0";
2259                                        val=Integer.toString(CMath.s_int(num.trim())+amount);
2260                                }
2261                        }
2262                        else
2263                        if(val.startsWith("-"))
2264                        {
2265                                // subtract -number form
2266                                if(CMath.isNumber(val.substring(1).trim()))
2267                                {
2268                                        val=val.substring(1);
2269                                        final int amount=CMath.s_int(val.trim());
2270                                        String num=H.get(key);
2271                                        if(num==null)
2272                                                num="0";
2273                                        val=Integer.toString(CMath.s_int(num.trim())-amount);
2274                                }
2275                        }
2276                        else
2277                        if(val.startsWith("*"))
2278                        {
2279                                // multiply via *number form
2280                                if(CMath.isNumber(val.substring(1).trim()))
2281                                {
2282                                        val=val.substring(1);
2283                                        final int amount=CMath.s_int(val.trim());
2284                                        String num=H.get(key);
2285                                        if(num==null)
2286                                                num="0";
2287                                        val=Integer.toString(CMath.s_int(num.trim())*amount);
2288                                }
2289                        }
2290                        else
2291                        if(val.startsWith("/"))
2292                        {
2293                                // divide /number form
2294                                if(CMath.isNumber(val.substring(1).trim()))
2295                                {
2296                                        val=val.substring(1);
2297                                        final int amount=CMath.s_int(val.trim());
2298                                        String num=H.get(key);
2299                                        if(num==null)
2300                                                num="0";
2301                                        if(amount==0)
2302                                                Log.errOut("Scripting","Scripting SetVar error: Division by 0: "+name+"/"+key+"="+val);
2303                                        else
2304                                                val=Integer.toString(CMath.s_int(num.trim())/amount);
2305                                }
2306                        }
2307                        if(H.containsKey(key))
2308                                H.remove(key);
2309                        if(val.trim().length()>0)
2310                                H.put(key,val);
2311                        if(H.size()==0)
2312                                resources._removeResource("SCRIPTVAR-"+name);
2313                }
2314        }
2315
2316        @Override
2317        public String[] parseEval(final String evaluable) throws ScriptParseException
2318        {
2319                final int STATE_MAIN=0;
2320                final int STATE_INFUNCTION=1;
2321                final int STATE_INFUNCQUOTE=2;
2322                final int STATE_POSTFUNCTION=3;
2323                final int STATE_POSTFUNCEVAL=4;
2324                final int STATE_POSTFUNCQUOTE=5;
2325                final int STATE_MAYFUNCTION=6;
2326
2327                buildHashes();
2328                final Vector<String> V=new Vector<String>();
2329                if((evaluable==null)||(evaluable.trim().length()==0))
2330                        return new String[]{};
2331                final char[] evalC=evaluable.toCharArray();
2332                int state=0;
2333                int dex=0;
2334                char lastQuote='\0';
2335                String s=null;
2336                int depth=0;
2337                for(int c=0;c<evalC.length;c++)
2338                {
2339                        switch(state)
2340                        {
2341                        case STATE_MAIN:
2342                        {
2343                                if(Character.isWhitespace(evalC[c]))
2344                                {
2345                                        s=new String(evalC,dex,c-dex).trim();
2346                                        if(s.length()>0)
2347                                        {
2348                                                s=s.toUpperCase();
2349                                                V.addElement(s);
2350                                                dex=c+1;
2351                                                if(funcH.containsKey(s))
2352                                                        state=STATE_MAYFUNCTION;
2353                                                else
2354                                                if(!connH.containsKey(s))
2355                                                        throw new ScriptParseException("Unknown keyword: "+s);
2356                                        }
2357                                }
2358                                else
2359                                if(Character.isLetter(evalC[c])
2360                                ||(Character.isDigit(evalC[c])&&(c>0)&&Character.isLetter(evalC[c-1])&&(c<evalC.length-1)&&Character.isLetter(evalC[c+1])))
2361                                { /* move along */
2362                                }
2363                                else
2364                                {
2365                                        switch(evalC[c])
2366                                        {
2367                                        case '!':
2368                                        {
2369                                                if(c==evalC.length-1)
2370                                                        throw new ScriptParseException("Bad Syntax on last !");
2371                                                V.addElement("NOT");
2372                                                dex=c+1;
2373                                                break;
2374                                        }
2375                                        case '(':
2376                                        {
2377                                                s=new String(evalC,dex,c-dex).trim();
2378                                                if(s.length()>0)
2379                                                {
2380                                                        s=s.toUpperCase();
2381                                                        V.addElement(s);
2382                                                        V.addElement("(");
2383                                                        dex=c+1;
2384                                                        if(funcH.containsKey(s))
2385                                                                state=STATE_INFUNCTION;
2386                                                        else
2387                                                        if(connH.containsKey(s))
2388                                                                state=STATE_MAIN;
2389                                                        else
2390                                                                throw new ScriptParseException("Unknown keyword: "+s);
2391                                                }
2392                                                else
2393                                                {
2394                                                        V.addElement("(");
2395                                                        depth++;
2396                                                        dex=c+1;
2397                                                }
2398                                                break;
2399                                        }
2400                                        case ')':
2401                                                s=new String(evalC,dex,c-dex).trim();
2402                                                if(s.length()>0)
2403                                                        throw new ScriptParseException("Bad syntax before ) at: "+s);
2404                                                if(depth==0)
2405                                                        throw new ScriptParseException("Unmatched ) character");
2406                                                V.addElement(")");
2407                                                depth--;
2408                                                dex=c+1;
2409                                                break;
2410                                        default:
2411                                                throw new ScriptParseException("Unknown character at: "+new String(evalC,dex,c-dex+1).trim()+": "+evaluable);
2412                                        }
2413                                }
2414                                break;
2415                        }
2416                        case STATE_MAYFUNCTION:
2417                        {
2418                                if(evalC[c]=='(')
2419                                {
2420                                        V.addElement("(");
2421                                        dex=c+1;
2422                                        state=STATE_INFUNCTION;
2423                                }
2424                                else
2425                                if(!Character.isWhitespace(evalC[c]))
2426                                        throw new ScriptParseException("Expected ( at "+evalC[c]+": "+evaluable);
2427                                break;
2428                        }
2429                        case STATE_POSTFUNCTION:
2430                        {
2431                                if(!Character.isWhitespace(evalC[c]))
2432                                {
2433                                        switch(evalC[c])
2434                                        {
2435                                        case '=':
2436                                        case '>':
2437                                        case '<':
2438                                        case '!':
2439                                        {
2440                                                if(c==evalC.length-1)
2441                                                        throw new ScriptParseException("Bad Syntax on last "+evalC[c]);
2442                                                if(!Character.isWhitespace(evalC[c+1]))
2443                                                {
2444                                                        s=new String(evalC,c,2);
2445                                                        if((!signH.containsKey(s))&&(evalC[c]!='!'))
2446                                                                s=""+evalC[c];
2447                                                }
2448                                                else
2449                                                        s=""+evalC[c];
2450                                                if(!signH.containsKey(s))
2451                                                {
2452                                                        c=dex-1;
2453                                                        state=STATE_MAIN;
2454                                                        break;
2455                                                }
2456                                                V.addElement(s);
2457                                                dex=c+(s.length());
2458                                                c=c+(s.length()-1);
2459                                                state=STATE_POSTFUNCEVAL;
2460                                                break;
2461                                        }
2462                                        default:
2463                                                c=dex-1;
2464                                                state=STATE_MAIN;
2465                                                break;
2466                                        }
2467                                }
2468                                break;
2469                        }
2470                        case STATE_INFUNCTION:
2471                        {
2472                                if(evalC[c]==')')
2473                                {
2474                                        V.addElement(new String(evalC,dex,c-dex));
2475                                        V.addElement(")");
2476                                        dex=c+1;
2477                                        state=STATE_POSTFUNCTION;
2478                                }
2479                                else
2480                                if((evalC[c]=='\'')||(evalC[c]=='`'))
2481                                {
2482                                        lastQuote=evalC[c];
2483                                        state=STATE_INFUNCQUOTE;
2484                                }
2485                                break;
2486                        }
2487                        case STATE_INFUNCQUOTE:
2488                        {
2489                                if(evalC[c]==lastQuote)
2490                                        state=STATE_INFUNCTION;
2491                                break;
2492                        }
2493                        case STATE_POSTFUNCQUOTE:
2494                        {
2495                                if(evalC[c]==lastQuote)
2496                                {
2497                                        if((V.size()>2)
2498                                        &&(signH.containsKey(V.lastElement()))
2499                                        &&(V.elementAt(V.size()-2).equals(")")))
2500                                        {
2501                                                final String sign=V.lastElement();
2502                                                V.removeElementAt(V.size()-1);
2503                                                V.removeElementAt(V.size()-1);
2504                                                final String prev=V.lastElement();
2505                                                if(prev.equals("("))
2506                                                        s=sign+" "+new String(evalC,dex+1,c-dex);
2507                                                else
2508                                                {
2509                                                        V.removeElementAt(V.size()-1);
2510                                                        s=prev+" "+sign+" "+new String(evalC,dex+1,c-dex);
2511                                                }
2512                                                V.addElement(s);
2513                                                V.addElement(")");
2514                                                dex=c+1;
2515                                                state=STATE_MAIN;
2516                                        }
2517                                        else
2518                                                throw new ScriptParseException("Bad postfunc Eval somewhere");
2519                                }
2520                                break;
2521                        }
2522                        case STATE_POSTFUNCEVAL:
2523                        {
2524                                if(Character.isWhitespace(evalC[c]))
2525                                {
2526                                        s=new String(evalC,dex,c-dex).trim();
2527                                        if(s.length()>0)
2528                                        {
2529                                                if((V.size()>1)
2530                                                &&(signH.containsKey(V.lastElement()))
2531                                                &&(V.elementAt(V.size()-2).equals(")")))
2532                                                {
2533                                                        final String sign=V.lastElement();
2534                                                        V.removeElementAt(V.size()-1);
2535                                                        V.removeElementAt(V.size()-1);
2536                                                        final String prev=V.lastElement();
2537                                                        if(prev.equals("("))
2538                                                                s=sign+" "+new String(evalC,dex+1,c-dex);
2539                                                        else
2540                                                        {
2541                                                                V.removeElementAt(V.size()-1);
2542                                                                s=prev+" "+sign+" "+new String(evalC,dex+1,c-dex);
2543                                                        }
2544                                                        V.addElement(s);
2545                                                        V.addElement(")");
2546                                                        dex=c+1;
2547                                                        state=STATE_MAIN;
2548                                                }
2549                                                else
2550                                                        throw new ScriptParseException("Bad postfunc Eval somewhere");
2551                                        }
2552                                }
2553                                else
2554                                if(Character.isLetterOrDigit(evalC[c]))
2555                                { /* move along */
2556                                }
2557                                else
2558                                if((evalC[c]=='\'')||(evalC[c]=='`'))
2559                                {
2560                                        s=new String(evalC,dex,c-dex).trim();
2561                                        if(s.length()==0)
2562                                        {
2563                                                lastQuote=evalC[c];
2564                                                state=STATE_POSTFUNCQUOTE;
2565                                        }
2566                                }
2567                                break;
2568                        }
2569                        }
2570                }
2571                if((state==STATE_POSTFUNCQUOTE)
2572                ||(state==STATE_INFUNCQUOTE))
2573                        throw new ScriptParseException("Unclosed "+lastQuote+" somewhere");
2574                if(depth>0)
2575                        throw new ScriptParseException("Unclosed ( somewhere");
2576                return CMParms.toStringArray(V);
2577        }
2578
2579        public void pushEvalBoolean(final Vector<Object> stack, boolean trueFalse)
2580        {
2581                if(stack.size()>0)
2582                {
2583                        final Object O=stack.elementAt(stack.size()-1);
2584                        if(O instanceof Integer)
2585                        {
2586                                final int connector=((Integer)O).intValue();
2587                                stack.removeElementAt(stack.size()-1);
2588                                if((stack.size()>0)
2589                                &&((stack.elementAt(stack.size()-1) instanceof Boolean)))
2590                                {
2591                                        final boolean preTrueFalse=((Boolean)stack.elementAt(stack.size()-1)).booleanValue();
2592                                        stack.removeElementAt(stack.size()-1);
2593                                        switch(connector)
2594                                        {
2595                                        case CONNECTOR_AND:
2596                                                trueFalse = preTrueFalse && trueFalse;
2597                                                break;
2598                                        case CONNECTOR_OR:
2599                                                trueFalse = preTrueFalse || trueFalse;
2600                                                break;
2601                                        case CONNECTOR_ANDNOT:
2602                                                trueFalse = preTrueFalse && (!trueFalse);
2603                                                break;
2604                                        case CONNECTOR_NOT:
2605                                        case CONNECTOR_ORNOT:
2606                                                trueFalse = preTrueFalse || (!trueFalse);
2607                                                break;
2608                                        }
2609                                }
2610                                else
2611                                switch(connector)
2612                                {
2613                                        case CONNECTOR_ANDNOT:
2614                                        case CONNECTOR_NOT:
2615                                        case CONNECTOR_ORNOT:
2616                                                trueFalse = !trueFalse;
2617                                                break;
2618                                        default:
2619                                                break;
2620                                }
2621                        }
2622                        else
2623                        if(O instanceof Boolean)
2624                        {
2625                                final boolean preTrueFalse=((Boolean)stack.elementAt(stack.size()-1)).booleanValue();
2626                                stack.removeElementAt(stack.size()-1);
2627                                trueFalse=preTrueFalse&&trueFalse;
2628                        }
2629                }
2630                stack.addElement(trueFalse?Boolean.TRUE:Boolean.FALSE);
2631        }
2632
2633        /**
2634         * Returns the index, in the given string vector, of the given string, starting
2635         * from the given index.  If the string to search for contains more than one
2636         * "word", where a word is defined in space-delimited terms respecting double-quotes,
2637         * then it will return the index at which all the words in the parsed search string
2638         * are found in the given string list.
2639         * @param V the string list to search in
2640         * @param str the string to search for
2641         * @param start the index to start at (0 is good)
2642         * @return the index at which the search string was found in the string list, or -1
2643         */
2644        private static int strIndex(final Vector<String> V, final String str, final int start)
2645        {
2646                if(str.indexOf(' ')<0)
2647                        return V.indexOf(str,start);
2648                final List<String> V2=CMParms.parse(str);
2649                if(V2.size()==0)
2650                        return -1;
2651                int x=V.indexOf(V2.get(0),start);
2652                boolean found=false;
2653                while((x>=0)&&((x+V2.size())<=V.size())&&(!found))
2654                {
2655                        found=true;
2656                        for(int v2=1;v2<V2.size();v2++)
2657                        {
2658                                if(!V.get(x+v2).equals(V2.get(v2)))
2659                                {
2660                                        found=false;
2661                                        break;
2662                                }
2663                        }
2664                        if(!found)
2665                                x=V.indexOf(V2.get(0),x+1);
2666                }
2667                if(found)
2668                        return x;
2669                return -1;
2670        }
2671
2672        /**
2673         * Weird method.  Accepts a string list, a combiner (see below), a string buffer to search for,
2674         * and a previously found index. The stringbuffer is always cleared during this call.
2675         * If the stringbuffer was empty, the previous found index is returned. Otherwise:
2676         * If the combiner is '&', the first index of the given stringbuffer in the string list is returned (or -1).
2677         * If the combiner is '|', the previous index is returned if it was found, otherwise the first index
2678         * of the given stringbuffer in the string list is returned (or -1).
2679         * If the combiner is '&gt;', then the previous index is returned if it was not found (-1), otherwise the
2680         * next highest found stringbuffer since the last string list search is returned, or (-1) if no more found.
2681         * If the combiner is '&lt;', then the previous index is returned if it was not found (-1), otherwise the
2682         * first found stringbuffer index is returned if it is lower than the previously found index.
2683         * Other combiners return -1.
2684         * @param V the string list to search
2685         * @param combiner the combiner, either &,|,&lt;,or &gt;.
2686         * @param buf the stringbuffer to search for, which is always cleared
2687         * @param lastIndex the previously found index
2688         * @return the result of the search
2689         */
2690        private static int stringContains(final Vector<String> V, final char combiner, final StringBuffer buf, int lastIndex)
2691        {
2692                final String str=buf.toString().trim();
2693                if(str.length()==0)
2694                        return lastIndex;
2695                buf.setLength(0);
2696                switch (combiner)
2697                {
2698                case '&':
2699                        lastIndex = strIndex(V, str, 0);
2700                        return lastIndex;
2701                case '|':
2702                        if (lastIndex >= 0)
2703                                return lastIndex;
2704                        return strIndex(V, str, 0);
2705                case '>':
2706                        if (lastIndex < 0)
2707                                return lastIndex;
2708                        return strIndex(V, str, lastIndex + 1);
2709                case '<':
2710                {
2711                        if (lastIndex < 0)
2712                                return lastIndex;
2713                        final int newIndex = strIndex(V, str, 0);
2714                        if (newIndex < lastIndex)
2715                                return newIndex;
2716                        return -1;
2717                }
2718                }
2719                return -1;
2720        }
2721
2722        /**
2723         * Main workhorse of the stringcontains mobprog function.
2724         * @param V parsed string to search
2725         * @param str the coded search function
2726         * @param index a 1-dim array of the index in the coded search str to start the search at
2727         * @param depth the number of close parenthesis to expect
2728         * @return the last index in the coded search function evaluated
2729         */
2730        private static int stringContains(final Vector<String> V, final char[] str, final int[] index, final int depth)
2731        {
2732                final StringBuffer buf=new StringBuffer("");
2733                int lastIndex=0;
2734                boolean quoteMode=false;
2735                char combiner='&';
2736                for(int i=index[0];i<str.length;i++)
2737                {
2738                        switch(str[i])
2739                        {
2740                        case ')':
2741                                if((depth>0)&&(!quoteMode))
2742                                {
2743                                        index[0]=i;
2744                                        return stringContains(V,combiner,buf,lastIndex);
2745                                }
2746                                buf.append(str[i]);
2747                                break;
2748                        case ' ':
2749                                buf.append(str[i]);
2750                                break;
2751                        case '&':
2752                        case '|':
2753                        case '>':
2754                        case '<':
2755                                if(quoteMode)
2756                                        buf.append(str[i]);
2757                                else
2758                                {
2759                                        lastIndex=stringContains(V,combiner,buf,lastIndex);
2760                                        combiner=str[i];
2761                                }
2762                                break;
2763                        case '(':
2764                                if(!quoteMode)
2765                                {
2766                                        lastIndex=stringContains(V,combiner,buf,lastIndex);
2767                                        index[0]=i+1;
2768                                        final int newIndex=stringContains(V,str,index,depth+1);
2769                                        i=index[0];
2770                                        switch(combiner)
2771                                        {
2772                                        case '&':
2773                                                if((lastIndex<0)||(newIndex<0))
2774                                                        lastIndex=-1;
2775                                                break;
2776                                        case '|':
2777                                                if(newIndex>=0)
2778                                                        lastIndex=newIndex;
2779                                                break;
2780                                        case '>':
2781                                                if(newIndex<=lastIndex)
2782                                                        lastIndex=-1;
2783                                                else
2784                                                        lastIndex=newIndex;
2785                                                break;
2786                                        case '<':
2787                                                if((newIndex<0)||(newIndex>=lastIndex))
2788                                                        lastIndex=-1;
2789                                                else
2790                                                        lastIndex=newIndex;
2791                                                break;
2792                                        }
2793                                }
2794                                else
2795                                        buf.append(str[i]);
2796                                break;
2797                        case '\"':
2798                                quoteMode=(!quoteMode);
2799                                break;
2800                        case '\\':
2801                                if(i<str.length-1)
2802                                {
2803                                        buf.append(str[i+1]);
2804                                        i++;
2805                                }
2806                                break;
2807                        default:
2808                                if(Character.isLetter(str[i]))
2809                                        buf.append(Character.toLowerCase(str[i]));
2810                                else
2811                                        buf.append(str[i]);
2812                                break;
2813                        }
2814                }
2815                return stringContains(V,combiner,buf,lastIndex);
2816        }
2817
2818        /**
2819         * As the name implies, this is the implementation of the stringcontains mobprog function
2820         * @param str1 the string to search in
2821         * @param str2 the coded search expression
2822         * @return the index of the found string in the first string
2823         */
2824        protected final static int stringContainsFunctionImpl(final String str1, final String str2)
2825        {
2826                final StringBuffer buf1=new StringBuffer(str1.toLowerCase());
2827                for(int i=buf1.length()-1;i>=0;i--)
2828                {
2829                        if((buf1.charAt(i)!=' ')
2830                        &&(buf1.charAt(i)!='\'')
2831                        &&(buf1.charAt(i)!='\"')
2832                        &&(buf1.charAt(i)!='`')
2833                        &&(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(buf1.charAt(i))))
2834                                buf1.setCharAt(i,' ');
2835                }
2836                final Vector<String> V=CMParms.parse(buf1.toString());
