2837                return stringContains(V,str2.toCharArray(),new int[]{0},0);
2838        }
2839
2840        @Override
2841        public boolean eval(final PhysicalAgent scripted,
2842                                                final MOB source,
2843                                                final Environmental target,
2844                                                final MOB monster,
2845                                                final Item primaryItem,
2846                                                final Item secondaryItem,
2847                                                final String msg,
2848                                                Object[] tmp,
2849                                                final String[][] eval,
2850                                                final int startEval)
2851        {
2852                String[] tt=eval[0];
2853                if(tmp == null)
2854                        tmp = newObjs();
2855                final Vector<Object> stack=new Vector<Object>();
2856                for(int t=startEval;t<tt.length;t++)
2857                if(tt[t].equals("("))
2858                        stack.addElement(tt[t]);
2859                else
2860                if(tt[t].equals(")"))
2861                {
2862                        if((!(stack.lastElement() instanceof Boolean))
2863                        ||(stack.size()==1)
2864                        ||(!(stack.elementAt(stack.size()-2)).equals("(")))
2865                        {
2866                                logError(scripted,"EVAL","SYNTAX",") Format error: "+CMParms.toListString(tt));
2867                                return false;
2868                        }
2869                        final boolean b=((Boolean)stack.lastElement()).booleanValue();
2870                        stack.removeElementAt(stack.size()-1);
2871                        stack.removeElementAt(stack.size()-1);
2872                        pushEvalBoolean(stack,b);
2873                }
2874                else
2875                if(connH.containsKey(tt[t]))
2876                {
2877                        Integer curr=connH.get(tt[t]);
2878                        if((stack.size()>0)&&(stack.lastElement() instanceof Integer))
2879                        {
2880                                final int old=((Integer)stack.lastElement()).intValue();
2881                                stack.removeElementAt(stack.size()-1);
2882                                curr=Integer.valueOf(CONNECTOR_MAP[old][curr.intValue()]);
2883                        }
2884                        stack.addElement(curr);
2885                }
2886                else
2887                if(funcH.containsKey(tt[t]))
2888                {
2889                        final Integer funcCode=funcH.get(tt[t]);
2890                        if((t==tt.length-1)
2891                        ||(!tt[t+1].equals("(")))
2892                        {
2893                                logError(scripted,"EVAL","SYNTAX","No ( for fuction "+tt[t]+": "+CMParms.toListString(tt));
2894                                return false;
2895                        }
2896                        t+=2;
2897                        int tlen=0;
2898                        while(((t+tlen)<tt.length)&&(!tt[t+tlen].equals(")")))
2899                                tlen++;
2900                        if((t+tlen)==tt.length)
2901                        {
2902                                logError(scripted,"EVAL","SYNTAX","No ) for fuction "+tt[t-1]+": "+CMParms.toListString(tt));
2903                                return false;
2904                        }
2905                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_MISC+funcCode.intValue();
2906                        final String funcParms=tt[t];
2907                        boolean returnable=false;
2908                        switch(funcCode.intValue())
2909                        {
2910                        case 1: // rand
2911                        {
2912                                String num=funcParms;
2913                                if(num.endsWith("%"))
2914                                        num=num.substring(0,num.length()-1);
2915                                final int arg=CMath.s_int(num);
2916                                if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<arg)
2917                                        returnable=true;
2918                                else
2919                                        returnable=false;
2920                                break;
2921                        }
2922                        case 2: // has
2923                        {
2924                                if(tlen==1)
2925                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
2926                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
2927                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
2928                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
2929                                if(arg2.length()==0)
2930                                {
2931                                        logError(scripted,"HAS","Syntax",funcParms);
2932                                        return returnable;
2933                                }
2934                                final Environmental E2=getArgumentItem(arg2,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
2935                                if(E==null)
2936                                        returnable=false;
2937                                else
2938                                if(E instanceof MOB)
2939                                {
2940                                        if(E2!=null)
2941                                                returnable=((MOB)E).isMine(E2);
2942                                        else
2943                                                returnable=(((MOB)E).findItem(arg2)!=null);
2944                                }
2945                                else
2946                                if(E instanceof Item)
2947                                        returnable=CMLib.english().containsString(E.name(),arg2);
2948                                else
2949                                if(E instanceof Room)
2950                                {
2951                                        if(E2 instanceof Item)
2952                                                returnable=((Room)E).isContent((Item)E2);
2953                                        else
2954                                                returnable=(((Room)E).findItem(null,arg2)!=null);
2955                                }
2956                                else
2957                                        returnable=false;
2958                                break;
2959                        }
2960                        case 74: // hasnum
2961                        {
2962                                if (tlen == 1)
2963                                        tt = parseBits(eval, t, "cccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
2964                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
2965                                final String item=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
2966                                final String cmp=tt[t+2];
2967                                final String value=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+3]);
2968                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
2969                                if((value.length()==0)||(item.length()==0)||(cmp.length()==0))
2970                                {
2971                                        logError(scripted,"HASNUM","Syntax",funcParms);
2972                                        return returnable;
2973                                }
2974                                Item I=null;
2975                                int num=0;
2976                                if(E==null)
2977                                        returnable=false;
2978                                else
2979                                if(E instanceof MOB)
2980                                {
2981                                        final MOB M=(MOB)E;
2982                                        for(int i=0;i<M.numItems();i++)
2983                                        {
2984                                                I=M.getItem(i);
2985                                                if(I==null)
2986                                                        break;
2987                                                if((item.equalsIgnoreCase("all"))
2988                                                ||(CMLib.english().containsString(I.Name(),item)))
2989                                                        num++;
2990                                        }
2991                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+num,value,cmp,"HASNUM");
2992                                }
2993                                else
2994                                if(E instanceof Item)
2995                                {
2996                                        num=CMLib.english().containsString(E.name(),item)?1:0;
2997                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+num,value,cmp,"HASNUM");
2998                                }
2999                                else
3000                                if(E instanceof Room)
3001                                {
3002                                        final Room R=(Room)E;
3003                                        for(int i=0;i<R.numItems();i++)
3004                                        {
3005                                                I=R.getItem(i);
3006                                                if(I==null)
3007                                                        break;
3008                                                if((item.equalsIgnoreCase("all"))
3009                                                ||(CMLib.english().containsString(I.Name(),item)))
3010                                                        num++;
3011                                        }
3012                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+num,value,cmp,"HASNUM");
3013                                }
3014                                else
3015                                        returnable=false;
3016                                break;
3017                        }
3018                        case 67: // hastitle
3019                        {
3020                                if (tlen == 1)
3021                                        tt = parseBits(eval, t, "cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3022                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
3023                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
3024                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3025                                if(arg2.length()==0)
3026                                {
3027                                        logError(scripted,"HASTITLE","Syntax",funcParms);
3028                                        return returnable;
3029                                }
3030                                if(E instanceof MOB)
3031                                {
3032                                        final MOB M=(MOB)E;
3033                                        returnable=(M.playerStats()!=null)&&(M.playerStats().getTitles().contains(arg2));
3034                                }
3035                                else
3036                                        returnable=false;
3037                                break;
3038                        }
3039                        case 3: // worn
3040                        {
3041                                if (tlen == 1)
3042                                        tt = parseBits(eval, t, "cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3043                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
3044                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
3045                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3046                                if(arg2.length()==0)
3047                                {
3048                                        logError(scripted,"WORN","Syntax",funcParms);
3049                                        return returnable;
3050                                }
3051                                if(E==null)
3052                                        returnable=false;
3053                                else
3054                                if(E instanceof MOB)
3055                                        returnable=(((MOB)E).fetchItem(null,Wearable.FILTER_WORNONLY,arg2)!=null);
3056                                else
3057                                if(E instanceof Item)
3058                                        returnable=(CMLib.english().containsString(E.name(),arg2)&&(!((Item)E).amWearingAt(Wearable.IN_INVENTORY)));
3059                                else
3060                                        returnable=false;
3061                                break;
3062                        }
3063                        case 4: // isnpc
3064                        {
3065                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3066                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3067                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
3068                                        returnable=false;
3069                                else
3070                                        returnable=((MOB)E).isMonster();
3071                                break;
3072                        }
3073                        case 87: // isbirthday
3074                        {
3075                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3076                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3077                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
3078                                        returnable=false;
3079                                else
3080                                {
3081                                        final MOB mob=(MOB)E;
3082                                        if(mob.playerStats()==null)
3083                                                 returnable=false;
3084                                        else
3085                                        {
3086                                                final TimeClock C=CMLib.time().localClock(mob.getStartRoom());
3087                                                final int month=C.getMonth();
3088                                                final int day=C.getDayOfMonth();
3089                                                final int bday=mob.playerStats().getBirthday()[PlayerStats.BIRTHDEX_DAY];
3090                                                final int bmonth=mob.playerStats().getBirthday()[PlayerStats.BIRTHDEX_MONTH];
3091                                                if((C.getYear()>mob.playerStats().getBirthday()[PlayerStats.BIRTHDEX_LASTYEARCELEBRATED])
3092                                                &&((month==bmonth)&&(day==bday)))
3093                                                        returnable=true;
3094                                                else
3095                                                        returnable=false;
3096                                        }
3097                                }
3098                                break;
3099                        }
3100                        case 5: // ispc
3101                        {
3102                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3103                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3104                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
3105                                        returnable=false;
3106                                else
3107                                        returnable=!((MOB)E).isMonster();
3108                                break;
3109                        }
3110                        case 6: // isgood
3111                        {
3112                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3113                                final Physical P=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3114                                if(P==null)
3115                                        returnable=false;
3116                                else
3117                                        returnable=CMLib.flags().isGood(P);
3118                                break;
3119                        }
3120                        case 8: // isevil
3121                        {
3122                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3123                                final Physical P=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3124                                if(P==null)
3125                                        returnable=false;
3126                                else
3127                                        returnable=CMLib.flags().isEvil(P);
3128                                break;
3129                        }
3130                        case 9: // isneutral
3131                        {
3132                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3133                                final Physical P=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3134                                if(P==null)
3135                                        returnable=false;
3136                                else
3137                                        returnable=CMLib.flags().isNeutral(P);
3138                                break;
3139                        }
3140                        case 54: // isalive
3141                        {
3142                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3143                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3144                                if((E!=null)&&((E instanceof MOB))&&(!((MOB)E).amDead()))
3145                                        returnable=true;
3146                                else
3147                                        returnable=false;
3148                                break;
3149                        }
3150                        case 58: // isable
3151                        {
3152                                if(tlen==1)
3153                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3154                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
3155                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3156                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3157                                if((E!=null)&&((E instanceof MOB))&&(!((MOB)E).amDead()))
3158                                {
3159                                        final ExpertiseLibrary X=(ExpertiseLibrary)CMLib.expertises().findDefinition(arg2,true);
3160                                        if(X!=null)
3161                                                returnable=((MOB)E).fetchExpertise(X.ID())!=null;
3162                                        else
3163                                                returnable=((MOB)E).findAbility(arg2)!=null;
3164                                }
3165                                else
3166                                        returnable=false;
3167                                break;
3168                        }
3169                        case 59: // isopen
3170                        {
3171                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3172                                final int dir=CMLib.directions().getGoodDirectionCode(arg1);
3173                                returnable=false;
3174                                if(dir<0)
3175                                {
3176                                        final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3177                                        if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof Container))
3178                                                returnable=((Container)E).isOpen();
3179                                        else
3180                                        if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof Exit))
3181                                                returnable=((Exit)E).isOpen();
3182                                }
3183                                else
3184                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
3185                                {
3186                                        final Exit E=lastKnownLocation.getExitInDir(dir);
3187                                        if(E!=null)
3188                                                returnable= E.isOpen();
3189                                }
3190                                break;
3191                        }
3192                        case 60: // islocked
3193                        {
3194                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3195                                final int dir=CMLib.directions().getGoodDirectionCode(arg1);
3196                                returnable=false;
3197                                if(dir<0)
3198                                {
3199                                        final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3200                                        if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof Container))
3201                                                returnable=((Container)E).isLocked();
3202                                        else
3203                                        if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof Exit))
3204                                                returnable=((Exit)E).isLocked();
3205                                }
3206                                else
3207                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
3208                                {
3209                                        final Exit E=lastKnownLocation.getExitInDir(dir);
3210                                        if(E!=null)
3211                                                returnable= E.isLocked();
3212                                }
3213                                break;
3214                        }
3215                        case 10: // isfight
3216                        {
3217                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3218                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3219                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
3220                                        returnable=false;
3221                                else
3222                                        returnable=((MOB)E).isInCombat();
3223                                break;
3224                        }
3225                        case 11: // isimmort
3226                        {
3227                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3228                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3229                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
3230                                        returnable=false;
3231                                else
3232                                        returnable=CMSecurity.isAllowed(((MOB)E),lastKnownLocation,CMSecurity.SecFlag.IMMORT);
3233                                break;
3234                        }
3235                        case 12: // ischarmed
3236                        {
3237                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3238                                final Physical E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3239                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
3240                                        returnable=false;
3241                                else
3242                                        returnable=CMLib.flags().flaggedAffects(E,Ability.FLAG_CHARMING).size()>0;
3243                                break;
3244                        }
3245                        case 15: // isfollow
3246                        {
3247                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3248                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3249                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
3250                                        returnable=false;
3251                                else
3252                                if(((MOB)E).amFollowing()==null)
3253                                        returnable=false;
3254                                else
3255                                if(((MOB)E).amFollowing().location()!=lastKnownLocation)
3256                                        returnable=false;
3257                                else
3258                                        returnable=true;
3259                                break;
3260                        }
3261                        case 73: // isservant
3262                        {
3263                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3264                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3265                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB))||(lastKnownLocation==null))
3266                                        returnable=false;
3267                                else
3268                                if((((MOB)E).getLiegeID()==null)||(((MOB)E).getLiegeID().length()==0))
3269                                        returnable=false;
3270                                else
3271                                if(lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant("$"+((MOB)E).getLiegeID()+"$")==null)
3272                                        returnable=false;
3273                                else
3274                                        returnable=true;
3275                                break;
3276                        }
3277                        case 95: // isspeaking
3278                        {
3279                                if(tlen==1)
3280                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3281                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
3282                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
3283                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3284                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB))||(lastKnownLocation==null))
3285                                        returnable=false;
3286                                else
3287                                {
3288                                        final MOB TM=(MOB)E;
3289                                        final Language L=CMLib.utensils().getLanguageSpoken(TM);
3290                                        if((L!=null)
3291                                        &&(!L.ID().equalsIgnoreCase("Common"))
3292                                        &&(L.ID().equalsIgnoreCase(arg2)||L.Name().equalsIgnoreCase(arg2)||arg2.equalsIgnoreCase("any")))
3293                                                returnable=true;
3294                                        else
3295                                        if(arg2.equalsIgnoreCase("common")||arg2.equalsIgnoreCase("none"))
3296                                                returnable=true;
3297                                        else
3298                                                returnable=false;
3299                                }
3300                                break;
3301                        }
3302                        case 55: // ispkill
3303                        {
3304                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
3305                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3306                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
3307                                        returnable=false;
3308                                else
3309                                if(((MOB)E).isAttributeSet(MOB.Attrib.PLAYERKILL))
3310                                        returnable=true;
3311                                else
3312                                        returnable=false;
3313                                break;
3314                        }
3315                        case 7: // isname
3316                        {
3317                                if(tlen==1)
3318                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3319                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
3320                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
3321                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3322                                if(E==null)
3323                                        returnable=false;
3324                                else
3325                                        returnable=CMLib.english().containsString(E.name(),arg2);
3326                                break;
3327                        }

3333                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3334                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
3335                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3336                                if(E==null)
3337                                        returnable=false;
3338                                else
3339                                        returnable=simpleEvalStr(scripted,E.Name(),arg3,arg2,"NAME");
3340                                break;
3341                        }

3346                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
3347                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3348                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
3349                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3350                                if(E==null)
3351                                        returnable=false;
3352                                else
3353                                        returnable=simpleEvalStr(scripted,CMLib.beanCounter().getCurrency(E),arg3,arg2,"CURRENCY");
3354                                break;
3355                        }
3356                        case 61: // strin
3357                        {
3358                                if(tlen==1)
3359                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3360                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
3361                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
3362                                final Vector<String> V=CMParms.parse(arg1.toUpperCase());
3363                                returnable=V.contains(arg2.toUpperCase());
3364                                break;
3365                        }
3366                        case 62: // callfunc
3367                        {
3368                                if(tlen==1)
3369                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3370                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
3371                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
3372                                String found=null;
3373                                boolean validFunc=false;
3374                                final List<DVector> scripts=getScripts();
3375                                String trigger=null;
3376                                String[] ttrigger=null;
3377                                for(int v=0;v<scripts.size();v++)
3378                                {
3379                                        final DVector script2=scripts.get(v);
3380                                        if(script2.size()<1)
3381                                                continue;
3382                                        trigger=((String)script2.elementAt(0,1)).toUpperCase().trim();
3383                                        ttrigger=(String[])script2.elementAt(0,2);
3384                                        if(getTriggerCode(trigger,ttrigger)==17)
3385                                        {
3386                                                final String fnamed=
3387                                                        (ttrigger!=null)
3388                                                        ?ttrigger[1]
3389                                                        :CMParms.getCleanBit(trigger,1);
3390                                                if(fnamed.equalsIgnoreCase(arg1))
3391                                                {
3392                                                        validFunc=true;
3393                                                        found=
3394                                                        execute(scripted,
3395                                                                        source,
3396                                                                        target,
3397                                                                        monster,
3398                                                                        primaryItem,
3399                                                                        secondaryItem,
3400                                                                        script2,
3401                                                                        varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,arg2),
3402                                                                        tmp);
3403                                                        if(found==null)
3404                                                                found="";
3405                                                        break;
3406                                                }
3407                                        }
3408                                }
3409                                if(!validFunc)
3410                                        logError(scripted,"CALLFUNC","Unknown","Function: "+arg1);
3411                                else
3412                                if(found!=null)
3413                                        returnable=!(found.trim().length()==0);
3414                                else
3415                                        returnable=false;
3416                                break;
3417                        }
3418                        case 14: // affected
3419                        {
3420                                if(tlen==1)
3421                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3422                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
3423                                String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
3424                                final Physical P=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3425                                if(P==null)
3426                                        returnable=false;
3427                                else
3428                                {
3429                                        final Ability A=CMClass.findAbility(arg2);
3430                                        if(A!=null)
3431                                                arg2=A.ID();
3432                                        returnable=(P.fetchEffect(arg2)!=null);
3433                                }
3434                                break;
3435                        }
3436                        case 69: // isbehave

3444                                        returnable=false;

3449                                                arg2=B.ID();
3450                                        returnable=(P.fetchBehavior(arg2)!=null);
3451                                }

3453                        }

3468                        case 28: // questwinner

3470                                if(tlen==1)

3474                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(tt[t+0],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3475                                final Quest Q=getQuest(arg2);
3476                                if(Q==null)
3477                                        returnable=false;
3478                                else
3479                                {
3480                                        if(E!=null)
3481                                                arg1=E.Name();
3482                                        returnable=Q.wasWinner(arg1);
3483                                }
3484                                break;
3485                        }
3486                        case 93: // questscripted
3487                        {
3488                                if(tlen==1)
3489                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3490                                final PhysicalAgent E=getArgumentMOB(tt[t+0],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3491                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3492                                if(arg2.equalsIgnoreCase("ALL"))
3493                                {
3494                                        returnable=false;
3495                                        for(final Enumeration<Quest> q=CMLib.quests().enumQuests();q.hasMoreElements();)
3496                                        {
3497                                                final Quest Q=q.nextElement();
3498                                                if(Q.running())
3499                                                {
3500                                                        if(E!=null)
3501                                                        {
3502                                                                for(final Enumeration<ScriptingEngine> e=E.scripts();e.hasMoreElements();)
3503                                                                {
3504                                                                        final ScriptingEngine SE=e.nextElement();
3505                                                                        if((SE!=null)&&(SE.defaultQuestName().equalsIgnoreCase(Q.name())))
3506                                                                                returnable=true;
3507                                                                }
3508                                                                for(final Enumeration<Behavior> b=E.behaviors();b.hasMoreElements();)
3509                                                                {
3510                                                                        final Behavior B=b.nextElement();
3511                                                                        if(B instanceof ScriptingEngine)
3512                                                                        {
3513                                                                                final ScriptingEngine SE=(ScriptingEngine)B;
3514                                                                                if((SE.defaultQuestName().equalsIgnoreCase(Q.name())))
3515                                                                                        returnable=true;
3516                                                                        }
3517                                                                }
3518                                                        }
3519                                                }
3520                                        }
3521                                }
3522                                else
3523                                {
3524                                        final Quest Q=getQuest(arg2);
3525                                        returnable=false;
3526                                        if((Q!=null)&&(E!=null))
3527                                        {
3528                                                for(final Enumeration<ScriptingEngine> e=E.scripts();e.hasMoreElements();)
3529                                                {
3530                                                        final ScriptingEngine SE=e.nextElement();
3531                                                        if((SE!=null)&&(SE.defaultQuestName().equalsIgnoreCase(Q.name())))
3532                                                                returnable=true;
3533                                                }
3534                                                for(final Enumeration<Behavior> b=E.behaviors();b.hasMoreElements();)
3535                                                {
3536                                                        final Behavior B=b.nextElement();
3537                                                        if(B instanceof ScriptingEngine)
3538                                                        {
3539                                                                final ScriptingEngine SE=(ScriptingEngine)B;
3540                                                                if((SE.defaultQuestName().equalsIgnoreCase(Q.name())))
3541                                                                        returnable=true;
3542                                                        }
3543                                                }
3544                                        }
3545                                }
3546                                break;
3547                        }
3548                        case 94: // questroom
3549                        {
3550                                if(tlen==1)
3551                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3552                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
3553                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3554                                final Quest Q=getQuest(arg2);
3555                                if(Q==null)
3556                                        returnable=false;
3557                                else
3558                                        returnable=(Q.getQuestRoomIndex(arg1)>=0);
3559                                break;
3560                        }
3561                        case 29: // questmob
3562                        {
3563                                if(tlen==1)
3564                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3565                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
3566                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3567                                final PhysicalAgent E=getArgumentMOB(tt[t+0],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3568                                if(arg2.equalsIgnoreCase("ALL"))
3569                                {
3570                                        returnable=false;
3571                                        for(final Enumeration<Quest> q=CMLib.quests().enumQuests();q.hasMoreElements();)
3572                                        {
3573                                                final Quest Q=q.nextElement();
3574                                                if(Q.running())
3575                                                {
3576                                                        if(E!=null)
3577                                                        {
3578                                                                if(Q.isObjectInUse(E))
3579                                                                {
3580                                                                        returnable=true;
3581                                                                        break;
3582                                                                }
3583                                                        }
3584                                                        else
3585                                                        if(Q.getQuestMobIndex(arg1)>=0)
3586                                                        {
3587                                                                returnable=true;
3588                                                                break;
3589                                                        }
3590                                                }
3591                                        }
3592                                }
3593                                else
3594                                {
3595                                        final Quest Q=getQuest(arg2);
3596                                        if(Q==null)
3597                                                returnable=false;
3598                                        else
3599                                                returnable=(Q.getQuestMobIndex(arg1)>=0);
3600                                }
3601                                break;
3602                        }
3603                        case 31: // isquestmobalive
3604                        {
3605                                if(tlen==1)
3606                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3607                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
3608                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3609                                if(arg2.equalsIgnoreCase("ALL"))
3610                                {
3611                                        returnable=false;
3612                                        for(final Enumeration<Quest> q=CMLib.quests().enumQuests();q.hasMoreElements();)
3613                                        {
3614                                                final Quest Q=q.nextElement();
3615                                                if(Q.running())
3616                                                {
3617                                                        MOB M=null;
3618                                                        if(CMath.s_int(arg1.trim())>0)
3619                                                                M=Q.getQuestMob(CMath.s_int(arg1.trim()));
3620                                                        else
3621                                                                M=Q.getQuestMob(Q.getQuestMobIndex(arg1));
3622                                                        if(M!=null)
3623                                                        {
3624                                                                returnable=!M.amDead();
3625                                                                break;
3626                                                        }
3627                                                }
3628                                        }
3629                                }
3630                                else
3631                                {
3632                                        final Quest Q=getQuest(arg2);
3633                                        if(Q==null)
3634                                                returnable=false;
3635                                        else
3636                                        {
3637                                                MOB M=null;
3638                                                if(CMath.s_int(arg1.trim())>0)
3639                                                        M=Q.getQuestMob(CMath.s_int(arg1.trim()));
3640                                                else
3641                                                        M=Q.getQuestMob(Q.getQuestMobIndex(arg1));
3642                                                if(M==null)
3643                                                        returnable=false;
3644                                                else
3645                                                        returnable=!M.amDead();
3646                                        }
3647                                }
3648                                break;
3649                        }
3650                        case 32: // nummobsinarea
3651                        {
3652                                if(tlen==1)
3653                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3654                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]).toUpperCase();
3655                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3656                                String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
3657                                int num=0;
3658                                MaskingLibrary.CompiledZMask MASK=null;
3659                                if((arg3.toUpperCase().startsWith("MASK")&&(arg3.substring(4).trim().startsWith("="))))
3660                                {
3661                                        arg3=arg3.substring(4).trim();
3662                                        arg3=arg3.substring(1).trim();
3663                                        MASK=CMLib.masking().maskCompile(arg3);
3664                                }
3665                                for(final Enumeration<Room> e=lastKnownLocation.getArea().getProperMap();e.hasMoreElements();)
3666                                {
3667                                        final Room R=e.nextElement();
3668                                        if(arg1.equals("*"))
3669                                                num+=R.numInhabitants();
3670                                        else
3671                                        {
3672                                                for(int m=0;m<R.numInhabitants();m++)
3673                                                {
3674                                                        final MOB M=R.fetchInhabitant(m);
3675                                                        if(M==null)
3676                                                                continue;
3677                                                        if(MASK!=null)
3678                                                        {
3679                                                                if(CMLib.masking().maskCheck(MASK,M,true))
3680                                                                        num++;
3681                                                        }
3682                                                        else
3683                                                        if(CMLib.english().containsString(M.name(),arg1))
3684                                                                num++;
3685                                                }
3686                                        }
3687                                }
3688                                returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+num,arg3,arg2,"NUMMOBSINAREA");
3689                                break;
3690                        }
3691                        case 33: // nummobs
3692                        {
3693                                if(tlen==1)
3694                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3695                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]).toUpperCase();
3696                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3697                                String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
3698                                int num=0;
3699                                MaskingLibrary.CompiledZMask MASK=null;
3700                                if((arg3.toUpperCase().startsWith("MASK")&&(arg3.substring(4).trim().startsWith("="))))
3701                                {
3702                                        arg3=arg3.substring(4).trim();
3703                                        arg3=arg3.substring(1).trim();
3704                                        MASK=CMLib.masking().maskCompile(arg3);
3705                                }
3706                                try
3707                                {
3708                                        for(final Enumeration e=CMLib.map().rooms();e.hasMoreElements();)
3709                                        {
3710                                                final Room R=(Room)e.nextElement();
3711                                                for(int m=0;m<R.numInhabitants();m++)
3712                                                {
3713                                                        final MOB M=R.fetchInhabitant(m);
3714                                                        if(M==null)
3715                                                                continue;
3716                                                        if(MASK!=null)
3717                                                        {
3718                                                                if(CMLib.masking().maskCheck(MASK,M,true))
3719                                                                        num++;
3720                                                        }
3721                                                        else
3722                                                        if(CMLib.english().containsString(M.name(),arg1))
3723                                                                num++;
3724                                                }
3725                                        }
3726                                }
3727                                catch (final NoSuchElementException nse)
3728                                {
3729                                }
3730                                returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+num,arg3,arg2,"NUMMOBS");
3731                                break;
3732                        }
3733                        case 34: // numracesinarea
3734                        {
3735                                if(tlen==1)
3736                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3737                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]).toUpperCase();
3738                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3739                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
3740                                int num=0;
3741                                Room R=null;
3742                                MOB M=null;
3743                                for(final Enumeration e=lastKnownLocation.getArea().getProperMap();e.hasMoreElements();)
3744                                {
3745                                        R=(Room)e.nextElement();
3746                                        for(int m=0;m<R.numInhabitants();m++)
3747                                        {
3748                                                M=R.fetchInhabitant(m);
3749                                                if((M!=null)&&(M.charStats().raceName().equalsIgnoreCase(arg1)))
3750                                                        num++;
3751                                        }
3752                                }
3753                                returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+num,arg3,arg2,"NUMRACESINAREA");
3754                                break;
3755                        }
3756                        case 35: // numraces
3757                        {
3758                                if(tlen==1)
3759                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3760                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]).toUpperCase();
3761                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3762                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
3763                                int num=0;
3764                                try
3765                                {
3766                                        for(final Enumeration e=CMLib.map().rooms();e.hasMoreElements();)
3767                                        {
3768                                                final Room R=(Room)e.nextElement();
3769                                                for(int m=0;m<R.numInhabitants();m++)
3770                                                {
3771                                                        final MOB M=R.fetchInhabitant(m);
3772                                                        if((M!=null)&&(M.charStats().raceName().equalsIgnoreCase(arg1)))
3773                                                                num++;
3774                                                }
3775                                        }
3776                                }
3777                                catch (final NoSuchElementException nse)
3778                                {
3779                                }
3780                                returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+num,arg3,arg2,"NUMRACES");
3781                                break;
3782                        }
3783                        case 30: // questobj
3784                        {
3785                                if(tlen==1)
3786                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3787                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
3788                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3789                                final PhysicalAgent E=getArgumentItem(tt[t+0],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3790                                if(arg2.equalsIgnoreCase("ALL"))
3791                                {
3792                                        returnable=false;
3793                                        for(final Enumeration<Quest> q=CMLib.quests().enumQuests();q.hasMoreElements();)
3794                                        {
3795                                                final Quest Q=q.nextElement();
3796                                                if(Q.running())
3797                                                {
3798                                                        if(E!=null)
3799                                                        {
3800                                                                if(Q.isObjectInUse(E))
3801                                                                {
3802                                                                        returnable=true;
3803                                                                        break;
3804                                                                }
3805                                                        }
3806                                                        else
3807                                                        if(Q.getQuestItemIndex(arg1)>=0)
3808                                                        {
3809                                                                returnable=true;
3810                                                                break;
3811                                                        }
3812                                                }
3813                                        }
3814                                }
3815                                else
3816                                {
3817                                        final Quest Q=getQuest(arg2);
3818                                        if(Q==null)
3819                                                returnable=false;
3820                                        else
3821                                                returnable=(Q.getQuestItemIndex(arg1)>=0);
3822                                }
3823                                break;
3824                        }
3825                        case 85: // islike
3826                        {
3827                                if(tlen==1)
3828                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3829                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
3830                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
3831                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3832                                if(E==null)
3833                                        returnable=false;
3834                                else
3835                                        returnable=CMLib.masking().maskCheck(arg2, E,false);
3836                                break;
3837                        }
3838                        case 86: // strcontains
3839                        {
3840                                if(tlen==1)
3841                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */

3843                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
3844                                returnable=stringContainsFunctionImpl(arg1,arg2)>=0;
3845                                break;
3846                        }
3847                        case 92: // isodd
3848                        {
3849                                final String val=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms)).trim();
3850                                boolean isodd = false;
3851                                if( CMath.isLong( val ) )
3852                                {
3853                                        isodd = (CMath.s_long(val) %2 == 1);
3854                                }
3855                                returnable = isodd;
3856                                break;
3857                        }
3858                        case 16: // hitprcnt
3859                        {
3860                                if(tlen==1)
3861                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3862                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
3863                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
3864                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
3865                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
3866                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
3867                                {
3868                                        logError(scripted,"HITPRCNT","Syntax",funcParms);
3869                                        return returnable;
3870                                }
3871                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
3872                                        returnable=false;
3873                                else
3874                                {
3875                                        final double hitPctD=CMath.div(((MOB)E).curState().getHitPoints(),((MOB)E).maxState().getHitPoints());
3876                                        final int val1=(int)Math.round(hitPctD*100.0);
3877                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+val1,arg3,arg2,"HITPRCNT");
3878                                }
3879                                break;
3880                        }
3881                        case 50: // isseason
3882                        {
3883                                String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
3884                                returnable=false;
3885                                if(monster.location()!=null)
3886                                {
3887                                        arg1=arg1.toUpperCase();
3888                                        for(final TimeClock.Season season : TimeClock.Season.values())
3889                                        {
3890                                                if(season.toString().startsWith(arg1.toUpperCase())
3891                                                &&(monster.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getSeasonCode()==season))
3892                                                {
3893                                                        returnable=true;
3894                                                        break;
3895                                                }
3896                                        }
3897                                }
3898                                break;
3899                        }
3900                        case 51: // isweather
3901                        {
3902                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
3903                                returnable=false;
3904                                if(monster.location()!=null)
3905                                for(int a=0;a<Climate.WEATHER_DESCS.length;a++)
3906                                {
3907                                        if((Climate.WEATHER_DESCS[a]).startsWith(arg1.toUpperCase())
3908                                        &&(monster.location().getArea().getClimateObj().weatherType(monster.location())==a))
3909                                        {
3910                                                returnable = true;
3911                                                break;
3912                                        }
3913                                }
3914                                break;
3915                        }
3916                        case 57: // ismoon
3917                        {
3918                                String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
3919                                returnable=false;
3920                                if(monster.location()!=null)
3921                                {
3922                                        if(arg1.length()==0)
3923                                                returnable=monster.location().getArea().getClimateObj().canSeeTheStars(monster.location());
3924                                        else
3925                                        {
3926                                                arg1=arg1.toUpperCase();
3927                                                for(final TimeClock.MoonPhase phase : TimeClock.MoonPhase.values())
3928                                                {
3929                                                        if(phase.toString().startsWith(arg1)
3930                                                        &&(monster.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getMoonPhase(monster.location())==phase))
3931                                                        {
3932                                                                returnable=true;
3933                                                                break;
3934                                                        }
3935                                                }
3936                                        }
3937                                }
3938                                break;
3939                        }
3940                        case 38: // istime
3941                        {
3942                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms)).toLowerCase().trim();
3943                                if(monster.location()==null)
3944                                        returnable=false;
3945                                else
3946                                if(("daytime").startsWith(arg1)
3947                                &&(monster.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getTODCode()==TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DAY))
3948                                        returnable=true;
3949                                else
3950                                if(("dawn").startsWith(arg1)
3951                                &&(monster.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getTODCode()==TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DAWN))
3952                                        returnable=true;
3953                                else
3954                                if(("dusk").startsWith(arg1)
3955                                &&(monster.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getTODCode()==TimeClock.TimeOfDay.DUSK))
3956                                        returnable=true;
3957                                else
3958                                if(("nighttime").startsWith(arg1)
3959                                &&(monster.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getTODCode()==TimeClock.TimeOfDay.NIGHT))
3960                                        returnable=true;
3961                                else
3962                                if((monster.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getHourOfDay()==CMath.s_int(arg1)))
3963                                        returnable=true;
3964                                else
3965                                        returnable=false;
3966                                break;
3967                        }
3968                        case 39: // isday
3969                        {
3970                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
3971                                if((monster.location()!=null)&&(monster.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getDayOfMonth()==CMath.s_int(arg1.trim())))
3972                                        returnable=true;
3973                                else
3974                                        returnable=false;
3975                                break;
3976                        }
3977                        case 45: // nummobsroom
3978                        {
3979                                if(tlen==1)
3980                                {
3981                                        if(CMParms.numBits(funcParms)>2)
3982                                                tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3983                                        else
3984                                                tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
3985                                }
3986                                int num=0;
3987                                int startbit=0;
3988                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
3989                                {
3990                                        num=lastKnownLocation.numInhabitants();
3991                                        if(signH.containsKey(tt[t+1]))
3992                                        {
3993                                                String name=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
3994                                                startbit++;
3995                                                if(!name.equalsIgnoreCase("*"))
3996                                                {
3997                                                        num=0;
3998                                                        MaskingLibrary.CompiledZMask MASK=null;
3999                                                        if((name.toUpperCase().startsWith("MASK")&&(name.substring(4).trim().startsWith("="))))
4000                                                        {
4001                                                                final boolean usePreCompiled = (name.equals(tt[t+0]));
4002                                                                name=name.substring(4).trim();
4003                                                                name=name.substring(1).trim();
4004                                                                MASK=usePreCompiled?CMLib.masking().getPreCompiledMask(name): CMLib.masking().maskCompile(name);
4005                                                        }
4006                                                        for(int i=0;i<lastKnownLocation.numInhabitants();i++)
4007                                                        {
4008                                                                final MOB M=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(i);
4009                                                                if(M==null)
4010                                                                        continue;
4011                                                                if(MASK!=null)
4012                                                                {
4013                                                                        if(CMLib.masking().maskCheck(MASK,M,true))
4014                                                                                num++;
4015                                                                }
4016                                                                else
4017                                                                if(CMLib.english().containsString(M.Name(),name)
4018                                                                ||CMLib.english().containsString(M.displayText(),name))
4019                                                                        num++;
4020                                                        }
4021                                                }
4022                                        }
4023                                }
4024                                else
4025                                if(!signH.containsKey(tt[t+0]))
4026                                {
4027                                        logError(scripted,"NUMMOBSROOM","Syntax","No SIGN found: "+funcParms);
4028                                        return returnable;
4029                                }
4030
4031                                final String comp=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+startbit]);
4032                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+startbit+1]);
4033                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
4034                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+num,arg2,comp,"NUMMOBSROOM");
4035                                break;
4036                        }
4037                        case 63: // numpcsroom
4038                        {
4039                                if(tlen==1)
4040                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4041                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
4042                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
4043                                final Room R=lastKnownLocation;
4044                                if(R!=null)
4045                                {
4046                                        int num=0;
4047                                        for(final Enumeration<MOB> m=R.inhabitants();m.hasMoreElements();)
4048                                        {
4049                                                final MOB M=m.nextElement();
4050                                                if((M!=null)&&(!M.isMonster()))
4051                                                        num++;
4052                                        }
4053                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+num,arg2,arg1,"NUMPCSROOM");
4054                                }
4055                                break;
4056                        }
4057                        case 79: // numpcsarea
4058                        {

4063                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
4064                                {
