4069                                                        num++;
4070                                        }
4071                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+num,arg2,arg1,"NUMPCSAREA");
4072                                }
4073                                break;
4074                        }
4075                        case 77: // explored
4076                        {
4077                                if(tlen==1)
4078                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4079                                final String whom=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
4080                                final String where=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
4081                                final String cmp=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
4082                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+3]);
4083                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(whom,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4084                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
4085                                {
4086                                        logError(scripted,"EXPLORED","Unknown Code",whom);
4087                                        return returnable;
4088                                }
4089                                Area A=null;
4090                                if(!where.equalsIgnoreCase("world"))
4091                                {
4092                                        A=CMLib.map().getArea(where);
4093                                        if(A==null)
4094                                        {
4095                                                final Environmental E2=getArgumentItem(where,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4096                                                if(E2 != null)
4097                                                        A=CMLib.map().areaLocation(E2);
4098                                        }
4099                                        if(A==null)
4100                                        {
4101                                                logError(scripted,"EXPLORED","Unknown Area",where);
4102                                                return returnable;
4103                                        }
4104                                }
4105                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
4106                                {
4107                                        int pct=0;
4108                                        final MOB M=(MOB)E;
4109                                        if(M.playerStats()!=null)
4110                                                pct=M.playerStats().percentVisited(M,A);
4111                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+pct,arg2,cmp,"EXPLORED");
4112                                }
4113                                break;
4114                        }
4115                        case 72: // faction
4116                        {
4117                                if(tlen==1)
4118                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4119                                final String whom=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
4120                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
4121                                final String cmp=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
4122                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+3]);
4123                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(whom,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4124                                final Faction F=CMLib.factions().getFaction(arg1);
4125                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
4126                                {
4127                                        logError(scripted,"FACTION","Unknown Code",whom);
4128                                        return returnable;
4129                                }
4130                                if(F==null)
4131                                {
4132                                        logError(scripted,"FACTION","Unknown Faction",arg1);
4133                                        return returnable;
4134                                }
4135                                final MOB M=(MOB)E;
4136                                String value=null;
4137                                if(!M.hasFaction(F.factionID()))
4138                                        value="";
4139                                else
4140                                {
4141                                        final int myfac=M.fetchFaction(F.factionID());
4142                                        if(CMath.isNumber(arg2.trim()))
4143                                                value=Integer.toString(myfac);
4144                                        else
4145                                        {
4146                                                final Faction.FRange FR=CMLib.factions().getRange(F.factionID(),myfac);
4147                                                if(FR==null)
4148                                                        value="";
4149                                                else
4150                                                        value=FR.name();
4151                                        }
4152                                }
4153                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
4154                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,value,arg2,cmp,"FACTION");
4155                                break;
4156                        }
4157                        case 46: // numitemsroom
4158                        {
4159                                if(tlen==1)
4160                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4161                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
4162                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
4163                                int ct=0;
4164                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
4165                                {
4166                                        for(int i=0;i<lastKnownLocation.numItems();i++)
4167                                        {
4168                                                final Item I=lastKnownLocation.getItem(i);
4169                                                if((I!=null)&&(I.container()==null))
4170                                                        ct++;
4171                                        }
4172                                }
4173                                returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+ct,arg2,arg1,"NUMITEMSROOM");
4174                                break;
4175                        }
4176                        case 47: //mobitem
4177                        {
4178                                if(tlen==1)
4179                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4180                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
4181                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
4182                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
4183                                MOB M=null;
4184                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
4185                                {
4186                                        if(CMath.isInteger(arg1.trim()))
4187                                                M=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(CMath.s_int(arg1.trim())-1);
4188                                        else
4189                                                M=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(arg1.trim());
4190                                }
4191                                Item which=null;
4192                                int ct=1;
4193                                if(M!=null)
4194                                {
4195                                        for(int i=0;i<M.numItems();i++)
4196                                        {
4197                                                final Item I=M.getItem(i);
4198                                                if((I!=null)&&(I.container()==null))
4199                                                {
4200                                                        if(ct==CMath.s_int(arg2.trim()))
4201                                                        {
4202                                                                which = I;
4203                                                                break;
4204                                                        }
4205                                                        ct++;
4206                                                }
4207                                        }
4208                                }
4209                                if(which==null)
4210                                        returnable=false;
4211                                else
4212                                        returnable=(CMLib.english().containsString(which.name(),arg3)
4213                                                                ||CMLib.english().containsString(which.Name(),arg3)
4214                                                                ||CMLib.english().containsString(which.displayText(),arg3));
4215                                break;
4216                        }

4222                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
4223                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4224                                if(arg2.length()==0)
4225                                {
4226                                        logError(scripted,"HASTATTOO","Syntax",funcParms);
4227                                        break;
4228                                }
4229                                else
4230                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
4231                                        returnable=(((MOB)E).findTattoo(arg2)!=null);
4232                                else
4233                                        returnable=false;
4234                                break;

4301                                }

4307                                                shopHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((Item)which).owner());

4309                                                shopHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((MOB)which).location());

4318                                                        {
4319                                                                ct++;
4320                                                        }
4321                                                }

4323                                }

4376                                        else

4379                                                                        ||CMLib.english().containsString(which.Name(),arg3)
4380                                                                        ||CMLib.english().containsString(which.displayText(),arg3));

4388                        }

4492                        case 17: // inroom
4493                        {
4494                                if(tlen==1)

4496                                String comp="==";

4498                                String arg2;
4499                                if(signH.containsKey(tt[t+1]))
4500                                {
4501                                        E=getArgumentItem(tt[t+0],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4502                                        comp=tt[t+1];
4503                                        arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
4504                                }
4505                                else
4506                                        arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
4507                                Room R=null;
4508                                if(arg2.startsWith("$"))
4509                                        R=CMLib.map().roomLocation(this.getArgumentItem(arg2,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp));
4510                                if(R==null)
4511                                        R=getRoom(arg2,lastKnownLocation);
4512                                if(E==null)
4513                                        returnable=false;
4514                                else
4515                                {
4516                                        final Room R2=CMLib.map().roomLocation(E);
4517                                        if((R==null)&&((arg2.length()==0)||(R2==null)))
4518                                                returnable=true;
4519                                        else
4520                                        if((R==null)||(R2==null))
4521                                                returnable=false;
4522                                        else
4523                                                returnable=simpleEvalStr(scripted,CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(R2),CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(R),comp,"INROOM");
4524                                }
4525                                break;
4526                        }
4527                        case 90: // inarea
4528                        {
4529                                if(tlen==1)
4530                                        tt=parseSpecial3PartEval(eval,t);
4531                                String comp="==";

4535                                {
4536                                        E=getArgumentItem(tt[t+0],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4537                                        comp=tt[t+1];
4538                                        arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
4539                                }
4540                                else
4541                                        arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
4542                                Room R=null;
4543                                if(arg3.startsWith("$"))
4544                                        R=CMLib.map().roomLocation(this.getArgumentItem(arg3,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp));
4545                                if(R==null)
4546                                {
4547                                        try
4548                                        {
4549                                                final String lnAstr=(lastKnownLocation!=null)?lastKnownLocation.getArea().Name():null;
4550                                                if((lnAstr!=null)&&(lnAstr.equalsIgnoreCase(arg3)))
4551                                                        R=lastKnownLocation;
4552                                                if(R==null)
4553                                                {
4554                                                        for(final Enumeration<Area> a=CMLib.map().areas();a.hasMoreElements();)
4555                                                        {
4556                                                                final Area A=a.nextElement();
4557                                                                if((A!=null)&&(A.Name().equalsIgnoreCase(arg3)))
4558                                                                {
4559                                                                        if((lnAstr!=null)
4560                                                                        &&(lnAstr.equals(A.Name())))
4561                                                                                R=lastKnownLocation;
4562                                                                        else
4563                                                                        if(!A.isProperlyEmpty())
4564                                                                                R=A.getRandomProperRoom();
4565                                                                }
4566                                                        }
4567                                                }
4568                                                if(R==null)
4569                                                {
4570                                                        for(final Enumeration<Area> a=CMLib.map().areas();a.hasMoreElements();)
4571                                                        {
4572                                                                final Area A=a.nextElement();
4573                                                                if((A!=null)&&(CMLib.english().containsString(A.Name(),arg3)))
4574                                                                {
4575                                                                        if((lnAstr!=null)
4576                                                                        &&(lnAstr.equals(A.Name())))
4577                                                                                R=lastKnownLocation;
4578                                                                        else
4579                                                                        if(!A.isProperlyEmpty())
4580                                                                                R=A.getRandomProperRoom();
4581                                                                }
4582                                                        }
4583                                                }
4584                                        }
4585                                        catch (final NoSuchElementException nse)
4586                                        {
4587                                        }
4588                                }
4589                                if(R==null)
4590                                        R=getRoom(arg3,lastKnownLocation);
4591                                if((R!=null)
4592                                &&(CMath.bset(R.getArea().flags(),Area.FLAG_INSTANCE_PARENT))
4593                                &&(lastKnownLocation!=null)
4594                                &&(lastKnownLocation.getArea()!=R.getArea())
4595                                &&(CMath.bset(lastKnownLocation.getArea().flags(),Area.FLAG_INSTANCE_CHILD))
4596                                &&(CMLib.map().getModelArea(lastKnownLocation.getArea())==R.getArea()))
4597                                        R=lastKnownLocation;
4598
4599                                if(E==null)
4600                                        returnable=false;
4601                                else
4602                                {
4603                                        final Room R2=CMLib.map().roomLocation(E);
4604                                        if((R==null)&&((arg3.length()==0)||(R2==null)))
4605                                                returnable=true;
4606                                        else
4607                                        if((R==null)||(R2==null))
4608                                                returnable=false;
4609                                        else
4610                                                returnable=simpleEvalStr(scripted,R2.getArea().Name(),R.getArea().Name(),comp,"INAREA");
4611                                }
4612                                break;
4613                        }
4614                        case 89: // isrecall
4615                        {
4616                                if(tlen==1)
4617                                        tt=parseSpecial3PartEval(eval,t);
4618                                String comp="==";
4619                                Environmental E=monster;
4620                                String arg2;
4621                                if(signH.containsKey(tt[t+1]))
4622                                {

4624                                        comp=tt[t+1];
4625                                        arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
4626                                }
4627                                else

4639                                        if((R==null)&&((arg2.length()==0)||(R2==null)))
4640                                                returnable=true;
4641                                        else
4642                                        if((R==null)||(R2==null))
4643                                                returnable=false;
4644                                        else
4645                                                returnable=simpleEvalStr(scripted,CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(R2),CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(R),comp,"ISRECALL");
4646                                }
4647                                break;
4648                        }
4649                        case 37: // inlocale
4650                        {
4651                                if(tlen==1)
4652                                {
4653                                        if(CMParms.numBits(funcParms)>1)
4654                                                tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4655                                        else
4656                                        {
4657                                                final int numBits=2;
4658                                                String[] parsed=null;
4659                                                if(CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms).equals(funcParms))
4660                                                        parsed=parseBits("'"+funcParms+"'"+CMStrings.repeat(" .",numBits-1),"cr");
4661                                                else
4662                                                        parsed=parseBits(funcParms+CMStrings.repeat(" .",numBits-1),"cr");
4663                                                tt=insertStringArray(tt,parsed,t);
4664                                                eval[0]=tt;
4665                                        }
4666                                }
4667                                String arg2=null;
4668                                Environmental E=monster;
4669                                if(tt[t+1].equals("."))
4670                                        arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
4671                                else
4672                                {
4673                                        E=getArgumentItem(tt[t+0],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4674                                        arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
4675                                }
4676                                if(E==null)
4677                                        returnable=false;
4678                                else
4679                                if(arg2.length()==0)
4680                                        returnable=true;
4681                                else
4682                                {
4683                                        final Room R=CMLib.map().roomLocation(E);
4684                                        if(R==null)
4685                                                returnable=false;
4686                                        else
4687                                        if(CMClass.classID(R).toUpperCase().indexOf(arg2.toUpperCase())>=0)
4688                                                returnable=true;
4689                                        else
4690                                                returnable=false;
4691                                }
4692                                break;
4693                        }
4694                        case 18: // sex
4695                        {
4696                                if(tlen==1)
4697                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"CcR"); /* tt[t+0] */
4698                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
4699                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
4700                                String arg3=tt[t+2];
4701                                if(CMath.isNumber(arg3.trim()))
4702                                {
4703                                        switch(CMath.s_int(arg3.trim()))
4704                                        {
4705                                        case 0:
4706                                                arg3 = "NEUTER";
4707                                                break;
4708                                        case 1:
4709                                                arg3 = "MALE";
4710                                                break;
4711                                        case 2:
4712                                                arg3 = "FEMALE";
4713                                                break;
4714                                        }
4715                                }
4716                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4717                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
4718                                {
4719                                        logError(scripted,"SEX","Syntax",funcParms);
4720                                        return returnable;
4721                                }
4722                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
4723                                        returnable=false;
4724                                else
4725                                {
4726                                        final String sex=(""+((char)((MOB)E).charStats().getStat(CharStats.STAT_GENDER))).toUpperCase();
4727                                        if(arg2.equals("=="))
4728                                                returnable=arg3.startsWith(sex);
4729                                        else
4730                                        if(arg2.equals("!="))
4731                                                returnable=!arg3.startsWith(sex);
4732                                        else
4733                                        {
4734                                                logError(scripted,"SEX","Syntax",funcParms);
4735                                                return returnable;
4736                                        }
4737                                }
4738                                break;
4739                        }
4740                        case 91: // datetime
4741                        {
4742                                if(tlen==1)
4743                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"Ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4744                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
4745                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
4746                                final String arg3=tt[t+2];
4747                                final int index=CMParms.indexOf(ScriptingEngine.DATETIME_ARGS,arg1.trim());
4748                                if(index<0)
4749                                        logError(scripted,"DATETIME","Syntax","Unknown arg: "+arg1+" for "+scripted.name());
4750                                else
4751                                if(CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted)!=null)
4752                                {
4753                                        String val=null;
4754                                        switch(index)
4755                                        {
4756                                        case 2:
4757                                                val = "" + CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted).getTimeObj().getDayOfMonth();
4758                                                break;
4759                                        case 3:
4760                                                val = "" + CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted).getTimeObj().getDayOfMonth();
4761                                                break;
4762                                        case 4:
4763                                                val = "" + CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted).getTimeObj().getMonth();
4764                                                break;
4765                                        case 5:
4766                                                val = "" + CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted).getTimeObj().getYear();
4767                                                break;
4768                                        default:
4769                                                val = "" + CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted).getTimeObj().getHourOfDay();
4770                                                break;
4771                                        }
4772                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,val,arg3,arg2,"DATETIME");
4773                                }
4774                                break;
4775                        }
4776                        case 13: // stat
4777                        {
4778                                if(tlen==1)
4779                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4780                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
4781                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
4782                                final String arg3=tt[t+2];
4783                                final String arg4=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+3]);
4784                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4785                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
4786                                {
4787                                        logError(scripted,"STAT","Syntax",funcParms);
4788                                        break;
4789                                }
4790                                if(E==null)
4791                                        returnable=false;
4792                                else
4793                                {
4794                                        final String val=getStatValue(E,arg2);
4795                                        if(val==null)
4796                                        {
4797                                                logError(scripted,"STAT","Syntax","Unknown stat: "+arg2+" for "+E.name());
4798                                                break;
4799                                        }
4800
4801                                        if(arg3.equals("=="))
4802                                                returnable=val.equalsIgnoreCase(arg4);
4803                                        else
4804                                        if(arg3.equals("!="))
4805                                                returnable=!val.equalsIgnoreCase(arg4);
4806                                        else
4807                                                returnable=simpleEval(scripted,val,arg4,arg3,"STAT");
4808                                }
4809                                break;
4810                        }
4811                        case 52: // gstat
4812                        {
4813                                if(tlen==1)
4814                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4815                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
4816                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
4817                                final String arg3=tt[t+2];
4818                                final String arg4=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+3]);
4819                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4820                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
4821                                {
4822                                        logError(scripted,"GSTAT","Syntax",funcParms);
4823                                        break;
4824                                }
4825                                if(E==null)
4826                                        returnable=false;
4827                                else
4828                                {
4829                                        final String val=getGStatValue(E,arg2);
4830                                        if(val==null)
4831                                        {
4832                                                logError(scripted,"GSTAT","Syntax","Unknown stat: "+arg2+" for "+E.name());
4833                                                break;
4834                                        }
4835
4836                                        if(arg3.equals("=="))
4837                                                returnable=val.equalsIgnoreCase(arg4);
4838                                        else
4839                                        if(arg3.equals("!="))
4840                                                returnable=!val.equalsIgnoreCase(arg4);
4841                                        else
4842                                                returnable=simpleEval(scripted,val,arg4,arg3,"GSTAT");
4843                                }
4844                                break;
4845                        }
4846                        case 19: // position
4847                        {
4848                                if(tlen==1)
4849                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccR"); /* tt[t+0] */
4850                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
4851                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
4852                                final String arg3=tt[t+2];
4853                                final Physical P=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4854                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
4855                                {
4856                                        logError(scripted,"POSITION","Syntax",funcParms);
4857                                        return returnable;
4858                                }
4859                                if(P==null)
4860                                        returnable=false;
4861                                else
4862                                {
4863                                        String sex="STANDING";
4864                                        if(CMLib.flags().isSleeping(P))
4865                                                sex="SLEEPING";
4866                                        else
4867                                        if(CMLib.flags().isSitting(P))
4868                                                sex="SITTING";
4869                                        if(arg2.equals("=="))
4870                                                returnable=sex.startsWith(arg3);
4871                                        else
4872                                        if(arg2.equals("!="))
4873                                                returnable=!sex.startsWith(arg3);
4874                                        else
4875                                        {
4876                                                logError(scripted,"POSITION","Syntax",funcParms);
4877                                                return returnable;
4878                                        }
4879                                }
4880                                break;
4881                        }
4882                        case 20: // level
4883                        {
4884                                if(tlen==1)
4885                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4886                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
4887                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
4888                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
4889                                final Physical P=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4890                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
4891                                {
4892                                        logError(scripted,"LEVEL","Syntax",funcParms);
4893                                        return returnable;
4894                                }
4895                                if(P==null)
4896                                        returnable=false;
4897                                else
4898                                {
4899                                        final int val1=P.phyStats().level();
4900                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+val1,arg3,arg2,"LEVEL");
4901                                }
4902                                break;
4903                        }
4904                        case 80: // questpoints
4905                        {
4906                                if(tlen==1)
4907                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4908                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
4909                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
4910                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
4911                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4912                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
4913                                {
4914                                        logError(scripted,"QUESTPOINTS","Syntax",funcParms);
4915                                        return returnable;
4916                                }
4917                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
4918                                        returnable=false;
4919                                else
4920                                {
4921                                        final int val1=((MOB)E).getQuestPoint();
4922                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+val1,arg3,arg2,"QUESTPOINTS");
4923                                }
4924                                break;
4925                        }
4926                        case 83: // qvar
4927                        {
4928                                if(tlen==1)
4929                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4930                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
4931                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
4932                                final String arg3=tt[t+2];
4933                                final String arg4=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+3]);
4934                                final Quest Q=getQuest(arg1);
4935                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
4936                                {
4937                                        logError(scripted,"QVAR","Syntax",funcParms);
4938                                        return returnable;
4939                                }
4940                                if(Q==null)
4941                                        returnable=false;
4942                                else
4943                                        returnable=simpleEvalStr(scripted,Q.getStat(arg2),arg4,arg3,"QVAR");
4944                                break;
4945                        }
4946                        case 84: // math
4947                        {
4948                                if(tlen==1)
4949                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4950                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
4951                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
4952                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
4953                                if(!CMath.isMathExpression(arg1))
4954                                {
4955                                        logError(scripted,"MATH","Syntax",funcParms);
4956                                        return returnable;
4957                                }
4958                                if(!CMath.isMathExpression(arg3))
4959                                {
4960                                        logError(scripted,"MATH","Syntax",funcParms);
4961                                        return returnable;
4962                                }
4963                                returnable=simpleExpressionEval(scripted,arg1,arg3,arg2,"MATH");
4964                                break;
4965                        }
4966                        case 81: // trains
4967                        {
4968                                if(tlen==1)
4969                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4970                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
4971                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
4972                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
4973                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4974                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
4975                                {
4976                                        logError(scripted,"TRAINS","Syntax",funcParms);
4977                                        return returnable;
4978                                }
4979                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
4980                                        returnable=false;
4981                                else
4982                                {
4983                                        final int val1=((MOB)E).getTrains();
4984                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+val1,arg3,arg2,"TRAINS");
4985                                }
4986                                break;
4987                        }
4988                        case 82: // pracs
4989                        {
4990                                if(tlen==1)
4991                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
4992                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
4993                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
4994                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
4995                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
4996                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
4997                                {
4998                                        logError(scripted,"PRACS","Syntax",funcParms);
4999                                        return returnable;
5000                                }
5001                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
5002                                        returnable=false;
5003                                else
5004                                {
5005                                        final int val1=((MOB)E).getPractices();
5006                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+val1,arg3,arg2,"PRACS");
5007                                }
5008                                break;
5009                        }
5010                        case 66: // clanrank
5011                        {
5012                                if(tlen==1)
5013                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
5014                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5015                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5016                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5017                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5018                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
5019                                {
5020                                        logError(scripted,"CLANRANK","Syntax",funcParms);
5021                                        return returnable;
5022                                }
5023                                if(!(E instanceof MOB))
5024                                        returnable=false;
5025                                else
5026                                {
5027                                        int val1=-1;
5028                                        Clan C=CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan((MOB)E);
5029                                        if(C==null)
5030                                                C=((MOB)E).clans().iterator().hasNext()?((MOB)E).clans().iterator().next().first:null;
5031                                        if(C!=null)
5032                                                val1=((MOB)E).getClanRole(C.clanID()).second.intValue();
5033                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+val1,arg3,arg2,"CLANRANK");
5034                                }
5035                                break;
5036                        }
5037                        case 64: // deity
5038                        {
5039                                if(tlen==1)
5040                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccR"); /* tt[t+0] */
5041                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5042                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5043                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5044                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5045                                if(arg2.length()==0)
5046                                {
5047                                        logError(scripted,"DEITY","Syntax",funcParms);
5048                                        return returnable;
5049                                }
5050                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
5051                                        returnable=false;
5052                                else
5053                                {
5054                                        final String sex=((MOB)E).getWorshipCharID();
5055                                        if(arg2.equals("=="))
5056                                                returnable=sex.equalsIgnoreCase(arg3);
5057                                        else
5058                                        if(arg2.equals("!="))
5059                                                returnable=!sex.equalsIgnoreCase(arg3);
5060                                        else
5061                                        {
5062                                                logError(scripted,"DEITY","Syntax",funcParms);
5063                                                return returnable;
5064                                        }
5065                                }
5066                                break;
5067                        }
5068                        case 68: // clandata
5069                        {
5070                                if(tlen==1)
5071                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cccR"); /* tt[t+0] */
5072                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5073                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5074                                final String arg3=tt[t+2];
5075                                final String arg4=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+3]);
5076                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5077                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
5078                                {
5079                                        logError(scripted,"CLANDATA","Syntax",funcParms);
5080                                        return returnable;
5081                                }
5082                                String clanID=null;
5083                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
5084                                {
5085                                        Clan C=CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan((MOB)E);
5086                                        if(C==null)
5087                                                C=((MOB)E).clans().iterator().hasNext()?((MOB)E).clans().iterator().next().first:null;
5088                                        if(C!=null)
5089                                                clanID=C.clanID();
5090                                }
5091                                else
5092                                {
5093                                        clanID=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,arg1);
5094                                        if((scripted instanceof MOB)
5095                                        &&(CMLib.clans().getClanAnyHost(clanID)==null))
5096                                        {
5097                                                final List<Pair<Clan,Integer>> Cs=CMLib.clans().getClansByCategory((MOB)scripted, clanID);
5098                                                if((Cs!=null)&&(Cs.size()>0))
5099                                                        clanID=Cs.get(0).first.clanID();
5100                                        }
5101                                }
5102                                final Clan C=CMLib.clans().findClan(clanID);
5103                                if(C!=null)
5104                                {
5105                                        if(!C.isStat(arg2))
5106                                                logError(scripted,"CLANDATA","RunTime",arg2+" is not a valid clan variable.");
5107                                        else
5108                                        {
5109                                                final String whichVal=C.getStat(arg2).trim();
5110                                                if(CMath.isNumber(whichVal)&&CMath.isNumber(arg4.trim()))
5111                                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,whichVal,arg4,arg3,"CLANDATA");
5112                                                else
5113                                                        returnable=simpleEvalStr(scripted,whichVal,arg4,arg3,"CLANDATA");
5114                                        }
5115                                }
5116                                break;
5117                        }
5118                        case 98: // clanqualifies
5119                        {
5120                                if(tlen==1)
5121                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccR"); /* tt[t+0] */
5122                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5123                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
5124                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5125                                if(arg2.length()==0)
5126                                {
5127                                        logError(scripted,"CLANQUALIFIES","Syntax",funcParms);
5128                                        return returnable;
5129                                }
5130                                final Clan C=CMLib.clans().findClan(arg2);
5131                                if((C!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
5132                                {
5133                                        final MOB mob=(MOB)E;
5134                                        if(C.isOnlyFamilyApplicants()
5135                                        &&(!CMLib.clans().isFamilyOfMembership(mob,C.getMemberList())))
5136                                                returnable=false;
5137                                        else
5138                                        if(CMLib.clans().getClansByCategory(mob, C.getCategory()).size()>CMProps.getMaxClansThisCategory(C.getCategory()))
5139                                                returnable=false;
5140                                        if(returnable && (!CMLib.masking().maskCheck(C.getBasicRequirementMask(), mob, true)))
5141                                                returnable=false;
5142                                        else
5143                                        if(returnable && (CMLib.masking().maskCheck(C.getAcceptanceSettings(),mob,true)))
5144                                                returnable=false;
5145                                }
5146                                else
5147                                {
5148                                        logError(scripted,"CLANQUALIFIES","Unknown clan "+arg2+" or "+arg1+" is not a mob",funcParms);
5149                                        return returnable;
5150                                }
5151                                break;
5152                        }
5153                        case 65: // clan
5154                        {
5155                                if(tlen==1)
5156                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccR"); /* tt[t+0] */
5157                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5158                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5159                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5160                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5161                                if(arg2.length()==0)
5162                                {
5163                                        logError(scripted,"CLAN","Syntax",funcParms);
5164                                        return returnable;
5165                                }
5166                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
5167                                        returnable=false;
5168                                else
5169                                {
5170                                        String clanID="";
5171                                        Clan C=CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan((MOB)E);
5172                                        if(C==null)
5173                                                C=((MOB)E).clans().iterator().hasNext()?((MOB)E).clans().iterator().next().first:null;
5174                                        if(C!=null)
5175                                                clanID=C.clanID();
5176                                        if(arg2.equals("=="))
5177                                                returnable=clanID.equalsIgnoreCase(arg3);
5178                                        else
5179                                        if(arg2.equals("!="))
5180                                                returnable=!clanID.equalsIgnoreCase(arg3);
5181                                        else
5182                                        if(arg2.equals("in"))
5183                                                returnable=((MOB)E).getClanRole(arg3)!=null;
5184                                        else
5185                                        if(arg2.equals("notin"))
5186                                                returnable=((MOB)E).getClanRole(arg3)==null;
5187                                        else
5188                                        {
5189                                                logError(scripted,"CLAN","Syntax",funcParms);
5190                                                return returnable;
5191                                        }
5192                                }
5193                                break;
5194                        }
5195                        case 88: // mood
5196                        {
5197                                if(tlen==1)
5198                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccR"); /* tt[t+0] */
5199                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5200                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5201                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5202                                final Physical P=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5203                                if(arg2.length()==0)
5204                                {
5205                                        logError(scripted,"MOOD","Syntax",funcParms);
5206                                        return returnable;
5207                                }
5208                                if((P==null)||(!(P instanceof MOB)))
5209                                        returnable=false;
5210                                else
5211                                {
5212                                        final Ability moodA=P.fetchEffect("Mood");
5213                                        if(moodA!=null)
5214                                        {
5215                                                final String sex=moodA.text();
5216                                                if(arg2.equals("=="))
5217                                                        returnable=sex.equalsIgnoreCase(arg3);
5218                                                else
5219                                                if(arg2.equals("!="))
5220                                                        returnable=!sex.equalsIgnoreCase(arg3);
5221                                                else
5222                                                {
5223                                                        logError(scripted,"MOOD","Syntax",funcParms);
5224                                                        return returnable;
5225                                                }
5226                                        }
5227                                }
5228                                break;
5229                        }
5230                        case 21: // class
5231                        {
5232                                if(tlen==1)
5233                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccR"); /* tt[t+0] */
5234                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5235                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5236                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5237                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5238                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
5239                                {
5240                                        logError(scripted,"CLASS","Syntax",funcParms);
5241                                        return returnable;
5242                                }
5243                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
5244                                        returnable=false;
5245                                else
5246                                {
5247                                        final String sex=((MOB)E).charStats().displayClassName().toUpperCase();
5248                                        if(arg2.equals("=="))
5249                                                returnable=sex.startsWith(arg3);
5250                                        else
5251                                        if(arg2.equals("!="))
5252                                                returnable=!sex.startsWith(arg3);
5253                                        else
5254                                        {
5255                                                logError(scripted,"CLASS","Syntax",funcParms);
5256                                                return returnable;
5257                                        }
5258                                }
5259                                break;
5260                        }
5261                        case 22: // baseclass
5262                        {
5263                                if(tlen==1)
5264                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccR"); /* tt[t+0] */
5265                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5266                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5267                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5268                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5269                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
5270                                {
5271                                        logError(scripted,"CLASS","Syntax",funcParms);
5272                                        return returnable;
5273                                }
5274                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
5275                                        returnable=false;
5276                                else
5277                                {
5278                                        final String sex=((MOB)E).charStats().getCurrentClass().baseClass().toUpperCase();
5279                                        if(arg2.equals("=="))
5280                                                returnable=sex.startsWith(arg3);
5281                                        else
5282                                        if(arg2.equals("!="))
5283                                                returnable=!sex.startsWith(arg3);
5284                                        else
5285                                        {
5286                                                logError(scripted,"CLASS","Syntax",funcParms);
5287                                                return returnable;
5288                                        }
5289                                }
5290                                break;
5291                        }
5292                        case 23: // race
5293                        {
5294                                if(tlen==1)
5295                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccR"); /* tt[t+0] */
5296                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5297                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5298                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5299                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5300                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
5301                                {
5302                                        logError(scripted,"RACE","Syntax",funcParms);
5303                                        return returnable;
5304                                }
5305                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
5306                                        returnable=false;
5307                                else
5308                                {
5309                                        final String sex=((MOB)E).charStats().raceName().toUpperCase();
5310                                        if(arg2.equals("=="))
5311                                                returnable=sex.startsWith(arg3);
5312                                        else
5313                                        if(arg2.equals("!="))
5314                                                returnable=!sex.startsWith(arg3);
5315                                        else
5316                                        {
5317                                                logError(scripted,"RACE","Syntax",funcParms);
5318                                                return returnable;
5319                                        }
5320                                }
5321                                break;
5322                        }
5323                        case 24: //racecat
5324                        {
5325                                if(tlen==1)
5326                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccR"); /* tt[t+0] */
5327                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5328                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5329                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5330                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5331                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
5332                                {
5333                                        logError(scripted,"RACECAT","Syntax",funcParms);
5334                                        return returnable;
5335                                }
5336                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
5337                                        returnable=false;
5338                                else
5339                                {
5340                                        final String sex=((MOB)E).charStats().getMyRace().racialCategory().toUpperCase();
5341                                        if(arg2.equals("=="))
5342                                                returnable=sex.startsWith(arg3);
5343                                        else
5344                                        if(arg2.equals("!="))
5345                                                returnable=!sex.startsWith(arg3);
5346                                        else
5347                                        {
5348                                                logError(scripted,"RACECAT","Syntax",funcParms);
5349                                                return returnable;
5350                                        }
5351                                }
5352                                break;
5353                        }
5354                        case 25: // goldamt
5355                        {
5356                                if(tlen==1)
5357                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
5358                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5359                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5360                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5361                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5362                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
5363                                {
5364                                        logError(scripted,"GOLDAMT","Syntax",funcParms);
5365                                        break;
5366                                }
5367                                if(E==null)
5368                                        returnable=false;
5369                                else
5370                                {
5371                                        int val1=0;
5372                                        if(E instanceof MOB)
5373                                                val1=(int)Math.round(CMLib.beanCounter().getTotalAbsoluteValue((MOB)E,CMLib.beanCounter().getCurrency(scripted)));
5374                                        else
5375                                        if(E instanceof Coins)
5376                                                val1=(int)Math.round(((Coins)E).getTotalValue());
5377                                        else
5378                                        if(E instanceof Item)
5379                                                val1=((Item)E).value();
5380                                        else
5381                                        {
5382                                                logError(scripted,"GOLDAMT","Syntax",funcParms);
5383                                                return returnable;
5384                                        }
5385
5386                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+val1,arg3,arg2,"GOLDAMT");
5387                                }
5388                                break;
5389                        }
5390                        case 78: // exp
5391                        {
5392                                if(tlen==1)
5393                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
5394                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5395                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5396                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5397                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5398                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
5399                                {
5400                                        logError(scripted,"EXP","Syntax",funcParms);
5401                                        break;
5402                                }
5403                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
5404                                        returnable=false;
5405                                else
5406                                {
5407                                        final int val1=((MOB)E).getExperience();
5408                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+val1,arg3,arg2,"EXP");
5409                                }
5410                                break;
5411                        }
5412                        case 76: // value
5413                        {
5414                                if(tlen==1)
5415                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
5416                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5417                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5418                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+1]);
5419                                final String arg3=tt[t+2];
5420                                final String arg4=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+3]);
5421                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0)||(arg4.length()==0))
5422                                {
5423                                        logError(scripted,"VALUE","Syntax",funcParms);
5424                                        break;
5425                                }
5426                                if(!CMLib.beanCounter().getAllCurrencies().contains(arg2.toUpperCase()))
5427                                {
5428                                        logError(scripted,"VALUE","Syntax",arg2+" is not a valid designated currency.");
5429                                        break;
5430                                }
5431                                if(E==null)
5432                                        returnable=false;
5433                                else
5434                                {
5435                                        int val1=0;
5436                                        if(E instanceof MOB)
5437                                                val1=(int)Math.round(CMLib.beanCounter().getTotalAbsoluteValue((MOB)E,arg2.toUpperCase()));
5438                                        else
5439                                        if(E instanceof Coins)
5440                                        {
5441                                                if(((Coins)E).getCurrency().equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
5442                                                        val1=(int)Math.round(((Coins)E).getTotalValue());
5443                                        }
5444                                        else
5445                                        if(E instanceof Item)
5446                                                val1=((Item)E).value();
5447                                        else
5448                                        {
5449                                                logError(scripted,"VALUE","Syntax",funcParms);
5450                                                return returnable;
5451                                        }
5452
5453                                        returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+val1,arg4,arg3,"GOLDAMT");
5454                                }
5455                                break;
5456                        }
5457                        case 26: // objtype
5458                        {
5459                                if(tlen==1)
5460                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccR"); /* tt[t+0] */
5461                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5462                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5463                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5464                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5465                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
5466                                {
5467                                        logError(scripted,"OBJTYPE","Syntax",funcParms);
5468                                        return returnable;
5469                                }
5470                                if(E==null)
5471                                        returnable=false;
5472                                else
5473                                {
5474                                        final String sex=CMClass.classID(E).toUpperCase();
5475                                        if(arg2.equals("=="))
5476                                                returnable=sex.indexOf(arg3)>=0;
5477                                        else
5478                                        if(arg2.equals("!="))
5479                                                returnable=sex.indexOf(arg3)<0;
5480                                        else
5481                                        {
5482                                                logError(scripted,"OBJTYPE","Syntax",funcParms);
5483                                                return returnable;
5484                                        }
5485                                }
5486                                break;
5487                        }
5488                        case 27: // var
5489                        {
5490                                if(tlen==1)
5491                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cCcr"); /* tt[t+0] */
5492                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5493                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5494                                final String arg3=tt[t+2];
5495                                final String arg4=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+3]);
5496                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5497                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
5498                                {
5499                                        logError(scripted,"VAR","Syntax",funcParms);
5500                                        return returnable;
5501                                }
5502                                final String val=getVar(E,arg1,arg2,source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5503                                if(arg3.equals("=="))
5504                                        returnable=val.equals(arg4);
5505                                else
5506                                if(arg3.equals("!="))
5507                                        returnable=!val.equals(arg4);
5508                                else
5509                                if(arg3.equals(">"))
5510                                        returnable=CMath.s_int(val.trim())>CMath.s_int(arg4.trim());
5511                                else
5512                                if(arg3.equals("<"))
5513                                        returnable=CMath.s_int(val.trim())<CMath.s_int(arg4.trim());
5514                                else
5515                                if(arg3.equals(">="))
5516                                        returnable=CMath.s_int(val.trim())>=CMath.s_int(arg4.trim());
5517                                else
5518                                if(arg3.equals("<="))
5519                                        returnable=CMath.s_int(val.trim())<=CMath.s_int(arg4.trim());
5520                                else
5521                                {
5522                                        logError(scripted,"VAR","Syntax",funcParms);
5523                                        return returnable;
5524                                }
5525                                break;
5526                        }
5527                        case 41: // eval
5528                        {
5529                                if(tlen==1)
5530                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
