5531                                final String val=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]);
5532                                final String arg3=tt[t+1];
5533                                final String arg4=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]);
5534                                if(arg3.length()==0)
5535                                {
5536                                        logError(scripted,"EVAL","Syntax",funcParms);
5537                                        return returnable;
5538                                }
5539                                if(arg3.equals("=="))
5540                                        returnable=val.equals(arg4);
5541                                else
5542                                if(arg3.equals("!="))
5543                                        returnable=!val.equals(arg4);
5544                                else
5545                                if(arg3.equals(">"))
5546                                        returnable=CMath.s_int(val.trim())>CMath.s_int(arg4.trim());
5547                                else
5548                                if(arg3.equals("<"))
5549                                        returnable=CMath.s_int(val.trim())<CMath.s_int(arg4.trim());
5550                                else
5551                                if(arg3.equals(">="))
5552                                        returnable=CMath.s_int(val.trim())>=CMath.s_int(arg4.trim());
5553                                else
5554                                if(arg3.equals("<="))
5555                                        returnable=CMath.s_int(val.trim())<=CMath.s_int(arg4.trim());
5556                                else
5557                                {
5558                                        logError(scripted,"EVAL","Syntax",funcParms);
5559                                        return returnable;
5560                                }
5561                                break;
5562                        }
5563                        case 40: // number
5564                        {
5565                                final String val=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms)).trim();
5566                                boolean isnumber=(val.length()>0);
5567                                for(int i=0;i<val.length();i++)
5568                                {
5569                                        if(!Character.isDigit(val.charAt(i)))
5570                                        {
5571                                                isnumber = false;
5572                                                break;
5573                                        }
5574                                }
5575                                returnable=isnumber;
5576                                break;
5577                        }
5578                        case 42: // randnum
5579                        {
5580                                if(tlen==1)
5581                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
5582                                final String arg1s=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]).toUpperCase().trim();
5583                                int arg1=0;
5584                                if(CMath.isMathExpression(arg1s.trim()))
5585                                        arg1=CMath.s_parseIntExpression(arg1s.trim());
5586                                else
5587                                        arg1=CMParms.parse(arg1s.trim()).size();
5588                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5589                                final String arg3s=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]).trim();
5590                                int arg3=0;
5591                                if(CMath.isMathExpression(arg3s.trim()))
5592                                        arg3=CMath.s_parseIntExpression(arg3s.trim());
5593                                else
5594                                        arg3=CMParms.parse(arg3s.trim()).size();
5595                                arg1=CMLib.dice().roll(1,arg1,0);
5596                                returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+arg1,""+arg3,arg2,"RANDNUM");
5597                                break;
5598                        }
5599                        case 71: // rand0num
5600                        {
5601                                if(tlen==1)
5602                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
5603                                final String arg1s=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+0]).toUpperCase().trim();
5604                                int arg1=0;
5605                                if(CMath.isMathExpression(arg1s))
5606                                        arg1=CMath.s_parseIntExpression(arg1s);
5607                                else
5608                                        arg1=CMParms.parse(arg1s).size();
5609                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5610                                final String arg3s=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[t+2]).trim();
5611                                int arg3=0;
5612                                if(CMath.isMathExpression(arg3s))
5613                                        arg3=CMath.s_parseIntExpression(arg3s);
5614                                else
5615                                        arg3=CMParms.parse(arg3s).size();
5616                                arg1=CMLib.dice().roll(1,arg1,-1);
5617                                returnable=simpleEval(scripted,""+arg1,""+arg3,arg2,"RAND0NUM");
5618                                break;
5619                        }
5620                        case 53: // incontainer
5621                        {
5622                                if(tlen==1)
5623                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
5624                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5625                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5626                                final String arg2=tt[t+1];
5627                                final Environmental E2=getArgumentItem(arg2,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5628                                if(E==null)
5629                                        returnable=false;
5630                                else
5631                                if(E instanceof MOB)
5632                                {
5633                                        if(arg2.length()==0)
5634                                                returnable=(((MOB)E).riding()==null);
5635                                        else
5636                                        if(E2!=null)
5637                                                returnable=(((MOB)E).riding()==E2);
5638                                        else
5639                                                returnable=false;
5640                                }
5641                                else
5642                                if(E instanceof Item)
5643                                {
5644                                        if(arg2.length()==0)
5645                                                returnable=(((Item)E).container()==null);
5646                                        else
5647                                        if(E2!=null)
5648                                                returnable=(((Item)E).container()==E2);
5649                                        else
5650                                                returnable=false;
5651                                }
5652                                else
5653                                        returnable=false;
5654                                break;
5655                        }
5656                        case 96: // iscontents
5657                        {
5658                                if(tlen==1)
5659                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"cr"); /* tt[t+0] */
5660                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5661                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5662                                final String arg2=varify(source, target, scripted, monster, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp, tt[t+1]);
5663                                if(E==null)
5664                                        returnable=false;
5665                                else
5666                                if(E instanceof Rideable)
5667                                {
5668                                        if(arg2.length()==0)
5669                                                returnable=((Rideable)E).numRiders()==0;
5670                                        else
5671                                                returnable=CMLib.english().fetchEnvironmental(new XVector<Rider>(((Rideable)E).riders()), arg2, false)!=null;
5672                                }
5673                                if(E instanceof Container)
5674                                {
5675                                        if(arg2.length()==0)
5676                                                returnable=!((Container)E).hasContent();
5677                                        else
5678                                                returnable=CMLib.english().fetchEnvironmental(((Container)E).getDeepContents(), arg2, false)!=null;
5679                                }
5680                                else
5681                                        returnable=false;
5682                                break;
5683                        }
5684                        case 97: // wornon
5685                        {
5686                                if(tlen==1)
5687                                        tt=parseBits(eval,t,"ccr"); /* tt[t+0] */
5688                                final String arg1=tt[t+0];
5689                                final PhysicalAgent E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5690                                final String arg2=varify(source, target, scripted, monster, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp, tt[t+1]);
5691                                final String arg3=varify(source, target, scripted, monster, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp, tt[t+2]);
5692                                if((arg2.length()==0)||(arg3.length()==0))
5693                                {
5694                                        logError(scripted,"WORNON","Syntax",funcParms);
5695                                        return returnable;
5696                                }
5697                                final int wornLoc = CMParms.indexOf(Wearable.CODES.NAMESUP(), arg2.toUpperCase().trim());
5698                                returnable=false;
5699                                if(wornLoc<0)
5700                                        logError(scripted,"EVAL","BAD WORNON LOCATION",arg2);
5701                                else
5702                                if(E instanceof MOB)
5703                                {
5704                                        final List<Item> items=((MOB)E).fetchWornItems(Wearable.CODES.GET(wornLoc),(short)-2048,(short)0);
5705                                        if((items.size()==0)&&(arg3.length()==0))
5706                                                returnable=true;
5707                                        else
5708                                                returnable = CMLib.english().fetchEnvironmental(items, arg3, false)!=null;
5709                                }
5710                                break;
5711                        }
5712                        default:
5713                                logError(scripted,"EVAL","UNKNOWN",CMParms.toListString(tt));
5714                                return false;
5715                        }
5716                        pushEvalBoolean(stack,returnable);
5717                        while((t<tt.length)&&(!tt[t].equals(")")))
5718                                t++;
5719                }
5720                else
5721                {
5722                        logError(scripted,"EVAL","SYNTAX","BAD CONJUCTOR "+tt[t]+": "+CMParms.toListString(tt));
5723                        return false;
5724                }
5725                if((stack.size()!=1)||(!(stack.firstElement() instanceof Boolean)))
5726                {
5727                        logError(scripted,"EVAL","SYNTAX","Unmatched (: "+CMParms.toListString(tt));
5728                        return false;
5729                }
5730                return ((Boolean)stack.firstElement()).booleanValue();
5731        }
5732
5733        protected void setShopPrice(final ShopKeeper shopHere, final Environmental E, final Object[] tmp)
5734        {
5735                if(shopHere instanceof MOB)
5736                {
5737                        final ShopKeeper.ShopPrice price = CMLib.coffeeShops().sellingPrice((MOB)shopHere, null, E, shopHere, shopHere.getShop(), true);
5738                        if(price.experiencePrice>0)
5739                                tmp[SPECIAL_9SHOPHASPRICE] = price.experiencePrice+"xp";
5740                        else
5741                        if(price.questPointPrice>0)
5742                                tmp[SPECIAL_9SHOPHASPRICE] = price.questPointPrice+"qp";
5743                        else
5744                                tmp[SPECIAL_9SHOPHASPRICE] = CMLib.beanCounter().abbreviatedPrice((MOB)shopHere,price.absoluteGoldPrice);
5745                }
5746        }
5747
5748        @Override
5749        public String functify(final PhysicalAgent scripted,
5750                                                   final MOB source,
5751                                                   final Environmental target,
5752                                                   final MOB monster,
5753                                                   final Item primaryItem,
5754                                                   final Item secondaryItem,
5755                                                   final String msg,
5756                                                   final Object[] tmp,
5757                                                   final String evaluable)
5758        {
5759                if(evaluable.length()==0)
5760                        return "";
5761                final StringBuffer results = new StringBuffer("");
5762                final int y=evaluable.indexOf('(');
5763                final int z=evaluable.indexOf(')',y);
5764                final String preFab=(y>=0)?evaluable.substring(0,y).toUpperCase().trim():"";
5765                Integer funcCode=funcH.get(preFab);
5766                if(funcCode==null)
5767                        funcCode=Integer.valueOf(0);
5768                if((y<0)||(z<y))
5769                {
5770                        logError(scripted,"()","Syntax",evaluable);
5771                        return "";
5772                }
5773                else
5774                {
5775                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_MISC2+funcCode.intValue();
5776                        final String funcParms=evaluable.substring(y+1,z).trim();
5777                        switch(funcCode.intValue())
5778                        {
5779                        case 1: // rand
5780                        {
5781                                results.append(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage());
5782                                break;
5783                        }
5784                        case 2: // has
5785                        {
5786                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
5787                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5788                                ArrayList<Item> choices=new ArrayList<Item>();
5789                                if(E==null)
5790                                        choices=new ArrayList<Item>();
5791                                else
5792                                if(E instanceof MOB)
5793                                {
5794                                        for(int i=0;i<((MOB)E).numItems();i++)
5795                                        {
5796                                                final Item I=((MOB)E).getItem(i);
5797                                                if((I!=null)&&(I.amWearingAt(Wearable.IN_INVENTORY))&&(I.container()==null))
5798                                                        choices.add(I);
5799                                        }
5800                                }
5801                                else
5802                                if(E instanceof Item)
5803                                {
5804                                        if(E instanceof Container)
5805                                                choices.addAll(((Container)E).getDeepContents());
5806                                        else
5807                                                choices.add((Item)E);
5808                                }
5809                                else
5810                                if(E instanceof Room)
5811                                {
5812                                        for(int i=0;i<((Room)E).numItems();i++)
5813                                        {
5814                                                final Item I=((Room)E).getItem(i);
5815                                                if((I!=null)&&(I.container()==null))
5816                                                        choices.add(I);
5817                                        }
5818                                }
5819                                if(choices.size()>0)
5820                                        results.append(choices.get(CMLib.dice().roll(1,choices.size(),-1)).name());
5821                                break;
5822                        }
5823                        case 74: // hasnum
5824                        {
5825                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
5826                                final String item=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,1));
5827                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5828                                if((item.length()==0)||(E==null))
5829                                        logError(scripted,"HASNUM","Syntax",funcParms);
5830                                else
5831                                {
5832                                        Item I=null;
5833                                        int num=0;
5834                                        if(E instanceof MOB)
5835                                        {
5836                                                final MOB M=(MOB)E;
5837                                                for(int i=0;i<M.numItems();i++)
5838                                                {
5839                                                        I=M.getItem(i);
5840                                                        if(I==null)
5841                                                                break;
5842                                                        if((item.equalsIgnoreCase("all"))
5843                                                        ||(CMLib.english().containsString(I.Name(),item)))
5844                                                                num++;
5845                                                }
5846                                                results.append(""+num);
5847                                        }
5848                                        else
5849                                        if(E instanceof Item)
5850                                        {
5851                                                num=CMLib.english().containsString(E.name(),item)?1:0;
5852                                                results.append(""+num);
5853                                        }
5854                                        else
5855                                        if(E instanceof Room)
5856                                        {
5857                                                final Room R=(Room)E;
5858                                                for(int i=0;i<R.numItems();i++)
5859                                                {
5860                                                        I=R.getItem(i);
5861                                                        if(I==null)
5862                                                                break;
5863                                                        if((item.equalsIgnoreCase("all"))
5864                                                        ||(CMLib.english().containsString(I.Name(),item)))
5865                                                                num++;
5866                                                }
5867                                                results.append(""+num);
5868                                        }
5869                                }
5870                                break;
5871                        }
5872                        case 3: // worn
5873                        {
5874                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
5875                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5876                                ArrayList<Item> choices=new ArrayList<Item>();
5877                                if(E==null)
5878                                        choices=new ArrayList<Item>();
5879                                else
5880                                if(E instanceof MOB)
5881                                {
5882                                        for(int i=0;i<((MOB)E).numItems();i++)
5883                                        {
5884                                                final Item I=((MOB)E).getItem(i);
5885                                                if((I!=null)&&(!I.amWearingAt(Wearable.IN_INVENTORY))&&(I.container()==null))
5886                                                        choices.add(I);
5887                                        }
5888                                }
5889                                else
5890                                if((E instanceof Item)&&(!(((Item)E).amWearingAt(Wearable.IN_INVENTORY))))
5891                                {
5892                                        if(E instanceof Container)
5893                                                choices.addAll(((Container)E).getDeepContents());
5894                                        else
5895                                                choices.add((Item)E);
5896                                }
5897                                if(choices.size()>0)
5898                                        results.append(choices.get(CMLib.dice().roll(1,choices.size(),-1)).name());
5899                                break;
5900                        }
5901                        case 4: // isnpc
5902                        case 5: // ispc
5903                                results.append("[unimplemented function]");
5904                                break;
5905                        case 87: // isbirthday
5906                        {
5907                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
5908                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5909                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB)&&(((MOB)E).playerStats()!=null)&&(((MOB)E).playerStats().getBirthday()!=null))
5910                                {
5911                                        final MOB mob=(MOB)E;
5912                                        final TimeClock C=CMLib.time().localClock(mob.getStartRoom());
5913                                        final int day=C.getDayOfMonth();
5914                                        final int month=C.getMonth();
5915                                        int year=C.getYear();
5916                                        final int bday=mob.playerStats().getBirthday()[PlayerStats.BIRTHDEX_DAY];
5917                                        final int bmonth=mob.playerStats().getBirthday()[PlayerStats.BIRTHDEX_MONTH];
5918                                        if((month>bmonth)||((month==bmonth)&&(day>bday)))
5919                                                year++;
5920
5921                                        final StringBuffer timeDesc=new StringBuffer("");
5922                                        if(C.getDaysInWeek()>0)
5923                                        {
5924                                                long x=((long)year)*((long)C.getMonthsInYear())*C.getDaysInMonth();
5925                                                x=x+((long)(bmonth-1))*((long)C.getDaysInMonth());
5926                                                x=x+bmonth;
5927                                                timeDesc.append(C.getWeekNames()[(int)(x%C.getDaysInWeek())]+", ");
5928                                        }
5929                                        timeDesc.append("the "+bday+CMath.numAppendage(bday));
5930                                        timeDesc.append(" day of "+C.getMonthNames()[bmonth-1]);
5931                                        if(C.getYearNames().length>0)
5932                                                timeDesc.append(", "+CMStrings.replaceAll(C.getYearNames()[year%C.getYearNames().length],"#",""+year));
5933                                        results.append(timeDesc.toString());
5934                                }
5935                                break;
5936                        }
5937                        case 6: // isgood
5938                        {
5939                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
5940                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5941                                if((E!=null)&&((E instanceof MOB)))
5942                                {
5943                                        final Faction.FRange FR=CMLib.factions().getRange(CMLib.factions().AlignID(),((MOB)E).fetchFaction(CMLib.factions().AlignID()));
5944                                        if(FR!=null)
5945                                                results.append(FR.name());
5946                                        else
5947                                                results.append(((MOB)E).fetchFaction(CMLib.factions().AlignID()));
5948                                }
5949                                break;
5950                        }
5951                        case 8: // isevil
5952                        {
5953                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
5954                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5955                                if((E!=null)&&((E instanceof MOB)))
5956                                        results.append(CMLib.flags().getAlignmentName(E).toLowerCase());
5957                                break;
5958                        }
5959                        case 9: // isneutral
5960                        {
5961                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
5962                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5963                                if((E!=null)&&((E instanceof MOB)))
5964                                        results.append(((MOB)E).fetchFaction(CMLib.factions().AlignID()));
5965                                break;
5966                        }
5967                        case 11: // isimmort
5968                                results.append("[unimplemented function]");
5969                                break;
5970                        case 54: // isalive
5971                        {
5972                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
5973                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5974                                if((E!=null)&&((E instanceof MOB))&&(!((MOB)E).amDead()))
5975                                        results.append(((MOB)E).healthText(null));
5976                                else
5977                                if(E!=null)
5978                                        results.append(E.name()+" is dead.");
5979                                break;
5980                        }
5981                        case 58: // isable
5982                        {
5983                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
5984                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
5985                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0));
5986                                if((E!=null)&&((E instanceof MOB))&&(!((MOB)E).amDead()))
5987                                {
5988                                        final ExpertiseLibrary X=(ExpertiseLibrary)CMLib.expertises().findDefinition(arg2,true);
5989                                        if(X!=null)
5990                                        {
5991                                                final Pair<String,Integer> s=((MOB)E).fetchExpertise(X.ID());
5992                                                if(s!=null)
5993                                                        results.append(s.getKey()+((s.getValue()!=null)?s.getValue().toString():""));
5994                                        }
5995                                        else
5996                                        {
5997                                                final Ability A=((MOB)E).findAbility(arg2);
5998                                                if(A!=null)
5999                                                        results.append(""+A.proficiency());
6000                                        }
6001                                }
6002                                break;
6003                        }
6004                        case 59: // isopen
6005                        {
6006                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6007                                final int dir=CMLib.directions().getGoodDirectionCode(arg1);
6008                                boolean returnable=false;
6009                                if(dir<0)
6010                                {
6011                                        final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6012                                        if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof Container))
6013                                                returnable=((Container)E).isOpen();
6014                                        else
6015                                        if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof Exit))
6016                                                returnable=((Exit)E).isOpen();
6017                                }
6018                                else
6019                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6020                                {
6021                                        final Exit E=lastKnownLocation.getExitInDir(dir);
6022                                        if(E!=null)
6023                                                returnable= E.isOpen();
6024                                }
6025                                results.append(""+returnable);
6026                                break;
6027                        }
6028                        case 60: // islocked
6029                        {
6030                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6031                                final int dir=CMLib.directions().getGoodDirectionCode(arg1);
6032                                if(dir<0)
6033                                {
6034                                        final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6035                                        if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof Container))
6036                                                results.append(((Container)E).keyName());
6037                                        else
6038                                        if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof Exit))
6039                                                results.append(((Exit)E).keyName());
6040                                }
6041                                else
6042                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6043                                {
6044                                        final Exit E=lastKnownLocation.getExitInDir(dir);
6045                                        if(E!=null)
6046                                                results.append(E.keyName());
6047                                }
6048                                break;
6049                        }
6050                        case 62: // callfunc
6051                        {
6052                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0));
6053                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0));
6054                                String found=null;
6055                                boolean validFunc=false;
6056                                final List<DVector> scripts=getScripts();
6057                                String trigger=null;
6058                                String[] ttrigger=null;
6059                                for(int v=0;v<scripts.size();v++)
6060                                {
6061                                        final DVector script2=scripts.get(v);
6062                                        if(script2.size()<1)
6063                                                continue;
6064                                        trigger=((String)script2.elementAt(0,1)).toUpperCase().trim();
6065                                        ttrigger=(String[])script2.elementAt(0,2);
6066                                        if(getTriggerCode(trigger,ttrigger)==17)
6067                                        {
6068                                                final String fnamed=CMParms.getCleanBit(trigger,1);
6069                                                if(fnamed.equalsIgnoreCase(arg1))
6070                                                {
6071                                                        validFunc=true;
6072                                                        found=
6073                                                        execute(scripted,
6074                                                                        source,
6075                                                                        target,
6076                                                                        monster,
6077                                                                        primaryItem,
6078                                                                        secondaryItem,
6079                                                                        script2,
6080                                                                        varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,arg2),
6081                                                                        tmp);
6082                                                        if(found==null)
6083                                                                found="";
6084                                                        break;
6085                                                }
6086                                        }
6087                                }
6088                                if(!validFunc)
6089                                        logError(scripted,"CALLFUNC","Unknown","Function: "+arg1);
6090                                else
6091                                        results.append(found);
6092                                break;
6093                        }
6094                        case 61: // strin
6095                        {
6096                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0));
6097                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0));
6098                                final List<String> V=CMParms.parse(arg1.toUpperCase());
6099                                results.append(V.indexOf(arg2.toUpperCase()));
6100                                break;
6101                        }
6102                        case 55: // ispkill
6103                        {
6104                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6105                                final Physical E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6106                                if((E==null)||(!(E instanceof MOB)))
6107                                        results.append("false");
6108                                else
6109                                if(((MOB)E).isAttributeSet(MOB.Attrib.PLAYERKILL))
6110                                        results.append("true");
6111                                else
6112                                        results.append("false");
6113                                break;
6114                        }
6115                        case 10: // isfight
6116                        {
6117                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6118                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6119                                if((E!=null)&&((E instanceof MOB))&&(((MOB)E).isInCombat()))
6120                                        results.append(((MOB)E).getVictim().name());
6121                                break;
6122                        }
6123                        case 12: // ischarmed
6124                        {
6125                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6126                                final Physical E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6127                                if(E!=null)
6128                                {
6129                                        final List<Ability> V=CMLib.flags().flaggedAffects(E,Ability.FLAG_CHARMING);
6130                                        for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
6131                                                results.append((V.get(v).name())+" ");
6132                                }
6133                                break;
6134                        }
6135                        case 15: // isfollow
6136                        {
6137                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6138                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6139                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB)&&(((MOB)E).amFollowing()!=null)
6140                                &&(((MOB)E).amFollowing().location()==lastKnownLocation))
6141                                        results.append(((MOB)E).amFollowing().name());
6142                                break;
6143                        }
6144                        case 73: // isservant
6145                        {
6146                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6147                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6148                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB)&&(((MOB)E).getLiegeID()!=null)&&(((MOB)E).getLiegeID().length()>0))
6149                                        results.append(((MOB)E).getLiegeID());
6150                                break;
6151                        }
6152                        case 95: // isspeaking
6153                        {
6154                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6155                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6156                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
6157                                {
6158                                        final MOB TM=(MOB)E;
6159                                        final Language L=CMLib.utensils().getLanguageSpoken(TM);
6160                                        if(L!=null)
6161                                                results.append(L.Name());
6162                                        else
6163                                                results.append("Common");
6164                                }
6165                                break;
6166                        }
6167                        case 56: // name
6168                        case 7: // isname
6169                        {
6170                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6171                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6172                                if(E!=null)
6173                                        results.append(E.name());
6174                                break;
6175                        }
6176                        case 75: // currency
6177                        {
6178                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6179                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6180                                if(E!=null)
6181                                        results.append(CMLib.beanCounter().getCurrency(E));
6182                                break;
6183                        }
6184                        case 14: // affected
6185                        {
6186                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6187                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6188                                if((E instanceof Physical)&&(((Physical)E).numEffects()>0))
6189                                        results.append(((Physical)E).effects().nextElement().name());
6190                                break;
6191                        }
6192                        case 69: // isbehave
6193                        {
6194                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6195                                final PhysicalAgent E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6196                                if(E!=null)
6197                                {
6198                                        for(final Enumeration<Behavior> e=E.behaviors();e.hasMoreElements();)
6199                                        {
6200                                                final Behavior B=e.nextElement();
6201                                                if(B!=null)
6202                                                        results.append(B.ID()+" ");
6203                                        }
6204                                }
6205                                break;
6206                        }
6207                        case 70: // ipaddress
6208                        {
6209                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6210                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6211                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB)&&(!((MOB)E).isMonster()))
6212                                        results.append(((MOB)E).session().getAddress());
6213                                break;
6214                        }
6215                        case 28: // questwinner
6216                        {
6217                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6218                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6219                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB)&&(!((MOB)E).isMonster()))
6220                                {
6221                                        for(int q=0;q<CMLib.quests().numQuests();q++)
6222                                        {
6223                                                final Quest Q=CMLib.quests().fetchQuest(q);
6224                                                if((Q!=null)&&(Q.wasWinner(E.Name())))
6225                                                        results.append(Q.name()+" ");
6226                                        }
6227                                }
6228                                break;
6229                        }
6230                        case 93: // questscripted
6231                        {
6232                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6233                                final PhysicalAgent E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6234                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB)&&(!((MOB)E).isMonster()))
6235                                {
6236                                        for(final Enumeration<ScriptingEngine> e=E.scripts();e.hasMoreElements();)
6237                                        {
6238                                                final ScriptingEngine SE=e.nextElement();
6239                                                if((SE!=null)&&(SE.defaultQuestName()!=null)&&(SE.defaultQuestName().length()>0))
6240                                                {
6241                                                        final Quest Q=CMLib.quests().fetchQuest(SE.defaultQuestName());
6242                                                        if(Q!=null)
6243                                                                results.append(Q.name()+" ");
6244                                                        else
6245                                                                results.append(SE.defaultQuestName()+" ");
6246                                                }
6247                                        }
6248                                        for(final Enumeration<Behavior> e=E.behaviors();e.hasMoreElements();)
6249                                        {
6250                                                final Behavior B=e.nextElement();
6251                                                if(B instanceof ScriptingEngine)
6252                                                {
6253                                                        final ScriptingEngine SE=(ScriptingEngine)B;
6254                                                        if((SE.defaultQuestName()!=null)&&(SE.defaultQuestName().length()>0))
6255                                                        {
6256                                                                final Quest Q=CMLib.quests().fetchQuest(SE.defaultQuestName());
6257                                                                if(Q!=null)
6258                                                                        results.append(Q.name()+" ");
6259                                                                else
6260                                                                        results.append(SE.defaultQuestName()+" ");
6261                                                        }
6262                                                }
6263                                        }
6264                                }
6265                                break;
6266                        }
6267                        case 30: // questobj
6268                        {
6269                                String questName=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6270                                questName=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,questName);
6271                                if(questName.equals("*") && (this.defaultQuestName()!=null) && (this.defaultQuestName().length()>0))
6272                                        questName = this.defaultQuestName();
6273                                final Quest Q=getQuest(questName);
6274                                if(Q==null)
6275                                {
6276                                        logError(scripted,"QUESTOBJ","Unknown","Quest: "+questName);
6277                                        break;
6278                                }
6279                                final StringBuffer list=new StringBuffer("");
6280                                int num=1;
6281                                Environmental E=Q.getQuestItem(num);
6282                                while(E!=null)
6283                                {
6284                                        if(E.Name().indexOf(' ')>=0)
6285                                                list.append("\""+E.Name()+"\" ");
6286                                        else
6287                                                list.append(E.Name()+" ");
6288                                        num++;
6289                                        E=Q.getQuestItem(num);
6290                                }
6291                                results.append(list.toString().trim());
6292                                break;
6293                        }
6294                        case 94: // questroom
6295                        {
6296                                String questName=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6297                                questName=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,questName);
6298                                final Quest Q=getQuest(questName);
6299                                if(Q==null)
6300                                {
6301                                        logError(scripted,"QUESTOBJ","Unknown","Quest: "+questName);
6302                                        break;
6303                                }
6304                                final StringBuffer list=new StringBuffer("");
6305                                int num=1;
6306                                Environmental E=Q.getQuestRoom(num);
6307                                while(E!=null)
6308                                {
6309                                        final String roomID=CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID((Room)E);
6310                                        if(roomID.indexOf(' ')>=0)
6311                                                list.append("\""+roomID+"\" ");
6312                                        else
6313                                                list.append(roomID+" ");
6314                                        num++;
6315                                        E=Q.getQuestRoom(num);
6316                                }
6317                                results.append(list.toString().trim());
6318                                break;
6319                        }
6320                        case 29: // questmob
6321                        {
6322                                String questName=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6323                                questName=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,questName);
6324                                if(questName.equals("*") && (this.defaultQuestName()!=null) && (this.defaultQuestName().length()>0))
6325                                        questName=this.defaultQuestName();
6326                                final Quest Q=getQuest(questName);
6327                                if(Q==null)
6328                                {
6329                                        logError(scripted,"QUESTOBJ","Unknown","Quest: "+questName);
6330                                        break;
6331                                }
6332                                final StringBuffer list=new StringBuffer("");
6333                                int num=1;
6334                                Environmental E=Q.getQuestMob(num);
6335                                while(E!=null)
6336                                {
6337                                        if(E.Name().indexOf(' ')>=0)
6338                                                list.append("\""+E.Name()+"\" ");
6339                                        else
6340                                                list.append(E.Name()+" ");
6341                                        num++;
6342                                        E=Q.getQuestMob(num);
6343                                }
6344                                results.append(list.toString().trim());
6345                                break;
6346                        }
6347                        case 31: // isquestmobalive
6348                        {
6349                                String questName=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6350                                questName=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,questName);
6351                                final Quest Q=getQuest(questName);
6352                                if(Q==null)
6353                                {
6354                                        logError(scripted,"QUESTOBJ","Unknown","Quest: "+questName);
6355                                        break;
6356                                }
6357                                final StringBuffer list=new StringBuffer("");
6358                                int num=1;
6359                                MOB E=Q.getQuestMob(num);
6360                                while(E!=null)
6361                                {
6362                                        if(CMLib.flags().isInTheGame(E,true))
6363                                        {
6364                                                if(E.Name().indexOf(' ')>=0)
6365                                                        list.append("\""+E.Name()+"\" ");
6366                                                else
6367                                                        list.append(E.Name()+" ");
6368                                        }
6369                                        num++;
6370                                        E=Q.getQuestMob(num);
6371                                }
6372                                results.append(list.toString().trim());
6373                                break;
6374                        }
6375                        case 49: // hastattoo
6376                        {
6377                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6378                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6379                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
6380                                {
6381                                        for(final Enumeration<Tattoo> t = ((MOB)E).tattoos();t.hasMoreElements();)
6382                                                results.append(t.nextElement().ID()).append(" ");
6383                                }
6384                                break;
6385                        }
6386                        case 99: // hasacctattoo
6387                        {
6388                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6389                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6390                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB)&&(((MOB)E).playerStats()!=null)&&(((MOB)E).playerStats().getAccount()!=null))
6391                                {
6392                                        for(final Enumeration<Tattoo> t = ((MOB)E).playerStats().getAccount().tattoos();t.hasMoreElements();)
6393                                                results.append(t.nextElement().ID()).append(" ");
6394                                }
6395                                break;
6396                        }
6397                        case 32: // nummobsinarea
6398                        {
6399                                String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
6400                                int num=0;
6401                                MaskingLibrary.CompiledZMask MASK=null;
6402                                if((arg1.toUpperCase().startsWith("MASK")&&(arg1.substring(4).trim().startsWith("="))))
6403                                {
6404                                        arg1=arg1.substring(4).trim();
6405                                        arg1=arg1.substring(1).trim();
6406                                        MASK=CMLib.masking().maskCompile(arg1);
6407                                }
6408                                for(final Enumeration<Room> e=lastKnownLocation.getArea().getProperMap();e.hasMoreElements();)
6409                                {
6410                                        final Room R=e.nextElement();
6411                                        if(arg1.equals("*"))
6412                                                num+=R.numInhabitants();
6413                                        else
6414                                        {
6415                                                for(int m=0;m<R.numInhabitants();m++)
6416                                                {
6417                                                        final MOB M=R.fetchInhabitant(m);
6418                                                        if(M==null)
6419                                                                continue;
6420                                                        if(MASK!=null)
6421                                                        {
6422                                                                if(CMLib.masking().maskCheck(MASK,M,true))
6423                                                                        num++;
6424                                                        }
6425                                                        else
6426                                                        if(CMLib.english().containsString(M.name(),arg1))
6427                                                                num++;
6428                                                }
6429                                        }
6430                                }
6431                                results.append(num);
6432                                break;
6433                        }
6434                        case 33: // nummobs
6435                        {
6436                                int num=0;
6437                                String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
6438                                MaskingLibrary.CompiledZMask MASK=null;
6439                                if((arg1.toUpperCase().startsWith("MASK")&&(arg1.substring(4).trim().startsWith("="))))
6440                                {
6441                                        arg1=arg1.substring(4).trim();
6442                                        arg1=arg1.substring(1).trim();
6443                                        MASK=CMLib.masking().maskCompile(arg1);
6444                                }
6445                                try
6446                                {
6447                                        for(final Enumeration e=CMLib.map().rooms();e.hasMoreElements();)
6448                                        {
6449                                                final Room R=(Room)e.nextElement();
6450                                                for(int m=0;m<R.numInhabitants();m++)
6451                                                {
6452                                                        final MOB M=R.fetchInhabitant(m);
6453                                                        if(M==null)
6454                                                                continue;
6455                                                        if(MASK!=null)
6456                                                        {
6457                                                                if(CMLib.masking().maskCheck(MASK,M,true))
6458                                                                        num++;
6459                                                        }
6460                                                        else
6461                                                        if(CMLib.english().containsString(M.name(),arg1))
6462                                                                num++;
6463                                                }
6464                                        }
6465                                }
6466                                catch(final NoSuchElementException nse)
6467                                {
6468                                }
6469                                results.append(num);
6470                                break;
6471                        }
6472                        case 34: // numracesinarea
6473                        {
6474                                int num=0;
6475                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
6476                                Room R=null;
6477                                MOB M=null;
6478                                for(final Enumeration e=lastKnownLocation.getArea().getProperMap();e.hasMoreElements();)
6479                                {
6480                                        R=(Room)e.nextElement();
6481                                        for(int m=0;m<R.numInhabitants();m++)
6482                                        {
6483                                                M=R.fetchInhabitant(m);
6484                                                if((M!=null)&&(M.charStats().raceName().equalsIgnoreCase(arg1)))
6485                                                        num++;
6486                                        }
6487                                }
6488                                results.append(num);
6489                                break;
6490                        }
6491                        case 35: // numraces
6492                        {
6493                                int num=0;
6494                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
6495                                Room R=null;
6496                                MOB M=null;
6497                                try
6498                                {
6499                                        for(final Enumeration e=CMLib.map().rooms();e.hasMoreElements();)
6500                                        {
6501                                                R=(Room)e.nextElement();
6502                                                for(int m=0;m<R.numInhabitants();m++)
6503                                                {
6504                                                        M=R.fetchInhabitant(m);
6505                                                        if((M!=null)&&(M.charStats().raceName().equalsIgnoreCase(arg1)))
6506                                                                num++;
6507                                                }
6508                                        }
6509                                }
6510                                catch (final NoSuchElementException nse)
6511                                {
6512                                }
6513                                results.append(num);
6514                                break;
6515                        }
6516                        case 16: // hitprcnt
6517                        {
6518                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6519                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6520                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
6521                                {
6522                                        final double hitPctD=CMath.div(((MOB)E).curState().getHitPoints(),((MOB)E).maxState().getHitPoints());
6523                                        final int val1=(int)Math.round(hitPctD*100.0);
6524                                        results.append(val1);
6525                                }
6526                                break;
6527                        }
6528                        case 50: // isseason
6529                        {
6530                                if(monster.location()!=null)
6531                                        results.append(monster.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getSeasonCode().toString());
6532                                break;
6533                        }
6534                        case 51: // isweather
6535                        {
6536                                if(monster.location()!=null)
6537                                        results.append(Climate.WEATHER_DESCS[monster.location().getArea().getClimateObj().weatherType(monster.location())]);
6538                                break;
6539                        }
6540                        case 57: // ismoon
6541                        {
6542                                if(monster.location()!=null)
6543                                        results.append(monster.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getMoonPhase(monster.location()).toString());
6544                                break;
6545                        }
6546                        case 38: // istime
6547                        {
6548                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6549                                        results.append(lastKnownLocation.getArea().getTimeObj().getTODCode().getDesc().toLowerCase());
6550                                break;
6551                        }
6552                        case 39: // isday
6553                        {
6554                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6555                                        results.append(""+lastKnownLocation.getArea().getTimeObj().getDayOfMonth());
6556                                break;
6557                        }
6558                        case 43: // roommob
6559                        {
6560                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
6561                                Environmental which=null;
6562                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6563                                {
6564                                        if(CMath.isInteger(arg1.trim()))
6565                                                which=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(CMath.s_int(arg1.trim())-1);
6566                                        else
6567                                                which=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(arg1.trim());
6568                                        if(which!=null)
6569                                        {
6570                                                final Vector<MOB> list=new Vector<MOB>();
6571                                                for(int i=0;i<lastKnownLocation.numInhabitants();i++)
6572                                                {
6573                                                        final MOB M=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(i);
6574                                                        if(M!=null)
6575                                                                list.addElement(M);
6576                                                }
6577                                                results.append(CMLib.english().getContextName(list,which));
6578                                        }
6579                                }
6580                                break;
6581                        }
6582                        case 44: // roomitem
6583                        {
6584                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
6585                                Environmental which=null;
6586                                int ct=1;
6587                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6588                                {
6589                                        final Vector<Item> list=new Vector<Item>();
6590                                        for(int i=0;i<lastKnownLocation.numItems();i++)
6591                                        {
6592                                                final Item I=lastKnownLocation.getItem(i);
6593                                                if((I!=null)&&(I.container()==null))
6594                                                {
6595                                                        list.addElement(I);
6596                                                        if(ct==CMath.s_int(arg1.trim()))
6597                                                        {
6598                                                                which = I;
6599                                                                break;
6600                                                        }
6601                                                        ct++;
6602                                                }
6603                                        }
6604                                        if(which!=null)
6605                                                results.append(CMLib.english().getContextName(list,which));
6606                                }
6607                                break;
6608                        }
6609                        case 45: // nummobsroom
6610                        {
6611                                int num=0;
6612                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6613                                {
6614                                        num=lastKnownLocation.numInhabitants();
6615                                        String name=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
6616                                        if((name.length()>0)&&(!name.equalsIgnoreCase("*")))
6617                                        {
6618                                                num=0;
6619                                                MaskingLibrary.CompiledZMask MASK=null;
6620                                                if((name.toUpperCase().startsWith("MASK")&&(name.substring(4).trim().startsWith("="))))
6621                                                {
6622                                                        name=name.substring(4).trim();
6623                                                        name=name.substring(1).trim();
6624                                                        MASK=CMLib.masking().maskCompile(name);
6625                                                }
6626                                                for(int i=0;i<lastKnownLocation.numInhabitants();i++)
6627                                                {
6628                                                        final MOB M=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(i);
6629                                                        if(M==null)
6630                                                                continue;
6631                                                        if(MASK!=null)
6632                                                        {
6633                                                                if(CMLib.masking().maskCheck(MASK,M,true))
6634                                                                        num++;
6635                                                        }
6636                                                        else
6637                                                        if(CMLib.english().containsString(M.Name(),name)
6638                                                        ||CMLib.english().containsString(M.displayText(),name))
6639                                                                num++;
6640                                                }
6641                                        }
6642                                }
6643                                results.append(""+num);
6644                                break;
6645                        }
6646                        case 63: // numpcsroom
6647                        {
6648                                final Room R=lastKnownLocation;
6649                                if(R!=null)
6650                                {
6651                                        int num=0;
6652                                        for(final Enumeration<MOB> m=R.inhabitants();m.hasMoreElements();)
6653                                        {
6654                                                final MOB M=m.nextElement();
6655                                                if((M!=null)&&(!M.isMonster()))
6656                                                        num++;
6657                                        }
6658                                        results.append(""+num);
6659                                }
6660                                break;
6661                        }
6662                        case 79: // numpcsarea
6663                        {
6664                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6665                                {
6666                                        int num=0;
6667                                        for(final Session S : CMLib.sessions().localOnlineIterable())
6668                                        {
6669                                                if((S.mob().location()!=null)&&(S.mob().location().getArea()==lastKnownLocation.getArea()))
6670                                                        num++;
6671                                        }
6672                                        results.append(""+num);
6673                                }
6674                                break;
6675                        }
6676                        case 77: // explored
6677                        {
6678                                final String whom=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0));
6679                                final String where=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,1));
6680                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(whom,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6681                                if(E instanceof MOB)
6682                                {
6683                                        Area A=null;
6684                                        if(!where.equalsIgnoreCase("world"))
6685                                        {
6686                                                A=CMLib.map().getArea(where);
6687                                                if(A==null)
6688                                                {
6689                                                        final Environmental E2=getArgumentItem(where,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6690                                                        if(E2!=null)
6691                                                                A=CMLib.map().areaLocation(E2);
6692                                                }
6693                                        }
6694                                        if((lastKnownLocation!=null)
6695                                        &&((A!=null)||(where.equalsIgnoreCase("world"))))
6696                                        {
6697                                                int pct=0;
6698                                                final MOB M=(MOB)E;
6699                                                if(M.playerStats()!=null)
6700                                                        pct=M.playerStats().percentVisited(M,A);
6701                                                results.append(""+pct);
6702                                        }
6703                                }
6704                                break;
6705                        }
6706                        case 72: // faction
6707                        {
6708                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
6709                                final String arg2=CMParms.getPastBit(funcParms,0);
6710                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6711                                final Faction F=CMLib.factions().getFaction(arg2);
6712                                if(F==null)
6713                                        logError(scripted,"FACTION","Unknown Faction",arg1);
6714                                else
6715                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB)&&(((MOB)E).hasFaction(F.factionID())))
6716                                {
6717                                        final int value=((MOB)E).fetchFaction(F.factionID());
6718                                        final Faction.FRange FR=CMLib.factions().getRange(F.factionID(),value);
6719                                        if(FR!=null)
6720                                                results.append(FR.name());
6721                                }
6722                                break;
