6723                        }

6731                                        if((I!=null)&&(I.container()==null))
6732                                                ct++;
6733                                }

6735                                break;
6736                        }
6737                        case 47: //mobitem
6738                        {
6739                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0));
6740                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0));
6741                                MOB M=null;

6743                                {
6744                                        if(CMath.isInteger(arg1.trim()))
6745                                                M=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(CMath.s_int(arg1.trim())-1);
6746                                        else
6747                                                M=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(arg1.trim());
6748                                }

6750                                int ct=1;

6757                                                {
6758                                                        if(ct==CMath.s_int(arg2.trim()))
6759                                                        {
6760                                                                which = I;
6761                                                                break;
6762                                                        }
6763                                                        ct++;
6764                                                }
6765                                        }
6766                                }
6767                                if(which!=null)
6768                                        results.append(which.name());
6769                                break;
6770                        }
6771                        case 100: // shopitem
6772                        {
6773                                final String arg1raw=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
6774                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,arg1raw);
6775                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0));
6776                                PhysicalAgent where=null;
6777                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6778                                {
6779                                        if(CMath.isInteger(arg1.trim()))
6780                                                where=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(CMath.s_int(arg1.trim())-1);
6781                                        else
6782                                                where=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(arg1.trim());
6783                                        if(where == null)
6784                                                where=this.getArgumentItem(arg1raw, source, monster, scripted, target, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp);
6785                                        if(where == null)
6786                                                where=this.getArgumentMOB(arg1raw, source, monster, target, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp);
6787                                }
6788                                Environmental which=null;
6789                                int ct=1;
6790                                if(where!=null)
6791                                {
6792                                        ShopKeeper shopHere = CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(where);
6793                                        if((shopHere == null)&&(scripted instanceof Item))
6794                                                shopHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((Item)where).owner());
6795                                        if((shopHere == null)&&(scripted instanceof MOB))
6796                                                shopHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((MOB)where).location());
6797                                        if(shopHere == null)
6798                                                shopHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(lastKnownLocation);
6799                                        if(shopHere!=null)
6800                                        {
6801                                                final CoffeeShop shop = shopHere.getShop();
6802                                                if(shop != null)
6803                                                {
6804                                                        for(final Iterator<Environmental> i=shop.getStoreInventory();i.hasNext();ct++)
6805                                                        {
6806                                                                final Environmental E=i.next();
6807                                                                if(ct==CMath.s_int(arg2.trim()))
6808                                                                {
6809                                                                        which = E;
6810                                                                        setShopPrice(shopHere,E,tmp);
6811                                                                        break;
6812                                                                }
6813                                                        }
6814                                                }
6815                                        }
6816                                }
6817                                if(which!=null)
6818                                        results.append(which.name());
6819                                break;
6820                        }
6821                        case 101: // numitemsshop
6822                        {
6823                                final String arg1raw = CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6824                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,arg1raw);
6825                                PhysicalAgent which=null;
6826                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6827                                {
6828                                        if(CMath.isInteger(arg1.trim()))
6829                                                which=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(CMath.s_int(arg1.trim())-1);
6830                                        else
6831                                                which=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(arg1);
6832                                        if(which == null)
6833                                                which=this.getArgumentItem(arg1raw, source, monster, scripted, target, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp);
6834                                        if(which == null)
6835                                                which=this.getArgumentMOB(arg1raw, source, monster, target, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp);
6836                                }
6837                                int ct=0;
6838                                if(which!=null)
6839                                {
6840                                        ShopKeeper shopHere = CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(which);
6841                                        if((shopHere == null)&&(scripted instanceof Item))
6842                                                shopHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((Item)which).owner());
6843                                        if((shopHere == null)&&(scripted instanceof MOB))
6844                                                shopHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((MOB)which).location());
6845                                        if(shopHere == null)
6846                                                shopHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(lastKnownLocation);
6847                                        if(shopHere!=null)
6848                                        {
6849                                                final CoffeeShop shop = shopHere.getShop();
6850                                                if(shop != null)
6851                                                {
6852                                                        for(final Iterator<Environmental> i=shop.getStoreInventory();i.hasNext();i.next())
6853                                                        {
6854                                                                ct++;
6855                                                        }
6856                                                }
6857                                        }
6858                                }
6859                                results.append(""+ct);
6860                                break;
6861                        }
6862                        case 102: // shophas
6863                        {
6864                                final String arg1raw=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6865                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,arg1raw);
6866                                PhysicalAgent where=null;
6867                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6868                                {
6869                                        if(CMath.isInteger(arg1.trim()))
6870                                                where=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(CMath.s_int(arg1.trim())-1);
6871                                        else
6872                                                where=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(arg1.trim());
6873                                        if(where == null)
6874                                                where=this.getArgumentItem(arg1raw, source, monster, scripted, target, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp);
6875                                        if(where == null)
6876                                                where=this.getArgumentMOB(arg1raw, source, monster, target, primaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp);
6877                                }
6878                                if(where!=null)
6879                                {
6880                                        ShopKeeper shopHere = CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(where);
6881                                        if((shopHere == null)&&(scripted instanceof Item))
6882                                                shopHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((Item)where).owner());
6883                                        if((shopHere == null)&&(scripted instanceof MOB))
6884                                                shopHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((MOB)where).location());
6885                                        if(shopHere == null)
6886                                                shopHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(lastKnownLocation);
6887                                        if(shopHere!=null)
6888                                        {
6889                                                final CoffeeShop shop = shopHere.getShop();
6890                                                if(shop != null)
6891                                                {
6892                                                        int ct=0;
6893                                                        for(final Iterator<Environmental> i=shop.getStoreInventory();i.hasNext();i.next())
6894                                                                ct++;
6895                                                        final int which=CMLib.dice().roll(1, ct, -1);
6896                                                        ct=0;
6897                                                        for(final Iterator<Environmental> i=shop.getStoreInventory();i.hasNext();ct++)
6898                                                        {
6899                                                                final Environmental E=i.next();
6900                                                                if(which == ct)
6901                                                                {
6902                                                                        results.append(E.Name());
6903                                                                        setShopPrice(shopHere,E,tmp);
6904                                                                        break;
6905                                                                }
6906                                                        }
6907                                                }
6908                                        }
6909                                }
6910                                break;
6911                        }
6912                        case 48: // numitemsmob
6913                        {
6914                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
6915                                MOB which=null;
6916                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6917                                {
6918                                        if(CMath.isInteger(arg1.trim()))
6919                                                which=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(CMath.s_int(arg1.trim())-1);
6920                                        else
6921                                                which=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(arg1);
6922                                }
6923                                int ct=0;
6924                                if(which!=null)
6925                                {
6926                                        for(int i=0;i<which.numItems();i++)
6927                                        {
6928                                                final Item I=which.getItem(i);
6929                                                if((I!=null)&&(I.container()==null))
6930                                                        ct++;
6931                                        }
6932                                }
6933                                results.append(""+ct);
6934                                break;
6935                        }
6936                        case 36: // ishere
6937                        {
6938                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6939                                        results.append(lastKnownLocation.getArea().name());
6940                                break;
6941                        }
6942                        case 17: // inroom
6943                        {
6944                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6945                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6946                                if((E==null)||arg1.length()==0)
6947                                        results.append(CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(lastKnownLocation));
6948                                else
6949                                        results.append(CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(CMLib.map().roomLocation(E)));
6950                                break;
6951                        }
6952                        case 90: // inarea
6953                        {
6954                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6955                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6956                                if((E==null)||arg1.length()==0)
6957                                        results.append(lastKnownLocation==null?"Nowhere":lastKnownLocation.getArea().Name());
6958                                else
6959                                {
6960                                        final Room R=CMLib.map().roomLocation(E);
6961                                        results.append(R==null?"Nowhere":R.getArea().Name());
6962                                }
6963                                break;
6964                        }
6965                        case 89: // isrecall
6966                        {
6967                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6968                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6969                                if(E!=null)
6970                                        results.append(CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(CMLib.map().getStartRoom(E)));
6971                                break;
6972                        }
6973                        case 37: // inlocale
6974                        {
6975                                final String parms=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
6976                                if(parms.trim().length()==0)
6977                                {
6978                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
6979                                                results.append(lastKnownLocation.name());
6980                                }
6981                                else
6982                                {
6983                                        final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(parms,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6984                                        if(E!=null)
6985                                        {
6986                                                final Room R=CMLib.map().roomLocation(E);
6987                                                if(R!=null)
6988                                                        results.append(R.name());
6989                                        }
6990                                }
6991                                break;
6992                        }
6993                        case 18: // sex
6994                        {
6995                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
6996                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
6997                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
6998                                        results.append(((MOB)E).charStats().genderName());
6999                                break;
7000                        }
7001                        case 91: // datetime
7002                        {
7003                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
7004                                final int index=CMParms.indexOf(ScriptingEngine.DATETIME_ARGS,arg1.toUpperCase().trim());
7005                                if(index<0)
7006                                        logError(scripted,"DATETIME","Syntax","Unknown arg: "+arg1+" for "+scripted.name());
7007                                else
7008                                if(CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted)!=null)
7009                                {
7010                                        switch(index)
7011                                        {
7012                                        case 2:
7013                                                results.append(CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted).getTimeObj().getDayOfMonth());
7014                                                break;
7015                                        case 3:
7016                                                results.append(CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted).getTimeObj().getDayOfMonth());
7017                                                break;
7018                                        case 4:
7019                                                results.append(CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted).getTimeObj().getMonth());
7020                                                break;
7021                                        case 5:
7022                                                results.append(CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted).getTimeObj().getYear());
7023                                                break;
7024                                        default:
7025                                                results.append(CMLib.map().areaLocation(scripted).getTimeObj().getHourOfDay()); break;
7026                                        }
7027                                }
7028                                break;
7029                        }
7030                        case 13: // stat
7031                        {
7032                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
7033                                final String arg2=CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0);
7034                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7035                                if(E!=null)
7036                                {
7037                                        final String val=getStatValue(E,arg2);
7038                                        if(val==null)
7039                                        {
7040                                                logError(scripted,"STAT","Syntax","Unknown stat: "+arg2+" for "+E.name());
7041                                                break;
7042                                        }
7043                                        results.append(val);
7044                                        break;
7045                                }
7046                                break;
7047                        }
7048                        case 52: // gstat
7049                        {
7050                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
7051                                final String arg2=CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0);
7052                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7053                                if(E!=null)
7054                                {
7055                                        final String val=getGStatValue(E,arg2);
7056                                        if(val==null)
7057                                        {
7058                                                logError(scripted,"GSTAT","Syntax","Unknown stat: "+arg2+" for "+E.name());
7059                                                break;
7060                                        }
7061                                        results.append(val);
7062                                        break;
7063                                }
7064                                break;
7065                        }
7066                        case 19: // position
7067                        {
7068                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7069                                final Physical P=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7070                                if(P!=null)
7071                                {
7072                                        final String sex;
7073                                        if(CMLib.flags().isSleeping(P))
7074                                                sex="SLEEPING";
7075                                        else
7076                                        if(CMLib.flags().isSitting(P))
7077                                                sex="SITTING";
7078                                        else
7079                                                sex="STANDING";
7080                                        results.append(sex);
7081                                        break;
7082                                }
7083                                break;
7084                        }
7085                        case 20: // level
7086                        {
7087                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7088                                final Physical P=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7089                                if(P!=null)
7090                                        results.append(P.phyStats().level());
7091                                break;
7092                        }
7093                        case 80: // questpoints
7094                        {
7095                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7096                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7097                                if(E instanceof MOB)
7098                                        results.append(((MOB)E).getQuestPoint());
7099                                break;
7100                        }
7101                        case 83: // qvar
7102                        {
7103                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
7104                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0));
7105                                if((arg1.length()!=0)&&(arg2.length()!=0))
7106                                {
7107                                        final Quest Q=getQuest(arg1);
7108                                        if(Q!=null)
7109                                                results.append(Q.getStat(arg2));
7110                                }
7111                                break;
7112                        }
7113                        case 84: // math
7114                        {
7115                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms));
7116                                results.append(""+Math.round(CMath.s_parseMathExpression(arg1)));
7117                                break;
7118                        }
7119                        case 85: // islike
7120                        {
7121                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7122                                results.append(CMLib.masking().maskDesc(arg1));
7123                                break;
7124                        }
7125                        case 86: // strcontains
7126                        {
7127                                results.append("[unimplemented function]");
7128                                break;
7129                        }
7130                        case 81: // trains
7131                        {
7132                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7133                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7134                                if(E instanceof MOB)
7135                                        results.append(((MOB)E).getTrains());
7136                                break;
7137                        }
7138                        case 92: // isodd
7139                        {
7140                                final String val=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp ,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms)).trim();
7141                                boolean isodd = false;
7142                                if( CMath.isLong( val ) )
7143                                {
7144                                        isodd = (CMath.s_long(val) %2 == 1);
7145                                }
7146                                if( isodd )
7147                                {
7148                                        results.append( CMath.s_long( val.trim() ) );
7149                                }
7150                                break;
7151                        }
7152                        case 82: // pracs
7153                        {
7154                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7155                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7156                                if(E instanceof MOB)
7157                                        results.append(((MOB)E).getPractices());
7158                                break;
7159                        }
7160                        case 68: // clandata
7161                        {
7162                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
7163                                final String arg2=CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0);
7164                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7165                                String clanID=null;
7166                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
7167                                {
7168                                        Clan C=CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan((MOB)E);
7169                                        if(C==null)
7170                                                C=((MOB)E).clans().iterator().hasNext()?((MOB)E).clans().iterator().next().first:null;
7171                                        if(C!=null)
7172                                                clanID=C.clanID();
7173                                }
7174                                else
7175                                        clanID=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,arg1);
7176                                final Clan C=CMLib.clans().findClan(clanID);
7177                                if(C!=null)
7178                                {
7179                                        if(!C.isStat(arg2))
7180                                                logError(scripted,"CLANDATA","RunTime",arg2+" is not a valid clan variable.");
7181                                        else
7182                                                results.append(C.getStat(arg2));
7183                                }
7184                                break;
7185                        }
7186                        case 98: // clanqualifies
7187                        {
7188                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7189                                Clan C=CMLib.clans().getClan(arg1);
7190                                if(C==null)
7191                                        C=CMLib.clans().findClan(arg1);
7192                                if(C!=null)
7193                                {
7194                                        if(C.getAcceptanceSettings().length()>0)
7195                                                results.append(CMLib.masking().maskDesc(C.getAcceptanceSettings()));
7196                                        if(C.getBasicRequirementMask().length()>0)
7197                                                results.append(CMLib.masking().maskDesc(C.getBasicRequirementMask()));
7198                                        if(C.isOnlyFamilyApplicants())
7199                                                results.append("Must belong to the family.");
7200                                        final int total=CMProps.getMaxClansThisCategory(C.getCategory());
7201                                        if(C.getCategory().length()>0)
7202                                                results.append("May belong to only "+total+" "+C.getCategory()+" clan. ");
7203                                        else
7204                                                results.append("May belong to only "+total+" standard clan. ");
7205                                }
7206                                break;
7207                        }
7208                        case 67: // hastitle
7209                        {
7210                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
7211                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0));
7212                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7213                                if((arg2.length()>0)&&(E instanceof MOB)&&(((MOB)E).playerStats()!=null))
7214                                {
7215                                        final MOB M=(MOB)E;
7216                                        results.append(M.playerStats().getActiveTitle());
7217                                }
7218                                break;
7219                        }
7220                        case 66: // clanrank
7221                        {
7222                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7223                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7224                                Clan C=null;
7225                                if(E instanceof MOB)
7226                                {
7227                                        C=CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan((MOB)E);
7228                                        if(C==null)
7229                                                C=((MOB)E).clans().iterator().hasNext()?((MOB)E).clans().iterator().next().first:null;
7230                                }
7231                                else
7232                                        C=CMLib.clans().findClan(varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,arg1));
7233                                if(C!=null)
7234                                {
7235                                        final Pair<Clan,Integer> p=((MOB)E).getClanRole(C.clanID());
7236                                        if(p!=null)
7237                                                results.append(p.second.toString());
7238                                }
7239                                break;
7240                        }
7241                        case 21: // class
7242                        {
7243                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7244                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7245                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
7246                                        results.append(((MOB)E).charStats().displayClassName());
7247                                break;
7248                        }

7252                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7253                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
7254                                {
7255                                        final String sex=((MOB)E).getWorshipCharID();
7256                                        results.append(sex);
7257                                }
7258                                break;
7259                        }
7260                        case 65: // clan

7262                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7263                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7264                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
7265                                {
7266                                        Clan C=CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan((MOB)E);
7267                                        if(C==null)
7268                                                C=((MOB)E).clans().iterator().hasNext()?((MOB)E).clans().iterator().next().first:null;
7269                                        if(C!=null)
7270                                                results.append(C.clanID());
7271                                }
7272                                break;
7273                        }
7274                        case 88: // mood
7275                        {
7276                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7277                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7278                                if(E instanceof MOB)
7279                                {
7280                                        final Ability moodA=((MOB)E).fetchEffect("Mood");
7281                                        if(moodA!=null)
7282                                                results.append(CMStrings.capitalizeAndLower(moodA.text()));
7283                                }
7284                                break;
7285                        }
7286                        case 22: // baseclass
7287                        {
7288                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7289                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7290                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
7291                                        results.append(((MOB)E).charStats().getCurrentClass().baseClass());
7292                                break;
7293                        }

7297                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7298                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))

7300                                break;

7302                        case 24: //racecat
7303                        {
7304                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7305                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7306                                if((E!=null)&&(E instanceof MOB))
7307                                        results.append(((MOB)E).charStats().getMyRace().racialCategory());
7308                                break;
7309                        }
7310                        case 25: // goldamt
7311                        {
7312                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7313                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7314                                if(E==null)
7315                                        results.append(false);
7316                                else
7317                                {
7318                                        int val1=0;
7319                                        if(E instanceof MOB)
7320                                                val1=(int)Math.round(CMLib.beanCounter().getTotalAbsoluteValue((MOB)E,CMLib.beanCounter().getCurrency(scripted)));
7321                                        else
7322                                        if(E instanceof Coins)
7323                                                val1=(int)Math.round(((Coins)E).getTotalValue());
7324                                        else
7325                                        if(E instanceof Item)
7326                                                val1=((Item)E).value();
7327                                        else
7328                                        {
7329                                                logError(scripted,"GOLDAMT","Syntax",funcParms);
7330                                                return results.toString();
7331                                        }
7332                                        results.append(val1);
7333                                }
7334                                break;
7335                        }
7336                        case 78: // exp
7337                        {
7338                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7339                                final Environmental E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7340                                if(E==null)
7341                                        results.append(false);
7342                                else
7343                                {
7344                                        int val1=0;
7345                                        if(E instanceof MOB)
7346                                                val1=((MOB)E).getExperience();
7347                                        results.append(val1);
7348                                }
7349                                break;
7350                        }
7351                        case 76: // value
7352                        {
7353                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
7354                                final String arg2=CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0);
7355                                if(!CMLib.beanCounter().getAllCurrencies().contains(arg2.toUpperCase()))
7356                                {
7357                                        logError(scripted,"VALUE","Syntax",arg2+" is not a valid designated currency.");
7358                                        return results.toString();
7359                                }
7360                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7361                                if(E==null)
7362                                        results.append(false);
7363                                else
7364                                {
7365                                        int val1=0;
7366                                        if(E instanceof MOB)
7367                                                val1=(int)Math.round(CMLib.beanCounter().getTotalAbsoluteValue((MOB)E,arg2));
7368                                        else
7369                                        if(E instanceof Coins)
7370                                        {
7371                                                if(((Coins)E).getCurrency().equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
7372                                                        val1=(int)Math.round(((Coins)E).getTotalValue());
7373                                        }
7374                                        else
7375                                        if(E instanceof Item)
7376                                                val1=((Item)E).value();
7377                                        else
7378                                        {
7379                                                logError(scripted,"GOLDAMT","Syntax",funcParms);
7380                                                return results.toString();
7381                                        }
7382                                        results.append(val1);
7383                                }
7384                                break;
7385                        }
7386                        case 26: // objtype
7387                        {
7388                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7389                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7390                                if(E!=null)
7391                                {
7392                                        final String sex=CMClass.classID(E).toLowerCase();
7393                                        results.append(sex);
7394                                }
7395                                break;
7396                        }
7397                        case 53: // incontainer
7398                        {
7399                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7400                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7401                                if(E!=null)
7402                                {
7403                                        if(E instanceof MOB)
7404                                        {
7405                                                if(((MOB)E).riding()!=null)
7406                                                        results.append(((MOB)E).riding().Name());
7407                                        }
7408                                        else
7409                                        if(E instanceof Item)
7410                                        {
7411                                                if(((Item)E).riding()!=null)
7412                                                        results.append(((Item)E).riding().Name());
7413                                                else
7414                                                if(((Item)E).container()!=null)
7415                                                        results.append(((Item)E).container().Name());
7416                                                else
7417                                                if(E instanceof Container)
7418                                                {
7419                                                        final List<Item> V=((Container)E).getDeepContents();
7420                                                        for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
7421                                                                results.append("\""+V.get(v).Name()+"\" ");
7422                                                }
7423                                        }
7424                                }
7425                                break;
7426                        }
7427                        case 27: // var
7428                        {
7429                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
7430                                final String arg2=CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0).toUpperCase();
7431                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7432                                final String val=getVar(E,arg1,arg2,source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7433                                results.append(val);
7434                                break;
7435                        }
7436                        case 41: // eval
7437                                results.append("[unimplemented function]");
7438                                break;
7439                        case 40: // number
7440                        {
7441                                final String val=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms)).trim();
7442                                boolean isnumber=(val.length()>0);
7443                                for(int i=0;i<val.length();i++)
7444                                {
7445                                        if(!Character.isDigit(val.charAt(i)))
7446                                        {
7447                                                isnumber = false;
7448                                                break;
7449                                        }
7450                                }
7451                                if(isnumber)
7452                                        results.append(CMath.s_long(val.trim()));
7453                                break;
7454                        }
7455                        case 42: // randnum
7456                        {
7457                                final String arg1String=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms)).toUpperCase();
7458                                int arg1=0;
7459                                if(CMath.isMathExpression(arg1String))
7460                                        arg1=CMath.s_parseIntExpression(arg1String.trim());
7461                                else
7462                                        arg1=CMParms.parse(arg1String.trim()).size();
7463                                results.append(CMLib.dice().roll(1,arg1,0));
7464                                break;
7465                        }
7466                        case 71: // rand0num
7467                        {
7468                                final String arg1String=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms)).toUpperCase();
7469                                int arg1=0;
7470                                if(CMath.isMathExpression(arg1String))
7471                                        arg1=CMath.s_parseIntExpression(arg1String.trim());
7472                                else
7473                                        arg1=CMParms.parse(arg1String.trim()).size();
7474                                results.append(CMLib.dice().roll(1,arg1,-1));
7475                                break;
7476                        }
7477                        case 96: // iscontents
7478                        {
7479                                final String arg1=CMParms.cleanBit(funcParms);
7480                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7481                                if(E instanceof Rideable)
7482                                {
7483                                        for(final Enumeration<Rider> r=((Rideable)E).riders();r.hasMoreElements();)
7484                                                results.append(CMParms.quoteIfNecessary(r.nextElement().name())).append(" ");
7485                                }
7486                                if(E instanceof Container)
7487                                {
7488                                        for (final Item item : ((Container)E).getDeepContents())
7489                                                results.append(CMParms.quoteIfNecessary(item.name())).append(" ");
7490                                }
7491                                break;
7492                        }
7493                        case 97: // wornon
7494                        {
7495                                final String arg1=CMParms.getCleanBit(funcParms,0);
7496                                final String arg2=CMParms.getPastBitClean(funcParms,0).toUpperCase();
7497                                final PhysicalAgent E=getArgumentMOB(arg1,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7498                                int wornLoc=-1;
7499                                if(arg2.length()>0)
7500                                        wornLoc = CMParms.indexOf(Wearable.CODES.NAMESUP(), arg2.toUpperCase().trim());
7501                                if(wornLoc<0)
7502                                        logError(scripted,"EVAL","BAD WORNON LOCATION",arg2);
7503                                else
7504                                if(E instanceof MOB)
7505                                {
7506                                        final List<Item> items=((MOB)E).fetchWornItems(Wearable.CODES.GET(wornLoc),(short)-2048,(short)0);
7507                                        for(final Item item : items)
7508                                                results.append(CMParms.quoteIfNecessary(item.name())).append(" ");
7509                                }
7510                                break;
7511                        }
7512                        default:
7513                                logError(scripted,"Unknown Val",preFab,evaluable);
7514                                return results.toString();
7515                        }
7516                }
7517                return results.toString();
7518        }
7519
7520        protected MOB getRandPC(final MOB monster, final Object[] tmp, final Room room)
7521        {
7522                if((tmp[SPECIAL_RANDPC]==null)||(tmp[SPECIAL_RANDPC]==monster))
7523                {
7524                        MOB M=null;
7525                        if(room!=null)
7526                        {
7527                                final Vector<MOB> choices = new Vector<MOB>();
7528                                for(int p=0;p<room.numInhabitants();p++)
7529                                {
7530                                        M=room.fetchInhabitant(p);
7531                                        if((!M.isMonster())&&(M!=monster))
7532                                        {
7533                                                final HashSet<MOB> seen=new HashSet<MOB>();
7534                                                while((M.amFollowing()!=null)&&(!M.amFollowing().isMonster())&&(!seen.contains(M)))
7535                                                {
7536                                                        seen.add(M);
7537                                                        M=M.amFollowing();
7538                                                }
7539                                                choices.addElement(M);
7540                                        }
7541                                }
7542                                if(choices.size() > 0)
7543                                        tmp[SPECIAL_RANDPC] = choices.elementAt(CMLib.dice().roll(1,choices.size(),-1));
7544                        }
7545                }
7546                return (MOB)tmp[SPECIAL_RANDPC];
7547        }
7548
7549        protected MOB getRandAnyone(final MOB monster, final Object[] tmp, final Room room)
7550        {
7551                if((tmp[SPECIAL_RANDANYONE]==null)||(tmp[SPECIAL_RANDANYONE]==monster))
7552                {
7553                        MOB M=null;
7554                        if(room!=null)
7555                        {
7556                                final Vector<MOB> choices = new Vector<MOB>();
7557                                for(int p=0;p<room.numInhabitants();p++)
7558                                {
7559                                        M=room.fetchInhabitant(p);
7560                                        if(M!=monster)
7561                                        {
7562                                                final HashSet<MOB> seen=new HashSet<MOB>();
7563                                                while((M.amFollowing()!=null)&&(!M.amFollowing().isMonster())&&(!seen.contains(M)))
7564                                                {
7565                                                        seen.add(M);
7566                                                        M=M.amFollowing();
7567                                                }
7568                                                choices.addElement(M);
7569                                        }
7570                                }
7571                                if(choices.size() > 0)
7572                                        tmp[SPECIAL_RANDANYONE] = choices.elementAt(CMLib.dice().roll(1,choices.size(),-1));
7573                        }
7574                }
7575                return (MOB)tmp[SPECIAL_RANDANYONE];
7576        }
7577
7578        @Override
7579        public String execute(final PhysicalAgent scripted,
7580                                                  final MOB source,
7581                                                  final Environmental target,
7582                                                  final MOB monster,
7583                                                  final Item primaryItem,
7584                                                  final Item secondaryItem,
7585                                                  final DVector script,
7586                                                  final String msg,
7587                                                  final Object[] tmp)
7588        {
7589                return execute(scripted,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,script,msg,tmp,1);
7590        }
7591
7592        public String execute(PhysicalAgent scripted,
7593                                                  MOB source,
7594                                                  Environmental target,
7595                                                  MOB monster,
7596                                                  Item primaryItem,
7597                                                  Item secondaryItem,
7598                                                  final DVector script,
7599                                                  String msg,
7600                                                  final Object[] tmp,
7601                                                  final int startLine)
7602        {
7603                tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_START;
7604                String s=null;
7605                String[] tt=null;
7606                String cmd=null;
7607                for(int si=startLine;si<script.size();si++)
7608                {
7609                        s=((String)script.elementAt(si,1)).trim();
7610                        tt=(String[])script.elementAt(si,2);
7611                        if(tt!=null)
7612                                cmd=tt[0];
7613                        else
7614                                cmd=CMParms.getCleanBit(s,0).toUpperCase();
7615                        if(cmd.length()==0)
7616                                continue;
7617
7618                        Integer methCode=methH.get(cmd);
7619                        if((methCode==null)&&(cmd.startsWith("MP")))
7620                        {
7621                                for(int i=0;i<methods.length;i++)
7622                                {
7623                                        if(methods[i].startsWith(cmd))
7624                                                methCode=Integer.valueOf(i);
7625                                }
7626                        }
7627                        if(methCode==null)
7628                                methCode=Integer.valueOf(0);
7629                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_MISC3+methCode.intValue();
7630                        switch(methCode.intValue())
7631                        {
7632                        case 57: // <SCRIPT>
7633                        {
7634                                if(tt==null)
7635                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7636                                final StringBuffer jscript=new StringBuffer("");
7637                                while((++si)<script.size())
7638                                {
7639                                        s=((String)script.elementAt(si,1)).trim();
7640                                        tt=(String[])script.elementAt(si,2);
7641                                        if(tt!=null)
7642                                                cmd=tt[0];
7643                                        else
7644                                                cmd=CMParms.getCleanBit(s,0).toUpperCase();
7645                                        if(cmd.equals("</SCRIPT>"))
7646                                        {
7647                                                if(tt==null)
7648                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7649                                                break;
7650                                        }
7651                                        jscript.append(s+"\n");
7652                                }
7653                                if(CMSecurity.isApprovedJScript(jscript))
7654                                {
7655                                        final Context cx = Context.enter();
7656                                        try
7657                                        {
7658                                                final JScriptEvent scope = new JScriptEvent(this,scripted,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
7659                                                cx.initStandardObjects(scope);
7660                                                final String[] names = { "host", "source", "target", "monster", "item", "item2", "message" ,"getVar", "setVar", "toJavaString"};
7661                                                scope.defineFunctionProperties(names, JScriptEvent.class,
7662                                                                                                           ScriptableObject.DONTENUM);
7663                                                cx.evaluateString(scope, jscript.toString(),"<cmd>", 1, null);
7664                                        }
7665                                        catch(final Exception e)
7666                                        {
7667                                                Log.errOut("Scripting",scripted.name()+"/"+CMLib.map().getDescriptiveExtendedRoomID(lastKnownLocation)+"/JSCRIPT Error: "+e.getMessage());
7668                                        }
7669                                        Context.exit();
7670                                }
7671                                else
7672                                if(CMProps.getIntVar(CMProps.Int.JSCRIPTS)==CMSecurity.JSCRIPT_REQ_APPROVAL)
7673                                {
7674                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
7675                                                lastKnownLocation.showHappens(CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,L("A Javascript was not authorized.  Contact an Admin to use MODIFY JSCRIPT to authorize this script."));
7676                                }
7677                                break;
7678                        }
7679                        case 19: // if
7680                        {
7681                                if(tt==null)
7682                                {
7683                                        try
7684                                        {
7685                                                final String[] ttParms=parseEval(s.substring(2));
7686                                                tt=new String[ttParms.length+1];
7687                                                tt[0]="IF";
7688                                                for(int i=0;i<ttParms.length;i++)
7689                                                        tt[i+1]=ttParms[i];
7690                                                script.setElementAt(si,2,tt);
7691                                        }
7692                                        catch(final Exception e)
7693                                        {
7694                                                logError(scripted,"IF","Syntax",e.getMessage());
7695                                                tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
7696                                                return null;
7697                                        }
7698                                }
7699                                final String[][] EVAL={tt};
7700                                boolean condition=eval(scripted,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,EVAL,1);
7701                                if(EVAL[0]!=tt)
7702                                {
7703                                        tt=EVAL[0];
7704                                        script.setElementAt(si,2,tt);
7705                                }
7706                                final DVector V=new DVector(2);
7707                                V.addElement("",null);
7708                                int depth=0;
7709                                boolean foundendif=false;
7710                                boolean ignoreUntilEndScript=false;
7711                                si++;
7712                                while(si<script.size())
7713                                {
7714                                        s=((String)script.elementAt(si,1)).trim();
7715                                        tt=(String[])script.elementAt(si,2);
7716                                        if(tt!=null)
7717                                                cmd=tt[0];
7718                                        else
7719                                                cmd=CMParms.getCleanBit(s,0).toUpperCase();
7720                                        if(cmd.equals("<SCRIPT>"))
7721                                        {
7722                                                if(tt==null)
7723                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7724                                                ignoreUntilEndScript=true;
7725                                        }
7726                                        else
7727                                        if(cmd.equals("</SCRIPT>"))
7728                                        {
7729                                                if(tt==null)
7730                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7731                                                ignoreUntilEndScript=false;
7732                                        }
7733                                        else
7734                                        if(ignoreUntilEndScript)
7735                                        {
7736                                        }
7737                                        else
7738                                        if(cmd.equals("ENDIF")&&(depth==0))
7739                                        {
7740                                                if(tt==null)
7741                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7742                                                foundendif=true;
7743                                                break;
7744                                        }
7745                                        else
7746                                        if(cmd.equals("ELSE")&&(depth==0))
7747                                        {
7748                                                condition=!condition;
7749                                                if(s.substring(4).trim().length()>0)
7750                                                {
7751                                                        script.setElementAt(si,1,"ELSE");
7752                                                        script.setElementAt(si,2,new String[]{"ELSE"});
7753                                                        script.insertElementAt(si+1,s.substring(4).trim(),null);
7754                                                }
7755                                                else
7756                                                if(tt==null)
7757                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7758                                        }
7759                                        else
7760                                        {
7761                                                if(cmd.equals("IF"))
7762                                                        depth++;
7763                                                else
7764                                                if(cmd.equals("ENDIF"))
7765                                                {
7766                                                        if(tt==null)
7767                                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7768                                                        depth--;
7769                                                }
7770                                                if(condition)
7771                                                        V.addSharedElements(script.elementsAt(si));
7772                                        }
7773                                        si++;
7774                                }
7775                                if(!foundendif)
7776                                {
7777                                        logError(scripted,"IF","Syntax"," Without ENDIF!");
7778                                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
7779                                        return null;
7780                                }
7781                                if(V.size()>1)
7782                                {
7783                                        //source.tell(L("Starting @x1",conditionStr));
7784                                        //for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
7785                                        //  source.tell(L("Statement @x1",((String)V.elementAt(v))));
7786                                        final String response=execute(scripted,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,V,msg,tmp);
7787                                        if(response!=null)
7788                                        {
7789                                                tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
7790                                                return response;
7791                                        }
7792                                        //source.tell(L("Stopping @x1",conditionStr));
7793                                }
7794                                break;
7795                        }
7796                        case 70: // switch
7797                        {
7798                                if(tt==null)
7799                                {
7800                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
7801                                        if(tt==null)
7802                                                return null;
7803                                }
7804                                final String var=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]).trim();
7805                                final DVector V=new DVector(2);
7806                                V.addElement("",null);
7807                                int depth=0;
7808                                boolean foundendif=false;
7809                                boolean ignoreUntilEndScript=false;
7810                                boolean inCase=false;
7811                                boolean matchedCase=false;
7812                                si++;
7813                                String s2=null;
7814                                while(si<script.size())
7815                                {
7816                                        s=((String)script.elementAt(si,1)).trim();
7817                                        tt=(String[])script.elementAt(si,2);
7818                                        if(tt!=null)
7819                                                cmd=tt[0];
7820                                        else
7821                                                cmd=CMParms.getCleanBit(s,0).toUpperCase();
7822                                        if(cmd.equals("<SCRIPT>"))
7823                                        {
7824                                                if(tt==null)
7825                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7826                                                ignoreUntilEndScript=true;
7827                                        }
7828                                        else
7829                                        if(cmd.equals("</SCRIPT>"))
7830                                        {
7831                                                if(tt==null)
7832                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7833                                                ignoreUntilEndScript=false;
7834                                        }
7835                                        else
7836                                        if(ignoreUntilEndScript)
7837                                        {
7838                                        }
7839                                        else
7840                                        if(cmd.equals("ENDSWITCH")&&(depth==0))
7841                                        {
7842                                                if(tt==null)
7843                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7844                                                foundendif=true;
7845                                                break;
7846                                        }
7847                                        else
7848                                        if(cmd.equals("CASE")&&(depth==0))
7849                                        {
7850                                                if(tt==null)
7851                                                {
7852                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
7853                                                        if(tt==null)
7854                                                                return null;
7855                                                }
7856                                                s2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]).trim();
7857                                                inCase=var.equalsIgnoreCase(s2);
7858                                                matchedCase=matchedCase||inCase;
7859                                        }
7860                                        else
7861                                        if(cmd.equals("DEFAULT")&&(depth==0))
7862                                        {
7863                                                inCase=!matchedCase;
7864                                        }
7865                                        else
7866                                        {
7867                                                if(inCase)
7868                                                        V.addElement(s,tt);
7869                                                if(cmd.equals("SWITCH"))
7870                                                {
7871                                                        if(tt==null)
7872                                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
7873                                                        depth++;
7874                                                }
7875                                                else
7876                                                if(cmd.equals("ENDSWITCH"))
7877                                                {
7878                                                        if(tt==null)
7879                                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7880                                                        depth--;
7881                                                }
7882                                        }
7883                                        si++;
7884                                }
7885                                if(!foundendif)
7886                                {
7887                                        logError(scripted,"SWITCH","Syntax"," Without ENDSWITCH!");
7888                                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
7889                                        return null;
7890                                }
7891                                if(V.size()>1)
7892                                {
7893                                        final String response=execute(scripted,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,V,msg,tmp);
7894                                        if(response!=null)
7895                                        {
7896                                                tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
7897                                                return response;
7898                                        }
7899                                }
7900                                break;
7901                        }
7902                        case 62: // for x = 1 to 100
7903                        {
7904                                if(tt==null)
7905                                {
7906                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"CcccCr");
7907                                        if(tt==null)
7908                                                return null;
7909                                }
7910                                if(tt[5].length()==0)
7911                                {
7912                                        logError(scripted,"FOR","Syntax","5 parms required!");
7913                                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
7914                                        return null;
7915                                }
7916                                final String varStr=tt[1];
7917                                if((varStr.length()!=2)||(varStr.charAt(0)!='$')||(!Character.isDigit(varStr.charAt(1))))
7918                                {
7919                                        logError(scripted,"FOR","Syntax","'"+varStr+"' is not a tmp var $1, $2..");
7920                                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
7921                                        return null;
7922                                }
7923                                final int whichVar=CMath.s_int(Character.toString(varStr.charAt(1)));
7924                                if((tmp[whichVar] instanceof String)
7925                                &&(((String)tmp[whichVar]).length()>0)
7926                                &&(CMath.isInteger(((String)tmp[whichVar]).trim())))
7927                                {
7928                                        logError(scripted,"FOR","Syntax","'"+whichVar+"' is already in use! Use a different one!");
7929                                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
7930                                        return null;
7931                                }
7932                                if(!tt[2].equals("="))
7933                                {
7934                                        logError(scripted,"FOR","Syntax","'"+s+"' is illegal for syntax!");
7935                                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
7936                                        return null;
7937                                }
7938
7939                                int toAdd=0;
7940                                if(tt[4].equals("TO<"))
7941                                        toAdd=-1;
7942                                else
7943                                if(tt[4].equals("TO>"))
7944                                        toAdd=1;
7945                                else
7946                                if(!tt[4].equals("TO"))
7947                                {
7948                                        logError(scripted,"FOR","Syntax","'"+s+"' is illegal for syntax!");
7949                                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
7950                                        return null;
7951                                }
7952                                final String from=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]).trim();
7953                                final String to=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[5]).trim();
7954                                if((!CMath.isInteger(from))||(!CMath.isInteger(to)))
7955                                {
