7956                                        logError(scripted,"FOR","Syntax","'"+from+"-"+to+"' is illegal range!");
7957                                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
7958                                        return null;
7959                                }
7960                                final DVector V=new DVector(2);
7961                                V.addElement("",null);
7962                                int depth=0;
7963                                boolean foundnext=false;
7964                                boolean ignoreUntilEndScript=false;
7965                                si++;
7966                                while(si<script.size())
7967                                {
7968                                        s=((String)script.elementAt(si,1)).trim();
7969                                        tt=(String[])script.elementAt(si,2);
7970                                        if(tt!=null)
7971                                                cmd=tt[0];
7972                                        else
7973                                                cmd=CMParms.getCleanBit(s,0).toUpperCase();
7974                                        if(cmd.equals("<SCRIPT>"))
7975                                        {
7976                                                if(tt==null)
7977                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7978                                                ignoreUntilEndScript=true;
7979                                        }
7980                                        else
7981                                        if(cmd.equals("</SCRIPT>"))
7982                                        {
7983                                                if(tt==null)
7984                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7985                                                ignoreUntilEndScript=false;
7986                                        }
7987                                        else
7988                                        if(ignoreUntilEndScript)
7989                                        {
7990                                        }
7991                                        else
7992                                        if(cmd.equals("NEXT")&&(depth==0))
7993                                        {
7994                                                if(tt==null)
7995                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
7996                                                foundnext=true;
7997                                                break;
7998                                        }
7999                                        else
8000                                        {
8001                                                if(cmd.equals("FOR"))
8002                                                {
8003                                                        if(tt==null)
8004                                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"CcccCr");
8005                                                        depth++;
8006                                                }
8007                                                else
8008                                                if(cmd.equals("NEXT"))
8009                                                {
8010                                                        if(tt==null)
8011                                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
8012                                                        depth--;
8013                                                }
8014                                                V.addSharedElements(script.elementsAt(si));
8015                                        }
8016                                        si++;
8017                                }
8018                                if(!foundnext)
8019                                {
8020                                        logError(scripted,"FOR","Syntax"," Without NEXT!");
8021                                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
8022                                        return null;
8023                                }
8024                                if(V.size()>1)
8025                                {
8026                                        //source.tell(L("Starting @x1",conditionStr));
8027                                        //for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
8028                                        //  source.tell(L("Statement @x1",((String)V.elementAt(v))));
8029                                        final int fromInt=CMath.s_int(from);
8030                                        int toInt=CMath.s_int(to);
8031                                        final int increment=(toInt>=fromInt)?1:-1;
8032                                        String response=null;
8033                                        if(((increment>0)&&(fromInt<=(toInt+toAdd)))
8034                                        ||((increment<0)&&(fromInt>=(toInt+toAdd))))
8035                                        {
8036                                                toInt+=toAdd;
8037                                                final long tm=System.currentTimeMillis()+(10 * 1000);
8038                                                for(int forLoop=fromInt;forLoop!=toInt;forLoop+=increment)
8039                                                {
8040                                                        tmp[whichVar]=""+forLoop;
8041                                                        response=execute(scripted,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,V,msg,tmp);
8042                                                        if(response!=null)
8043                                                                break;
8044                                                        if(System.currentTimeMillis()>tm)
8045                                                        {
8046                                                                logError(scripted,"FOR","Runtime","For loop violates 10 second rule: " +s);
8047                                                                break;
8048                                                        }
8049                                                }
8050                                                tmp[whichVar]=""+toInt;
8051                                                if(response == null)
8052                                                        response=execute(scripted,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,V,msg,tmp);
8053                                                else
8054                                                if(response.equalsIgnoreCase("break"))
8055                                                        response=null;
8056                                        }
8057                                        if(response!=null)
8058                                        {
8059                                                tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
8060                                                return response;
8061                                        }
8062                                        tmp[whichVar]=null;
8063                                        //source.tell(L("Stopping @x1",conditionStr));
8064                                }
8065                                break;
8066                        }
8067                        case 50: // break;
8068                                if(tt==null)
8069                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"C");
8070                                tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
8071                                return "BREAK";
8072                        case 1: // mpasound
8073                        {
8074                                if(tt==null)
8075                                {
8076                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cp");
8077                                        if(tt==null)
8078                                                return null;
8079                                }
8080                                final String echo=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
8081                                //lastKnownLocation.showSource(monster,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,echo);
8082                                for(int d=Directions.NUM_DIRECTIONS()-1;d>=0;d--)
8083                                {
8084                                        final Room R2=lastKnownLocation.getRoomInDir(d);
8085                                        final Exit E2=lastKnownLocation.getExitInDir(d);
8086                                        if((R2!=null)&&(E2!=null)&&(E2.isOpen()))
8087                                                R2.showOthers(monster,null,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,echo);
8088                                }
8089                                break;
8090                        }
8091                        case 4: // mpjunk
8092                        {
8093                                if(tt==null)
8094                                {
8095                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"CR");
8096                                        if(tt==null)
8097                                                return null;
8098                                }
8099                                if(tt[1].equals("ALL") && (monster!=null))
8100                                {
8101                                        monster.delAllItems(true);
8102                                }
8103                                else
8104                                {
8105                                        final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8106                                        Item I=null;
8107                                        if(E instanceof Item)
8108                                                I=(Item)E;
8109                                        if((I==null)&&(monster!=null))
8110                                                I=monster.findItem(varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]));
8111                                        if((I==null)&&(scripted instanceof Room))
8112                                                I=((Room)scripted).findItem(varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]));
8113                                        if(I!=null)
8114                                                I.destroy();
8115                                }
8116                                break;
8117                        }
8118                        case 2: // mpecho
8119                        {
8120                                if(tt==null)
8121                                {
8122                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cp");
8123                                        if(tt==null)
8124                                                return null;
8125                                }
8126                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
8127                                        lastKnownLocation.show(monster,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]));
8128                                break;
8129                        }
8130                        case 13: // mpunaffect
8131                        {
8132                                if(tt==null)
8133                                {
8134                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
8135                                        if(tt==null)
8136                                                return null;
8137                                }
8138                                final Physical newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8139                                String which=tt[2];
8140                                if(newTarget!=null)
8141                                if(which.equalsIgnoreCase("all")||(which.length()==0))
8142                                {
8143                                        for(int a=newTarget.numEffects()-1;a>=0;a--)
8144                                        {
8145                                                final Ability A=newTarget.fetchEffect(a);
8146                                                if(A!=null)
8147                                                        A.unInvoke();
8148                                        }
8149                                }
8150                                else
8151                                {
8152                                        final Ability A2=CMClass.findAbility(which);
8153                                        if(A2!=null)
8154                                                which=A2.ID();
8155                                        final Ability A=newTarget.fetchEffect(which);
8156                                        if(A!=null)
8157                                        {
8158                                                if((newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(!((MOB)newTarget).isMonster()))
8159                                                        Log.sysOut("Scripting",newTarget.Name()+" was MPUNAFFECTED by "+A.Name());
8160                                                A.unInvoke();
8161                                                if(newTarget.fetchEffect(which)==A)
8162                                                        newTarget.delEffect(A);
8163                                        }
8164                                }
8165                                break;
8166                        }
8167                        case 3: // mpslay
8168                        {
8169                                if(tt==null)
8170                                {
8171                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
8172                                        if(tt==null)
8173                                                return null;
8174                                }
8175                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8176                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
8177                                        CMLib.combat().postDeath(monster,(MOB)newTarget,null);
8178                                break;
8179                        }
8180                        case 73: // mpsetinternal
8181                        {
8182                                if(tt==null)
8183                                {
8184                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"CCr");
8185                                        if(tt==null)
8186                                                return null;
8187                                }
8188                                final String arg2=tt[1];
8189                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
8190                                if(arg2.equals("SCOPE"))
8191                                        setVarScope(arg3);
8192                                else
8193                                if(arg2.equals("NODELAY"))
8194                                        noDelay=CMath.s_bool(arg3);
8195                                else
8196                                if(arg2.equals("ACTIVETRIGGER")||arg2.equals("ACTIVETRIGGERS"))
8197                                        alwaysTriggers=CMath.s_bool(arg3);
8198                                else
8199                                if(arg2.equals("DEFAULTQUEST"))
8200                                        registerDefaultQuest(arg3);
8201                                else
8202                                if(arg2.equals("SAVABLE"))
8203                                        setSavable(CMath.s_bool(arg3));
8204                                else
8205                                if(arg2.equals("PASSIVE"))
8206                                        this.runInPassiveAreas = CMath.s_bool(arg3);
8207                                else
8208                                        logError(scripted,"MPSETINTERNAL","Syntax","Unknown stat: "+arg2);
8209                                break;
8210                        }
8211                        case 74: // mpprompt
8212                        {
8213                                if(tt==null)
8214                                {
8215                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"CCCr");
8216                                        if(tt==null)
8217                                                return null;
8218                                }
8219                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8220                                final String var=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
8221                                final String promptStr=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
8222                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB)&&((((MOB)newTarget).session()!=null)))
8223                                {
8224                                        try
8225                                        {
8226                                                final String value=((MOB)newTarget).session().prompt(promptStr,120000);
8227                                                setVar(newTarget.Name(),var,value);
8228                                        }
8229                                        catch(final Exception e)
8230                                        {
8231                                                return "";
8232                                        }
8233                                }
8234                                break;
8235                        }
8236                        case 75: // mpconfirm
8237                        {
8238                                if(tt==null)
8239                                {
8240                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"CCCCr");
8241                                        if(tt==null)
8242                                                return null;
8243                                }
8244                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8245                                final String var=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
8246                                final String defaultVal=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
8247                                final String promptStr=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[4]);
8248                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB)&&((((MOB)newTarget).session()!=null)))
8249                                {
8250                                        try
8251                                        {
8252                                                final String value=((MOB)newTarget).session().confirm(promptStr,defaultVal,60000)?"Y":"N";
8253                                                setVar(newTarget.Name(),var,value);
8254                                        }
8255                                        catch(final Exception e)
8256                                        {
8257                                                return "";
8258                                        }
8259                                        /*
8260                                         * this is how to do non-blocking, which doesn't help stuff waiting
8261                                         * for a response from the original execute method
8262                                        final Session session = ((MOB)newTarget).session();
8263                                        if(session != null)
8264                                        {
8265                                                try
8266                                                {
8267                                                        final int lastLineNum=si;
8268                                                        final JScriptEvent continueEvent=new JScriptEvent(
8269                                                                                                                                                this,
8270                                                                                                                                                scripted,
8271                                                                                                                                                source,
8272                                                                                                                                                target,
8273                                                                                                                                                monster,
8274                                                                                                                                                primaryItem,
8275                                                                                                                                                secondaryItem,
8276                                                                                                                                                msg,
8277                                                                                                                                                tmp);
8278                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).session().prompt(new InputCallback(InputCallback.Type.PROMPT,"",0)
8279                                                        {
8280                                                                private final JScriptEvent event=continueEvent;
8281                                                                private final int lineNum=lastLineNum;
8282                                                                private final String scope=newTarget.Name();
8283                                                                private final String varName=var;
8284                                                                private final String promptStrMsg=promptStr;
8285                                                                private final DVector lastScript=script;
8286
8287                                                                @Override
8288                                                                public void showPrompt()
8289                                                                {
8290                                                                        session.promptPrint(promptStrMsg);
8291                                                                }
8292
8293                                                                @Override
8294                                                                public void timedOut()
8295                                                                {
8296                                                                        event.executeEvent(lastScript, lineNum+1);
8297                                                                }
8298
8299                                                                @Override
8300                                                                public void callBack()
8301                                                                {
8302                                                                        final String value=this.input;
8303                                                                        if((value.trim().length()==0)||(value.indexOf('<')>=0))
8304                                                                                return;
8305                                                                        setVar(scope,varName,value);
8306                                                                        event.executeEvent(lastScript, lineNum+1);
8307                                                                }
8308                                                        });
8309                                                }
8310                                                catch(final Exception e)
8311                                                {
8312                                                        return "";
8313                                                }
8314                                        }
8315                                         */
8316                                }
8317                                break;
8318                        }
8319                        case 76: // mpchoose
8320                        {
8321                                if(tt==null)
8322                                {
8323                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"CCCCCr");
8324                                        if(tt==null)
8325                                                return null;
8326                                }
8327                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8328                                final String var=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
8329                                final String choices=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
8330                                final String defaultVal=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[4]);
8331                                final String promptStr=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[5]);
8332                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB)&&((((MOB)newTarget).session()!=null)))
8333                                {
8334                                        try
8335                                        {
8336                                                final String value=((MOB)newTarget).session().choose(promptStr,choices,defaultVal,60000);
8337                                                setVar(newTarget.Name(),var,value);
8338                                        }
8339                                        catch(final Exception e)
8340                                        {
8341                                                return "";
8342                                        }
8343                                }
8344                                break;
8345                        }
8346                        case 16: // mpset
8347                        {
8348                                if(tt==null)
8349                                {
8350                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"CCcr");
8351                                        if(tt==null)
8352                                                return null;
8353                                }
8354                                final Physical newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8355                                final String arg2=tt[2];
8356                                String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
8357                                if(newTarget!=null)
8358                                {
8359                                        if((newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(!((MOB)newTarget).isMonster()))
8360                                                Log.sysOut("Scripting",newTarget.Name()+" has "+arg2+" MPSETTED to "+arg3);
8361                                        boolean found=false;
8362                                        for(int i=0;i<newTarget.getStatCodes().length;i++)
8363                                        {
8364                                                if(newTarget.getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
8365                                                {
8366                                                        if(arg3.equals("++"))
8367                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(newTarget.getStat(newTarget.getStatCodes()[i]))+1);
8368                                                        if(arg3.equals("--"))
8369                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(newTarget.getStat(newTarget.getStatCodes()[i]))-1);
8370                                                        newTarget.setStat(arg2,arg3);
8371                                                        found=true;
8372                                                        break;
8373                                                }
8374                                        }
8375                                        if((!found)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
8376                                        {
8377                                                final MOB M=(MOB)newTarget;
8378                                                for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
8379                                                {
8380                                                        if(CharStats.CODES.NAME(i).equalsIgnoreCase(arg2)||CharStats.CODES.DESC(i).equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
8381                                                        {
8382                                                                if(arg3.equals("++"))
8383                                                                        arg3=""+(M.baseCharStats().getStat(i)+1);
8384                                                                if(arg3.equals("--"))
8385                                                                        arg3=""+(M.baseCharStats().getStat(i)-1);
8386                                                                M.baseCharStats().setStat(i,CMath.s_int(arg3.trim()));
8387                                                                M.recoverCharStats();
8388                                                                if(arg2.equalsIgnoreCase("RACE"))
8389                                                                        M.charStats().getMyRace().startRacing(M,false);
8390                                                                found=true;
8391                                                                break;
8392                                                        }
8393                                                }
8394                                                if(!found)
8395                                                {
8396                                                        for(int i=0;i<M.curState().getStatCodes().length;i++)
8397                                                        {
8398                                                                if(M.curState().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
8399                                                                {
8400                                                                        if(arg3.equals("++"))
8401                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.curState().getStat(M.curState().getStatCodes()[i]))+1);
8402                                                                        if(arg3.equals("--"))
8403                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.curState().getStat(M.curState().getStatCodes()[i]))-1);
8404                                                                        M.curState().setStat(arg2,arg3);
8405                                                                        found=true;
8406                                                                        break;
8407                                                                }
8408                                                        }
8409                                                }
8410                                                if(!found)
8411                                                {
8412                                                        for(int i=0;i<M.basePhyStats().getStatCodes().length;i++)
8413                                                        {
8414                                                                if(M.basePhyStats().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
8415                                                                {
8416                                                                        if(arg3.equals("++"))
8417                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.basePhyStats().getStat(M.basePhyStats().getStatCodes()[i]))+1);
8418                                                                        if(arg3.equals("--"))
8419                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.basePhyStats().getStat(M.basePhyStats().getStatCodes()[i]))-1);
8420                                                                        M.basePhyStats().setStat(arg2,arg3);
8421                                                                        found=true;
8422                                                                        break;
8423                                                                }
8424                                                        }
8425                                                }
8426                                                if((!found)&&(M.playerStats()!=null))
8427                                                {
8428                                                        for(int i=0;i<M.playerStats().getStatCodes().length;i++)
8429                                                        {
8430                                                                if(M.playerStats().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
8431                                                                {
8432                                                                        if(arg3.equals("++"))
8433                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.playerStats().getStat(M.playerStats().getStatCodes()[i]))+1);
8434                                                                        if(arg3.equals("--"))
8435                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.playerStats().getStat(M.playerStats().getStatCodes()[i]))-1);
8436                                                                        M.playerStats().setStat(arg2,arg3);
8437                                                                        found=true;
8438                                                                        break;
8439                                                                }
8440                                                        }
8441                                                }
8442                                                if((!found)&&(arg2.toUpperCase().startsWith("BASE")))
8443                                                {
8444                                                        for(int i=0;i<M.baseState().getStatCodes().length;i++)
8445                                                        {
8446                                                                if(M.baseState().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2.substring(4)))
8447                                                                {
8448                                                                        if(arg3.equals("++"))
8449                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.baseState().getStat(M.baseState().getStatCodes()[i]))+1);
8450                                                                        if(arg3.equals("--"))
8451                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.baseState().getStat(M.baseState().getStatCodes()[i]))-1);
8452                                                                        M.baseState().setStat(arg2.substring(4),arg3);
8453                                                                        found=true;
8454                                                                        break;
8455                                                                }
8456                                                        }
8457                                                }
8458                                                if((!found)&&(gstatH.containsKey(arg2.toUpperCase())))
8459                                                {
8460                                                        found=true;
8461                                                        switch(gstatH.get(arg2.toUpperCase()).intValue())
8462                                                        {
8463                                                        case GSTATADD_STINK:
8464                                                                if(M.playerStats()!=null)
8465                                                                        M.playerStats().setHygiene(Math.round(CMath.s_pct(arg3)*PlayerStats.HYGIENE_DELIMIT));
8466                                                                break;
8467                                                        case GSTATADD_DEITY:
8468                                                                M.setWorshipCharID(arg3);
8469                                                                break;
8470                                                        case GSTATADD_CLAN:
8471                                                        {
8472                                                                Pair<Clan, Integer> p = M.getClanRole(arg3);
8473                                                                if (p == null)
8474                                                                {
8475                                                                        final Clan C = CMLib.clans().getClan(arg3);
8476                                                                        if (C != null)
8477                                                                                p = new Pair<Clan, Integer>(C, Integer.valueOf(C.getGovernment().getAcceptPos()));
8478                                                                }
8479                                                                if (p != null)
8480                                                                        M.setClan(p.first.clanID(), p.second.intValue());
8481                                                                break;
8482                                                        }
8483                                                        case GSTATADD_CLANROLE:
8484                                                        {
8485                                                                Clan C = CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan((MOB) newTarget);
8486                                                                if (C == null)
8487                                                                        C = ((MOB) newTarget).clans().iterator().hasNext() ? ((MOB) newTarget).clans().iterator().next().first : null;
8488                                                                if (C != null)
8489                                                                        M.setClan(C.clanID(), CMath.s_int(arg3));
8490                                                                break;
8491                                                        }
8492                                                        }
8493                                                }
8494                                        }
8495
8496                                        if(!found)
8497                                        {
8498                                                logError(scripted,"MPSET","Syntax","Unknown stat: "+arg2+" for "+newTarget.Name());
8499                                                break;
8500                                        }
8501                                        if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
8502                                                ((MOB)newTarget).recoverCharStats();
8503                                        newTarget.recoverPhyStats();
8504                                        if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
8505                                        {
8506                                                ((MOB)newTarget).recoverMaxState();
8507                                                if(arg2.equalsIgnoreCase("LEVEL"))
8508                                                {
8509                                                        CMLib.leveler().fillOutMOB(((MOB)newTarget),((MOB)newTarget).basePhyStats().level());
8510                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).recoverMaxState();
8511                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).recoverCharStats();
8512                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).recoverPhyStats();
8513                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).resetToMaxState();
8514                                                }
8515                                        }
8516                                }
8517                                break;
8518                        }
8519                        case 63: // mpargset
8520                        {
8521                                if(tt==null)
8522                                {
8523                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
8524                                        if(tt==null)
8525                                                return null;
8526                                }
8527                                final String arg1=tt[1];
8528                                final String arg2=tt[2];
8529                                if((arg1.length()!=2)||(!arg1.startsWith("$")))
8530                                {
8531                                        logError(scripted,"MPARGSET","Syntax","Mangled argument var: "+arg1+" for "+scripted.Name());
8532                                        break;
8533                                }
8534                                Object O=getArgumentMOB(arg2,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8535                                if(O==null)
8536                                        O=getArgumentItem(arg2,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8537                                if((O==null)
8538                                &&((!arg2.trim().startsWith("$"))
8539                                        ||(arg2.length()<2)
8540                                        ||((!Character.isDigit(arg2.charAt(1)))
8541                                                &&(!Character.isLetter(arg2.charAt(1))))))
8542                                        O=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,arg2);
8543                                final char c=arg1.charAt(1);
8544                                if(Character.isDigit(c))
8545                                {
8546                                        if((O instanceof String)&&(((String)O).equalsIgnoreCase("null")))
8547                                                O=null;
8548                                        tmp[CMath.s_int(Character.toString(c))]=O;
8549                                }
8550                                else
8551                                {
8552                                        switch(arg1.charAt(1))
8553                                        {
8554                                        case 'N':
8555                                        case 'n':
8556                                                if (O instanceof MOB)
8557                                                        source = (MOB) O;
8558                                                break;
8559                                        case 'B':
8560                                        case 'b':
8561                                                if (O instanceof Environmental)
8562                                                        lastLoaded = (Environmental) O;
8563                                                break;
8564                                        case 'I':
8565                                        case 'i':
8566                                                if (O instanceof PhysicalAgent)
8567                                                        scripted = (PhysicalAgent) O;
8568                                                if (O instanceof MOB)
8569                                                        monster = (MOB) O;
8570                                                break;
8571                                        case 'T':
8572                                        case 't':
8573                                                if (O instanceof Environmental)
8574                                                        target = (Environmental) O;
8575                                                break;
8576                                        case 'O':
8577                                        case 'o':
8578                                                if (O instanceof Item)
8579                                                        primaryItem = (Item) O;
8580                                                break;
8581                                        case 'P':
8582                                        case 'p':
8583                                                if (O instanceof Item)
8584                                                        secondaryItem = (Item) O;
8585                                                break;
8586                                        case 'd':
8587                                        case 'D':
8588                                                if (O instanceof Room)
8589                                                        lastKnownLocation = (Room) O;
8590                                                break;
8591                                        case 'g':
8592                                        case 'G':
8593                                                if (O instanceof String)
8594                                                        msg = (String) O;
8595                                                break;
8596                                        default:
8597                                                logError(scripted, "MPARGSET", "Syntax", "Invalid argument var: " + arg1 + " for " + scripted.Name());
8598                                                break;
8599                                        }
8600                                }
8601                                break;
8602                        }
8603                        case 35: // mpgset
8604                        {
8605                                if(tt==null)
8606                                {
8607                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cccr");
8608                                        if(tt==null)
8609                                                return null;
8610                                }
8611                                final Physical newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8612                                final String arg2=tt[2];
8613                                String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
8614                                if(newTarget!=null)
8615                                {
8616                                        if((newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(!((MOB)newTarget).isMonster()))
8617                                                Log.sysOut("Scripting",newTarget.Name()+" has "+arg2+" MPGSETTED to "+arg3);
8618                                        boolean found=false;
8619                                        for(int i=0;i<newTarget.getStatCodes().length;i++)
8620                                        {
8621                                                if(newTarget.getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
8622                                                {
8623                                                        if(arg3.equals("++"))
8624                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(newTarget.getStat(newTarget.getStatCodes()[i]))+1);
8625                                                        if(arg3.equals("--"))
8626                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(newTarget.getStat(newTarget.getStatCodes()[i]))-1);
8627                                                        newTarget.setStat(newTarget.getStatCodes()[i],arg3);
8628                                                        found=true;
8629                                                        break;
8630                                                }
8631                                        }
8632                                        if(!found)
8633                                        {
8634                                                if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
8635                                                {
8636                                                        final GenericBuilder.GenMOBCode element = (GenericBuilder.GenMOBCode)CMath.s_valueOf(GenericBuilder.GenMOBCode.class,arg2.toUpperCase().trim());
8637                                                        if(element != null)
8638                                                        {
8639                                                                if(arg3.equals("++"))
8640                                                                        arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(CMLib.coffeeMaker().getGenMobStat((MOB)newTarget,element.name()))+1);
8641                                                                if(arg3.equals("--"))
8642                                                                        arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(CMLib.coffeeMaker().getGenMobStat((MOB)newTarget,element.name()))-1);
8643                                                                CMLib.coffeeMaker().setGenMobStat((MOB)newTarget,element.name(),arg3);
8644                                                                found=true;
8645                                                        }
8646                                                        if(!found)
8647                                                        {
8648                                                                final MOB M=(MOB)newTarget;
8649                                                                for(final int i : CharStats.CODES.ALLCODES())
8650                                                                {
8651                                                                        if(CharStats.CODES.NAME(i).equalsIgnoreCase(arg2)||CharStats.CODES.DESC(i).equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
8652                                                                        {
8653                                                                                if(arg3.equals("++"))
8654                                                                                        arg3=""+(M.baseCharStats().getStat(i)+1);
8655                                                                                if(arg3.equals("--"))
8656                                                                                        arg3=""+(M.baseCharStats().getStat(i)-1);
8657                                                                                if((arg3.length()==1)&&(Character.isLetter(arg3.charAt(0))))
8658                                                                                        M.baseCharStats().setStat(i,arg3.charAt(0));
8659                                                                                else
8660                                                                                        M.baseCharStats().setStat(i,CMath.s_int(arg3.trim()));
8661                                                                                M.recoverCharStats();
8662                                                                                if(arg2.equalsIgnoreCase("RACE"))
8663                                                                                        M.charStats().getMyRace().startRacing(M,false);
8664                                                                                found=true;
8665                                                                                break;
8666                                                                        }
8667                                                                }
8668                                                                if(!found)
8669                                                                {
8670                                                                        for(int i=0;i<M.curState().getStatCodes().length;i++)
8671                                                                        {
8672                                                                                if(M.curState().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
8673                                                                                {
8674                                                                                        if(arg3.equals("++"))
8675                                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.curState().getStat(M.curState().getStatCodes()[i]))+1);
8676                                                                                        if(arg3.equals("--"))
8677                                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.curState().getStat(M.curState().getStatCodes()[i]))-1);
8678                                                                                        M.curState().setStat(arg2,arg3);
8679                                                                                        found=true;
8680                                                                                        break;
8681                                                                                }
8682                                                                        }
8683                                                                }
8684                                                                if(!found)
8685                                                                {
8686                                                                        for(int i=0;i<M.basePhyStats().getStatCodes().length;i++)
8687                                                                        {
8688                                                                                if(M.basePhyStats().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
8689                                                                                {
8690                                                                                        if(arg3.equals("++"))
8691                                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.basePhyStats().getStat(M.basePhyStats().getStatCodes()[i]))+1);
8692                                                                                        if(arg3.equals("--"))
8693                                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.basePhyStats().getStat(M.basePhyStats().getStatCodes()[i]))-1);
8694                                                                                        M.basePhyStats().setStat(arg2,arg3);
8695                                                                                        found=true;
8696                                                                                        break;
8697                                                                                }
8698                                                                        }
8699                                                                }
8700                                                                if((!found)&&(M.playerStats()!=null))
8701                                                                {
8702                                                                        for(int i=0;i<M.playerStats().getStatCodes().length;i++)
8703                                                                        {
8704                                                                                if(M.playerStats().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2))
8705                                                                                {
8706                                                                                        if(arg3.equals("++"))
8707                                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.playerStats().getStat(M.playerStats().getStatCodes()[i]))+1);
8708                                                                                        if(arg3.equals("--"))
8709                                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.playerStats().getStat(M.playerStats().getStatCodes()[i]))-1);
8710                                                                                        M.playerStats().setStat(arg2,arg3);
8711                                                                                        found=true;
8712                                                                                        break;
8713                                                                                }
8714                                                                        }
8715                                                                }
8716                                                                if((!found)&&(arg2.toUpperCase().startsWith("BASE")))
8717                                                                {
8718                                                                        for(int i=0;i<M.baseState().getStatCodes().length;i++)
8719                                                                        {
8720                                                                                if(M.baseState().getStatCodes()[i].equalsIgnoreCase(arg2.substring(4)))
8721                                                                                {
8722                                                                                        if(arg3.equals("++"))
8723                                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.baseState().getStat(M.baseState().getStatCodes()[i]))+1);
8724                                                                                        if(arg3.equals("--"))
8725                                                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(M.baseState().getStat(M.baseState().getStatCodes()[i]))-1);
8726                                                                                        M.baseState().setStat(arg2.substring(4),arg3);
8727                                                                                        found=true;
8728                                                                                        break;
8729                                                                                }
8730                                                                        }
8731                                                                }
8732                                                                if((!found)&&(gstatH.containsKey(arg2.toUpperCase())))
8733                                                                {
8734                                                                        found=true;
8735                                                                        switch(gstatH.get(arg2.toUpperCase()).intValue())
8736                                                                        {
8737                                                                        case GSTATADD_STINK:
8738                                                                                if(M.playerStats()!=null)
8739                                                                                        M.playerStats().setHygiene(Math.round(CMath.s_pct(arg3)*PlayerStats.HYGIENE_DELIMIT));
8740                                                                                break;
8741                                                                        case GSTATADD_DEITY:
8742                                                                                M.setWorshipCharID(arg3);
8743                                                                                break;
8744                                                                        case GSTATADD_CLAN:
8745                                                                        {
8746                                                                                Pair<Clan, Integer> p = M.getClanRole(arg3);
8747                                                                                if (p == null)
8748                                                                                {
8749                                                                                        final Clan C = CMLib.clans().getClan(arg3);
8750                                                                                        if (C != null)
8751                                                                                                p = new Pair<Clan, Integer>(C, Integer.valueOf(C.getGovernment().getAcceptPos()));
8752                                                                                }
8753                                                                                if (p != null)
8754                                                                                        M.setClan(p.first.clanID(), p.second.intValue());
8755                                                                                break;
8756                                                                        }
8757                                                                        case GSTATADD_CLANROLE:
8758                                                                        {
8759                                                                                Clan C = CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan((MOB) newTarget);
8760                                                                                if (C == null)
8761                                                                                        C = ((MOB) newTarget).clans().iterator().hasNext() ? ((MOB) newTarget).clans().iterator().next().first : null;
8762                                                                                if (C != null)
8763                                                                                        M.setClan(C.clanID(), CMath.s_int(arg3));
8764                                                                                break;
8765                                                                        }
8766                                                                        }
8767                                                                }
8768                                                        }
8769                                                }
8770                                        }
8771                                        else
8772                                        if(newTarget instanceof Item)
8773                                        {
8774
8775                                                final GenericBuilder.GenItemCode element = (GenericBuilder.GenItemCode)CMath.s_valueOf(GenericBuilder.GenItemCode.class,arg2.toUpperCase().trim());
8776                                                if(element != null)
8777                                                {
8778                                                        if(arg3.equals("++"))
8779                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(CMLib.coffeeMaker().getGenItemStat((Item)newTarget,element.name()))+1);
8780                                                        if(arg3.equals("--"))
8781                                                                arg3=""+(CMath.s_int(CMLib.coffeeMaker().getGenItemStat((Item)newTarget,element.name()))-1);
8782                                                        CMLib.coffeeMaker().setGenItemStat((Item)newTarget,element.name(),arg3);
8783                                                        found=true;
8784                                                }
8785                                        }
8786
8787                                        if(!found)
8788                                        {
8789                                                logError(scripted,"MPGSET","Syntax","Unknown stat: "+arg2+" for "+newTarget.Name());
8790                                                break;
8791                                        }
8792                                        if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
8793                                                ((MOB)newTarget).recoverCharStats();
8794                                        newTarget.recoverPhyStats();
8795                                        if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
8796                                        {
8797                                                ((MOB)newTarget).recoverMaxState();
8798                                                if(arg2.equalsIgnoreCase("LEVEL"))
8799                                                {
8800                                                        CMLib.leveler().fillOutMOB(((MOB)newTarget),((MOB)newTarget).basePhyStats().level());
8801                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).recoverMaxState();
8802                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).recoverCharStats();
8803                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).recoverPhyStats();
8804                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).resetToMaxState();
8805                                                }
8806                                        }
8807                                }
8808                                break;
8809                        }
8810                        case 11: // mpexp
8811                        {
8812                                if(tt==null)
8813                                {
8814                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
8815                                        if(tt==null)
8816                                                return null;
8817                                }
8818                                final Physical newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8819                                final String amtStr=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]).trim();
8820                                int t=CMath.s_int(amtStr);
8821                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
8822                                {
8823                                        if((amtStr.endsWith("%"))
8824                                        &&(((MOB)newTarget).getExpNeededLevel()<Integer.MAX_VALUE))
8825                                        {
8826                                                final int baseLevel=newTarget.basePhyStats().level();
8827                                                final int lastLevelExpNeeded=(baseLevel<=1)?0:CMLib.leveler().getLevelExperience(baseLevel-1);
8828                                                final int thisLevelExpNeeded=CMLib.leveler().getLevelExperience(baseLevel);
8829                                                t=(int)Math.round(CMath.mul(thisLevelExpNeeded-lastLevelExpNeeded,
8830                                                                                        CMath.div(CMath.s_int(amtStr.substring(0,amtStr.length()-1)),100.0)));
8831                                        }
8832                                        if(t!=0)
8833                                                CMLib.leveler().postExperience((MOB)newTarget,null,null,t,false);
8834                                }
8835                                break;
8836                        }
8837                        case 86: // mprpexp
8838                        {
8839                                if(tt==null)
8840                                {
8841                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
8842                                        if(tt==null)
8843                                                return null;
8844                                }
8845                                final Physical newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8846                                final String amtStr=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]).trim();
8847                                int t=CMath.s_int(amtStr);
8848                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
8849                                {
8850                                        if((amtStr.endsWith("%"))
8851                                        &&(((MOB)newTarget).getExpNeededLevel()<Integer.MAX_VALUE))
8852                                        {
8853                                                final int baseLevel=newTarget.basePhyStats().level();
8854                                                final int lastLevelExpNeeded=(baseLevel<=1)?0:CMLib.leveler().getLevelExperience(baseLevel-1);
8855                                                final int thisLevelExpNeeded=CMLib.leveler().getLevelExperience(baseLevel);
8856                                                t=(int)Math.round(CMath.mul(thisLevelExpNeeded-lastLevelExpNeeded,
8857                                                                                        CMath.div(CMath.s_int(amtStr.substring(0,amtStr.length()-1)),100.0)));
8858                                        }
8859                                        if(t!=0)
8860                                                CMLib.leveler().postRPExperience((MOB)newTarget,null,null,t,false);
8861                                }
8862                                break;
8863                        }
8864                        case 77: // mpmoney
8865                        {
8866                                if(tt==null)
8867                                {
8868                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
8869                                        if(tt==null)
8870                                                return null;
8871                                }
8872                                Environmental newTarget=getArgumentMOB(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8873                                if(newTarget==null)
8874                                        newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8875                                String amtStr=tt[2];
8876                                amtStr=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,amtStr).trim();
8877                                final boolean plus=!amtStr.startsWith("-");
8878                                if(amtStr.startsWith("+")||amtStr.startsWith("-"))
8879                                        amtStr=amtStr.substring(1).trim();
8880                                final String currency = CMLib.english().numPossibleGoldCurrency(source, amtStr);
8881                                final long amt = CMLib.english().numPossibleGold(source, amtStr);
8882                                final double denomination = CMLib.english().numPossibleGoldDenomination(source, currency, amtStr);
8883                                Container container = null;
8884                                if(newTarget instanceof Item)
8885                                {
8886                                        container = (newTarget instanceof Container)?(Container)newTarget:null;
8887                                        newTarget = ((Item)newTarget).owner();
8888                                }
8889                                if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
8890                                {
8891                                        if(plus)
8892                                                CMLib.beanCounter().giveSomeoneMoney((MOB)newTarget, currency, amt * denomination);
8893                                        else
8894                                                CMLib.beanCounter().subtractMoney((MOB)newTarget, currency, amt * denomination);
8895                                }
8896                                else
8897                                {
8898                                        if(!(newTarget instanceof Room))
8899                                                newTarget=lastKnownLocation;
8900                                        if(plus)
8901                                                CMLib.beanCounter().dropMoney((Room)newTarget, container, currency, amt * denomination);
8902                                        else
8903                                                CMLib.beanCounter().removeMoney((Room)newTarget, container, currency, amt * denomination);
8904                                }
8905                                break;
8906                        }
8907                        case 59: // mpquestpoints
8908                        {
8909                                if(tt==null)
8910                                {
8911                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
8912                                        if(tt==null)
8913                                                return null;
8914                                }
8915                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8916                                final String val=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]).trim();
8917                                if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
8918                                {
8919                                        if(CMath.isNumber(val))
8920                                        {
8921                                                final int ival=CMath.s_int(val);
8922                                                final int aval=ival-((MOB)newTarget).getQuestPoint();
8923                                                ((MOB)newTarget).setQuestPoint(CMath.s_int(val));
8924                                                if(aval>0)
8925                                                        CMLib.players().bumpPrideStat((MOB)newTarget,PrideStat.QUESTPOINTS_EARNED, aval);
8926                                        }
8927                                        else
8928                                        if(val.startsWith("++")&&(CMath.isNumber(val.substring(2).trim())))
8929                                        {
8930                                                ((MOB)newTarget).setQuestPoint(((MOB)newTarget).getQuestPoint()+CMath.s_int(val.substring(2).trim()));
8931                                                CMLib.players().bumpPrideStat((MOB)newTarget,PrideStat.QUESTPOINTS_EARNED, CMath.s_int(val.substring(2).trim()));
8932                                        }
8933                                        else
8934                                        if(val.startsWith("--")&&(CMath.isNumber(val.substring(2).trim())))
8935                                                ((MOB)newTarget).setQuestPoint(((MOB)newTarget).getQuestPoint()-CMath.s_int(val.substring(2).trim()));
8936                                        else
8937                                                logError(scripted,"QUESTPOINTS","Syntax","Bad syntax "+val+" for "+scripted.Name());
8938                                }
8939                                break;
8940                        }
8941                        case 65: // MPQSET
8942                        {
8943                                if(tt==null)
8944                                {
8945                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cccr");
8946                                        if(tt==null)
8947                                                return null;
8948                                }
8949                                final String qstr=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
8950                                final String var=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
8951                                final PhysicalAgent obj=getArgumentItem(tt[3],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
8952                                String val=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
8953                                final Quest Q=getQuest(qstr);
8954                                if(Q==null)
8955                                        logError(scripted,"MPQSET","Syntax","Unknown quest "+qstr+" for "+scripted.Name());
8956                                else
8957                                if(var.equalsIgnoreCase("QUESTOBJ"))
8958                                {
8959                                        if(obj==null)
8960                                                logError(scripted,"MPQSET","Syntax","Unknown object "+tt[3]+" for "+scripted.Name());
8961                                        else
8962                                        {
8963                                                obj.basePhyStats().setDisposition(obj.basePhyStats().disposition()|PhyStats.IS_UNSAVABLE);
8964                                                obj.recoverPhyStats();
8965                                                Q.runtimeRegisterObject(obj);
8966                                        }
8967                                }
8968                                else
