8969                                if(var.equalsIgnoreCase("STATISTICS")&&(val.equalsIgnoreCase("ACCEPTED")))
8970                                        CMLib.coffeeTables().bump(Q,CoffeeTableRow.STAT_QUESTACCEPTED);
8971                                else
8972                                if(var.equalsIgnoreCase("STATISTICS")&&(val.equalsIgnoreCase("SUCCESS")||val.equalsIgnoreCase("WON")))
8973                                        CMLib.coffeeTables().bump(Q,CoffeeTableRow.STAT_QUESTSUCCESS);
8974                                else
8975                                if(var.equalsIgnoreCase("STATISTICS")&&(val.equalsIgnoreCase("FAILED")))
8976                                        CMLib.coffeeTables().bump(Q,CoffeeTableRow.STAT_QUESTFAILED);
8977                                else
8978                                {
8979                                        if(val.equals("++"))
8980                                                val=""+(CMath.s_int(Q.getStat(var))+1);
8981                                        if(val.equals("--"))
8982                                                val=""+(CMath.s_int(Q.getStat(var))-1);
8983                                        Q.setStat(var,val);
8984                                }
8985                                break;
8986                        }
8987                        case 66: // MPLOG
8988                        {
8989                                if(tt==null)
8990                                {
8991                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"CCcr");
8992                                        if(tt==null)
8993                                                return null;
8994                                }
8995                                final String type=tt[1];
8996                                final String head=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
8997                                final String val=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
8998                                if(type.startsWith("E"))
8999                                        Log.errOut("Script","["+head+"] "+val);
9000                                else
9001                                if(type.startsWith("I")||type.startsWith("S"))
9002                                        Log.infoOut("Script","["+head+"] "+val);
9003                                else
9004                                if(type.startsWith("D"))
9005                                        Log.debugOut("Script","["+head+"] "+val);
9006                                else
9007                                        logError(scripted,"MPLOG","Syntax","Unknown log type "+type+" for "+scripted.Name());
9008                                break;
9009                        }
9010                        case 67: // MPCHANNEL
9011                        {
9012                                if(tt==null)
9013                                {
9014                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
9015                                        if(tt==null)
9016                                                return null;
9017                                }
9018                                String channel=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9019                                final boolean sysmsg=channel.startsWith("!");
9020                                if(sysmsg)
9021                                        channel=channel.substring(1);
9022                                final String val=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
9023                                if(CMLib.channels().getChannelCodeNumber(channel)<0)
9024                                        logError(scripted,"MPCHANNEL","Syntax","Unknown channel "+channel+" for "+scripted.Name());
9025                                else
9026                                        CMLib.commands().postChannel(monster,channel,val,sysmsg);
9027                                break;
9028                        }
9029                        case 68: // MPUNLOADSCRIPT
9030                        {
9031                                if(tt==null)
9032                                {
9033                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cc");
9034                                        if(tt==null)
9035                                                return null;
9036                                }
9037                                String scriptname=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9038                                if(!new CMFile(Resources.makeFileResourceName(scriptname),null,CMFile.FLAG_FORCEALLOW).exists())
9039                                        logError(scripted,"MPUNLOADSCRIPT","Runtime","File does not exist: "+Resources.makeFileResourceName(scriptname));
9040                                else
9041                                {
9042                                        final ArrayList<String> delThese=new ArrayList<String>();
9043                                        scriptname=scriptname.toUpperCase().trim();
9044                                        final String parmname=scriptname;
9045                                        for(final Iterator<String> k = Resources.findResourceKeys(parmname);k.hasNext();)
9046                                        {
9047                                                final String key=k.next();
9048                                                if(key.startsWith("PARSEDPRG: ")&&(key.toUpperCase().endsWith(parmname)))
9049                                                {
9050                                                        delThese.add(key);
9051                                                }
9052                                        }
9053                                        for(int i=0;i<delThese.size();i++)
9054                                                Resources.removeResource(delThese.get(i));
9055                                }
9056
9057                                break;
9058                        }
9059                        case 60: // MPTRAINS
9060                        {
9061                                if(tt==null)
9062                                {
9063                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
9064                                        if(tt==null)
9065                                                return null;
9066                                }
9067                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9068                                final String val=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]).trim();
9069                                if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
9070                                {
9071                                        if(CMath.isNumber(val))
9072                                                ((MOB)newTarget).setTrains(CMath.s_int(val));
9073                                        else
9074                                        if(val.startsWith("++")&&(CMath.isNumber(val.substring(2).trim())))
9075                                                ((MOB)newTarget).setTrains(((MOB)newTarget).getTrains()+CMath.s_int(val.substring(2).trim()));
9076                                        else
9077                                        if(val.startsWith("--")&&(CMath.isNumber(val.substring(2).trim())))
9078                                                ((MOB)newTarget).setTrains(((MOB)newTarget).getTrains()-CMath.s_int(val.substring(2).trim()));
9079                                        else
9080                                                logError(scripted,"TRAINS","Syntax","Bad syntax "+val+" for "+scripted.Name());
9081                                }
9082                                break;
9083                        }
9084                        case 61: // mppracs
9085                        {
9086                                if(tt==null)
9087                                {
9088                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
9089                                        if(tt==null)
9090                                                return null;
9091                                }
9092                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9093                                final String val=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]).trim();
9094                                if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
9095                                {
9096                                        if(CMath.isNumber(val))
9097                                                ((MOB)newTarget).setPractices(CMath.s_int(val));
9098                                        else
9099                                        if(val.startsWith("++")&&(CMath.isNumber(val.substring(2).trim())))
9100                                                ((MOB)newTarget).setPractices(((MOB)newTarget).getPractices()+CMath.s_int(val.substring(2).trim()));
9101                                        else
9102                                        if(val.startsWith("--")&&(CMath.isNumber(val.substring(2).trim())))
9103                                                ((MOB)newTarget).setPractices(((MOB)newTarget).getPractices()-CMath.s_int(val.substring(2).trim()));
9104                                        else
9105                                                logError(scripted,"PRACS","Syntax","Bad syntax "+val+" for "+scripted.Name());
9106                                }
9107                                break;
9108                        }
9109                        case 5: // mpmload
9110                        {
9111                                if(tt==null)
9112                                {
9113                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9114                                        if(tt==null)
9115                                                return null;
9116                                }
9117                                final String name=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9118                                final ArrayList<Environmental> Ms=new ArrayList<Environmental>();
9119                                MOB m=CMClass.getMOB(name);
9120                                if(m!=null)
9121                                        Ms.add(m);
9122                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9123                                {
9124                                        if(Ms.size()==0)
9125                                                findSomethingCalledThis(name,monster,lastKnownLocation,Ms,true);
9126                                        for(int i=0;i<Ms.size();i++)
9127                                        {
9128                                                if(Ms.get(i) instanceof MOB)
9129                                                {
9130                                                        m=(MOB)((MOB)Ms.get(i)).copyOf();
9131                                                        m.text();
9132                                                        m.recoverPhyStats();
9133                                                        m.recoverCharStats();
9134                                                        m.resetToMaxState();
9135                                                        m.bringToLife(lastKnownLocation,true);
9136                                                        lastLoaded=m;
9137                                                }
9138                                        }
9139                                }
9140                                break;
9141                        }
9142                        case 6: // mpoload
9143                        {
9144                                // if not mob
9145                                Physical addHere;
9146                                if(scripted instanceof MOB)
9147                                        addHere=monster;
9148                                else
9149                                if(scripted instanceof Item)
9150                                        addHere=((Item)scripted).owner();
9151                                else
9152                                if(scripted instanceof Room)
9153                                        addHere=scripted;
9154                                else
9155                                        addHere=lastKnownLocation;
9156                                if(addHere!=null)
9157                                {
9158                                        if(tt==null)
9159                                        {
9160                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9161                                                if(tt==null)
9162                                                        return null;
9163                                        }
9164                                        String name=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9165                                        final int containerIndex=name.toUpperCase().indexOf(" INTO ");
9166                                        Container container=null;
9167                                        if(containerIndex>=0)
9168                                        {
9169                                                final ArrayList<Environmental> containers=new ArrayList<Environmental>();
9170                                                findSomethingCalledThis(name.substring(containerIndex+6).trim(),monster,lastKnownLocation,containers,false);
9171                                                for(int c=0;c<containers.size();c++)
9172                                                {
9173                                                        if((containers.get(c) instanceof Container)
9174                                                        &&(((Container)containers.get(c)).capacity()>0))
9175                                                        {
9176                                                                container=(Container)containers.get(c);
9177                                                                name=name.substring(0,containerIndex).trim();
9178                                                                break;
9179                                                        }
9180                                                }
9181                                        }
9182                                        final long coins=CMLib.english().numPossibleGold(null,name);
9183                                        if(coins>0)
9184                                        {
9185                                                final String currency=CMLib.english().numPossibleGoldCurrency(scripted,name);
9186                                                final double denom=CMLib.english().numPossibleGoldDenomination(scripted,currency,name);
9187                                                final Coins C=CMLib.beanCounter().makeCurrency(currency,denom,coins);
9188                                                if(addHere instanceof MOB)
9189                                                        ((MOB)addHere).addItem(C);
9190                                                else
9191                                                if(addHere instanceof Room)
9192                                                        ((Room)addHere).addItem(C, Expire.Monster_EQ);
9193                                                C.putCoinsBack();
9194                                        }
9195                                        else
9196                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9197                                        {
9198                                                final ArrayList<Environmental> Is=new ArrayList<Environmental>();
9199                                                Item m=CMClass.getItem(name);
9200                                                if(m!=null)
9201                                                        Is.add(m);
9202                                                else
9203                                                        findSomethingCalledThis(name,monster,lastKnownLocation,Is,false);
9204                                                for(int i=0;i<Is.size();i++)
9205                                                {
9206                                                        if(Is.get(i) instanceof Item)
9207                                                        {
9208                                                                m=(Item)Is.get(i);
9209                                                                if((m!=null)
9210                                                                &&(!(m instanceof ArchonOnly)))
9211                                                                {
9212                                                                        m=(Item)m.copyOf();
9213                                                                        m.recoverPhyStats();
9214                                                                        m.setContainer(container);
9215                                                                        if(container instanceof MOB)
9216                                                                                ((MOB)container.owner()).addItem(m);
9217                                                                        else
9218                                                                        if(container instanceof Room)
9219                                                                                ((Room)container.owner()).addItem(m,ItemPossessor.Expire.Player_Drop);
9220                                                                        else
9221                                                                        if(addHere instanceof MOB)
9222                                                                                ((MOB)addHere).addItem(m);
9223                                                                        else
9224                                                                        if(addHere instanceof Room)
9225                                                                                ((Room)addHere).addItem(m, Expire.Monster_EQ);
9226                                                                        lastLoaded=m;
9227                                                                }
9228                                                        }
9229                                                }
9230                                                if(addHere instanceof MOB)
9231                                                {
9232                                                        ((MOB)addHere).recoverCharStats();
9233                                                        ((MOB)addHere).recoverMaxState();
9234                                                }
9235                                                addHere.recoverPhyStats();
9236                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9237                                        }
9238                                }
9239                                break;
9240                        }
9241                        case 41: // mpoloadroom
9242                        {
9243                                if(tt==null)
9244                                {
9245                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9246                                        if(tt==null)
9247                                                return null;
9248                                }
9249                                String name=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9250                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9251                                {
9252                                        final ArrayList<Environmental> Is=new ArrayList<Environmental>();
9253                                        final int containerIndex=name.toUpperCase().indexOf(" INTO ");
9254                                        Container container=null;
9255                                        if(containerIndex>=0)
9256                                        {
9257                                                final ArrayList<Environmental> containers=new ArrayList<Environmental>();
9258                                                findSomethingCalledThis(name.substring(containerIndex+6).trim(),null,lastKnownLocation,containers,false);
9259                                                for(int c=0;c<containers.size();c++)
9260                                                {
9261                                                        if((containers.get(c) instanceof Container)
9262                                                        &&(((Container)containers.get(c)).capacity()>0))
9263                                                        {
9264                                                                container=(Container)containers.get(c);
9265                                                                name=name.substring(0,containerIndex).trim();
9266                                                                break;
9267                                                        }
9268                                                }
9269                                        }
9270                                        final long coins=CMLib.english().numPossibleGold(null,name);
9271                                        if(coins>0)
9272                                        {
9273                                                final String currency=CMLib.english().numPossibleGoldCurrency(monster,name);
9274                                                final double denom=CMLib.english().numPossibleGoldDenomination(monster,currency,name);
9275                                                final Coins C=CMLib.beanCounter().makeCurrency(currency,denom,coins);
9276                                                Is.add(C);
9277                                        }
9278                                        else
9279                                        {
9280                                                final Item I=CMClass.getItem(name);
9281                                                if(I!=null)
9282                                                        Is.add(I);
9283                                                else
9284                                                        findSomethingCalledThis(name,monster,lastKnownLocation,Is,false);
9285                                        }
9286                                        for(int i=0;i<Is.size();i++)
9287                                        {
9288                                                if(Is.get(i) instanceof Item)
9289                                                {
9290                                                        Item I=(Item)Is.get(i);
9291                                                        if((I!=null)
9292                                                        &&(!(I instanceof ArchonOnly)))
9293                                                        {
9294                                                                I=(Item)I.copyOf();
9295                                                                I.recoverPhyStats();
9296                                                                lastKnownLocation.addItem(I,ItemPossessor.Expire.Monster_EQ);
9297                                                                I.setContainer(container);
9298                                                                if(I instanceof Coins)
9299                                                                        ((Coins)I).putCoinsBack();
9300                                                                if(I instanceof RawMaterial)
9301                                                                        ((RawMaterial)I).rebundle();
9302                                                                lastLoaded=I;
9303                                                        }
9304                                                }
9305                                        }
9306                                        lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9307                                }
9308                                break;
9309                        }
9310                        case 84: // mpoloadshop
9311                        {
9312                                // if not mob
9313                                ShopKeeper addHere = CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(scripted);
9314                                if((addHere == null)&&(scripted instanceof Item))
9315                                        addHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((Item)scripted).owner());
9316                                if((addHere == null)&&(scripted instanceof MOB))
9317                                        addHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((MOB)scripted).location());
9318                                if(addHere == null)
9319                                        addHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(lastKnownLocation);
9320                                if(addHere!=null)
9321                                {
9322                                        if(tt==null)
9323                                        {
9324                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9325                                                if(tt==null)
9326                                                        return null;
9327                                        }
9328                                        String name=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9329                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9330                                        {
9331                                                final ArrayList<Environmental> Is=new ArrayList<Environmental>();
9332                                                int price=-1;
9333                                                if((price = name.indexOf(" PRICE="))>=0)
9334                                                {
9335                                                        final String rest = name.substring(price+7).trim();
9336                                                        name=name.substring(0,price).trim();
9337                                                        if(CMath.isInteger(rest))
9338                                                                price=CMath.s_int(rest);
9339                                                }
9340                                                Item I=CMClass.getItem(name);
9341                                                if(I!=null)
9342                                                        Is.add(I);
9343                                                else
9344                                                        findSomethingCalledThis(name,monster,lastKnownLocation,Is,false);
9345                                                for(int i=0;i<Is.size();i++)
9346                                                {
9347                                                        if(Is.get(i) instanceof Item)
9348                                                        {
9349                                                                I=(Item)Is.get(i);
9350                                                                if((I!=null)
9351                                                                &&(!(I instanceof ArchonOnly)))
9352                                                                {
9353                                                                        I=(Item)I.copyOf();
9354                                                                        I.recoverPhyStats();
9355                                                                        final CoffeeShop shop = addHere.getShop();
9356                                                                        if(shop != null)
9357                                                                        {
9358                                                                                final Environmental E=shop.addStoreInventory(I,1,price);
9359                                                                                if(E!=null)
9360                                                                                        setShopPrice(addHere, E, tmp);
9361                                                                        }
9362                                                                        I.destroy();
9363                                                                }
9364                                                        }
9365                                                }
9366                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9367                                        }
9368                                }
9369                                break;
9370                        }
9371                        case 85: // mpmloadshop
9372                        {
9373                                // if not mob
9374                                ShopKeeper addHere = CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(scripted);
9375                                if((addHere == null)&&(scripted instanceof Item))
9376                                        addHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((Item)scripted).owner());
9377                                if((addHere == null)&&(scripted instanceof MOB))
9378                                        addHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(((MOB)scripted).location());
9379                                if(addHere == null)
9380                                        addHere=CMLib.coffeeShops().getShopKeeper(lastKnownLocation);
9381                                if(addHere!=null)
9382                                {
9383                                        if(tt==null)
9384                                        {
9385                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9386                                                if(tt==null)
9387                                                        return null;
9388                                        }
9389                                        String name=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9390                                        int price=-1;
9391                                        if((price = name.indexOf(" PRICE="))>=0)
9392                                        {
9393                                                final String rest = name.substring(price+7).trim();
9394                                                name=name.substring(0,price).trim();
9395                                                if(CMath.isInteger(rest))
9396                                                        price=CMath.s_int(rest);
9397                                        }
9398                                        final ArrayList<Environmental> Ms=new ArrayList<Environmental>();
9399                                        MOB m=CMClass.getMOB(name);
9400                                        if(m!=null)
9401                                                Ms.add(m);
9402                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9403                                        {
9404                                                if(Ms.size()==0)
9405                                                        findSomethingCalledThis(name,monster,lastKnownLocation,Ms,true);
9406                                                for(int i=0;i<Ms.size();i++)
9407                                                {
9408                                                        if(Ms.get(i) instanceof MOB)
9409                                                        {
9410                                                                m=(MOB)((MOB)Ms.get(i)).copyOf();
9411                                                                m.text();
9412                                                                m.recoverPhyStats();
9413                                                                m.recoverCharStats();
9414                                                                m.resetToMaxState();
9415                                                                final CoffeeShop shop = addHere.getShop();
9416                                                                if(shop != null)
9417                                                                {
9418                                                                        final Environmental E=shop.addStoreInventory(m,1,price);
9419                                                                        if(E!=null)
9420                                                                                setShopPrice(addHere, E, tmp);
9421                                                                }
9422                                                                m.destroy();
9423                                                        }
9424                                                }
9425                                        }
9426                                }
9427                                break;
9428                        }
9429                        case 42: // mphide
9430                        {
9431                                if(tt==null)
9432                                {
9433                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9434                                        if(tt==null)
9435                                                return null;
9436                                }
9437                                final Physical newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9438                                if(newTarget!=null)
9439                                {
9440                                        newTarget.basePhyStats().setDisposition(newTarget.basePhyStats().disposition()|PhyStats.IS_NOT_SEEN);
9441                                        newTarget.recoverPhyStats();
9442                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9443                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9444                                }
9445                                break;
9446                        }
9447                        case 58: // mpreset
9448                        {
9449                                if(tt==null)
9450                                {
9451                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9452                                        if(tt==null)
9453                                                return null;
9454                                }
9455                                final String arg=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9456                                if(arg.equalsIgnoreCase("area"))
9457                                {
9458                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9459                                                CMLib.map().resetArea(lastKnownLocation.getArea());
9460                                }
9461                                else
9462                                if(arg.equalsIgnoreCase("room"))
9463                                {
9464                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9465                                                CMLib.map().resetRoom(lastKnownLocation, true);
9466                                }
9467                                else
9468                                {
9469                                        final Room R=CMLib.map().getRoom(arg);
9470                                        if(R!=null)
9471                                                CMLib.map().resetRoom(R, true);
9472                                        else
9473                                        {
9474                                                final Area A=CMLib.map().findArea(arg);
9475                                                if(A!=null)
9476                                                        CMLib.map().resetArea(A);
9477                                                else
9478                                                        logError(scripted,"MPRESET","Syntax","Unknown location: "+arg+" for "+scripted.Name());
9479                                        }
9480                                }
9481                                break;
9482                        }
9483                        case 71: // mprejuv
9484                        {
9485                                if(tt==null)
9486                                {
9487                                        final String rest=CMParms.getPastBitClean(s,1);
9488                                        if(rest.equals("item")||rest.equals("items"))
9489                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
9490                                        else
9491                                        if(rest.equals("mob")||rest.equals("mobs"))
9492                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
9493                                        else
9494                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9495                                        if(tt==null)
9496                                                return null;
9497                                }
9498                                final String next=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9499                                String rest="";
9500                                if(tt.length>2)
9501                                        rest=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
9502                                int tickID=-1;
9503                                if(rest.equalsIgnoreCase("item")||rest.equalsIgnoreCase("items"))
9504                                        tickID=Tickable.TICKID_ROOM_ITEM_REJUV;
9505                                else
9506                                if(rest.equalsIgnoreCase("mob")||rest.equalsIgnoreCase("mobs"))
9507                                        tickID=Tickable.TICKID_MOB;
9508                                if(next.equalsIgnoreCase("area"))
9509                                {
9510                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9511                                                for(final Enumeration<Room> e=lastKnownLocation.getArea().getProperMap();e.hasMoreElements();)
9512                                                        CMLib.threads().rejuv(e.nextElement(),tickID);
9513                                }
9514                                else
9515                                if(next.equalsIgnoreCase("room"))
9516                                {
9517                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9518                                                CMLib.threads().rejuv(lastKnownLocation,tickID);
9519                                }
9520                                else
9521                                {
9522                                        final Room R=CMLib.map().getRoom(next);
9523                                        if(R!=null)
9524                                                CMLib.threads().rejuv(R,tickID);
9525                                        else
9526                                        {
9527                                                final Area A=CMLib.map().findArea(next);
9528                                                if(A!=null)
9529                                                {
9530                                                        for(final Enumeration e=A.getProperMap();e.hasMoreElements();)
9531                                                                CMLib.threads().rejuv((Room)e.nextElement(),tickID);
9532                                                }
9533                                                else
9534                                                        logError(scripted,"MPREJUV","Syntax","Unknown location: "+next+" for "+scripted.Name());
9535                                        }
9536                                }
9537                                break;
9538                        }
9539                        case 56: // mpstop
9540                        {
9541                                if(tt==null)
9542                                {
9543                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9544                                        if(tt==null)
9545                                                return null;
9546                                }
9547                                final Vector<MOB> V=new Vector<MOB>();
9548                                final String who=tt[1];
9549                                if(who.equalsIgnoreCase("all"))
9550                                {
9551                                        for(int i=0;i<lastKnownLocation.numInhabitants();i++)
9552                                                V.addElement(lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(i));
9553                                }
9554                                else
9555                                {
9556                                        final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(who,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9557                                        if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
9558                                                V.addElement((MOB)newTarget);
9559                                }
9560                                for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
9561                                {
9562                                        final Environmental newTarget=V.elementAt(v);
9563                                        if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
9564                                        {
9565                                                final MOB mob=(MOB)newTarget;
9566                                                Ability A=null;
9567                                                for(int a=mob.numEffects()-1;a>=0;a--)
9568                                                {
9569                                                        A=mob.fetchEffect(a);
9570                                                        if((A!=null)
9571                                                        &&((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_ACODES)==Ability.ACODE_COMMON_SKILL)
9572                                                        &&(A.canBeUninvoked())
9573                                                        &&(!A.isAutoInvoked()))
9574                                                                A.unInvoke();
9575                                                }
9576                                                mob.makePeace(false);
9577                                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9578                                                        lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9579                                        }
9580                                }
9581                                break;
9582                        }
9583                        case 43: // mpunhide
9584                        {
9585                                if(tt==null)
9586                                {
9587                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9588                                        if(tt==null)
9589                                                return null;
9590                                }
9591                                final Physical newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9592                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(CMath.bset(newTarget.basePhyStats().disposition(),PhyStats.IS_NOT_SEEN)))
9593                                {
9594                                        newTarget.basePhyStats().setDisposition(newTarget.basePhyStats().disposition()-PhyStats.IS_NOT_SEEN);
9595                                        newTarget.recoverPhyStats();
9596                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9597                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9598                                }
9599                                break;
9600                        }
9601                        case 44: // mpopen
9602                        {
9603                                if(tt==null)
9604                                {
9605                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9606                                        if(tt==null)
9607                                                return null;
9608                                }
9609                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9610                                if((newTarget instanceof Exit)&&(((Exit)newTarget).hasADoor()))
9611                                {
9612                                        final Exit E=(Exit)newTarget;
9613                                        E.setDoorsNLocks(E.hasADoor(),true,E.defaultsClosed(),E.hasALock(),false,E.defaultsLocked());
9614                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9615                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9616                                }
9617                                else
9618                                if((newTarget instanceof Container)&&(((Container)newTarget).hasADoor()))
9619                                {
9620                                        final Container E=(Container)newTarget;
9621                                        E.setDoorsNLocks(E.hasADoor(),true,E.defaultsClosed(),E.hasALock(),false,E.defaultsLocked());
9622                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9623                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9624                                }
9625                                break;
9626                        }
9627                        case 45: // mpclose
9628                        {
9629                                if(tt==null)
9630                                {
9631                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9632                                        if(tt==null)
9633                                                return null;
9634                                }
9635                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9636                                if((newTarget instanceof Exit)
9637                                &&(((Exit)newTarget).hasADoor())
9638                                &&(((Exit)newTarget).isOpen()))
9639                                {
9640                                        final Exit E=(Exit)newTarget;
9641                                        E.setDoorsNLocks(E.hasADoor(),false,E.defaultsClosed(),E.hasALock(),false,E.defaultsLocked());
9642                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9643                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9644                                }
9645                                else
9646                                if((newTarget instanceof Container)
9647                                &&(((Container)newTarget).hasADoor())
9648                                &&(((Container)newTarget).isOpen()))
9649                                {
9650                                        final Container E=(Container)newTarget;
9651                                        E.setDoorsNLocks(E.hasADoor(),false,E.defaultsClosed(),E.hasALock(),false,E.defaultsLocked());
9652                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9653                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9654                                }
9655                                break;
9656                        }
9657                        case 46: // mplock
9658                        {
9659                                if(tt==null)
9660                                {
9661                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9662                                        if(tt==null)
9663                                                return null;
9664                                }
9665                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9666                                if((newTarget instanceof Exit)
9667                                &&(((Exit)newTarget).hasALock()))
9668                                {
9669                                        final Exit E=(Exit)newTarget;
9670                                        E.setDoorsNLocks(E.hasADoor(),false,E.defaultsClosed(),E.hasALock(),true,E.defaultsLocked());
9671                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9672                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9673                                }
9674                                else
9675                                if((newTarget instanceof Container)
9676                                &&(((Container)newTarget).hasALock()))
9677                                {
9678                                        final Container E=(Container)newTarget;
9679                                        E.setDoorsNLocks(E.hasADoor(),false,E.defaultsClosed(),E.hasALock(),true,E.defaultsLocked());
9680                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9681                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9682                                }
9683                                break;
9684                        }
9685                        case 47: // mpunlock
9686                        {
9687                                if(tt==null)
9688                                {
9689                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9690                                        if(tt==null)
9691                                                return null;
9692                                }
9693                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9694                                if((newTarget instanceof Exit)
9695                                &&(((Exit)newTarget).isLocked()))
9696                                {
9697                                        final Exit E=(Exit)newTarget;
9698                                        E.setDoorsNLocks(E.hasADoor(),false,E.defaultsClosed(),E.hasALock(),false,E.defaultsLocked());
9699                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9700                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9701                                }
9702                                else
9703                                if((newTarget instanceof Container)
9704                                &&(((Container)newTarget).isLocked()))
9705                                {
9706                                        final Container E=(Container)newTarget;
9707                                        E.setDoorsNLocks(E.hasADoor(),false,E.defaultsClosed(),E.hasALock(),false,E.defaultsLocked());
9708                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
9709                                                lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
9710                                }
9711                                break;
9712                        }
9713                        case 48: // return
9714                                if(tt==null)
9715                                {
9716                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
9717                                        if(tt==null)
9718                                                return null;
9719                                }
9720                                tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
9721                                return varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9722                        case 7: // mpechoat
9723                        {
9724                                if(tt==null)
9725                                {
9726                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccp");
9727                                        if(tt==null)
9728                                                return null;
9729                                }
9730                                final String parm=tt[1];
9731                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentMOB(parm,source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9732                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(lastKnownLocation!=null))
9733                                {
9734                                        if(newTarget==monster)
9735                                                lastKnownLocation.showSource(monster,null,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]));
9736                                        else
9737                                                lastKnownLocation.show(monster,newTarget,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]),CMMsg.NO_EFFECT,null);
9738                                }
9739                                else
9740                                if(parm.equalsIgnoreCase("world"))
9741                                {
9742                                        lastKnownLocation.showSource(monster,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]));
9743                                        for(final Enumeration e=CMLib.map().rooms();e.hasMoreElements();)
9744                                        {
9745                                                final Room R=(Room)e.nextElement();
9746                                                if(R.numInhabitants()>0)
9747                                                        R.showOthers(monster,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]));
9748                                        }
9749                                }
9750                                else
9751                                if(parm.equalsIgnoreCase("area")&&(lastKnownLocation!=null))
9752                                {
9753                                        lastKnownLocation.showSource(monster,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]));
9754                                        for(final Enumeration e=lastKnownLocation.getArea().getProperMap();e.hasMoreElements();)
9755                                        {
9756                                                final Room R=(Room)e.nextElement();
9757                                                if(R.numInhabitants()>0)
9758                                                        R.showOthers(monster,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]));
9759                                        }
9760                                }
9761                                else
9762                                if(CMLib.map().getRoom(parm)!=null)
9763                                        CMLib.map().getRoom(parm).show(monster,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]));
9764                                else
9765                                if(CMLib.map().findArea(parm)!=null)
9766                                {
9767                                        lastKnownLocation.showSource(monster,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]));
9768                                        for(final Enumeration e=CMLib.map().findArea(parm).getMetroMap();e.hasMoreElements();)
9769                                        {
9770                                                final Room R=(Room)e.nextElement();
9771                                                if(R.numInhabitants()>0)
9772                                                        R.showOthers(monster,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]));
9773                                        }
9774                                }
9775                                break;
9776                        }
9777                        case 8: // mpechoaround
9778                        {
9779                                if(tt==null)
9780                                {
9781                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccp");
9782                                        if(tt==null)
9783                                                return null;
9784                                }
9785                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentMOB(tt[1],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9786                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(lastKnownLocation!=null))
9787                                {
9788                                        lastKnownLocation.showOthers((MOB)newTarget,null,CMMsg.MSG_OK_ACTION,varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]));
9789                                }
9790                                break;
9791                        }
9792                        case 9: // mpcast
9793                        {
9794                                if(tt==null)
9795                                {
9796                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
9797                                        if(tt==null)
9798                                                return null;
9799                                }
9800                                final String cast=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9801                                final Physical newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[2],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9802                                Ability A=null;
9803                                if(cast!=null)
9804                                        A=CMClass.findAbility(cast);
9805                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(A!=null))
9806                                {
9807                                        A.setProficiency(100);
9808                                        A.invoke(monster,newTarget,false,0);
9809                                }
9810                                break;
9811                        }
9812                        case 30: // mpaffect
9813                        {
9814                                if(tt==null)
9815                                {
9816                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cccp");
9817                                        if(tt==null)
9818                                                return null;
9819                                }
9820                                final String cast=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9821                                final Physical newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[2],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9822                                final String m2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
9823                                Ability A=null;
9824                                if(cast!=null)
9825                                        A=CMClass.findAbility(cast);
9826                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(A!=null))
9827                                {
9828                                        if((newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(!((MOB)newTarget).isMonster()))
9829                                                Log.sysOut("Scripting",newTarget.Name()+" was MPAFFECTED by "+A.Name());
9830                                        A.setMiscText(m2);
9831                                        if((A.classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_ACODES)==Ability.ACODE_PROPERTY)
9832                                                newTarget.addNonUninvokableEffect(A);
9833                                        else
9834                                                A.invoke(monster,CMParms.parse(m2),newTarget,true,0);
9835                                }
9836                                break;
9837                        }
9838                        case 80: // mpspeak
9839                        {
9840                                if(tt==null)
9841                                {
9842                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
9843                                        if(tt==null)
9844                                                return null;
9845                                }
9846                                final String language=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
9847                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentMOB(tt[1],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9848                                final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility(language);
9849                                if((A instanceof Language)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
9850                                {
9851                                        ((Language)A).setProficiency(100);
9852                                        ((Language)A).autoInvocation((MOB)newTarget, false);
9853                                        final Ability langA=((MOB)newTarget).fetchEffect(A.ID());
9854                                        if(langA!=null)
9855                                        {
9856                                                if(((MOB)newTarget).isMonster())
9857                                                        langA.setProficiency(100);
9858                                                langA.invoke((MOB)newTarget,CMParms.parse(""),(MOB)newTarget,false,0);
9859                                        }
9860                                        else
9861                                                A.invoke((MOB)newTarget,CMParms.parse(""),(MOB)newTarget,false,0);
9862                                }
9863                                break;
9864                        }
9865                        case 81: // mpsetclan
9866                        {
9867                                if(tt==null)
9868                                {
9869                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cccr");
9870                                        if(tt==null)
9871                                                return null;
9872                                }
9873                                final PhysicalAgent newTarget=getArgumentMOB(tt[1],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9874                                final String clan=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
9875                                final String roleStr=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
9876                                Clan C=CMLib.clans().getClan(clan);
9877                                if(C==null)
9878                                        C=CMLib.clans().findClan(clan);
9879                                if((newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(C!=null))
9880                                {
9881                                        int role=Integer.MIN_VALUE;
9882                                        if(CMath.isInteger(roleStr))
9883                                                role=CMath.s_int(roleStr);
9884                                        else
9885                                        for(int i=0;i<C.getRolesList().length;i++)
9886                                        {
9887                                                if(roleStr.equalsIgnoreCase(C.getRolesList()[i]))
9888                                                        role=i;
9889                                        }
9890                                        if(role!=Integer.MIN_VALUE)
9891                                        {
9892                                                if(((MOB)newTarget).isPlayer())
9893                                                        C.addMember((MOB)newTarget, role);
9894                                                else
9895                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).setClan(C.clanID(), role);
9896                                        }
9897                                }
9898                                break;
9899                        }
9900                        case 31: // mpbehave
9901                        {
9902                                if(tt==null)
9903                                {
9904                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cccp");
9905                                        if(tt==null)
9906                                                return null;
9907                                }
9908                                String cast=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
9909                                final PhysicalAgent newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[2],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9910                                final String m2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
9911                                Behavior B=null;
9912                                final Behavior B2=(cast==null)?null:CMClass.findBehavior(cast);
9913                                if(B2!=null)
9914                                        cast=B2.ID();
9915                                if((cast!=null)&&(newTarget!=null))
9916                                {
9917                                        B=newTarget.fetchBehavior(cast);
9918                                        if(B==null)
9919                                                B=CMClass.getBehavior(cast);
9920                                }
9921                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(B!=null))
9922                                {
9923                                        if((newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(!((MOB)newTarget).isMonster()))
9924                                                Log.sysOut("Scripting",newTarget.Name()+" was MPBEHAVED with "+B.name());
9925                                        B.setParms(m2);
9926                                        if(newTarget.fetchBehavior(B.ID())==null)
9927                                        {
9928                                                newTarget.addBehavior(B);
9929                                                if((defaultQuestName()!=null)&&(defaultQuestName().length()>0))
9930                                                B.registerDefaultQuest(defaultQuestName());
9931                                        }
9932                                }
9933                                break;
9934                        }
9935                        case 72: // mpscript
9936                        {
9937                                if(tt==null)
9938                                {
9939                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccp");
9940                                        if(tt==null)
9941                                                return null;
9942                                }
9943                                final PhysicalAgent newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
9944                                String m2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
9945                                boolean proceed=true;
9946                                boolean savable=false;
9947                                boolean execute=false;
9948                                String scope=getVarScope();
9949                                while(proceed)
9950                                {
9951                                        proceed=false;
9952                                        if(m2.toUpperCase().startsWith("SAVABLE"))
9953                                        {
9954                                                savable=true;
9955                                                m2=m2.substring(8).trim();
9956                                                proceed=true;
9957                                        }
9958                                        else
9959                                        if(m2.toUpperCase().startsWith("EXECUTE"))
9960                                        {
9961                                                execute=true;
9962                                                m2=m2.substring(8).trim();
9963                                                proceed=true;
9964                                        }
9965                                        else
9966                                        if(m2.toUpperCase().startsWith("GLOBAL"))
9967                                        {
9968                                                scope="";
9969                                                proceed=true;
9970                                                m2=m2.substring(6).trim();
9971                                        }
9972                                        else
9973                                        if(m2.toUpperCase().startsWith("INDIVIDUAL")||m2.equals("*"))
9974                                        {
9975                                                scope="*";
9976                                                proceed=true;
9977                                                m2=m2.substring(10).trim();
9978                                        }
9979                                }
9980                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(m2.length()>0))
9981                                {
9982                                        if((newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(!((MOB)newTarget).isMonster()))
9983                                                Log.sysOut("Scripting",newTarget.Name()+" was MPSCRIPTED: "+defaultQuestName);
9984                                        final ScriptingEngine S=(ScriptingEngine)CMClass.getCommon("DefaultScriptingEngine");
9985                                        S.setSavable(savable);
9986                                        S.setVarScope(scope);
9987                                        S.setScript(m2);
9988                                        if((defaultQuestName()!=null)&&(defaultQuestName().length()>0))
9989                                                S.registerDefaultQuest(defaultQuestName());
9990                                        newTarget.addScript(S);
9991                                        if(execute)
9992                                        {
9993                                                S.tick(newTarget,Tickable.TICKID_MOB);
9994                                                for(int i=0;i<5;i++)
9995                                                        S.dequeResponses();
9996                                                newTarget.delScript(S);
9997                                        }
9998                                }
9999                                break;
10000                        }
10001                        case 32: // mpunbehave
10002                        {
10003                                if(tt==null)
10004                                {
10005                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
10006                                        if(tt==null)
10007                                                return null;
10008                                }
10009                                String cast=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
10010                                final PhysicalAgent newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[2],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10011                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(cast!=null))
10012                                {
10013                                        Behavior B=CMClass.findBehavior(cast);
10014                                        if(B!=null)
10015                                                cast=B.ID();
10016                                        B=newTarget.fetchBehavior(cast);
10017                                        if(B!=null)
10018                                                newTarget.delBehavior(B);
10019                                        if((newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(!((MOB)newTarget).isMonster())&&(B!=null))
10020                                                Log.sysOut("Scripting",newTarget.Name()+" was MPUNBEHAVED with "+B.name());
10021                                }
10022                                break;
10023                        }
10024                        case 33: // mptattoo
10025                        {
10026                                if(tt==null)
10027                                {
10028                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
10029                                        if(tt==null)
10030                                                return null;
10031                                }
10032                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10033                                String tattooName=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
10034                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(tattooName.length()>0)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
10035                                {
10036                                        final MOB themob=(MOB)newTarget;
10037                                        final boolean tattooMinus=tattooName.startsWith("-");
10038                                        if(tattooMinus)
10039                                                tattooName=tattooName.substring(1);
10040                                        final Tattoo pT=((Tattoo)CMClass.getCommon("DefaultTattoo")).parse(tattooName);
10041                                        final Tattoo T=themob.findTattoo(pT.getTattooName());
10042                                        if(T!=null)
10043                                        {
10044                                                if(tattooMinus)
10045                                                        themob.delTattoo(T);
10046                                        }
10047                                        else
10048                                        if(!tattooMinus)
10049                                                themob.addTattoo(pT);
10050                                }
10051                                break;
10052                        }
10053                        case 83: // mpacctattoo
10054                        {
10055                                if(tt==null)
10056                                {
10057                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
10058                                        if(tt==null)
10059                                                return null;
10060                                }
10061                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10062                                String tattooName=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
10063                                if((newTarget!=null)
10064                                &&(tattooName.length()>0)
10065                                &&(newTarget instanceof MOB)
10066                                &&(((MOB)newTarget).playerStats()!=null)
10067                                &&(((MOB)newTarget).playerStats().getAccount()!=null))
10068                                {
10069                                        final Tattooable themob=((MOB)newTarget).playerStats().getAccount();
10070                                        final boolean tattooMinus=tattooName.startsWith("-");
10071                                        if(tattooMinus)
10072                                                tattooName=tattooName.substring(1);
10073                                        final Tattoo pT=((Tattoo)CMClass.getCommon("DefaultTattoo")).parse(tattooName);
10074                                        final Tattoo T=themob.findTattoo(pT.getTattooName());
10075                                        if(T!=null)
10076                                        {
10077                                                if(tattooMinus)
10078                                                        themob.delTattoo(T);
10079                                        }
10080                                        else
10081                                        if(!tattooMinus)
10082                                                themob.addTattoo(pT);
10083                                }
10084                                break;
10085                        }
10086                        case 55: // mpnotrigger
10087                        {
10088                                if(tt==null)
10089                                {
10090                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
10091                                        if(tt==null)
10092                                                return null;
10093                                }
10094                                final String trigger=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
10095                                final String time=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
10096                                int triggerCode=-1;
