10097                                for(int i=0;i<progs.length;i++)
10098                                {
10099                                        if(trigger.equalsIgnoreCase(progs[i]))
10100                                                triggerCode=i;
10101                                }
10102                                if(triggerCode<0)
10103                                        logError(scripted,"MPNOTRIGGER","RunTime",trigger+" is not a valid trigger name.");
10104                                else
10105                                if(!CMath.isInteger(time.trim()))
10106                                        logError(scripted,"MPNOTRIGGER","RunTime",time+" is not a valid milisecond time.");
10107                                else
10108                                {
10109                                        noTrigger.remove(Integer.valueOf(triggerCode));
10110                                        noTrigger.put(Integer.valueOf(triggerCode),Long.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis()+CMath.s_long(time.trim())));
10111                                }
10112                                break;
10113                        }
10114                        case 54: // mpfaction
10115                        {
10116                                if(tt==null)
10117                                {
10118                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cccr");
10119                                        if(tt==null)
10120                                                return null;
10121                                }
10122                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentMOB(tt[1],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10123                                final String faction=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
10124                                String range=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]).trim();
10125                                final Faction F=CMLib.factions().getFaction(faction);
10126                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(F!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
10127                                {
10128                                        final MOB themob=(MOB)newTarget;
10129                                        int curFaction = themob.fetchFaction(F.factionID());
10130                                        if((curFaction == Integer.MAX_VALUE)||(curFaction == Integer.MIN_VALUE))
10131                                                curFaction = F.findDefault(themob);
10132                                        if((range.startsWith("--"))&&(CMath.isInteger(range.substring(2).trim())))
10133                                        {
10134                                                final int amt=CMath.s_int(range.substring(2).trim());
10135                                                themob.tell(L("You lose @x1 faction with @x2.",""+amt,F.name()));
10136                                                range=""+(curFaction-amt);
10137                                        }
10138                                        else
10139                                        if((range.startsWith("+"))&&(CMath.isInteger(range.substring(1).trim())))
10140                                        {
10141                                                final int amt=CMath.s_int(range.substring(1).trim());
10142                                                themob.tell(L("You gain @x1 faction with @x2.",""+amt,F.name()));
10143                                                range=""+(curFaction+amt);
10144                                        }
10145                                        else
10146                                        if(CMath.isInteger(range))
10147                                                themob.tell(L("Your faction with @x1 is now @x2.",F.name(),""+CMath.s_int(range.trim())));
10148
10149                                        if(CMath.isInteger(range))
10150                                                themob.addFaction(F.factionID(),CMath.s_int(range.trim()));
10151                                        else
10152                                        {
10153                                                Faction.FRange FR=null;
10154                                                final Enumeration<Faction.FRange> e=CMLib.factions().getRanges(CMLib.factions().AlignID());
10155                                                if(e!=null)
10156                                                for(;e.hasMoreElements();)
10157                                                {
10158                                                        final Faction.FRange FR2=e.nextElement();
10159                                                        if(FR2.name().equalsIgnoreCase(range))
10160                                                        {
10161                                                                FR = FR2;
10162                                                                break;
10163                                                        }
10164                                                }
10165                                                if(FR==null)
10166                                                        logError(scripted,"MPFACTION","RunTime",range+" is not a valid range for "+F.name()+".");
10167                                                else
10168                                                {
10169                                                        themob.tell(L("Your faction with @x1 is now @x2.",F.name(),FR.name()));
10170                                                        themob.addFaction(F.factionID(),FR.low()+((FR.high()-FR.low())/2));
10171                                                }
10172                                        }
10173                                }
10174                                break;
10175                        }
10176                        case 49: // mptitle
10177                        {
10178                                if(tt==null)
10179                                {
10180                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
10181                                        if(tt==null)
10182                                                return null;
10183                                }
10184                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10185                                String titleStr=varify(monster, newTarget, scripted, monster, secondaryItem, secondaryItem, msg, tmp, tt[2]);
10186                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(titleStr.length()>0)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
10187                                {
10188                                        final MOB themob=(MOB)newTarget;
10189                                        final boolean tattooMinus=titleStr.startsWith("-");
10190                                        if(tattooMinus)
10191                                                titleStr=titleStr.substring(1);
10192                                        if(themob.playerStats()!=null)
10193                                        {
10194                                                if(themob.playerStats().getTitles().contains(titleStr))
10195                                                {
10196                                                        if(tattooMinus)
10197                                                                themob.playerStats().getTitles().remove(titleStr);
10198                                                }
10199                                                else
10200                                                if(!tattooMinus)
10201                                                        themob.playerStats().getTitles().add(0,titleStr);
10202                                        }
10203                                }
10204                                break;
10205                        }
10206                        case 10: // mpkill
10207                        {
10208                                if(tt==null)
10209                                {
10210                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
10211                                        if(tt==null)
10212                                                return null;
10213                                }
10214                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentMOB(tt[1],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10215                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(monster!=null))
10216                                        monster.setVictim((MOB)newTarget);
10217                                break;
10218                        }
10219                        case 51: // mpsetclandata
10220                        {
10221                                if(tt==null)
10222                                {
10223                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cccr");
10224                                        if(tt==null)
10225                                                return null;
10226                                }
10227                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10228                                String clanID=null;
10229                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
10230                                {
10231                                        Clan C=CMLib.clans().findRivalrousClan((MOB)newTarget);
10232                                        if(C==null)
10233                                                C=((MOB)newTarget).clans().iterator().hasNext()?((MOB)newTarget).clans().iterator().next().first:null;
10234                                        if(C!=null)
10235                                                clanID=C.clanID();
10236                                }
10237                                else
10238                                        clanID=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
10239                                final String clanvar=tt[2];
10240                                final String clanval=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
10241                                final Clan C=CMLib.clans().getClan(clanID);
10242                                if(C!=null)
10243                                {
10244                                        if(!C.isStat(clanvar))
10245                                                logError(scripted,"MPSETCLANDATA","RunTime",clanvar+" is not a valid clan variable.");
10246                                        else
10247                                        {
10248                                                C.setStat(clanvar,clanval.trim());
10249                                                if(C.getStat(clanvar).equalsIgnoreCase(clanval))
10250                                                        C.update();
10251                                        }
10252                                }
10253                                break;
10254                        }
10255                        case 52: // mpplayerclass
10256                        {
10257                                if(tt==null)
10258                                {
10259                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
10260                                        if(tt==null)
10261                                                return null;
10262                                }
10263                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10264                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
10265                                {
10266                                        final Vector<String> V=CMParms.parse(tt[2]);
10267                                        for(int i=0;i<V.size();i++)
10268                                        {
10269                                                if(CMath.isInteger(V.elementAt(i).trim()))
10270                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).baseCharStats().setClassLevel(((MOB)newTarget).baseCharStats().getCurrentClass(),CMath.s_int(V.elementAt(i).trim()));
10271                                                else
10272                                                {
10273                                                        final CharClass C=CMClass.findCharClass(V.elementAt(i));
10274                                                        if((C!=null)&&(C.availabilityCode()!=0))
10275                                                                ((MOB)newTarget).baseCharStats().setCurrentClass(C);
10276                                                }
10277                                        }
10278                                        ((MOB)newTarget).recoverCharStats();
10279                                }
10280                                break;
10281                        }
10282                        case 12: // mppurge
10283                        {
10284                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
10285                                {
10286                                        int flag=0;
10287                                        if(tt==null)
10288                                        {
10289                                                final String s2=CMParms.getCleanBit(s,1).toLowerCase();
10290                                                if(s2.equals("room"))
10291                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
10292                                                else
10293                                                if(s2.equals("my"))
10294                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
10295                                                else
10296                                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
10297                                                if(tt==null)
10298                                                        return null;
10299                                        }
10300                                        String s2=tt[1];
10301                                        if(s2.equalsIgnoreCase("room"))
10302                                        {
10303                                                flag=1;
10304                                                s2=tt[2];
10305                                        }
10306                                        else
10307                                        if(s2.equalsIgnoreCase("my"))
10308                                        {
10309                                                flag=2;
10310                                                s2=tt[2];
10311                                        }
10312                                        Environmental E=null;
10313                                        if(s2.equalsIgnoreCase("self")||s2.equalsIgnoreCase("me"))
10314                                                E=scripted;
10315                                        else
10316                                        if(flag==1)
10317                                        {
10318                                                s2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,s2);
10319                                                E=lastKnownLocation.fetchFromRoomFavorItems(null,s2);
10320                                        }
10321                                        else
10322                                        if(flag==2)
10323                                        {
10324                                                s2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,s2);
10325                                                if(monster!=null)
10326                                                        E=monster.findItem(s2);
10327                                        }
10328                                        else
10329                                                E=getArgumentItem(s2,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10330                                        if(E!=null)
10331                                        {
10332                                                if(E instanceof MOB)
10333                                                {
10334                                                        if(!((MOB)E).isMonster())
10335                                                        {
10336                                                                if(((MOB)E).getStartRoom()!=null)
10337                                                                        ((MOB)E).getStartRoom().bringMobHere((MOB)E,false);
10338                                                                ((MOB)E).session().stopSession(false,false,false);
10339                                                        }
10340                                                        else
10341                                                        if(((MOB)E).getStartRoom()!=null)
10342                                                                ((MOB)E).killMeDead(false);
10343                                                        else
10344                                                                ((MOB)E).destroy();
10345                                                }
10346                                                else
10347                                                if(E instanceof Item)
10348                                                {
10349                                                        final ItemPossessor oE=((Item)E).owner();
10350                                                        ((Item)E).destroy();
10351                                                        if(oE!=null)
10352                                                                oE.recoverPhyStats();
10353                                                }
10354                                        }
10355                                        lastKnownLocation.recoverRoomStats();
10356                                }
10357                                break;
10358                        }
10359                        case 14: // mpgoto
10360                        {
10361                                if(tt==null)
10362                                {
10363                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
10364                                        if(tt==null)
10365                                                return null;
10366                                }
10367                                final String roomID=tt[1].trim();
10368                                if((roomID.length()>0)&&(lastKnownLocation!=null))
10369                                {
10370                                        Room goHere=null;
10371                                        if(roomID.startsWith("$"))
10372                                                goHere=CMLib.map().roomLocation(this.getArgumentItem(roomID,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp));
10373                                        if(goHere==null)
10374                                                goHere=getRoom(varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,roomID),lastKnownLocation);
10375                                        if(goHere!=null)
10376                                        {
10377                                                if(scripted instanceof MOB)
10378                                                        goHere.bringMobHere((MOB)scripted,true);
10379                                                else
10380                                                if(scripted instanceof Item)
10381                                                        goHere.moveItemTo((Item)scripted,ItemPossessor.Expire.Player_Drop,ItemPossessor.Move.Followers);
10382                                                else
10383                                                {
10384                                                        goHere.bringMobHere(monster,true);
10385                                                        if(!(scripted instanceof MOB))
10386                                                                goHere.delInhabitant(monster);
10387                                                }
10388                                                if(CMLib.map().roomLocation(scripted)==goHere)
10389                                                        lastKnownLocation=goHere;
10390                                        }
10391                                }
10392                                break;
10393                        }
10394                        case 15: // mpat
10395                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
10396                                {
10397                                        if(tt==null)
10398                                        {
10399                                                tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccp");
10400                                                if(tt==null)
10401                                                        return null;
10402                                        }
10403                                        final Room lastPlace=lastKnownLocation;
10404                                        final String roomName=tt[1];
10405                                        if(roomName.length()>0)
10406                                        {
10407                                                final String doWhat=tt[2].trim();
10408                                                Room goHere=null;
10409                                                if(roomName.startsWith("$"))
10410                                                        goHere=CMLib.map().roomLocation(this.getArgumentItem(roomName,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp));
10411                                                if(goHere==null)
10412                                                        goHere=getRoom(varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,roomName),lastKnownLocation);
10413                                                if(goHere!=null)
10414                                                {
10415                                                        goHere.bringMobHere(monster,true);
10416                                                        final DVector DV=new DVector(2);
10417                                                        DV.addElement("",null);
10418                                                        DV.addElement(doWhat,null);
10419                                                        lastKnownLocation=goHere;
10420                                                        execute(scripted,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,DV,msg,tmp);
10421                                                        lastKnownLocation=lastPlace;
10422                                                        lastPlace.bringMobHere(monster,true);
10423                                                        if(!(scripted instanceof MOB))
10424                                                        {
10425                                                                goHere.delInhabitant(monster);
10426                                                                lastPlace.delInhabitant(monster);
10427                                                        }
10428                                                }
10429                                        }
10430                                }
10431                                break;
10432                        case 17: // mptransfer
10433                        {
10434                                if(tt==null)
10435                                {
10436                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
10437                                        if(tt==null)
10438                                                return null;
10439                                }
10440                                String mobName=tt[1];
10441                                String roomName=tt[2].trim();
10442                                Room newRoom=null;
10443                                if(roomName.startsWith("$"))
10444                                        newRoom=CMLib.map().roomLocation(this.getArgumentItem(roomName,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp));
10445                                if((roomName.length()==0)&&(lastKnownLocation!=null))
10446                                        roomName=lastKnownLocation.roomID();
10447                                if(roomName.length()>0)
10448                                {
10449                                        if(newRoom==null)
10450                                                newRoom=getRoom(varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,roomName),lastKnownLocation);
10451                                        if(newRoom!=null)
10452                                        {
10453                                                final ArrayList<Environmental> V=new ArrayList<Environmental>();
10454                                                if(mobName.startsWith("$"))
10455                                                {
10456                                                        final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(mobName,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10457                                                        if(E!=null)
10458                                                                V.add(E);
10459                                                }
10460                                                if(V.size()==0)
10461                                                {
10462                                                        mobName=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,mobName);
10463                                                        if(mobName.equalsIgnoreCase("all"))
10464                                                        {
10465                                                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
10466                                                                {
10467                                                                        for(int x=0;x<lastKnownLocation.numInhabitants();x++)
10468                                                                        {
10469                                                                                final MOB m=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(x);
10470                                                                                if((m!=null)&&(m!=monster)&&(!V.contains(m)))
10471                                                                                        V.add(m);
10472                                                                        }
10473                                                                }
10474                                                        }
10475                                                        else
10476                                                        {
10477                                                                MOB findOne=null;
10478                                                                Area A=null;
10479                                                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
10480                                                                {
10481                                                                        findOne=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(mobName);
10482                                                                        A=lastKnownLocation.getArea();
10483                                                                        if((findOne!=null)&&(findOne!=monster))
10484                                                                                V.add(findOne);
10485                                                                }
10486                                                                if(findOne==null)
10487                                                                {
10488                                                                        findOne=CMLib.players().getPlayerAllHosts(mobName);
10489                                                                        if((findOne!=null)&&(!CMLib.flags().isInTheGame(findOne,true)))
10490                                                                                findOne=null;
10491                                                                        if((findOne!=null)&&(findOne!=monster))
10492                                                                                V.add(findOne);
10493                                                                }
10494                                                                if((findOne==null)&&(A!=null))
10495                                                                {
10496                                                                        for(final Enumeration r=A.getProperMap();r.hasMoreElements();)
10497                                                                        {
10498                                                                                final Room R=(Room)r.nextElement();
10499                                                                                findOne=R.fetchInhabitant(mobName);
10500                                                                                if((findOne!=null)&&(findOne!=monster))
10501                                                                                        V.add(findOne);
10502                                                                        }
10503                                                                }
10504                                                        }
10505                                                }
10506                                                for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
10507                                                {
10508                                                        if(V.get(v) instanceof MOB)
10509                                                        {
10510                                                                final MOB mob=(MOB)V.get(v);
10511                                                                final Set<MOB> H=mob.getGroupMembers(new HashSet<MOB>());
10512                                                                for (final Object element : H)
10513                                                                {
10514                                                                        final MOB M=(MOB)element;
10515                                                                        if((!V.contains(M))&&(M.location()==mob.location()))
10516                                                                                V.add(M);
10517                                                                }
10518                                                        }
10519                                                }
10520                                                for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
10521                                                {
10522                                                        if(V.get(v) instanceof MOB)
10523                                                        {
10524                                                                final MOB follower=(MOB)V.get(v);
10525                                                                final Room thisRoom=follower.location();
10526                                                                final int dispmask=(PhyStats.IS_SLEEPING | PhyStats.IS_SITTING);
10527                                                                final int dispo1 = follower.basePhyStats().disposition() &  dispmask;
10528                                                                final int dispo2 = follower.phyStats().disposition() &  dispmask;
10529                                                                follower.basePhyStats().setDisposition(follower.basePhyStats().disposition() & (~dispmask));
10530                                                                follower.phyStats().setDisposition(follower.phyStats().disposition() & (~dispmask));
10531                                                                // scripting guide calls for NO text -- empty is probably req tho
10532                                                                final CMMsg enterMsg=CMClass.getMsg(follower,newRoom,null,CMMsg.MSG_ENTER|CMMsg.MASK_ALWAYS,null,CMMsg.MSG_ENTER,null,CMMsg.MSG_ENTER," "+CMLib.protocol().msp("appear.wav",10));
10533                                                                final CMMsg leaveMsg=CMClass.getMsg(follower,thisRoom,null,CMMsg.MSG_LEAVE|CMMsg.MASK_ALWAYS," ");
10534                                                                if((thisRoom!=null)
10535                                                                &&thisRoom.okMessage(follower,leaveMsg)
10536                                                                &&newRoom.okMessage(follower,enterMsg))
10537                                                                {
10538                                                                        if(follower.isInCombat())
10539                                                                        {
10540                                                                                CMLib.commands().postFlee(follower,("NOWHERE"));
10541                                                                                follower.makePeace(true);
10542                                                                        }
10543                                                                        thisRoom.send(follower,leaveMsg);
10544                                                                        newRoom.bringMobHere(follower,false);
10545                                                                        newRoom.send(follower,enterMsg);
10546                                                                        follower.basePhyStats().setDisposition(follower.basePhyStats().disposition() | dispo1);
10547                                                                        follower.phyStats().setDisposition(follower.phyStats().disposition() | dispo2);
10548                                                                        if(!CMLib.flags().isSleeping(follower))
10549                                                                        {
10550                                                                                follower.tell(CMLib.lang().L("\n\r\n\r"));
10551                                                                                CMLib.commands().postLook(follower,true);
10552                                                                        }
10553                                                                }
10554                                                                else
10555                                                                {
10556                                                                        follower.basePhyStats().setDisposition(follower.basePhyStats().disposition() | dispo1);
10557                                                                        follower.phyStats().setDisposition(follower.phyStats().disposition() | dispo2);
10558                                                                }
10559                                                        }
10560                                                        else
10561                                                        if((V.get(v) instanceof Item)
10562                                                        &&(newRoom!=CMLib.map().roomLocation(V.get(v))))
10563                                                                newRoom.moveItemTo((Item)V.get(v),ItemPossessor.Expire.Player_Drop,ItemPossessor.Move.Followers);
10564                                                        if(V.get(v)==scripted)
10565                                                                lastKnownLocation=newRoom;
10566                                                }
10567                                        }
10568                                }
10569                                break;
10570                        }
10571                        case 25: // mpbeacon
10572                        {
10573                                if(tt==null)
10574                                {
10575                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
10576                                        if(tt==null)
10577                                                return null;
10578                                }
10579                                final String roomName=tt[1];
10580                                Room newRoom=null;
10581                                if((roomName.length()>0)&&(lastKnownLocation!=null))
10582                                {
10583                                        final String beacon=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
10584                                        if(roomName.startsWith("$"))
10585                                                newRoom=CMLib.map().roomLocation(this.getArgumentItem(roomName,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp));
10586                                        if(newRoom==null)
10587                                                newRoom=getRoom(varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,roomName),lastKnownLocation);
10588                                        if(newRoom == null)
10589                                                logError(scripted,"MPBEACON","RunTime",tt[1]+" is not a room.");
10590                                        else
10591                                        if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
10592                                        {
10593                                                final Vector<MOB> V=new Vector<MOB>();
10594                                                if(beacon.equalsIgnoreCase("all"))
10595                                                {
10596                                                        for(int x=0;x<lastKnownLocation.numInhabitants();x++)
10597                                                        {
10598                                                                final MOB m=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(x);
10599                                                                if((m!=null)&&(m!=monster)&&(!m.isMonster())&&(!V.contains(m)))
10600                                                                        V.addElement(m);
10601                                                        }
10602                                                }
10603                                                else
10604                                                {
10605                                                        final MOB findOne=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(beacon);
10606                                                        if((findOne!=null)&&(findOne!=monster)&&(!findOne.isMonster()))
10607                                                                V.addElement(findOne);
10608                                                }
10609                                                for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
10610                                                {
10611                                                        final MOB follower=V.elementAt(v);
10612                                                        if(!follower.isMonster())
10613                                                                follower.setStartRoom(newRoom);
10614                                                }
10615                                        }
10616                                }
10617                                break;
10618                        }
10619                        case 18: // mpforce
10620                        {
10621                                if(tt==null)
10622                                {
10623                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccp");
10624                                        if(tt==null)
10625                                                return null;
10626                                }
10627                                final PhysicalAgent newTarget=getArgumentMOB(tt[1],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10628                                final String force=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]).trim();
10629                                if(newTarget!=null)
10630                                {
10631                                        final DVector vscript=new DVector(2);
10632                                        vscript.addElement("FUNCTION_PROG MPFORCE_"+System.currentTimeMillis()+Math.random(),null);
10633                                        vscript.addElement(force,null);
10634                                        // this can not be permanently parsed because it is variable
10635                                        execute(newTarget, source, target, getMakeMOB(newTarget), primaryItem, secondaryItem, vscript, msg, tmp);
10636                                }
10637                                break;
10638                        }
10639                        case 79: // mppossess
10640                        {
10641                                if(tt==null)
10642                                {
10643                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
10644                                        if(tt==null)
10645                                                return null;
10646                                }
10647                                final PhysicalAgent newSource=getArgumentMOB(tt[1],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10648                                final PhysicalAgent newTarget=getArgumentMOB(tt[2],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10649                                if((!(newSource instanceof MOB))||(((MOB)newSource).isMonster()))
10650                                        logError(scripted,"MPPOSSESS","RunTime",tt[1]+" is not a player.");
10651                                else
10652                                if((!(newTarget instanceof MOB))||(!((MOB)newTarget).isMonster())||CMSecurity.isASysOp((MOB)newTarget))
10653                                        logError(scripted,"MPPOSSESS","RunTime",tt[2]+" is not a mob.");
10654                                else
10655                                {
10656                                        final MOB mobM=(MOB)newSource;
10657                                        final MOB targetM=(MOB)newTarget;
10658                                        final Session S=mobM.session();
10659                                        S.setMob(targetM);
10660                                        targetM.setSession(S);
10661                                        targetM.setSoulMate(mobM);
10662                                        mobM.setSession(null);
10663                                }
10664                                break;
10665                        }
10666                        case 20: // mpsetvar
10667                        {
10668                                if(tt==null)
10669                                {
10670                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cccr");
10671                                        if(tt==null)
10672                                                return null;
10673                                }
10674                                String which=tt[1];
10675                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(which,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10676                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
10677                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
10678                                if(!which.equals("*"))
10679                                {
10680                                        if(E==null)
10681                                                which=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,which);
10682                                        else
10683                                        if(E instanceof Room)
10684                                                which=CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID((Room)E);
10685                                        else
10686                                                which=E.Name();
10687                                }
10688                                if((which.length()>0)&&(arg2.length()>0))
10689                                        setVar(which,arg2,arg3);
10690                                break;
10691                        }
10692                        case 36: // mpsavevar
10693                        {
10694                                if(tt==null)
10695                                {
10696                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"CcR");
10697                                        if(tt==null)
10698                                                return null;
10699                                }
10700                                String which=tt[1];
10701                                String arg2=tt[2];
10702                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(which,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10703                                which=getVarHost(E,which,source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10704                                if((which.length()>0)&&(arg2.length()>0))
10705                                {
10706                                        final DVector V=getScriptVarSet(which,arg2);
10707                                        for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
10708                                        {
10709                                                which=(String)V.elementAt(0,1);
10710                                                arg2=((String)V.elementAt(0,2)).toUpperCase();
10711                                                final Hashtable H=(Hashtable)resources._getResource("SCRIPTVAR-"+which);
10712                                                String val="";
10713                                                if(H!=null)
10714                                                {
10715                                                        val=(String)H.get(arg2);
10716                                                        if(val==null)
10717                                                                val="";
10718                                                }
10719                                                if(val.length()>0)
10720                                                        CMLib.database().DBReCreatePlayerData(which,"SCRIPTABLEVARS",which.toUpperCase()+"_SCRIPTABLEVARS_"+arg2,val);
10721                                                else
10722                                                        CMLib.database().DBDeletePlayerData(which,"SCRIPTABLEVARS",which.toUpperCase()+"_SCRIPTABLEVARS_"+arg2);
10723                                        }
10724                                }
10725                                break;
10726                        }
10727                        case 39: // mploadvar
10728                        {
10729                                if(tt==null)
10730                                {
10731                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"CcR");
10732                                        if(tt==null)
10733                                                return null;
10734                                }
10735                                String which=tt[1];
10736                                final String arg2=tt[2];
10737                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(which,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10738                                if(arg2.length()>0)
10739                                {
10740                                        List<PlayerData> V=null;
10741                                        which=getVarHost(E,which,source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10742                                        if(arg2.equals("*"))
10743                                                V=CMLib.database().DBReadPlayerData(which,"SCRIPTABLEVARS");
10744                                        else
10745                                                V=CMLib.database().DBReadPlayerData(which,"SCRIPTABLEVARS",which.toUpperCase()+"_SCRIPTABLEVARS_"+arg2);
10746                                        if((V!=null)&&(V.size()>0))
10747                                        for(int v=0;v<V.size();v++)
10748                                        {
10749                                                final DatabaseEngine.PlayerData VAR=V.get(v);
10750                                                String varName=VAR.key();
10751                                                if(varName.startsWith(which.toUpperCase()+"_SCRIPTABLEVARS_"))
10752                                                        varName=varName.substring((which+"_SCRIPTABLEVARS_").length());
10753                                                setVar(which,varName,VAR.xml());
10754                                        }
10755                                }
10756                                break;
10757                        }
10758                        case 40: // MPM2I2M
10759                        {
10760                                if(tt==null)
10761                                {
10762                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cccr");
10763                                        if(tt==null)
10764                                                return null;
10765                                }
10766                                final String arg1=tt[1];
10767                                final Environmental E=getArgumentItem(arg1,source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10768                                if(E instanceof MOB)
10769                                {
10770                                        final String arg2=tt[2];
10771                                        final String arg3=tt[3];
10772                                        final CagedAnimal caged=(CagedAnimal)CMClass.getItem("GenCaged");
10773                                        if(caged!=null)
10774                                        {
10775                                                ((Item)caged).basePhyStats().setAbility(1);
10776                                                ((Item)caged).recoverPhyStats();
10777                                        }
10778                                        if((caged!=null)&&caged.cageMe((MOB)E)&&(lastKnownLocation!=null))
10779                                        {
10780                                                if(arg2.length()>0)
10781                                                        ((Item)caged).setName(arg2);
10782                                                if(arg3.length()>0)
10783                                                        ((Item)caged).setDisplayText(arg3);
10784                                                lastKnownLocation.addItem(caged,ItemPossessor.Expire.Player_Drop);
10785                                                ((MOB)E).killMeDead(false);
10786                                        }
10787                                }
10788                                else
10789                                if(E instanceof CagedAnimal)
10790                                {
10791                                        final MOB M=((CagedAnimal)E).unCageMe();
10792                                        if((M!=null)&&(lastKnownLocation!=null))
10793                                        {
10794                                                M.bringToLife(lastKnownLocation,true);
10795                                                ((Item)E).destroy();
10796                                        }
10797                                }
10798                                else
10799                                        logError(scripted,"MPM2I2M","RunTime",arg1+" is not a mob or a caged item.");
10800                                break;
10801                        }
10802                        case 28: // mpdamage
10803                        {
10804                                if(tt==null)
10805                                {
10806                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccccr");
10807                                        if(tt==null)
10808                                                return null;
10809                                }
10810                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10811                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
10812                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
10813                                final String arg4=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[4]);
10814                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(arg2.length()>0))
10815                                {
10816                                        if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
10817                                        {
10818                                                final MOB deadM=(MOB)newTarget;
10819                                                MOB killerM=(MOB)newTarget;
10820                                                if(arg4.equalsIgnoreCase("MEKILL")||arg4.equalsIgnoreCase("ME"))
10821                                                        killerM=monster;
10822                                                final int min=CMath.s_int(arg2.trim());
10823                                                int max=CMath.s_int(arg3.trim());
10824                                                if(max<min)
10825                                                        max=min;
10826                                                if(min>0)
10827                                                {
10828                                                        int dmg=(max==min)?min:CMLib.dice().roll(1,max-min,min);
10829                                                        if((dmg>=deadM.curState().getHitPoints())
10830                                                        &&(!arg4.equalsIgnoreCase("KILL"))
10831                                                        &&(!arg4.equalsIgnoreCase("MEKILL")))
10832                                                                dmg=deadM.curState().getHitPoints()-1;
10833                                                        if(dmg>0)
10834                                                                CMLib.combat().postDamage(killerM,deadM,null,dmg,CMMsg.MASK_ALWAYS|CMMsg.TYP_CAST_SPELL,-1,null);
10835                                                }
10836                                        }
10837                                        else
10838                                        if(newTarget instanceof Item)
10839                                        {
10840                                                final Item E=(Item)newTarget;
10841                                                final int min=CMath.s_int(arg2.trim());
10842                                                int max=CMath.s_int(arg3.trim());
10843                                                if(max<min)
10844                                                        max=min;
10845                                                if(min>0)
10846                                                {
10847                                                        int dmg=(max==min)?min:CMLib.dice().roll(1,max-min,min);
10848                                                        boolean destroy=false;
10849                                                        if(E.subjectToWearAndTear())
10850                                                        {
10851                                                                if((dmg>=E.usesRemaining())&&(!arg4.equalsIgnoreCase("kill")))
10852                                                                        dmg=E.usesRemaining()-1;
10853                                                                if(dmg>0)
10854                                                                        E.setUsesRemaining(E.usesRemaining()-dmg);
10855                                                                if(E.usesRemaining()<=0)
10856                                                                        destroy=true;
10857                                                        }
10858                                                        else
10859                                                        if(arg4.equalsIgnoreCase("kill"))
10860                                                                destroy=true;
10861                                                        if(destroy)
10862                                                        {
10863                                                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
10864                                                                        lastKnownLocation.showHappens(CMMsg.MSG_OK_VISUAL,L("@x1 is destroyed!",E.name()));
10865                                                                E.destroy();
10866                                                        }
10867                                                }
10868                                        }
10869                                }
10870                                break;
10871                        }
10872                        case 78: // mpheal
10873                        {
10874                                if(tt==null)
10875                                {
10876                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cccr");
10877                                        if(tt==null)
10878                                                return null;
10879                                }
10880                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentItem(tt[1],source,monster,scripted,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10881                                final String arg2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
10882                                final String arg3=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
10883                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(arg2.length()>0))
10884                                {
10885                                        if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
10886                                        {
10887                                                final MOB healedM=(MOB)newTarget;
10888                                                final MOB healerM=(MOB)newTarget;
10889                                                final int min=CMath.s_int(arg2.trim());
10890                                                int max=CMath.s_int(arg3.trim());
10891                                                if(max<min)
10892                                                        max=min;
10893                                                if(min>0)
10894                                                {
10895                                                        final int amt=(max==min)?min:CMLib.dice().roll(1,max-min,min);
10896                                                        if(amt>0)
10897                                                                CMLib.combat().postHealing(healerM,healedM,null,amt,CMMsg.MASK_ALWAYS|CMMsg.TYP_CAST_SPELL,null);
10898                                                }
10899                                        }
10900                                        else
10901                                        if(newTarget instanceof Item)
10902                                        {
10903                                                final Item E=(Item)newTarget;
10904                                                final int min=CMath.s_int(arg2.trim());
10905                                                int max=CMath.s_int(arg3.trim());
10906                                                if(max<min)
10907                                                        max=min;
10908                                                if(min>0)
10909                                                {
10910                                                        final int amt=(max==min)?min:CMLib.dice().roll(1,max-min,min);
10911                                                        if(E.subjectToWearAndTear())
10912                                                        {
10913                                                                E.setUsesRemaining(E.usesRemaining()+amt);
10914                                                                if(E.usesRemaining()>100)
10915                                                                        E.setUsesRemaining(100);
10916                                                        }
10917                                                }
10918                                        }
10919                                }
10920                                break;
10921                        }
10922                        case 29: // mptrackto
10923                        {
10924                                if(tt==null)
10925                                {
10926                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
10927                                        if(tt==null)
10928                                                return null;
10929                                }
10930                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
10931                                final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility("Skill_Track");
10932                                if(A!=null)
10933                                {
10934                                        altStatusTickable=A;
10935                                        A.invoke(monster,CMParms.parse(arg1),null,true,0);
10936                                        altStatusTickable=null;
10937                                }
10938                                break;
10939                        }
10940                        case 53: // mpwalkto
10941                        {
10942                                if(tt==null)
10943                                {
10944                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
10945                                        if(tt==null)
10946                                                return null;
10947                                }
10948                                final String arg1=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
10949                                final Ability A=CMClass.getAbility("Skill_Track");
10950                                if(A!=null)
10951                                {
10952                                        altStatusTickable=A;
10953                                        A.invoke(monster,CMParms.parse(arg1+" LANDONLY"),null,true,0);
10954                                        altStatusTickable=null;
10955                                }
10956                                break;
10957                        }
10958                        case 21: //MPENDQUEST
10959                        {
10960                                if(tt==null)
10961                                {
10962                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
10963                                        if(tt==null)
10964                                                return null;
10965                                }
10966                                final String q=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1].trim());
10967                                final Quest Q=getQuest(q);
10968                                if(Q!=null)
10969                                {
10970                                        CMLib.coffeeTables().bump(Q,CoffeeTableRow.STAT_QUESTSTOP);
10971                                        Q.stopQuest();
10972                                }
10973                                else
10974                                if((tt[1].length()>0)&&(defaultQuestName!=null)&&(defaultQuestName.length()>0))
10975                                {
10976                                        final PhysicalAgent newTarget=getArgumentMOB(tt[1].trim(),source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
10977                                        if(newTarget==null)
10978                                                logError(scripted,"MPENDQUEST","Unknown","Quest or MOB: "+s);
10979                                        else
10980                                        {
10981                                                for(int i=newTarget.numScripts()-1;i>=0;i--)
10982                                                {
10983                                                        final ScriptingEngine S=newTarget.fetchScript(i);
10984                                                        if((S!=null)
10985                                                        &&(S.defaultQuestName()!=null)
10986                                                        &&(S.defaultQuestName().equalsIgnoreCase(defaultQuestName)))
10987                                                                newTarget.delScript(S);
10988                                                }
10989                                        }
10990                                }
10991                                else
10992                                        logError(scripted,"MPENDQUEST","Unknown","Quest: "+s);
10993                                break;
10994                        }
10995                        case 69: // MPSTEPQUEST
10996                        {
10997                                if(tt==null)
10998                                {
10999                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
11000                                        if(tt==null)
11001                                                return null;
11002                                }
11003                                final String qName=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1].trim());
11004                                final Quest Q=getQuest(qName);
11005                                if(Q!=null)
11006                                        Q.stepQuest();
11007                                else
11008                                        logError(scripted,"MPSTEPQUEST","Unknown","Quest: "+s);
11009                                break;
11010                        }
11011                        case 23: //MPSTARTQUEST
11012                        {
11013                                if(tt==null)
11014                                {
11015                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cr");
11016                                        if(tt==null)
11017                                                return null;
11018                                }
11019                                final String qName=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1].trim());
11020                                final Quest Q=getQuest(qName);
11021                                if(Q!=null)
11022                                        Q.startQuest();
11023                                else
11024                                        logError(scripted,"MPSTARTQUEST","Unknown","Quest: "+s);
11025                                break;
11026                        }
11027                        case 64: //MPLOADQUESTOBJ
11028                        {
11029                                if(tt==null)
11030                                {
11031                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Cccr");
11032                                        if(tt==null)
11033                                                return null;
11034                                }
11035                                final String questName=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1].trim());
11036                                final Quest Q=getQuest(questName);
11037                                if(Q==null)
11038                                {
11039                                        logError(scripted,"MPLOADQUESTOBJ","Unknown","Quest: "+questName);
11040                                        break;
11041                                }
11042                                final Object O=Q.getDesignatedObject(varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]));
11043                                if(O==null)
11044                                {
11045                                        logError(scripted,"MPLOADQUESTOBJ","Unknown","Unknown var "+tt[2]+" for Quest: "+questName);
11046                                        break;
11047                                }
11048                                final String varArg=tt[3];
11049                                if((varArg.length()!=2)||(!varArg.startsWith("$")))
11050                                {
11051                                        logError(scripted,"MPLOADQUESTOBJ","Syntax","Invalid argument var: "+varArg+" for "+scripted.Name());
11052                                        break;
11053                                }
11054
11055                                final char c=varArg.charAt(1);
11056                                if(Character.isDigit(c))
11057                                        tmp[CMath.s_int(Character.toString(c))]=O;
11058                                else
11059                                switch(c)
11060                                {
11061                                case 'N':
11062                                case 'n':
11063                                        if (O instanceof MOB)
11064                                                source = (MOB) O;
11065                                        break;
11066                                case 'I':
11067                                case 'i':
11068                                        if (O instanceof PhysicalAgent)
11069                                                scripted = (PhysicalAgent) O;
11070                                        if (O instanceof MOB)
11071                                                monster = (MOB) O;
11072                                        break;
11073                                case 'B':
11074                                case 'b':
11075                                        if (O instanceof Environmental)
11076                                                lastLoaded = (Environmental) O;
11077                                        break;
11078                                case 'T':
11079                                case 't':
11080                                        if (O instanceof Environmental)
11081                                                target = (Environmental) O;
11082                                        break;
11083                                case 'O':
11084                                case 'o':
11085                                        if (O instanceof Item)
11086                                                primaryItem = (Item) O;
11087                                        break;
11088                                case 'P':
11089                                case 'p':
11090                                        if (O instanceof Item)
11091                                                secondaryItem = (Item) O;
11092                                        break;
11093                                case 'd':
11094                                case 'D':
11095                                        if (O instanceof Room)
11096                                                lastKnownLocation = (Room) O;
11097                                        break;
11098                                default:
11099                                        logError(scripted, "MPLOADQUESTOBJ", "Syntax", "Invalid argument var: " + varArg + " for " + scripted.Name());
11100                                        break;
11101                                }
11102                                break;
11103                        }
11104                        case 22: //MPQUESTWIN
11105                        {
11106                                if(tt==null)
11107                                {
11108                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
11109                                        if(tt==null)
11110                                                return null;
11111                                }
11112                                String whoName=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
11113                                MOB M=null;
11114                                if(lastKnownLocation!=null)
11115                                        M=lastKnownLocation.fetchInhabitant(whoName);
11116                                if(M==null)
11117                                        M=CMLib.players().getPlayerAllHosts(whoName);
11118                                if(M!=null)
11119                                        whoName=M.Name();
11120                                if(whoName.length()>0)
11121                                {
11122                                        final Quest Q=getQuest(tt[2]);
11123                                        if(Q!=null)
11124                                        {
11125                                                if(M!=null)
11126                                                        CMLib.achievements().possiblyBumpAchievement(M, AchievementLibrary.Event.QUESTOR, 1, Q);
11127                                                Q.declareWinner(whoName);
11128                                                CMLib.players().bumpPrideStat(M,AccountStats.PrideStat.QUESTS_COMPLETED, 1);
11129                                        }
11130                                        else
11131                                                logError(scripted,"MPQUESTWIN","Unknown","Quest: "+s);
11132                                }
11133                                break;
11134                        }
11135                        case 24: // MPCALLFUNC
11136                        {
11137                                if(tt==null)
11138                                {
11139                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
11140                                        if(tt==null)
11141                                                return null;
11142                                }
11143                                final String named=tt[1];
11144                                final String parms=tt[2].trim();
11145                                boolean found=false;
11146                                final List<DVector> scripts=getScripts();
11147                                for(int v=0;v<scripts.size();v++)
11148                                {
11149                                        final DVector script2=scripts.get(v);
11150                                        if(script2.size()<1)
11151                                                continue;
11152                                        final String trigger=((String)script2.elementAt(0,1)).toUpperCase().trim();
11153                                        final String[] ttrigger=(String[])script2.elementAt(0,2);
11154                                        if(getTriggerCode(trigger,ttrigger)==17) // function_prog
11155                                        {
11156                                                final String fnamed=CMParms.getCleanBit(trigger,1);
11157                                                if(fnamed.equalsIgnoreCase(named))
11158                                                {
11159                                                        found=true;
11160                                                        execute(scripted,
11161                                                                        source,
11162                                                                        target,
11163                                                                        monster,
11164                                                                        primaryItem,
11165                                                                        secondaryItem,
11166                                                                        script2,
11167                                                                        varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,parms),
11168                                                                        tmp);
11169                                                        break;
11170                                                }
11171                                        }
11172                                }
11173                                if(!found)
11174                                        logError(scripted,"MPCALLFUNC","Unknown","Function: "+named);
11175                                break;
11176                        }
11177                        case 27: // MPWHILE
11178                        {
11179                                if(tt==null)
11180                                {
11181                                        final ArrayList<String> V=new ArrayList<String>();
11182                                        V.add("MPWHILE");
11183                                        String conditionStr=(s.substring(7).trim());
11184                                        if(!conditionStr.startsWith("("))
11185                                        {
