11186                                                logError(scripted,"MPWHILE","Syntax"," NO Starting (: "+s);
11187                                                break;
11188                                        }
11189                                        conditionStr=conditionStr.substring(1).trim();
11190                                        int x=-1;
11191                                        int depth=0;
11192                                        for(int i=0;i<conditionStr.length();i++)
11193                                        {
11194                                                if(conditionStr.charAt(i)=='(')
11195                                                        depth++;
11196                                                else
11197                                                if((conditionStr.charAt(i)==')')&&((--depth)<0))
11198                                                {
11199                                                        x=i;
11200                                                        break;
11201                                                }
11202                                        }
11203                                        if(x<0)
11204                                        {
11205                                                logError(scripted,"MPWHILE","Syntax"," no closing ')': "+s);
11206                                                break;
11207                                        }
11208                                        final String DO=conditionStr.substring(x+1).trim();
11209                                        conditionStr=conditionStr.substring(0,x);
11210                                        try
11211                                        {
11212                                                final String[] EVAL=parseEval(conditionStr);
11213                                                V.add("(");
11214                                                V.addAll(Arrays.asList(EVAL));
11215                                                V.add(")");
11216                                                V.add(DO);
11217                                                tt=CMParms.toStringArray(V);
11218                                                script.setElementAt(si,2,tt);
11219                                        }
11220                                        catch(final Exception e)
11221                                        {
11222                                                logError(scripted,"MPWHILE","Syntax",e.getMessage());
11223                                                break;
11224                                        }
11225                                        if(tt==null)
11226                                                return null;
11227                                }
11228                                int evalEnd=2;
11229                                int depth=0;
11230                                while((evalEnd<tt.length)&&((!tt[evalEnd].equals(")"))||(depth>0)))
11231                                {
11232                                        if(tt[evalEnd].equals("("))
11233                                                depth++;
11234                                        else
11235                                        if(tt[evalEnd].equals(")"))
11236                                                depth--;
11237                                        evalEnd++;
11238                                }
11239                                if(evalEnd==tt.length)
11240                                {
11241                                        logError(scripted,"MPWHILE","Syntax"," no closing ')': "+s);
11242                                        break;
11243                                }
11244                                final String[] EVAL=new String[evalEnd-2];
11245                                for(int y=2;y<evalEnd;y++)
11246                                        EVAL[y-2]=tt[y];
11247                                String DO=tt[evalEnd+1];
11248                                String[] DOT=null;
11249                                final int doLen=(tt.length-evalEnd)-1;
11250                                if(doLen>1)
11251                                {
11252                                        DOT=new String[doLen];
11253                                        for(int y=0;y<DOT.length;y++)
11254                                        {
11255                                                DOT[y]=tt[evalEnd+y+1];
11256                                                if(y>0)
11257                                                        DO+=" "+tt[evalEnd+y+1];
11258                                        }
11259                                }
11260                                final String[][] EVALO={EVAL};
11261                                final DVector vscript=new DVector(2);
11262                                vscript.addElement("FUNCTION_PROG MPWHILE_"+Math.random(),null);
11263                                vscript.addElement(DO,DOT);
11264                                final long time=System.currentTimeMillis();
11265                                while((eval(scripted,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,EVALO,0))
11266                                &&((System.currentTimeMillis()-time)<4000))
11267                                        execute(scripted,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,vscript,msg,tmp);
11268                                if(vscript.elementAt(1,2)!=DOT)
11269                                {
11270                                        final int oldDotLen=(DOT==null)?1:DOT.length;
11271                                        final String[] newDOT=(String[])vscript.elementAt(1,2);
11272                                        final String[] newTT=new String[tt.length-oldDotLen+newDOT.length];
11273                                        int end=0;
11274                                        for(end=0;end<tt.length-oldDotLen;end++)
11275                                                newTT[end]=tt[end];
11276                                        for(int y=0;y<newDOT.length;y++)
11277                                                newTT[end+y]=newDOT[y];
11278                                        tt=newTT;
11279                                        script.setElementAt(si,2,tt);
11280                                }
11281                                if(EVALO[0]!=EVAL)
11282                                {
11283                                        final Vector<String> lazyV=new Vector<String>();
11284                                        lazyV.addElement("MPWHILE");
11285                                        lazyV.addElement("(");
11286                                        final String[] newEVAL=EVALO[0];
11287                                        for (final String element : newEVAL)
11288                                                lazyV.addElement(element);
11289                                        for(int i=evalEnd;i<tt.length;i++)
11290                                                lazyV.addElement(tt[i]);
11291                                        tt=CMParms.toStringArray(lazyV);
11292                                        script.setElementAt(si,2,tt);
11293                                }
11294                                if((System.currentTimeMillis()-time)>=4000)
11295                                {
11296                                        logError(scripted,"MPWHILE","RunTime","4 second limit exceeded: "+s);
11297                                        break;
11298                                }
11299                                break;
11300                        }
11301                        case 26: // MPALARM
11302                        {
11303                                if(tt==null)
11304                                {
11305                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccp");
11306                                        if(tt==null)
11307                                                return null;
11308                                }
11309                                final String time=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[1]);
11310                                final String parms=tt[2].trim();
11311                                if(CMath.s_int(time.trim())<=0)
11312                                {
11313                                        logError(scripted,"MPALARM","Syntax","Bad time "+time);
11314                                        break;
11315                                }
11316                                if(parms.length()==0)
11317                                {
11318                                        logError(scripted,"MPALARM","Syntax","No command!");
11319                                        break;
11320                                }
11321                                final DVector vscript=new DVector(2);
11322                                vscript.addElement("FUNCTION_PROG ALARM_"+time+Math.random(),null);
11323                                vscript.addElement(parms,null);
11324                                prequeResponse(scripted,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,vscript,CMath.s_int(time.trim()),msg);
11325                                break;
11326                        }
11327                        case 37: // mpenable
11328                        {
11329                                if(tt==null)
11330                                {
11331                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccccp");
11332                                        if(tt==null)
11333                                                return null;
11334                                }
11335                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentMOB(tt[1],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
11336                                final String cast=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
11337                                String p2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[3]);
11338                                final String m2=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[4]);
11339                                Ability A=null;
11340                                if(cast!=null)
11341                                {
11342                                        if(newTarget instanceof MOB)
11343                                                A=((MOB)newTarget).fetchAbility(cast);
11344                                        if(A==null)
11345                                                A=CMClass.getAbility(cast);
11346                                        if(A==null)
11347                                        {
11348                                                final ExpertiseLibrary.ExpertiseDefinition D=CMLib.expertises().findDefinition(cast,false);
11349                                                if(D==null)
11350                                                        logError(scripted,"MPENABLE","Syntax","Unknown skill/expertise: "+cast);
11351                                                else
11352                                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
11353                                                        ((MOB)newTarget).addExpertise(D.ID());
11354                                        }
11355                                }
11356                                if((newTarget!=null)
11357                                &&(A!=null)
11358                                &&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
11359                                {
11360                                        if(!((MOB)newTarget).isMonster())
11361                                                Log.sysOut("Scripting",newTarget.Name()+" was MPENABLED with "+A.Name());
11362                                        if(p2.trim().startsWith("++"))
11363                                                p2=""+(CMath.s_int(p2.trim().substring(2))+A.proficiency());
11364                                        else
11365                                        if(p2.trim().startsWith("--"))
11366                                                p2=""+(A.proficiency()-CMath.s_int(p2.trim().substring(2)));
11367                                        A.setProficiency(CMath.s_int(p2.trim()));
11368                                        A.setMiscText(m2);
11369                                        if(((MOB)newTarget).fetchAbility(A.ID())==null)
11370                                        {
11371                                                ((MOB)newTarget).addAbility(A);
11372                                                A.autoInvocation((MOB)newTarget, false);
11373                                        }
11374                                }
11375                                break;
11376                        }
11377                        case 38: // mpdisable
11378                        {
11379                                if(tt==null)
11380                                {
11381                                        tt=parseBits(script,si,"Ccr");
11382                                        if(tt==null)
11383                                                return null;
11384                                }
11385                                final Environmental newTarget=getArgumentMOB(tt[1],source,monster,target,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp);
11386                                final String cast=varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,tt[2]);
11387                                if((newTarget!=null)&&(newTarget instanceof MOB))
11388                                {
11389                                        final Ability A=((MOB)newTarget).findAbility(cast);
11390                                        if(A!=null)
11391                                                ((MOB)newTarget).delAbility(A);
11392                                        if((!((MOB)newTarget).isMonster())&&(A!=null))
11393                                                Log.sysOut("Scripting",newTarget.Name()+" was MPDISABLED with "+A.Name());
11394                                        final ExpertiseLibrary.ExpertiseDefinition D=CMLib.expertises().findDefinition(cast,false);
11395                                        if((newTarget instanceof MOB)&&(D!=null))
11396                                                ((MOB)newTarget).delExpertise(D.ID());
11397                                }
11398                                break;
11399                        }
11400                        default:
11401                                if(cmd.length()>0)
11402                                {
11403                                        final Vector<String> V=CMParms.parse(varify(source,target,scripted,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,msg,tmp,s));
11404                                        if((V.size()>0)&&(monster!=null))
11405                                                monster.doCommand(V,MUDCmdProcessor.METAFLAG_MPFORCED);
11406                                }
11407                                break;
11408                        }
11409                }
11410                tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_END;
11411                return null;
11412        }
11413
11414        protected static final Vector<DVector> empty=new ReadOnlyVector<DVector>();
11415
11416        @Override
11417        public String getScriptResourceKey()
11418        {
11419                return scriptKey;
11420        }
11421
11422        protected List<DVector> getScripts()
11423        {
11424                if(CMSecurity.isDisabled(CMSecurity.DisFlag.SCRIPTABLE)||CMSecurity.isDisabled(CMSecurity.DisFlag.SCRIPTING))
11425                        return empty;
11426                List scripts=(List)Resources.getResource(getScriptResourceKey());
11427                if(scripts==null)
11428                {
11429                        String scr=getScript();
11430                        scr=CMStrings.replaceAll(scr,"`","'");
11431                        scripts=parseScripts(scr);
11432                        Resources.submitResource(getScriptResourceKey(),scripts);
11433                }
11434                return scripts;
11435        }
11436
11437        protected boolean match(final String str, final String patt)
11438        {
11439                if(patt.trim().equalsIgnoreCase("ALL"))
11440                        return true;
11441                if(patt.length()==0)
11442                        return true;
11443                if(str.length()==0)
11444                        return false;
11445                if(str.equalsIgnoreCase(patt))
11446                        return true;
11447                return false;
11448        }
11449
11450        private Item makeCheapItem(final Environmental E)
11451        {
11452                Item product=null;
11453                if(E instanceof Item)
11454                        product=(Item)E;
11455                else
11456                {
11457                        product=CMClass.getItem("StdItem");
11458                        product.setName(E.Name());
11459                        product.setDisplayText(E.displayText());
11460                        product.setDescription(E.description());
11461                        if(E instanceof Physical)
11462                                product.setBasePhyStats((PhyStats)((Physical)E).basePhyStats().copyOf());
11463                        product.recoverPhyStats();
11464                }
11465                return product;
11466        }
11467
11468        @Override
11469        public boolean okMessage(final Environmental host, final CMMsg msg)
11470        {
11471                if((!(host instanceof PhysicalAgent))||(msg.source()==null)||(recurseCounter.get()>2))
11472                        return true;
11473
11474                try
11475                {
11476                        // atomic recurse counter
11477                        recurseCounter.addAndGet(1);
11478
11479                        final PhysicalAgent affecting = (PhysicalAgent)host;
11480
11481                        final List<DVector> scripts=getScripts();
11482                        DVector script=null;
11483                        boolean tryIt=false;
11484                        String trigger=null;
11485                        String[] t=null;
11486                        int triggerCode=0;
11487                        String str=null;
11488                        for(int v=0;v<scripts.size();v++)
11489                        {
11490                                tryIt=false;
11491                                script=scripts.get(v);
11492                                if(script.size()<1)
11493                                        continue;
11494
11495                                trigger=((String)script.elementAt(0,1)).toUpperCase().trim();
11496                                t=(String[])script.elementAt(0,2);
11497                                triggerCode=getTriggerCode(trigger,t);
11498                                switch(triggerCode)
11499                                {
11500                                case 42: // cnclmsg_prog
11501                                        if(canTrigger(42))
11502                                        {
11503                                                if(t==null)
11504                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CCT");
11505                                                if(t!=null)
11506                                                {
11507                                                        final String command=t[1];
11508                                                        boolean chk=false;
11509                                                        final int x=command.indexOf('=');
11510                                                        if(x>0)
11511                                                        {
11512                                                                chk=true;
11513                                                                boolean minorOnly = false;
11514                                                                boolean majorOnly = false;
11515                                                                for(int i=0;i<x;i++)
11516                                                                {
11517                                                                        switch(command.charAt(i))
11518                                                                        {
11519                                                                        case 'S':
11520                                                                                if(majorOnly)
11521                                                                                        chk=chk&&msg.isSourceMajor(command.substring(x+1));
11522                                                                                else
11523                                                                                if(minorOnly)
11524                                                                                        chk=chk&&msg.isSourceMinor(command.substring(x+1));
11525                                                                                else
11526                                                                                        chk=chk&&msg.isSource(command.substring(x+1));
11527                                                                                break;
11528                                                                        case 'T':
11529                                                                                if(majorOnly)
11530                                                                                        chk=chk&&msg.isTargetMajor(command.substring(x+1));
11531                                                                                else
11532                                                                                if(minorOnly)
11533                                                                                        chk=chk&&msg.isTargetMinor(command.substring(x+1));
11534                                                                                else
11535                                                                                        chk=chk&&msg.isTarget(command.substring(x+1));
11536                                                                                break;
11537                                                                        case 'O':
11538                                                                                if(majorOnly)
11539                                                                                        chk=chk&&msg.isOthersMajor(command.substring(x+1));
11540                                                                                else
11541                                                                                if(minorOnly)
11542                                                                                        chk=chk&&msg.isOthersMinor(command.substring(x+1));
11543                                                                                else
11544                                                                                        chk=chk&&msg.isOthers(command.substring(x+1));
11545                                                                                break;
11546                                                                        case '<':
11547                                                                                minorOnly=true;
11548                                                                                majorOnly=false;
11549                                                                                break;
11550                                                                        case '>':
11551                                                                                majorOnly=true;
11552                                                                                minorOnly=false;
11553                                                                                break;
11554                                                                        case '?':
11555                                                                                majorOnly=false;
11556                                                                                minorOnly=false;
11557                                                                                break;
11558                                                                        default:
11559                                                                                chk=false;
11560                                                                                break;
11561                                                                        }
11562                                                                }
11563                                                        }
11564                                                        else
11565                                                        if(command.startsWith(">"))
11566                                                        {
11567                                                                final String cmd=command.substring(1);
11568                                                                chk=msg.isSourceMajor(cmd)||msg.isTargetMajor(cmd)||msg.isOthersMajor(cmd);
11569                                                        }
11570                                                        else
11571                                                        if(command.startsWith("<"))
11572                                                        {
11573                                                                final String cmd=command.substring(1);
11574                                                                chk=msg.isSourceMinor(cmd)||msg.isTargetMinor(cmd)||msg.isOthersMinor(cmd);
11575                                                        }
11576                                                        else
11577                                                        if(command.startsWith("?"))
11578                                                        {
11579                                                                final String cmd=command.substring(1);
11580                                                                chk=msg.isSource(cmd)||msg.isTarget(cmd)||msg.isOthers(cmd);
11581                                                        }
11582                                                        else
11583                                                                chk=msg.isSource(command)||msg.isTarget(command)||msg.isOthers(command);
11584                                                        if(chk)
11585                                                        {
11586                                                                str="";
11587                                                                if((msg.source().session()!=null)&&(msg.source().session().getPreviousCMD()!=null))
11588                                                                        str=" "+CMParms.combine(msg.source().session().getPreviousCMD(),0).toUpperCase()+" ";
11589                                                                if((t[2].length()==0)||(t[2].equals("ALL")))
11590                                                                        tryIt=true;
11591                                                                else
11592                                                                if((t[2].equals("P"))&&(t.length>3))
11593                                                                {
11594                                                                        if(match(str.trim(),t[3]))
11595                                                                                tryIt=true;
11596                                                                }
11597                                                                else
11598                                                                for(int i=2;i<t.length;i++)
11599                                                                {
11600                                                                        if(str.indexOf(" "+t[i]+" ")>=0)
11601                                                                        {
11602                                                                                str=(t[i].trim()+" "+str.trim()).trim();
11603                                                                                tryIt=true;
11604                                                                                break;
11605                                                                        }
11606                                                                }
11607                                                        }
11608                                                }
11609                                        }
11610                                        break;
11611                                }
11612                                if(tryIt)
11613                                {
11614                                        final MOB monster=getMakeMOB(affecting);
11615                                        if(lastKnownLocation==null)
11616                                                lastKnownLocation=msg.source().location();
11617                                        if((monster==null)||(monster.amDead())||(lastKnownLocation==null))
11618                                                return true;
11619                                        final Item defaultItem=(affecting instanceof Item)?(Item)affecting:null;
11620                                        Item Tool=null;
11621                                        if(msg.tool() instanceof Item)
11622                                                Tool=(Item)msg.tool();
11623                                        if(Tool==null)
11624                                                Tool=defaultItem;
11625                                        String resp=null;
11626                                        if(msg.target() instanceof MOB)
11627                                                resp=execute(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,str,newObjs());
11628                                        else
11629                                        if(msg.target() instanceof Item)
11630                                                resp=execute(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,(Item)msg.target(),script,str,newObjs());
11631                                        else
11632                                                resp=execute(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,str,newObjs());
11633                                        if((resp!=null)&&(resp.equalsIgnoreCase("CANCEL")))
11634                                                return false;
11635                                }
11636                        }
11637                }
11638                finally
11639                {
11640                        recurseCounter.addAndGet(-1);
11641                }
11642                return true;
11643        }
11644
11645        protected String standardTriggerCheck(final DVector script, String[] t, final Environmental E)
11646        {
11647                if(E==null)
11648                        return null;
11649                if(t==null)
11650                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CT");
11651                final String NAME=E.Name().toUpperCase();
11652                if((t[1].length()==0)
11653                ||(t[1].equals("ALL"))
11654                ||(t[1].equals("P")
11655                        &&(t.length==3)
11656                        &&((t[2].equalsIgnoreCase(NAME))
11657                                ||(t[2].equalsIgnoreCase("ALL")))))
11658                        return t[1];
11659                for(int i=1;i<t.length;i++)
11660                {
11661                        if(t[i].equals("P") && (i < t.length-1))
11662                        {
11663                                if( t[i+1].equalsIgnoreCase(NAME)
11664                                || t[i+1].equalsIgnoreCase("ALL"))
11665                                        return t[i];
11666                                i++;
11667                        }
11668                        else
11669                        if(((" "+NAME+" ").indexOf(" "+t[i]+" ")>=0)
11670                        ||(E.ID().equalsIgnoreCase(t[i]))
11671                        ||(t[i].equalsIgnoreCase("ALL")))
11672                                return t[i];
11673                }
11674                return null;
11675
11676        }
11677
11678        @Override
11679        public void executeMsg(final Environmental host, final CMMsg msg)
11680        {
11681                if((!(host instanceof PhysicalAgent))||(msg.source()==null)||(recurseCounter.get() > 2))
11682                        return;
11683
11684                try
11685                {
11686                        // atomic recurse counter
11687                        recurseCounter.addAndGet(1);
11688
11689                        final PhysicalAgent affecting = (PhysicalAgent)host;
11690
11691                        final MOB monster=getMakeMOB(affecting);
11692
11693                        if(lastKnownLocation==null)
11694                                lastKnownLocation=msg.source().location();
11695                        if((monster==null)||(monster.amDead())||(lastKnownLocation==null))
11696                                return;
11697
11698                        final Item defaultItem=(affecting instanceof Item)?(Item)affecting:null;
11699                        MOB eventMob=monster;
11700                        if((defaultItem!=null)&&(defaultItem.owner() instanceof MOB))
11701                                eventMob=(MOB)defaultItem.owner();
11702
11703                        final List<DVector> scripts=getScripts();
11704
11705                        if(msg.amITarget(eventMob)
11706                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
11707                        &&(msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_DAMAGE)
11708                        &&(msg.source()!=monster))
11709                                lastToHurtMe=msg.source();
11710                        DVector script=null;
11711                        String trigger=null;
11712                        String[] t=null;
11713                        for(int v=0;v<scripts.size();v++)
11714                        {
11715                                script=scripts.get(v);
11716                                if(script.size()<1)
11717                                        continue;
11718
11719                                trigger=((String)script.elementAt(0,1)).toUpperCase().trim();
11720                                t=(String[])script.elementAt(0,2);
11721                                final int triggerCode=getTriggerCode(trigger,t);
11722                                int targetMinorTrigger=-1;
11723                                switch(triggerCode)
11724                                {
11725                                case 1: // greet_prog
11726                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_ENTER)
11727                                        &&(msg.amITarget(lastKnownLocation))
11728                                        &&(!msg.amISource(eventMob))
11729                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster))
11730                                        &&canTrigger(1)
11731                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB))||CMLib.flags().canSenseEnteringLeaving(msg.source(),(MOB)affecting)))
11732                                        {
11733                                                if(t==null)
11734                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
11735                                                if(t!=null)
11736                                                {
11737                                                        final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
11738                                                        if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<prcnt)
11739                                                        {
11740                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,defaultItem,null,script,1,null, t);
11741                                                                return;
11742                                                        }
11743                                                }
11744                                        }
11745                                        break;
11746                                case 45: // arrive_prog
11747                                        if(((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_ENTER)||(msg.sourceMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_LIFE))
11748                                        &&(msg.amISource(eventMob))
11749                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster))
11750                                        &&canTrigger(45))
11751                                        {
11752                                                if(t==null)
11753                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
11754                                                if(t!=null)
11755                                                {
11756                                                        final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
11757                                                        if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<prcnt)
11758                                                        {
11759                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,defaultItem,null,script,1,null, t);
11760                                                                return;
11761                                                        }
11762                                                }
11763                                        }
11764                                        break;
11765                                case 2: // all_greet_prog
11766                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_ENTER)&&canTrigger(2)
11767                                        &&(msg.amITarget(lastKnownLocation))
11768                                        &&(!msg.amISource(eventMob))
11769                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster))
11770                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) ||CMLib.flags().canActAtAll(monster)))
11771                                        {
11772                                                if(t==null)
11773                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
11774                                                if(t!=null)
11775                                                {
11776                                                        final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
11777                                                        if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<prcnt)
11778                                                        {
11779                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,defaultItem,null,script,1,null, t);
11780                                                                return;
11781                                                        }
11782                                                }
11783                                        }
11784                                        break;
11785                                case 3: // speech_prog
11786                                        if(((msg.sourceMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_SPEAK)||(msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_SPEAK))&&canTrigger(3)
11787                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
11788                                        &&(!msg.othersMajor(CMMsg.MASK_CHANNEL))
11789                                        &&(((msg.othersMessage()!=null)&&((msg.tool()==null)||(!(msg.tool() instanceof Ability))||((((Ability)msg.tool()).classificationCode()&Ability.ALL_ACODES)!=Ability.ACODE_LANGUAGE)))
11790                                           ||((msg.target()==monster)&&(msg.targetMessage()!=null)&&(msg.tool()==null)))
11791                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
11792                                        {
11793                                                if(t==null)
11794                                                {
11795                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CT");
11796                                                        for(int i=0;i<t.length;i++)
11797                                                        {
11798                                                                if(t[i]!=null)
11799                                                                        t[i]=t[i].replace('`', '\'');
11800                                                        }
11801                                                }
11802                                                String str=null;
11803                                                if(msg.othersMessage() != null)
11804                                                        str=CMStrings.getSayFromMessage(msg.othersMessage().toUpperCase());
11805                                                else
11806                                                if(msg.targetMessage() != null)
11807                                                        str=CMStrings.getSayFromMessage(msg.targetMessage().toUpperCase());
11808                                                if(str != null)
11809                                                {
11810                                                        str=(" "+str.replace('`', '\'')+" ").toUpperCase();
11811                                                        str=CMStrings.removeColors(str);
11812                                                        str=CMStrings.replaceAll(str,"\n\r"," ");
11813                                                        if((t[1].length()==0)||(t[1].equals("ALL")))
11814                                                        {
11815                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,defaultItem,null,script,1,str, t);
11816                                                                return;
11817                                                        }
11818                                                        else
11819                                                        if((t[1].equals("P"))&&(t.length>2))
11820                                                        {
11821                                                                if(match(str.trim(),t[2]))
11822                                                                {
11823                                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,defaultItem,null,script,1,str, t);
11824                                                                        return;
11825                                                                }
11826                                                        }
11827                                                        else
11828                                                        for(int i=1;i<t.length;i++)
11829                                                        {
11830                                                                final int x=str.indexOf(" "+t[i]+" ");
11831                                                                if(x>=0)
11832                                                                {
11833                                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,defaultItem,null,script,1,str.substring(x).trim(), t);
11834                                                                        return;
11835                                                                }
11836                                                        }
11837                                                }
11838                                        }
11839                                        break;
11840                                case 4: // give_prog
11841                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_GIVE)
11842                                        &&canTrigger(4)
11843                                        &&((msg.amITarget(monster))
11844                                                ||(msg.tool()==affecting)
11845                                                ||(affecting instanceof Room)
11846                                                ||(affecting instanceof Area))
11847                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
11848                                        &&(msg.tool() instanceof Item)
11849                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
11850                                        {
11851                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,msg.tool());
11852                                                if(check!=null)
11853                                                {
11854                                                        if(lastMsg==msg)
11855                                                                break;
11856                                                        lastMsg=msg;
11857                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,(Item)msg.tool(),defaultItem,script,1,check, t);
11858                                                        return;
11859                                                }
11860                                        }
11861                                        break;
11862                                case 40: // llook_prog
11863                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_EXAMINE)&&canTrigger(40)
11864                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
11865                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
11866                                        {
11867                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,msg.target());
11868                                                if(check!=null)
11869                                                {
11870                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,(Item)msg.target(),defaultItem,script,1,check, t);
11871                                                        return;
11872                                                }
11873                                        }
11874                                        break;
11875                                case 41: // execmsg_prog
11876                                        if(canTrigger(41))
11877                                        {
11878                                                if(t==null)
11879                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CCT");
11880                                                if(t!=null)
11881                                                {
11882                                                        final String command=t[1];
11883                                                        boolean chk=false;
11884                                                        final int x=command.indexOf('=');
11885                                                        if(x>0)
11886                                                        {
11887                                                                chk=true;
11888                                                                boolean minorOnly = false;
11889                                                                boolean majorOnly = false;
11890                                                                for(int i=0;i<x;i++)
11891                                                                {
11892                                                                        switch(command.charAt(i))
11893                                                                        {
11894                                                                                case 'S':
11895                                                                                        if(majorOnly)
11896                                                                                                chk=chk&&msg.isSourceMajor(command.substring(x+1));
11897                                                                                        else
11898                                                                                        if(minorOnly)
11899                                                                                                chk=chk&&msg.isSourceMinor(command.substring(x+1));
11900                                                                                        else
11901                                                                                                chk=chk&&msg.isSource(command.substring(x+1));
11902                                                                                        break;
11903                                                                                case 'T':
11904                                                                                        if(majorOnly)
11905                                                                                                chk=chk&&msg.isTargetMajor(command.substring(x+1));
11906                                                                                        else
11907                                                                                        if(minorOnly)
11908                                                                                                chk=chk&&msg.isTargetMinor(command.substring(x+1));
11909                                                                                        else
11910                                                                                                chk=chk&&msg.isTarget(command.substring(x+1));
11911                                                                                        break;
11912                                                                                case 'O':
11913                                                                                        if(majorOnly)
11914                                                                                                chk=chk&&msg.isOthersMajor(command.substring(x+1));
11915                                                                                        else
11916                                                                                        if(minorOnly)
11917                                                                                                chk=chk&&msg.isOthersMinor(command.substring(x+1));
11918                                                                                        else
11919                                                                                                chk=chk&&msg.isOthers(command.substring(x+1));
11920                                                                                        break;
11921                                                                                case '<':
11922                                                                                        minorOnly=true;
11923                                                                                        majorOnly=false;
11924                                                                                        break;
11925                                                                                case '>':
11926                                                                                        majorOnly=true;
11927                                                                                        minorOnly=false;
11928                                                                                        break;
11929                                                                                case '?':
11930                                                                                        majorOnly=false;
11931                                                                                        minorOnly=false;
11932                                                                                        break;
11933                                                                                default:
11934                                                                                        chk=false;
11935                                                                                        break;
11936                                                                        }
11937                                                                }
11938                                                        }
11939                                                        else
11940                                                        if(command.startsWith(">"))
11941                                                        {
11942                                                                final String cmd=command.substring(1);
11943                                                                chk=msg.isSourceMajor(cmd)||msg.isTargetMajor(cmd)||msg.isOthersMajor(cmd);
11944                                                        }
11945                                                        else
11946                                                        if(command.startsWith("<"))
11947                                                        {
11948                                                                final String cmd=command.substring(1);
11949                                                                chk=msg.isSourceMinor(cmd)||msg.isTargetMinor(cmd)||msg.isOthersMinor(cmd);
11950                                                        }
11951                                                        else
11952                                                        if(command.startsWith("?"))
11953                                                        {
11954                                                                final String cmd=command.substring(1);
11955                                                                chk=msg.isSource(cmd)||msg.isTarget(cmd)||msg.isOthers(cmd);
11956                                                        }
11957                                                        else
11958                                                                chk=msg.isSource(command)||msg.isTarget(command)||msg.isOthers(command);
11959                                                        if(chk)
11960                                                        {
11961                                                                String str="";
11962                                                                if((msg.source().session()!=null)&&(msg.source().session().getPreviousCMD()!=null))
11963                                                                        str=" "+CMParms.combine(msg.source().session().getPreviousCMD(),0).toUpperCase()+" ";
11964                                                                boolean doIt=false;
11965                                                                if((t[2].length()==0)||(t[2].equals("ALL")))
11966                                                                        doIt=true;
11967                                                                else
11968                                                                if((t[2].equals("P"))&&(t.length>3))
11969                                                                {
11970                                                                        if(match(str.trim(),t[3]))
11971                                                                                doIt=true;
11972                                                                }
11973                                                                else
11974                                                                for(int i=2;i<t.length;i++)
11975                                                                {
11976                                                                        if(str.indexOf(" "+t[i]+" ")>=0)
11977                                                                        {
11978                                                                                str=(t[i].trim()+" "+str.trim()).trim();
11979                                                                                doIt=true;
11980                                                                                break;
11981                                                                        }
11982                                                                }
11983                                                                if(doIt)
11984                                                                {
11985                                                                        Item Tool=null;
11986                                                                        if(msg.tool() instanceof Item)
11987                                                                                Tool=(Item)msg.tool();
11988                                                                        if(Tool==null)
11989                                                                                Tool=defaultItem;
11990                                                                        if(msg.target() instanceof MOB)
11991                                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,1,str, t);
11992                                                                        else
11993                                                                        if(msg.target() instanceof Item)
11994                                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,(Item)msg.target(),script,1,str, t);
11995                                                                        else
11996                                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,1,str, t);
11997                                                                        return;
11998                                                                }
11999                                                        }
12000                                                }
12001                                        }
12002                                        break;
12003                                case 39: // look_prog
12004                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_LOOK)&&canTrigger(39)
12005                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
12006                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12007                                        {
12008                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,msg.target());
12009                                                if(check!=null)
12010                                                {
12011                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,defaultItem,defaultItem,script,1,check, t);
12012                                                        return;
12013                                                }
12014                                        }
12015                                        break;
12016                                case 20: // get_prog
12017                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_GET)&&canTrigger(20)
12018                                        &&(msg.amITarget(affecting)
12019                                                ||(affecting instanceof Room)
12020                                                ||(affecting instanceof Area)
12021                                                ||(affecting instanceof MOB))
12022                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
12023                                        &&(msg.target() instanceof Item)
12024                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12025                                        {
12026                                                Item checkInE=(Item)msg.target();
12027                                                if((msg.tool() instanceof Item)
12028                                                &&(((Item)msg.tool()).container()==msg.target()))
12029                                                        checkInE=(Item)msg.tool();
12030                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,checkInE);
12031                                                if(check!=null)
12032                                                {
12033                                                        if(lastMsg==msg)
12034                                                                break;
12035                                                        lastMsg=msg;
12036                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,checkInE,defaultItem,script,1,check, t);
12037                                                        return;
12038                                                }
12039                                        }
12040                                        break;
12041                                case 22: // drop_prog
12042                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_DROP)&&canTrigger(22)
12043                                        &&((msg.amITarget(affecting))
12044                                                ||(affecting instanceof Room)
12045                                                ||(affecting instanceof Area)
12046                                                ||(affecting instanceof MOB))
12047                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
12048                                        &&(msg.target() instanceof Item)
12049                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12050                                        {
12051                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,msg.target());
12052                                                if(check!=null)
12053                                                {
12054                                                        if(lastMsg==msg)
12055                                                                break;
12056                                                        lastMsg=msg;
12057                                                        if(msg.target() instanceof Coins)
12058                                                                execute(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,(Item)msg.target(),(Item)((Item)msg.target()).copyOf(),script,check,newObjs());
12059                                                        else
12060                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,(Item)msg.target(),defaultItem,script,1,check, t);
12061                                                        return;
12062                                                }
12063                                        }
12064                                        break;
12065                                case 24: // remove_prog
12066                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_REMOVE)&&canTrigger(24)
12067                                        &&((msg.amITarget(affecting))
12068                                                ||(affecting instanceof Room)
12069                                                ||(affecting instanceof Area)
12070                                                ||(affecting instanceof MOB))
12071                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
12072                                        &&(msg.target() instanceof Item)
12073                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12074                                        {
12075                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,msg.target());
12076                                                if(check!=null)
12077                                                {
12078                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,(Item)msg.target(),defaultItem,script,1,check, t);
12079                                                        return;
12080                                                }
12081                                        }
12082                                        break;
12083                                case 34: // open_prog
12084                                        if(targetMinorTrigger<0)
12085                                                targetMinorTrigger=CMMsg.TYP_OPEN;
12086                                        //$FALL-THROUGH$
12087                                case 35: // close_prog
12088                                        if(targetMinorTrigger<0)
12089                                                targetMinorTrigger=CMMsg.TYP_CLOSE;
12090                                        //$FALL-THROUGH$
12091                                case 36: // lock_prog
12092                                        if(targetMinorTrigger<0)
12093                                                targetMinorTrigger=CMMsg.TYP_LOCK;
12094                                        //$FALL-THROUGH$
12095                                case 37: // unlock_prog
12096                                {
12097                                        if(targetMinorTrigger<0)
12098                                                targetMinorTrigger=CMMsg.TYP_UNLOCK;
12099                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==targetMinorTrigger)&&canTrigger(triggerCode)
12100                                        &&((msg.amITarget(affecting))
12101                                                ||(affecting instanceof Room)
12102                                                ||(affecting instanceof Area)
12103                                                ||(affecting instanceof MOB))
12104                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
12105                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12106                                        {
12107                                                final Item I=(msg.target() instanceof Item)?(Item)msg.target():defaultItem;
12108                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,msg.target());
12109                                                if(check!=null)
12110                                                {
12111                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,I,defaultItem,script,1,check, t);
12112                                                        return;
12113                                                }
12114                                        }
12115                                        break;
12116                                }
12117                                case 25: // consume_prog
12118                                        if(((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_EAT)||(msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_DRINK))
12119                                        &&((msg.amITarget(affecting))||(affecting instanceof Room)||(affecting instanceof Area)||(affecting instanceof MOB))
12120                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))&&canTrigger(25)
12121                                        &&(msg.target() instanceof Item)
12122                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12123                                        {
12124                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,msg.target());
12125                                                if(check!=null)
12126                                                {
12127                                                        if((msg.target() == affecting)
12128                                                        &&(affecting instanceof Food))
12129                                                                execute(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,(Item)msg.target(),(Item)((Item)msg.target()).copyOf(),script,check,newObjs());
12130                                                        else
12131                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,(Item)msg.target(),defaultItem,script,1,check, t);
12132                                                        return;
12133                                                }
12134                                        }
12135                                        break;
12136                                case 21: // put_prog
12137                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_PUT)&&canTrigger(21)
12138                                        &&((msg.amITarget(affecting))||(affecting instanceof Room)||(affecting instanceof Area)||(affecting instanceof MOB))
12139                                        &&(msg.tool() instanceof Item)
12140                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
12141                                        &&(msg.target() instanceof Item)
12142                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12143                                        {
12144                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,msg.target());
12145                                                if(check!=null)
12146                                                {
12147                                                        if(lastMsg==msg)
12148                                                                break;
12149                                                        lastMsg=msg;
12150                                                        if((msg.tool() instanceof Coins)&&(((Item)msg.target()).owner() instanceof Room))
12151                                                                execute(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,(Item)msg.target(),(Item)((Item)msg.target()).copyOf(),script,check,newObjs());
12152                                                        else
12153                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,(Item)msg.target(),(Item)msg.tool(),script,1,check, t);
12154                                                        return;
12155                                                }
12156                                        }
12157                                        break;
12158                                case 27: // buy_prog
12159                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_BUY)&&canTrigger(27)
12160                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof ShopKeeper))
12161                                                ||msg.amITarget(affecting))
12162                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
12163                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12164                                        {
12165                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,msg.tool());
12166                                                if(check!=null)
12167                                                {
12168                                                        final Item product=makeCheapItem(msg.tool());
12169                                                        if((product instanceof Coins)
12170                                                        &&(product.owner() instanceof Room))
12171                                                                execute(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,product,(Item)product.copyOf(),script,check,newObjs());
12172                                                        else
12173                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,product,product,script,1,check, t);
12174                                                        return;
12175                                                }
12176                                        }
12177                                        break;
12178                                case 28: // sell_prog
12179                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_SELL)&&canTrigger(28)
12180                                        &&((msg.amITarget(affecting))||(!(affecting instanceof ShopKeeper)))
12181                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))
12182                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12183                                        {
12184                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,msg.tool());
12185                                                if(check!=null)
12186                                                {
12187                                                        final Item product=makeCheapItem(msg.tool());
12188                                                        if((product instanceof Coins)
12189                                                        &&(product.owner() instanceof Room))
12190                                                                execute(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,product,(Item)product.copyOf(),script,null,newObjs());
12191                                                        else
12192                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,product,product,script,1,check, t);
12193                                                        return;
12194                                                }
12195                                        }
12196                                        break;
12197                                case 23: // wear_prog
12198                                        if(((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_WEAR)
12199                                                ||(msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_HOLD)
12200                                                ||(msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_WIELD))
12201                                        &&((msg.amITarget(affecting))||(affecting instanceof Room)||(affecting instanceof Area)||(affecting instanceof MOB))
12202                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))&&canTrigger(23)
12203                                        &&(msg.target() instanceof Item)
12204                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12205                                        {
12206                                                final String check=standardTriggerCheck(script,t,msg.target());
12207                                                if(check!=null)
12208                                                {
12209                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,(Item)msg.target(),defaultItem,script,1,check, t);
12210                                                        return;
12211                                                }
12212                                        }
12213                                        break;
12214                                case 19: // bribe_prog
12215                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_GIVE)
12216                                        &&(msg.amITarget(eventMob)||(!(affecting instanceof MOB)))
12217                                        &&(!msg.amISource(monster))&&canTrigger(19)
12218                                        &&(msg.tool() instanceof Coins)
12219                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12220                                        {
12221                                                if(t==null)
12222                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12223                                                if(t!=null)
12224                                                {
12225                                                        if(t[1].startsWith("ANY")||t[1].startsWith("ALL"))
12226                                                                t[1]=t[1].trim();
12227                                                        else
12228                                                        if(!((Coins)msg.tool()).getCurrency().equals(CMLib.beanCounter().getCurrency(monster)))
12229                                                                break;
12230                                                        double d=0.0;
12231                                                        if(CMath.isDouble(t[1]))
12232                                                                d=CMath.s_double(t[1]);
12233                                                        else
12234                                                                d=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12235                                                        if((((Coins)msg.tool()).getTotalValue()>=d)
12236                                                        ||(t[1].equals("ALL"))
