12237                                                        ||(t[1].equals("ANY")))
12238                                                        {
12239                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,(Item)msg.tool(),defaultItem,script,1,null, t);
12240                                                                return;
12241                                                        }
12242                                                }
12243                                        }
12244                                        break;
12245                                case 8: // entry_prog
12246                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_ENTER)&&canTrigger(8)
12247                                        &&(msg.amISource(eventMob)
12248                                                ||(msg.target()==affecting)
12249                                                ||(msg.tool()==affecting)
12250                                                ||(affecting instanceof Item))
12251                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12252                                        {
12253                                                if(t==null)
12254                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12255                                                if(t!=null)
12256                                                {
12257                                                        final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12258                                                        if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<prcnt)
12259                                                        {
12260                                                                final List<ScriptableResponse> V=new XVector<ScriptableResponse>(que);
12261                                                                ScriptableResponse SB=null;
12262                                                                String roomID=null;
12263                                                                if(msg.target()!=null)
12264                                                                        roomID=CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(CMLib.map().roomLocation(msg.target()));
12265                                                                for(int q=0;q<V.size();q++)
12266                                                                {
12267                                                                        SB=V.get(q);
12268                                                                        if((SB.scr==script)&&(SB.s==msg.source()))
12269                                                                        {
12270                                                                                if(que.remove(SB))
12271                                                                                        execute(SB.h,SB.s,SB.t,SB.m,SB.pi,SB.si,SB.scr,SB.message,newObjs());
12272                                                                                break;
12273                                                                        }
12274                                                                }
12275                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,defaultItem,null,script,1,roomID, t);
12276                                                                return;
12277                                                        }
12278                                                }
12279                                        }
12280                                        break;
12281                                case 9: // exit_prog
12282                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_LEAVE)&&canTrigger(9)
12283                                        &&(msg.amITarget(lastKnownLocation))
12284                                        &&(!msg.amISource(eventMob))
12285                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster)))
12286                                        {
12287                                                if(t==null)
12288                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12289                                                if(t!=null)
12290                                                {
12291                                                        final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12292                                                        if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<prcnt)
12293                                                        {
12294                                                                final List<ScriptableResponse> V=new XVector<ScriptableResponse>(que);
12295                                                                ScriptableResponse SB=null;
12296                                                                String roomID=null;
12297                                                                if(msg.target()!=null)
12298                                                                        roomID=CMLib.map().getExtendedRoomID(CMLib.map().roomLocation(msg.target()));
12299                                                                for(int q=0;q<V.size();q++)
12300                                                                {
12301                                                                        SB=V.get(q);
12302                                                                        if((SB.scr==script)&&(SB.s==msg.source()))
12303                                                                        {
12304                                                                                if(que.remove(SB))
12305                                                                                        execute(SB.h,SB.s,SB.t,SB.m,SB.pi,SB.si,SB.scr,SB.message,newObjs());
12306                                                                                break;
12307                                                                        }
12308                                                                }
12309                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,defaultItem,null,script,1,roomID, t);
12310                                                                return;
12311                                                        }
12312                                                }
12313                                        }
12314                                        break;
12315                                case 10: // death_prog
12316                                        if((msg.sourceMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_DEATH)&&canTrigger(10)
12317                                        &&(msg.amISource(eventMob)||(!(affecting instanceof MOB))))
12318                                        {
12319                                                if(t==null)
12320                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"C");
12321                                                final MOB ded=msg.source();
12322                                                MOB src=lastToHurtMe;
12323                                                if(msg.tool() instanceof MOB)
12324                                                        src=(MOB)msg.tool();
12325                                                if((src==null)||(src.location()!=monster.location()))
12326                                                        src=ded;
12327                                                execute(affecting,src,ded,ded,defaultItem,null,script,null,newObjs());
12328                                                return;
12329                                        }
12330                                        break;
12331                                case 44: // kill_prog
12332                                        if((msg.sourceMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_DEATH)&&canTrigger(44)
12333                                        &&((msg.tool()==affecting)||(!(affecting instanceof MOB))))
12334                                        {
12335                                                if(t==null)
12336                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"C");
12337                                                final MOB ded=msg.source();
12338                                                MOB src=lastToHurtMe;
12339                                                if(msg.tool() instanceof MOB)
12340                                                        src=(MOB)msg.tool();
12341                                                if((src==null)||(src.location()!=monster.location()))
12342                                                        src=ded;
12343                                                execute(affecting,src,ded,ded,defaultItem,null,script,null,newObjs());
12344                                                return;
12345                                        }
12346                                        break;
12347                                case 26: // damage_prog
12348                                        if((msg.targetMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_DAMAGE)&&canTrigger(26)
12349                                        &&(msg.amITarget(eventMob)||(msg.tool()==affecting)))
12350                                        {
12351                                                if(t==null)
12352                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"C");
12353                                                Item I=null;
12354                                                if(msg.tool() instanceof Item)
12355                                                        I=(Item)msg.tool();
12356                                                execute(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),eventMob,defaultItem,I,script,""+msg.value(),newObjs());
12357                                                return;
12358                                        }
12359                                        break;
12360                                case 29: // login_prog
12361                                        if(!registeredEvents.contains(Integer.valueOf(CMMsg.TYP_LOGIN)))
12362                                        {
12363                                                CMLib.map().addGlobalHandler(affecting,CMMsg.TYP_LOGIN);
12364                                                registeredEvents.add(Integer.valueOf(CMMsg.TYP_LOGIN));
12365                                        }
12366                                        if((msg.sourceMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_LOGIN)&&canTrigger(29)
12367                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster))
12368                                        &&(!CMLib.flags().isCloaked(msg.source())))
12369                                        {
12370                                                if(t==null)
12371                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12372                                                if(t!=null)
12373                                                {
12374                                                        final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12375                                                        if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<prcnt)
12376                                                        {
12377                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,defaultItem,null,script,1,null, t);
12378                                                                return;
12379                                                        }
12380                                                }
12381                                        }
12382                                        break;
12383                                case 32: // level_prog
12384                                        if(!registeredEvents.contains(Integer.valueOf(CMMsg.TYP_LEVEL)))
12385                                        {
12386                                                CMLib.map().addGlobalHandler(affecting,CMMsg.TYP_LEVEL);
12387                                                registeredEvents.add(Integer.valueOf(CMMsg.TYP_LEVEL));
12388                                        }
12389                                        if((msg.sourceMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_LEVEL)&&canTrigger(32)
12390                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster))
12391                                        &&(msg.value() > msg.source().basePhyStats().level())
12392                                        &&(!CMLib.flags().isCloaked(msg.source())))
12393                                        {
12394                                                if(t==null)
12395                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12396                                                if(t!=null)
12397                                                {
12398                                                        final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12399                                                        if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<prcnt)
12400                                                        {
12401                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,defaultItem,null,script,1,null, t);
12402                                                                return;
12403                                                        }
12404                                                }
12405                                        }
12406                                        break;
12407                                case 30: // logoff_prog
12408                                        if((msg.sourceMinor()==CMMsg.TYP_QUIT)&&canTrigger(30)
12409                                        &&((!(affecting instanceof MOB)) || isFreeToBeTriggered(monster))
12410                                        &&(!CMLib.flags().isCloaked(msg.source())))
12411                                        {
12412                                                if(t==null)
12413                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12414                                                if(t!=null)
12415                                                {
12416                                                        final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12417                                                        if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<prcnt)
12418                                                        {
12419                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),monster,monster,defaultItem,null,script,1,null, t);
12420                                                                return;
12421                                                        }
12422                                                }
12423                                        }
12424                                        break;
12425                                case 12: // mask_prog
12426                                {
12427                                        if(!canTrigger(12))
12428                                                break;
12429                                }
12430                                //$FALL-THROUGH$
12431                                case 18: // act_prog
12432                                        if((msg.amISource(monster))
12433                                        ||((triggerCode==18)&&(!canTrigger(18))))
12434                                                break;
12435                                //$FALL-THROUGH$
12436                                case 43: // imask_prog
12437                                        if((triggerCode!=43)||(msg.amISource(monster)&&canTrigger(43)))
12438                                        {
12439                                                if(t==null)
12440                                                {
12441                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CT");
12442                                                        for(int i=1;i<t.length;i++)
12443                                                                t[i]=CMLib.english().stripPunctuation(CMStrings.removeColors(t[i]));
12444                                                }
12445                                                boolean doIt=false;
12446                                                String str=msg.othersMessage();
12447                                                if(str==null)
12448                                                        str=msg.targetMessage();
12449                                                if(str==null)
12450                                                        str=msg.sourceMessage();
12451                                                if(str==null)
12452                                                        break;
12453                                                str=CMLib.coffeeFilter().fullOutFilter(null,monster,msg.source(),msg.target(),msg.tool(),str,false);
12454                                                str=CMLib.english().stripPunctuation(CMStrings.removeColors(str));
12455                                                str=" "+CMStrings.replaceAll(str,"\n\r"," ").toUpperCase().trim()+" ";
12456                                                if((t[1].length()==0)||(t[1].equals("ALL")))
12457                                                        doIt=true;
12458                                                else
12459                                                if((t[1].equals("P"))&&(t.length>2))
12460                                                {
12461                                                        if(match(str.trim(),t[2]))
12462                                                                doIt=true;
12463                                                }
12464                                                else
12465                                                for(int i=1;i<t.length;i++)
12466                                                {
12467                                                        if(str.indexOf(" "+t[i]+" ")>=0)
12468                                                        {
12469                                                                str=t[i];
12470                                                                doIt=true;
12471                                                                break;
12472                                                        }
12473                                                }
12474                                                if(doIt)
12475                                                {
12476                                                        Item Tool=null;
12477                                                        if(msg.tool() instanceof Item)
12478                                                                Tool=(Item)msg.tool();
12479                                                        if(Tool==null)
12480                                                                Tool=defaultItem;
12481                                                        if(msg.target() instanceof MOB)
12482                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,1,str, t);
12483                                                        else
12484                                                        if(msg.target() instanceof Item)
12485                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,(Item)msg.target(),script,1,str, t);
12486                                                        else
12487                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,1,str, t);
12488                                                        return;
12489                                                }
12490                                        }
12491                                        break;
12492                                case 38: // social_prog
12493                                        if(!msg.amISource(monster)
12494                                        &&canTrigger(38)
12495                                        &&(msg.tool() instanceof Social))
12496                                        {
12497                                                if(t==null)
12498                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12499                                                if((t!=null)
12500                                                &&((Social)msg.tool()).Name().toUpperCase().startsWith(t[1]))
12501                                                {
12502                                                        final Item Tool=defaultItem;
12503                                                        if(msg.target() instanceof MOB)
12504                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,1,msg.tool().Name(), t);
12505                                                        else
12506                                                        if(msg.target() instanceof Item)
12507                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,(Item)msg.target(),script,1,msg.tool().Name(), t);
12508                                                        else
12509                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,1,msg.tool().Name(), t);
12510                                                        return;
12511                                                }
12512                                        }
12513                                        break;
12514                                case 33: // channel_prog
12515                                        if(!registeredEvents.contains(Integer.valueOf(CMMsg.TYP_CHANNEL)))
12516                                        {
12517                                                CMLib.map().addGlobalHandler(affecting,CMMsg.TYP_CHANNEL);
12518                                                registeredEvents.add(Integer.valueOf(CMMsg.TYP_CHANNEL));
12519                                        }
12520                                        if(!msg.amISource(monster)
12521                                        &&(msg.othersMajor(CMMsg.MASK_CHANNEL))
12522                                        &&canTrigger(33))
12523                                        {
12524                                                if(t==null)
12525                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CCT");
12526                                                boolean doIt=false;
12527                                                if(t!=null)
12528                                                {
12529                                                        final String channel=t[1];
12530                                                        final int channelInt=msg.othersMinor()-CMMsg.TYP_CHANNEL;
12531                                                        String str=null;
12532                                                        final CMChannel officialChannel=CMLib.channels().getChannel(channelInt);
12533                                                        if(officialChannel==null)
12534                                                                Log.errOut("Script","Unknown channel for code '"+channelInt+"': "+msg.othersMessage());
12535                                                        else
12536                                                        if(channel.equalsIgnoreCase(officialChannel.name()))
12537                                                        {
12538                                                                str=msg.sourceMessage();
12539                                                                if(str==null)
12540                                                                        str=msg.othersMessage();
12541                                                                if(str==null)
12542                                                                        str=msg.targetMessage();
12543                                                                if(str==null)
12544                                                                        break;
12545                                                                str=CMLib.coffeeFilter().fullOutFilter(null,monster,msg.source(),msg.target(),msg.tool(),str,false).toUpperCase().trim();
12546                                                                int dex=str.indexOf("["+channel+"]");
12547                                                                if(dex>0)
12548                                                                        str=str.substring(dex+2+channel.length()).trim();
12549                                                                else
12550                                                                {
12551                                                                        dex=str.indexOf('\'');
12552                                                                        final int edex=str.lastIndexOf('\'');
12553                                                                        if(edex>dex)
12554                                                                                str=str.substring(dex+1,edex);
12555                                                                }
12556                                                                str=" "+CMStrings.removeColors(str)+" ";
12557                                                                str=CMStrings.replaceAll(str,"\n\r"," ");
12558                                                                if((t[2].length()==0)||(t[2].equals("ALL")))
12559                                                                        doIt=true;
12560                                                                else
12561                                                                if(t[2].equals("P")&&(t.length>2))
12562                                                                {
12563                                                                        if(match(str.trim(),t[3]))
12564                                                                                doIt=true;
12565                                                                }
12566                                                                else
12567                                                                for(int i=2;i<t.length;i++)
12568                                                                {
12569                                                                        if(str.indexOf(" "+t[i]+" ")>=0)
12570                                                                        {
12571                                                                                str=t[i];
12572                                                                                doIt=true;
12573                                                                                break;
12574                                                                        }
12575                                                                }
12576                                                        }
12577                                                        if(doIt)
12578                                                        {
12579                                                                Item Tool=null;
12580                                                                if(msg.tool() instanceof Item)
12581                                                                        Tool=(Item)msg.tool();
12582                                                                if(Tool==null)
12583                                                                        Tool=defaultItem;
12584                                                                if(msg.target() instanceof MOB)
12585                                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,1,str, t);
12586                                                                else
12587                                                                if(msg.target() instanceof Item)
12588                                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,(Item)msg.target(),script,1,str, t);
12589                                                                else
12590                                                                        enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,1,str, t);
12591                                                                return;
12592                                                        }
12593                                                }
12594                                        }
12595                                        break;
12596                                case 31: // regmask_prog
12597                                        if(!msg.amISource(monster)&&canTrigger(31))
12598                                        {
12599                                                boolean doIt=false;
12600                                                String str=msg.othersMessage();
12601                                                if(str==null)
12602                                                        str=msg.targetMessage();
12603                                                if(str==null)
12604                                                        str=msg.sourceMessage();
12605                                                if(str==null)
12606                                                        break;
12607                                                str=CMLib.coffeeFilter().fullOutFilter(null,monster,msg.source(),msg.target(),msg.tool(),str,false);
12608                                                if(t==null)
12609                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"Cp");
12610                                                if(t!=null)
12611                                                {
12612                                                        if(CMParms.getCleanBit(t[1],0).equalsIgnoreCase("p"))
12613                                                                doIt=str.trim().equals(t[1].substring(1).trim());
12614                                                        else
12615                                                        {
12616                                                                Pattern P=patterns.get(t[1]);
12617                                                                if(P==null)
12618                                                                {
12619                                                                        P=Pattern.compile(t[1], Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE | Pattern.DOTALL);
12620                                                                        patterns.put(t[1],P);
12621                                                                }
12622                                                                final Matcher M=P.matcher(str);
12623                                                                doIt=M.find();
12624                                                                if(doIt)
12625                                                                        str=str.substring(M.start()).trim();
12626                                                        }
12627                                                }
12628                                                if(doIt)
12629                                                {
12630                                                        Item Tool=null;
12631                                                        if(msg.tool() instanceof Item)
12632                                                                Tool=(Item)msg.tool();
12633                                                        if(Tool==null)
12634                                                                Tool=defaultItem;
12635                                                        if(msg.target() instanceof MOB)
12636                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,1,str, t);
12637                                                        else
12638                                                        if(msg.target() instanceof Item)
12639                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,(Item)msg.target(),script,1,str, t);
12640                                                        else
12641                                                                enqueResponse(affecting,msg.source(),msg.target(),monster,Tool,defaultItem,script,1,str, t);
12642                                                        return;
12643                                                }
12644                                        }
12645                                        break;
12646                                }
12647                        }
12648                }
12649                finally
12650                {
12651                        recurseCounter.addAndGet(-1);
12652                }
12653        }
12654
12655        protected int getTriggerCode(final String trigger, final String[] ttrigger)
12656        {
12657                Integer I=null;
12658                if((ttrigger!=null)&&(ttrigger.length>0))
12659                        I=progH.get(ttrigger[0]);
12660                else
12661                {
12662                        final int x=trigger.indexOf(' ');
12663                        if(x<0)
12664                                I=progH.get(trigger.toUpperCase().trim());
12665                        else
12666                                I=progH.get(trigger.substring(0,x).toUpperCase().trim());
12667                }
12668                if(I==null)
12669                        return 0;
12670                return I.intValue();
12671        }
12672
12673        @Override
12674        public MOB getMakeMOB(final Tickable ticking)
12675        {
12676                MOB mob=null;
12677                if(ticking instanceof MOB)
12678                {
12679                        mob=(MOB)ticking;
12680                        if(!mob.amDead())
12681                                lastKnownLocation=mob.location();
12682                }
12683                else
12684                if(ticking instanceof Environmental)
12685                {
12686                        final Room R=CMLib.map().roomLocation((Environmental)ticking);
12687                        if(R!=null)
12688                                lastKnownLocation=R;
12689
12690                        if((backupMOB==null)
12691                        ||(backupMOB.amDestroyed())
12692                        ||(backupMOB.amDead()))
12693                        {
12694                                backupMOB=CMClass.getMOB("StdMOB");
12695                                if(backupMOB!=null)
12696                                {
12697                                        backupMOB.setName(ticking.name());
12698                                        backupMOB.setDisplayText(L("@x1 is here.",ticking.name()));
12699                                        backupMOB.setDescription("");
12700                                        backupMOB.setAgeMinutes(-1);
12701                                        mob=backupMOB;
12702                                        if(backupMOB.location()!=lastKnownLocation)
12703                                                backupMOB.setLocation(lastKnownLocation);
12704                                }
12705                        }
12706                        else
12707                        {
12708                                backupMOB.setAgeMinutes(-1);
12709                                mob=backupMOB;
12710                                if(backupMOB.location()!=lastKnownLocation)
12711                                {
12712                                        backupMOB.setLocation(lastKnownLocation);
12713                                        backupMOB.setName(ticking.name());
12714                                        backupMOB.setDisplayText(L("@x1 is here.",ticking.name()));
12715                                }
12716                        }
12717                }
12718                return mob;
12719        }
12720
12721        protected boolean canTrigger(final int triggerCode)
12722        {
12723                final Long L=noTrigger.get(Integer.valueOf(triggerCode));
12724                if(L==null)
12725                        return true;
12726                if(System.currentTimeMillis()<L.longValue())
12727                        return false;
12728                noTrigger.remove(Integer.valueOf(triggerCode));
12729                return true;
12730        }
12731
12732        @Override
12733        public boolean tick(final Tickable ticking, final int tickID)
12734        {
12735                final Item defaultItem=(ticking instanceof Item)?(Item)ticking:null;
12736                final MOB mob=getMakeMOB(ticking);
12737                if((mob==null)||(lastKnownLocation==null))
12738                {
12739                        altStatusTickable=null;
12740                        return true;
12741                }
12742
12743                final PhysicalAgent affecting=(ticking instanceof PhysicalAgent)?((PhysicalAgent)ticking):null;
12744
12745                final List<DVector> scripts=getScripts();
12746
12747                if(!runInPassiveAreas)
12748                {
12749                        final Area A=CMLib.map().areaLocation(ticking);
12750                        if((A!=null)&&(A.getAreaState() != Area.State.ACTIVE))
12751                        {
12752                                return true;
12753                        }
12754                }
12755                if(defaultItem != null)
12756                {
12757                        final ItemPossessor poss=defaultItem.owner();
12758                        if(poss instanceof MOB)
12759                        {
12760                                final Room R=((MOB)poss).location();
12761                                if((R==null)||(R.numInhabitants()==0))
12762                                {
12763                                        altStatusTickable=null;
12764                                        return true;
12765                                }
12766                        }
12767                }
12768
12769                int triggerCode=-1;
12770                String trigger="";
12771                String[] t=null;
12772                for(int thisScriptIndex=0;thisScriptIndex<scripts.size();thisScriptIndex++)
12773                {
12774                        final DVector script=scripts.get(thisScriptIndex);
12775                        if(script.size()<2)
12776                                continue;
12777                        trigger=((String)script.elementAt(0,1)).toUpperCase().trim();
12778                        t=(String[])script.elementAt(0,2);
12779                        triggerCode=getTriggerCode(trigger,t);
12780                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_SCRIPT+triggerCode;
12781                        switch(triggerCode)
12782                        {
12783                        case 5: // rand_Prog
12784                                if((!mob.amDead())&&canTrigger(5))
12785                                {
12786                                        if(t==null)
12787                                                t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12788                                        if(t!=null)
12789                                        {
12790                                                final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12791                                                if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<prcnt)
12792                                                        execute(affecting,mob,mob,mob,defaultItem,null,script,null,newObjs());
12793                                        }
12794                                }
12795                                break;
12796                        case 16: // delay_prog
12797                                if((!mob.amDead())&&canTrigger(16))
12798                                {
12799                                        int targetTick=-1;
12800                                        final Integer thisScriptIndexI=Integer.valueOf(thisScriptIndex);
12801                                        final int[] delayProgCounter;
12802                                        synchronized(thisScriptIndexI)
12803                                        {
12804                                                if(delayTargetTimes.containsKey(thisScriptIndexI))
12805                                                        targetTick=delayTargetTimes.get(thisScriptIndexI).intValue();
12806                                                else
12807                                                {
12808                                                        if(t==null)
12809                                                                t=parseBits(script,0,"CCR");
12810                                                        if(t!=null)
12811                                                        {
12812                                                                final int low=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12813                                                                int high=CMath.s_int(t[2]);
12814                                                                if(high<low)
12815                                                                        high=low;
12816                                                                targetTick=CMLib.dice().roll(1,high-low+1,low-1);
12817                                                                delayTargetTimes.put(thisScriptIndexI,Integer.valueOf(targetTick));
12818                                                        }
12819                                                }
12820                                                if(delayProgCounters.containsKey(thisScriptIndexI))
12821                                                        delayProgCounter=delayProgCounters.get(thisScriptIndexI);
12822                                                else
12823                                                {
12824                                                        delayProgCounter=new int[]{0};
12825                                                        delayProgCounters.put(thisScriptIndexI,delayProgCounter);
12826                                                }
12827                                        }
12828                                        boolean exec=false;
12829                                        synchronized(delayProgCounter)
12830                                        {
12831                                                if(delayProgCounter[0]>=targetTick)
12832                                                {
12833                                                        exec=true;
12834                                                        delayProgCounter[0]=0;
12835                                                }
12836                                                else
12837                                                        delayProgCounter[0]++;
12838                                        }
12839                                        if(exec)
12840                                                execute(affecting,mob,mob,mob,defaultItem,null,script,null,newObjs());
12841                                }
12842                                break;
12843                        case 7: // fight_Prog
12844                                if((mob.isInCombat())&&(!mob.amDead())&&canTrigger(7))
12845                                {
12846                                        if(t==null)
12847                                                t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12848                                        if(t!=null)
12849                                        {
12850                                                final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12851                                                if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<prcnt)
12852                                                        execute(affecting,mob.getVictim(),mob,mob,defaultItem,null,script,null,newObjs());
12853                                        }
12854                                }
12855                                else
12856                                if((ticking instanceof Item)
12857                                &&canTrigger(7)
12858                                &&(((Item)ticking).owner() instanceof MOB)
12859                                &&(((MOB)((Item)ticking).owner()).isInCombat()))
12860                                {
12861                                        if(t==null)
12862                                                t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12863                                        if(t!=null)
12864                                        {
12865                                                final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12866                                                if(CMLib.dice().rollPercentage()<prcnt)
12867                                                {
12868                                                        final MOB M=(MOB)((Item)ticking).owner();
12869                                                        if(!M.amDead())
12870                                                                execute(affecting,M,mob.getVictim(),mob,defaultItem,null,script,null,newObjs());
12871                                                }
12872                                        }
12873                                }
12874                                break;
12875                        case 11: // hitprcnt_prog
12876                                if((mob.isInCombat())&&(!mob.amDead())&&canTrigger(11))
12877                                {
12878                                        if(t==null)
12879                                                t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12880                                        if(t!=null)
12881                                        {
12882                                                final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12883                                                final int floor=(int)Math.round(CMath.mul(CMath.div(prcnt,100.0),mob.maxState().getHitPoints()));
12884                                                if(mob.curState().getHitPoints()<=floor)
12885                                                        execute(affecting,mob.getVictim(),mob,mob,defaultItem,null,script,null,newObjs());
12886                                        }
12887                                }
12888                                else
12889                                if((ticking instanceof Item)
12890                                &&canTrigger(11)
12891                                &&(((Item)ticking).owner() instanceof MOB)
12892                                &&(((MOB)((Item)ticking).owner()).isInCombat()))
12893                                {
12894                                        final MOB M=(MOB)((Item)ticking).owner();
12895                                        if(!M.amDead())
12896                                        {
12897                                                if(t==null)
12898                                                        t=parseBits(script,0,"CR");
12899                                                if(t!=null)
12900                                                {
12901                                                        final int prcnt=CMath.s_int(t[1]);
12902                                                        final int floor=(int)Math.round(CMath.mul(CMath.div(prcnt,100.0),M.maxState().getHitPoints()));
12903                                                        if(M.curState().getHitPoints()<=floor)
12904                                                                execute(affecting,M,mob.getVictim(),mob,defaultItem,null,script,null,newObjs());
12905                                                }
12906                                        }
12907                                }
12908                                break;
12909                        case 6: // once_prog
12910                                if(!oncesDone.contains(script)&&canTrigger(6))
12911                                {
12912                                        if(t==null)
12913                                                t=parseBits(script,0,"C");
12914                                        oncesDone.add(script);
12915                                        execute(affecting,mob,mob,mob,defaultItem,null,script,null,newObjs());
12916                                }
12917                                break;
12918                        case 14: // time_prog
12919                                if((mob.location()!=null)
12920                                &&canTrigger(14)
12921                                &&(!mob.amDead()))
12922                                {
12923                                        if(t==null)
12924                                                t=parseBits(script,0,"CT");
12925                                        int lastTimeProgDone=-1;
12926                                        if(lastTimeProgsDone.containsKey(Integer.valueOf(thisScriptIndex)))
12927                                                lastTimeProgDone=lastTimeProgsDone.get(Integer.valueOf(thisScriptIndex)).intValue();
12928                                        final int time=mob.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getHourOfDay();
12929                                        if((t!=null)&&(lastTimeProgDone!=time))
12930                                        {
12931                                                boolean done=false;
12932                                                for(int i=1;i<t.length;i++)
12933                                                {
12934                                                        if(time==CMath.s_int(t[i]))
12935                                                        {
12936                                                                done=true;
12937                                                                execute(affecting,mob,mob,mob,defaultItem,null,script,""+time,newObjs());
12938                                                                lastTimeProgsDone.remove(Integer.valueOf(thisScriptIndex));
12939                                                                lastTimeProgsDone.put(Integer.valueOf(thisScriptIndex),Integer.valueOf(time));
12940                                                                break;
12941                                                        }
12942                                                }
12943                                                if(!done)
12944                                                        lastTimeProgsDone.remove(Integer.valueOf(thisScriptIndex));
12945                                        }
12946                                }
12947                                break;
12948                        case 15: // day_prog
12949                                if((mob.location()!=null)&&canTrigger(15)
12950                                &&(!mob.amDead()))
12951                                {
12952                                        if(t==null)
12953                                                t=parseBits(script,0,"CT");
12954                                        int lastDayProgDone=-1;
12955                                        if(lastDayProgsDone.containsKey(Integer.valueOf(thisScriptIndex)))
12956                                                lastDayProgDone=lastDayProgsDone.get(Integer.valueOf(thisScriptIndex)).intValue();
12957                                        final int day=mob.location().getArea().getTimeObj().getDayOfMonth();
12958                                        if((t!=null)&&(lastDayProgDone!=day))
12959                                        {
12960                                                boolean done=false;
12961                                                for(int i=1;i<t.length;i++)
12962                                                {
12963                                                        if(day==CMath.s_int(t[i]))
12964                                                        {
12965                                                                done=true;
12966                                                                execute(affecting,mob,mob,mob,defaultItem,null,script,null,newObjs());
12967                                                                lastDayProgsDone.remove(Integer.valueOf(thisScriptIndex));
12968                                                                lastDayProgsDone.put(Integer.valueOf(thisScriptIndex),Integer.valueOf(day));
12969                                                                break;
12970                                                        }
12971                                                }
12972                                                if(!done)
12973                                                        lastDayProgsDone.remove(Integer.valueOf(thisScriptIndex));
12974                                        }
12975                                }
12976                                break;
12977                        case 13: // quest_time_prog
12978                                if(!oncesDone.contains(script)&&canTrigger(13))
12979                                {
12980                                        if(t==null)
12981                                                t=parseBits(script,0,"CCC");
12982                                        if(t!=null)
12983                                        {
12984                                                final Quest Q=getQuest(t[1]);
12985                                                if((Q!=null)&&(Q.running())&&(!Q.stopping()))
12986                                                {
12987                                                        final int time=CMath.s_int(t[2]);
12988                                                        if(time>=Q.minsRemaining())
12989                                                        {
12990                                                                oncesDone.add(script);
12991                                                                execute(affecting,mob,mob,mob,defaultItem,null,script,null,newObjs());
12992                                                        }
12993                                                }
12994                                        }
12995                                }
12996                                break;
12997                        default:
12998                                break;
12999                        }
13000                }
13001                tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_SCRIPT+100;
13002                dequeResponses();
13003                altStatusTickable=null;
13004                return true;
13005        }
13006
13007        @Override
13008        public void initializeClass()
13009        {
13010        }
13011
13012        @Override
13013        public int compareTo(final CMObject o)
13014        {
13015                return CMClass.classID(this).compareToIgnoreCase(CMClass.classID(o));
13016        }
13017
13018        public void enqueResponse(final PhysicalAgent host,
13019                                                          final MOB source,
13020                                                          final Environmental target,
13021                                                          final MOB monster,
13022                                                          final Item primaryItem,
13023                                                          final Item secondaryItem,
13024                                                          final DVector script,
13025                                                          final int ticks,
13026                                                          final String msg,
13027                                                          final String[] triggerStr)
13028        {
13029                if(!CMProps.getBoolVar(CMProps.Bool.MUDSTARTED))
13030                        return;
13031                if(que.size()>25)
13032                {
13033                        this.logError(monster, "UNK", "SYS", "Attempt to enque more than 25 events (last was "+CMParms.toListString(triggerStr)+" ).");
13034                        que.clear();
13035                }
13036                if(noDelay)
13037                        execute(host,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,script,msg,newObjs());
13038                else
13039                        que.add(new ScriptableResponse(host,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,script,ticks,msg));
13040        }
13041
13042        public void prequeResponse(final PhysicalAgent host,
13043                                                           final MOB source,
13044                                                           final Environmental target,
13045                                                           final MOB monster,
13046                                                           final Item primaryItem,
13047                                                           final Item secondaryItem,
13048                                                           final DVector script,
13049                                                           final int ticks,
13050                                                           final String msg)
13051        {
13052                if(!CMProps.getBoolVar(CMProps.Bool.MUDSTARTED))
13053                        return;
13054                if(que.size()>25)
13055                {
13056                        this.logError(monster, "UNK", "SYS", "Attempt to pre que more than 25 events.");
13057                        que.clear();
13058                }
13059                que.add(0,new ScriptableResponse(host,source,target,monster,primaryItem,secondaryItem,script,ticks,msg));
13060        }
13061
13062        @Override
13063        public void dequeResponses()
13064        {
13065                try
13066                {
13067                        tickStatus=Tickable.STATUS_SCRIPT+100;
13068                        for(int q=que.size()-1;q>=0;q--)
13069                        {
13070                                ScriptableResponse SB=null;
13071                                try
13072                                {
13073                                        SB=que.get(q);
13074                                }
13075                                catch(final ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException x)
13076                                {
13077                                        continue;
13078                                }
13079                                if(SB.checkTimeToExecute())
13080                                {
13081                                        execute(SB.h,SB.s,SB.t,SB.m,SB.pi,SB.si,SB.scr,SB.message,newObjs());
13082                                        que.remove(SB);
13083                                }
13084                        }
13085                }
13086                catch (final Exception e)
13087                {
13088                        Log.errOut("DefaultScriptingEngine", e);
13089                }
13090        }
13091
13092        public String L(final String str, final String ... xs)
13093        {
13094                return CMLib.lang().fullSessionTranslation(str, xs);
13095        }
13096
13097        protected static class JScriptEvent extends ScriptableObject
13098        {
13099                @Override
13100                public String getClassName()
13101                {
13102                        return "JScriptEvent";
13103                }
13104
13105                static final long                               serialVersionUID        = 43;
13106                final PhysicalAgent                             h;
13107                final MOB                                               s;
13108                final Environmental                             t;
13109                final MOB                                               m;
13110                final Item                                              pi;
13111                final Item                                              si;
13112                final Object[]                                  objs;
13113                Vector<String>                                  scr;
13114                final String                                    message;
13115                final DefaultScriptingEngine    c;
13116
13117                public Environmental host()
13118                {
13119                        return h;
13120                }
13121
13122                public MOB source()
13123                {
13124                        return s;
13125                }
13126
13127                public Environmental target()
13128                {
13129                        return t;
13130                }
13131
13132                public MOB monster()
13133                {
13134                        return m;
13135                }
13136
13137                public Item item()
13138                {
13139                        return pi;
13140                }
13141
13142                public Item item2()
13143                {
13144                        return si;
13145                }
13146
13147                public String message()
13148                {
13149                        return message;
13150                }
13151
13152                public void setVar(final String host, final String var, final String value)
13153                {
13154                        c.setVar(host,var.toUpperCase(),value);
13155                }
13156
13157                public String getVar(final String host, final String var)
13158                {
13159                        return c.getVar(host, var);
13160                }
13161
13162                public String toJavaString(final Object O)
13163                {
13164                        return Context.toString(O);
13165                }
13166
13167                @Override
13168                public Object get(final String name, final Scriptable start)
13169                {
13170                        if (super.has(name, start))
13171                                return super.get(name, start);
13172                        if (methH.containsKey(name) || funcH.containsKey(name)
13173                        || (name.endsWith("$")&&(funcH.containsKey(name.substring(0,name.length()-1)))))
13174                        {
13175                                return new Function()
13176                                {
13177                                        @Override
13178                                        public Object call(final Context cx, final Scriptable scope, final Scriptable thisObj, final Object[] args)
13179                                        {
13180                                                if(methH.containsKey(name))
13181                                                {
13182                                                        final StringBuilder strb=new StringBuilder(name);
13183                                                        if(args.length==1)
13184                                                                strb.append(" ").append(String.valueOf(args[0]));
13185                                                        else
13186                                                        for(int i=0;i<args.length;i++)
13187                                                        {
13188                                                                if(i==args.length-1)
13189                                                                        strb.append(" ").append(String.valueOf(args[i]));
13190                                                                else
13191                                                                        strb.append(" ").append("'"+String.valueOf(args[i])+"'");
13192                                                        }
13193                                                        final DVector DV=new DVector(2);
13194                                                        DV.addElement("JS_PROG",null);
13195                                                        DV.addElement(strb.toString(),null);
13196                                                        return c.execute(h,s,t,m,pi,si,DV,message,objs);
13197                                                }
13198                                                if(name.endsWith("$"))
13199                                                {
13200                                                        final StringBuilder strb=new StringBuilder(name.substring(0,name.length()-1)).append("(");
13201                                                        if(args.length==1)
13202                                                                strb.append(" ").append(String.valueOf(args[0]));
13203                                                        else
13204                                                        for(int i=0;i<args.length;i++)
13205                                                        {
13206                                                                if(i==args.length-1)
13207                                                                        strb.append(" ").append(String.valueOf(args[i]));
13208                                                                else
13209                                                                        strb.append(" ").append("'"+String.valueOf(args[i])+"'");
13210                                                        }
13211                                                        strb.append(" ) ");
13212                                                        return c.functify(h,s,t,m,pi,si,message,objs,strb.toString());
13213                                                }
13214                                                final String[] sargs=new String[args.length+3];
13215                                                sargs[0]=name;
13216                                                sargs[1]="(";
13217                                                for(int i=0;i<args.length;i++)
13218                                                        sargs[i+2]=String.valueOf(args[i]);
13219                                                sargs[sargs.length-1]=")";
13220                                                final String[][] EVAL={sargs};
13221                                                return Boolean.valueOf(c.eval(h,s,t,m,pi,si,message,objs,EVAL,0));
13222                                        }
13223
13224                                        @Override
13225                                        public void delete(final String arg0)
13226                                        {
13227                                        }
13228
13229                                        @Override
13230                                        public void delete(final int arg0)
13231                                        {
13232                                        }
13233
13234                                        @Override
13235                                        public Object get(final String arg0, final Scriptable arg1)
13236                                        {
13237                                                return null;
13238                                        }
13239
13240                                        @Override
13241                                        public Object get(final int arg0, final Scriptable arg1)
13242                                        {
13243                                                return null;
13244                                        }
13245
13246                                        @Override
13247                                        public String getClassName()
13248                                        {
13249                                                return null;
13250                                        }
13251
13252                                        @Override
13253                                        public Object getDefaultValue(final Class<?> arg0)
13254                                        {
13255                                                return null;
13256                                        }
13257
13258                                        @Override
13259                                        public Object[] getIds()
13260                                        {
13261                                                return null;
13262                                        }
13263
13264                                        @Override
13265                                        public Scriptable getParentScope()
13266                                        {
13267                                                return null;
13268                                        }
13269
13270                                        @Override
13271                                        public Scriptable getPrototype()
13272                                        {
13273                                                return null;
13274                                        }
13275
13276                                        @Override
13277                                        public boolean has(final String arg0, final Scriptable arg1)
13278                                        {
13279                                                return false;
13280                                        }
13281
13282                                        @Override
13283                                        public boolean has(final int arg0, final Scriptable arg1)
13284                                        {
13285                                                return false;
13286                                        }
13287
13288                                        @Override
13289                                        public boolean hasInstance(final Scriptable arg0)
13290                                        {
13291                                                return false;
13292                                        }
13293
13294                                        @Override
13295                                        public void put(final String arg0, final Scriptable arg1, final Object arg2)
13296                                        {
13297                                        }
13298
13299                                        @Override
13300                                        public void put(final int arg0, final Scriptable arg1, final Object arg2)
13301                                        {
13302                                        }
13303
13304                                        @Override
13305                                        public void setParentScope(final Scriptable arg0)
13306                                        {
13307                                        }
13308
13309                                        @Override
13310                                        public void setPrototype(final Scriptable arg0)
13311                                        {
13312                                        }
13313
13314                                        @Override
13315                                        public Scriptable construct(final Context arg0, final Scriptable arg1, final Object[] arg2)
13316                                        {
13317                                                return null;
13318                                        }
13319                                };
13320                        }
13321                        return super.get(name, start);
13322                }
13323
13324                public void executeEvent(final DVector script, final int lineNum)
13325                {
13326                        c.execute(h, s, t, m, pi, si, script, message, objs, lineNum);
13327                }
13328
13329                public JScriptEvent(final DefaultScriptingEngine scrpt,
13330                                                        final PhysicalAgent host,
13331                                                        final MOB source,
13332                                                        final Environmental target,
13333                                                        final MOB monster,
13334                                                        final Item primaryItem,
13335                                                        final Item secondaryItem,
13336                                                        final String msg,
13337                                                        final Object[] tmp)
13338                {
13339                        c=scrpt;
13340                        h=host;
13341                        s=source;
13342                        t=target;
13343                        m=monster;
13344                        pi=primaryItem;
13345                        si=secondaryItem;
13346                        message=msg;
13347                        objs=tmp;
13348                }
13349        }
13350}
